Evañca attano ajaṭākāsassa viya dānādikiriyā hiṃsādikiriyā ca na sambhavati, tathā sukhassa dukkhassa ca anubhavanabandho eva attavādino na yujjati kammabandhābhāvato. Jātiādīnañca asambhavato kuto vimokkho. Atha pana ‘‘dhammamattaṃ tassa uppajjati ceva vinassati ca. Yassa vasenāyaṃ kiriyāvohāro’’ti vadeyya, evampi purimarūpāvijahanena avaṭṭhitassa attano dhammamattanti na sakkā sambhāvetuṃ. Te vā panassa dhammā avatthābhūtā, tato aññe vā siyuṃ anaññe vā. Yadi ^a^V2.0036^ea^ aññe, na tāhi tassa uppannāhipi koci viseso atthi. Yo hi karoti paṭisaṃvedeti cavati upapajjati cāti icchitaṃ, tasmā tadattho eva yathāvuttadoso. Kiñca dhammakappanāpi niratthikā siyā. Atha anaññe, uppādavināsavantīhi avatthāhi anaññassa attano tāsaṃ viya uppādavināsasambhavato kuto niccatāvakāso. Tāsampi vā attano viya niccatāpattīti bandhavimokkhānaṃ asambhavo evāti na yujjatevāyaṃ attavādo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘attā nāma koci dukkhassa kārako natthīti dīpetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Parato^eb^ti ‘‘paraṃkataṃ dukkha’’ntiādike parasmiṃ tividhepi naye. ^b^Adhiccasamuppanna^eb^nti adhicca yadicchāya kiñci kāraṇaṃ kassaci vā pubbaṃ vinā samuppannaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘akāraṇena yadicchāya uppanna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Kasmā evamāhā^eb^ti evaṃ vakkhamānoti adhippāyo. ^b^Assā^eb^ti acelassa. ^b^Aya^eb^nti bhagavantaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Sodhento^eb^ti sayaṃ visuddhaṃ katvā pucchitamatthaṃ eva attano pucchāya suddhiṃ dassento. Laddhiyā ‘‘sayaṃkataṃ dukkha’’nti micchāgahaṇassa paṭisedhanatthāya.

[03]^b^So karotī^eb^ti so kammaṃ karoti. ^b^So paṭisaṃvedayatī^eb^ti kārakavedakānaṃ anaññattadassanaparaṃ etaṃ, na pana kammakiriyāphalānaṃ paṭisaṃvedanānaṃ samānakālatādassanaparaṃ. ^b^Itī^eb^ti nidassanatthe nipāto. ^b^Kho^eb^ti avadhāraṇe. ‘‘So evā’’ti dassito. Aniyatādesā hi ete nipātā. ^b^Ādito^eb^ti bhummatthe nissakkavacananti āha ^b^‘‘ādimhiyevā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Sayaṃkataṃ dukkha’’nti laddhiyā pageva ‘‘so karoti, so paṭisaṃvedayatī’’ti saññācittavipallāsā bhavanti. Saññāvipallāsato hi cittavipallāso, cittavipallāsato diṭṭhivipallāso, tenāha ^b^‘‘evaṃ sati pacchā sayaṃkataṃ dukkhanti ayaṃ laddhi hotī’’^eb^ti. Evaṃ ^a^M2.0042^ea^ sati saññācittavipallāsānaṃ brūhito micchābhiniveso, yadidaṃ ‘‘sayaṃkataṃ dukkha’’nti laddhi. Tasmā paṭinissajjetuṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigatanti dasseti. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘sayaṃkataṃ…pe… etaṃ paretī’’ti. ^b^Vaṭṭadukkhaṃ adhippetaṃ^eb^ avisesato atthīti ca vuttattā. ^b^Sassataṃ^eb^ sassatagāhaṃ ^b^dīpeti^eb^ paresaṃ pakāseti, tathābhūto ca ^b^sassataṃ^eb^ daḷhaggāhaṃ ^b^gaṇhātī^eb^ti. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti diṭṭhigatikassa. ^b^Taṃ^eb^ ‘‘sayaṃkataṃ dukkha’’nti evaṃ pavattaṃ viparītadassanaṃ. ^b^Etaṃ^eb^ sassataggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Pareti^eb^ upeti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kārakañca…pe… attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ekameva gaṇhanta^eb^nti satipi vatthubhede ayoniso uppajjanena ekameva katvā gaṇhantaṃ.

[03]^b^Idha^eb^ ‘‘ādimhiyevā’’ti pade. ‘‘Paraṃkataṃ dukkha’’nti laddhiyā pagevātiādinā hettha vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo. Ayañhettha yojanā – ‘‘paraṃkataṃ dukkha’’nti laddhiyā pageva añño karoti, añño paṭisaṃvedayatīti saññācittavipallāsā bhavantīti sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva ^a^V2.0037^ea^ yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Evaṃ satī^eb^ti evaṃ muduke ucchedavipallāse paṭhamuppanne sati pacchā ‘‘paraṃkataṃ dukkha’’nti ayaṃ laddhi hotīti sambandho. ^b^Kārako^eb^ti kammassa kārako. ^b^Tena kata^eb^nti kammakārakena kataṃ. Kammunā hi phalassa vohāro abhedopacārakattā. ^b^Eva^eb^nti diṭṭhisahagatā vedanā sātasabhāvā kilesapariḷāhādinā saparissayā saupāyāsā, evaṃ. ‘‘Pageva itare’’ti vuttavedanāya ^b^abhitunnassa viddhassa^eb^. ‘‘Vuttanayena yojetabba’’nti vatvā taṃ yojanaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘tatrāya’’^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^Uccheda^eb^nti sato sattassa ucchedaṃ vināsaṃ, vibhavanti attho. Asato hi vināsāsambhavato atthibhāvanibandhano ucchedo. Yathā hetuphalabhāvena pavattamānānaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ satipi ekasantānapariyāpannānaṃ bhinnasantatipatitehi visese hetuphalānaṃ paramatthato avinābhāvattā bhinnasantānapatitānaṃ viya accantabhedasanniṭṭhānena nānattanayassa micchāgahaṇaṃ ucchedābhinivesassa kāraṇaṃ. Evaṃ hetuphalabhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ vijjamānepi sabhāvabhede ekasantatipariyāpannatāya ekattanayena accantābhedagahaṇampi kāraṇamevāti dassetuṃ ‘‘sattassā’’ti vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ. Santānavasena hi vattamānesu khandhesu ghanavinibbhogābhāvena ekattagahaṇanibandhano sattaggāho, sattassa ca atthibhāvaggāhanibandhano ucchedaggāho, yāvāyaṃ attā na ^a^M2.0043^ea^ ucchijjati, tāvāyaṃ vijjatiyevāti gahaṇato nirudayavināso idha ucchedoti adhippetoti ‘‘uccheda’’nti vuttaṃ. Visesena nāso vināso, abhāvo. So pana maṃsacakkhupaññācakkhūnaṃ dassanapathātikkamoyeva hotīti vuttaṃ ‘‘adassana’’nti. Adassane hi nāsasaddo loke niruḷhoti. Sabhāvavigamo sabhāvāpagamo vibhavo. Yo hi nirudayavināsena ucchijjati, na so attano sabhāvena tiṭṭhati.

[03]^b^Ete te^eb^ti vā ye ime tayā ‘‘sayaṃkataṃ dukkha’’nti ca puṭṭhena mayā ‘‘so karoti, so paṭisaṃvedayatī’’tiādinā, ‘‘añño karoti, añño paṭisaṃvedayatī’’tiādinā ca paṭikkhittā sassatucchedasaṅkhātā antā, te ubho anteti yojanā. Atha vā ^b^ete te^eb^ti yattha puthū aññatitthiyā anupacitañāṇasambhāratāya paramagambhīraṃ saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ suññataṃ appajānantā sassatucchede nimuggā sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na visahanti, ete te ubho ante anupagammāti yojanā. ^b^Desetī^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ tāva anaññasādhāraṇe paṭipattidhamme ñāṇānubhāvena majjhimāya paṭipadāya ṭhito, karuṇānubhāvena desanādhamme majjhimāya paṭipadāya ṭhito dhammaṃ deseti. ^b^Ettha hī^eb^ti ^b^hi^eb^-saddo hetuattho. Yasmā kāraṇato…pe… niddiṭṭho, tasmā majjhimāya paṭipadāya ṭhito dhammaṃ desetīti yojanā. Kāraṇato phalaṃ dīpitanti yojanā, abhidheyyānurūpañhi liṅgavacanāni honti. ^b^Assā^eb^ti phalassa. ^b^Na koci kārako vā vedako vā niddiṭṭho,^eb^ aññadatthu paṭikkhitto hetuphalamattatādassanato kevalaṃ dukkhakkhandhagahaṇatoti. ^b^Ettāvatā^eb^ti ‘‘ete ^a^V2.0038^ea^ te, kassapa…pe… dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotī’’ti ettakena tāva padena. ^b^Sesapañhā^eb^ti ‘‘sayaṃkatañca paraṃkatañca dukkha’’ntiādikā sesā cattāro pañhā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘‘kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, natthi dukkha’’nti pañho pāḷiyaṃ sarūpeneva paṭikkhittoti na uddhato. ^b^Paṭisedhitā hontī^eb^ti tatiyapañho, tāva paṭhamadutiyapañhapaṭikkhepeneva paṭikkhitto, so hi pañho visuṃ visuṃ paṭikkhepena ekajjhaṃ paṭikkhepena ca. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ubho…pe… paṭikkhitto’’^eb^ti. Ettha ca yassa attā kārako vedako vā icchito, tena vipariṇāmadhammo attā anuññāto hoti. Tathā ca sati anupubbadhammappavattiyā rūpādidhammānaṃ viya ^a^M2.0044^ea^, sukhādidhammānaṃ viya cassa paccayāyattavuttitāya uppādavantatā āpajjati. Uppāde ca sati avassaṃbhāvī nirodhoti anavakāsā niccatāti. Tassa ‘‘sayaṃkata’’nti paṭhamapañhapaṭikkhepo pacchā ce attano niruḷhassa samudayo hotīti pubbe viya anena bhavitabbaṃ, pubbe viya vā pacchāpi. ^b^Sesapañhā^eb^ti tatiyapañhādayo. ^b^Tatiyapañho paṭikkhitto^eb^ti evañca tatiyapañho paṭikkhitto veditabbo – ‘‘avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā’’tiādinā satataṃ samitaṃ paccayāyattassa dīpanena dukkhassa adhiccasamuppannatā paṭikkhittā, tato eva tassa ajānanañca paṭikkhittaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī’’ti (ma. ni. 3.126; saṃ. ni. 2.39-40; mahāva. 1; udā. 1).

[03]Yaṃ parivāsaṃ samādiyitvā parivasatīti yojanā. ^b^Vacanasiliṭṭhatāvasenā^eb^ti ‘‘bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ labheyyaṃ upasampada’’nti yācantena tena vuttavacanasiliṭṭhatāvasena. ^b^Gāmappavesanādīnī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena nātidivāpaṭikkamanaṃ, navesiyādigocaratā, sabrahmacārīnaṃ kiccesu dakkhatādi, uddesādīsu tibbacchandatā, titthiyānaṃ avaṇṇabhaṇane attamanatā, buddhādīnaṃ avaṇṇabhaṇane anattamanatā, titthiyānaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇane anattamanatā, buddhādīnaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇane attamanatāti (mahāva. 87) imesaṃ saṅgaho. ^b^Aṭṭha vattānī^eb^ti imāni aṭṭha titthiyavattāni pūrentena. Ettha ca nātikālena gāmappavesanā tattha visuddhakāyavacīsamācārena piṇḍāya caritvā nātidivāpaṭikkamananti idamekaṃ vattaṃ.

[03]^b^Ayamettha pāṭho^eb^ti etasmiṃ kassapasutte ayaṃ pāṭho. ^b^Aññatthā^eb^ti sīhanādasuttādīsu (dī. ni. 1.402-403). ^b^Ghaṃsitvā koṭṭetvā^eb^ti yathā suvaṇṇaṃ nighaṃsitvā adhikaraṇiyā koṭṭetvā niddosameva gayhati, evaṃ parivāsavattacaraṇena ghaṃsitvā suddhabhāvavīmaṃsanena koṭṭetvā suddho eva aññatitthiyapubbo idha gayhati. ^b^Tibbacchandata^eb^nti sāsanaṃ anupavisitvā brahmacariyavāse tibbacchandataṃ daḷhatarābhirucitaṃ. ^b^Aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesī^eb^ti nāmagottena apākaṭaṃ ^a^V2.0039^ea^ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ āṇāpesi ehibhikkhūpasampadāya upanissayābhāvato. ^b^Gaṇe nisīditvā^eb^ti bhikkhū attano santike pattāsanavasena gaṇe nisīditvā.
[06]Acelakassapasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^18^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yasmā ^a^M2.0045^ea^ timbaruko ‘‘vedanā attā. Attāva vedayatī’’ti evaṃladdhiko, tasmā tāya laddhiyā ‘‘sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkha’’nti vadati, taṃ paṭisaṃharituṃ bhagavā ‘‘sā vedanā’’tiādiṃ avoca. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sā vedanātiādi sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkhanti laddhiyā nisedhanatthaṃ vutta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Etthāpī^eb^ti imasmimpi sutte. ^b^Tatrā^eb^ti yaṃ vuttaṃ ‘‘sā vedanā…pe… sukhadukkha’’nti, tasmiṃ pāṭhe. ^b^Ādimhiyevā^eb^ti ettha bhummavacanena ‘‘ādito’’ti to-saddo na nissakkavacane. ^b^Eva^eb^-kārena kho-saddo avadhāraṇeti dasseti. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ anantarasutte vuttameva. Tattha pana ‘‘vedanāto añño attā, vedanāya kārako’’ti laddhikassa diṭṭhigatikassa vādo paṭikkhitto, idha ‘‘vedanā attā’’ti evaṃladdhikassāti ayameva viseso. Tenāha ^b^‘‘evañhi sati vedanāya eva vedanā katā hotī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Imissā^eb^ti yāya vedanāya sukhadukkhaṃ kataṃ, imissā. ^b^Pubbepī^eb^ti sassatākārato pubbepi. ^b^Purimañhi attha^eb^nti anantarasutte vuttaṃ atthaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhakathāya^eb^nti porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ. ^b^Ta^eb^nti purimasutte vuttamatthaṃ. ^b^Assā^eb^ti imassa suttassa. Yasmā timbaruko ‘‘vedanāva attā’’ti gaṇhāti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ahaṃ sā vedanā…pe… na vadāmī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Aññā vedanā^eb^tiādīsupi yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ anantarasutte vuttanayameva. ^b^Kārakavedanā^eb^ti kattubhūtavedanā. ^b^Vedanāsukhadukkha^eb^nti vedanābhūtasukhadukkhaṃ kathitaṃ, na vaṭṭasukhadukkhaṃ. ^b^‘‘Vipākasukhadukkhameva vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ ‘‘sayaṃkataṃ sukhaṃ dukkha’’ntiādivacanato.
[06]Timbarukasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^19^eb^^b^.^eb^ Avijjā nīvaraṇā bhavādi-ādīnavassa nivāritapaṭicchādikā etassāti ^b^avijjānīvaraṇo,^eb^ avijjāya nivutoti āha ^b^‘‘avijjāya nivāritassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ayaṃ kāyo^eb^ti bālassa appahīnakilesassa paccuppannaṃ attabhāvaṃ rakkhaṃ katvā avijjāya paṭicchāditādīnave ayāthāvadassanavasena ^a^V2.0040^ea^ taṇhāya paṭiladdhacittassa taṃtaṃbhavūpagā saṅkhārā saṅkharīyanti. Tehi ^a^M2.0046^ea^ ca attabhāvassa abhinibbatti, tasmā ayañca avijjāya kāyo nibbattoti. ^b^Assā^eb^ti bālassa. ^b^Ayaṃ attho^eb^ti ‘‘ayaṃ kāyo nāmarūpanti ca vutto’’ti attho dīpetabbo upādānakkhandhasaḷāyatanasaṅgahato tesaṃ dhammānaṃ. ^b^Evametaṃ dvaya^eb^nti evaṃ avijjāya nivāritattā, taṇhāya ca saṃyuttattā evaṃ saparasantānagatasaviññāṇakakāyasaṅkhātaṃ dvayaṃ hoti. ^b^Aññatthā^eb^ti suttantaresu. ‘‘Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.204, 400; 3.421, 425-426; saṃ. ni. 2.43-45; 4.60-61; kathā. 465, 467) ajjhattikabāhirāyatanāni bhinditvā cakkhurūpādidvayāni paṭicca cakkhusamphassādayo vuttā, idha pana abhinditvā cha ajjhattikabāhirāyatanāni paṭicca cakkhusamphassādayo vuttā ^b^‘‘dvayaṃ paṭicca phasso’’^eb^ti, tasmā ^b^mahādvayaṃ nāma kiretaṃ^eb^ anavasesato ajjhattikabāhirāyatanānaṃ gahitattā. ^b^Ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanānī^eb^ti etthāpi hi saḷāyatanāni saṅgahitāneva. ^b^Phassakāraṇānī^eb^ti phassapavattiyā paccayāni. ^b^Yehī^eb^ti hetudassanamattanti āha ^b^‘‘yehi kāraṇabhūtehī’’^eb^ti. Phasso eva phusanakicco, na phassāyatanānīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘phassena phuṭṭho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paripuṇṇavasenā^eb^ti avekallavasena. Aparipuṇṇāyatanānaṃ hīnāni phassassa kāraṇāni honti, tesaṃ viyāti ‘‘etesaṃ vā aññatarenā’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Kāyanibbattanādimhī^eb^ti saviññāṇakassa kāyassa nibbattanaṃ kāyanibbattanaṃ, kāyo vā nibbattati etenāti kāyanibbattanaṃ, kilesābhisaṅkhārā. ^b^Ādi^eb^saddena phassasaḷāyatanādisaṅgaho. Adhikaṃ payasati payuñjati etenāti adhippayāso, visesakāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘adhikapayogo’’^eb^ti.

[03]Bhagavā amhākaṃ uppādakabhāvena mūlabhāvena ^b^bhagavaṃmūlakā. Ime dhammā^eb^ti ime kāraṇadhammā. Yehi mayaṃ bālapaṇḍitānaṃ samānepi kāyanibbattanādimhi visesaṃ jāneyyāma, tenāha ^b^‘‘pubbe kassapasammāsambuddhena uppāditā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ājānāmā^eb^ti abhimukhaṃ paccakkhato jānāma. ^b^Paṭivijjhāmā^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ, adhigacchāmāti attho. ^b^Netā^eb^ti amhākaṃ santāne pāpetā. ^b^Vinetā^eb^ti yathā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso hoti, evaṃ visesato netā, tadaṅgavinayādivasena vā vinetā. ^b^Anunetā^eb^ti anurūpaṃ netā. Antarantarā yathādhammapaññattiyā paññāpitānaṃ dhammānaṃ anurūpato dassanaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘yathāsabhāvato^eb^^a^M2.0047^ea^^b^…pe… dassetā’’^eb^ti. Āpāthaṃ upagacchantānaṃ bhagavā paṭisaraṇaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānanti ^b^bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā^eb^ dhammā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘catubhūmakadhammā’’^eb^tiādi. Paṭisarati paṭivijjhatīti paṭisaraṇaṃ, tasmā paṭivijjhanavasena bhagavā paṭisaraṇaṃ etesanti ^b^bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘api cā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Phasso āgacchatī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0041^ea^ paṭivijjhanakavasena phasso ñāṇassa āpāthaṃ āgacchati, āpāthaṃ āgacchantoyeva so atthato ‘‘ahaṃ kinnāmo’’ti nāmaṃ pucchanto viya, bhagavā cassa nāmaṃ karonto viya hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ahaṃ bhagavā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Upaṭṭhātū^eb^ti ñāṇassa paccupaṭṭhātu. ^b^Bhagavantaṃyeva paṭibhātū^eb^ti bhagavato eva bhāgo hotu, bhagavāva naṃ attano bhāgaṃ katvā vissajjetūti attho, bhagavato bhāgo yadidaṃ dhammassa akkhānaṃ, amhākaṃ pana savanaṃ bhāgoti ayamettha adhippāyo. Evañhi saddalakkhaṇena sameti. Keci pana paṭibhātūti atthaṃ vadanti ñāṇena dissatu desīyatūti vā attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tumheyeva no kathetvā dethāti attho’’^eb^ti.

[03]Bālassa paṇḍitassa ca kāyassa nibbattiyā paccayabhūtā ^b^avijjā ca taṇhā ca^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kammaṃ…pe… niruddhā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Javāpetvā^eb^ti gahitajavanaṃ katvā, yathā paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ samatthaṃ hoti, evaṃ katvā. Yadi niruddhā, kathaṃ appahīnāti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘yathā panā’’^eb^tiādi. Bhavati hi taṃsadisepi tabbohāro yathā ‘‘sā eva tittirī, tāneva osadhāni, tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesenā’’ti ca. ^b^Dukkhakkhayāyā^eb^ti tadatthavisesanatthanti āha ^b^‘‘khayatthāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṭisandhikāya^eb^nti paṭisandhigahaṇapubbakaṃ kāyaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘bālenā’’ti karaṇavacanaṃ nissakketi āha ^b^‘‘bālato’’^eb^ti. Bhāvinā saha paṭisandhinā ^b^sappaṭisandhiko^eb^. Yo pana ekantato tenattabhāvena arahattaṃ pattuṃ bhabbo, so bhāvinā paṭisandhinā ‘‘appaṭisandhiko’’ti, tato visesanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘sappaṭisandhiko’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi vuttaṃ, so ca yāva ariyabhūmiṃ na okkamati, tāva bāladhammasamaṅgī evāti katvā ^b^‘‘sabbopi puthujjano bālo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi ‘‘appaṭisandhiko khīṇāsavo paṇḍito’’ti khīṇāsava-saddena appaṭisandhiko visesito. Yadi evaṃ sekkhā kathanti āha ^b^‘‘sotāpannā’’^eb^tiādi. Te hi sikhāpattapaṇḍiccabhāvalakkhaṇābhāvato paṇḍitāti na vattabbā khīṇāsavā viya, balavatarānaṃ ^a^M2.0048^ea^ pana bāladhammānaṃ pahīnattā bālātipi na vattabbā puthujjanā viya. Bhajiyamānā pana catusaccasampaṭivedhaṃ upādāya ^b^paṇḍitapakkhaṃ bhajanti,^eb^ na bālapakkhaṃ vuttakāraṇenāti.
[06]Bālapaṇḍitasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^20^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sabbampi saṅkhataṃ appaṭicca uppannaṃ nāma natthīti paccayadhammopi attano paccayadhammaṃ upādāya paccayuppanno, tathā paccayuppannadhammopi attano paccayuppannaṃ upādāya paccayadhammoti yathārahaṃ dhammānaṃ paccayapaccayuppannatā. Yesaṃ vineyyānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādadesanāyeva subodhato ^a^V2.0042^ea^ upaṭṭhāti, tesaṃ vasena suṭṭhu vibhāgaṃ katvā paṭiccasamuppādo desito. Yesaṃ pana vineyyānaṃ tadubhayasmiṃ vibhajja sute eva dhammābhisamayo hoti, te sandhāya bhagavā tadubhayaṃ vibhajja dassento ‘‘paṭiccasamuppādañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi paṭiccasamuppanne ca dhamme’’ti imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhīti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento ^b^‘‘satthā imasmiṃ sutte’’^eb^tiādimāha. Paccayassa bhāvo paccayattaṃ, paccayanibbattatā. Asabhāvadhamme na labbhatīti ^b^‘‘sabhāvadhamme’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Nanu ca jāti jarā maraṇañca sabhāvadhammo na hoti, yesaṃ pana khandhānaṃ jāti jarā maraṇañca, te eva sabhāvadhammā, atha kasmā desanāya te gahitāti? Nāyaṃ doso, jāti jarā maraṇañhi paccayanibbattānaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ vikāramattaṃ, naññesaṃ, tasmā te gahitāti. ^b^Uppādā vā tathāgatāna^eb^nti na vineyyapuggalānaṃ maggaphaluppatti viya jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇuppatti tathāgatuppādāyattā, atha kho sā tathāgatānaṃ uppādepi anuppādepi hotiyeva. Tasmā sā kāmaṃ asaṅkhatā viya dhātu na niccā, tathāpi ‘‘sabbakālikā’’ti etena jātipaccayato jarāmaraṇuppattīti dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘jātiyeva jarāmaraṇassa paccayo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Jātipaccayā^eb^ti ca jātisaṅkhātapaccayā. Hetumhi nissakkavacanaṃ. Ṭhitāva sā dhātu, yāyaṃ idappaccayatā jātiyā jarāmaraṇassa paccayatā tassa byabhicārābhāvato. Idāni ^b^na kadāci jāti jarāmaraṇassa paccayo na hoti^eb^ hotiyevāti jarāmaraṇassa paccayabhāve niyameti. Ubhayenapi yathāvuttassa paccayabhāvo yattha ^a^M2.0049^ea^ hoti, tattha avassaṃbhāvitaṃ dasseti. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘ṭhitāva sā dhātū’’ti. ^b^Dvīhi^eb^ padehi. ^b^Tiṭṭhantī^eb^ti yassa vasena dhammānaṃ ṭhiti, sā idappaccayatā ^b^dhammaṭṭhitatā. Dhamme^eb^ti paccayuppanne dhamme. ^b^Niyameti^eb^ viseseti. Hetugatavisesasamāyogo hi hetuphalassa evaṃ dhammatāniyāmo evāti.

[03]Aparo nayo – ^b^ṭhitāva sā dhātū^eb^ti yāyaṃ jarāmaraṇassa idappaccayatā ‘‘jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa’’nti, esā dhātu esa sabhāvo. Tathāgatānaṃ uppādato pubbe uddhañca appaṭivijjhiyamāno, majjhe ca paṭivijjhiyamāno na tathāgatehi uppādito, atha kho sambhavantassa jarāmaraṇassa sabbakālaṃ jātipaccayato sambhavoti ṭhitāva sā dhātu, kevalaṃ pana sayambhuñāṇena abhisambujjhanato ‘‘ayaṃ dhammo tathāgatena abhisambuddho’’ti pavedanato ca tathāgato ‘‘dhammasāmī’’ti vuccati, na apubbassa uppādanato. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘ṭhitāva sā dhātū’’ti. Sā eva ‘‘jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa’’nti ettha vipallāsābhāvato evaṃ avabujjhamānassa etassa sabhāvassa, hetuno vā tatheva bhāvato ṭhitatāti ^b^dhammaṭṭhitatā,^eb^ jāti vā jarāmaraṇassa uppādaṭṭhiti pavattāayūhana-saṃyoga-palibodha-samudaya-hetupaccayaṭṭhitīti taduppādādibhāvenassā ṭhitatā ‘‘dhammaṭṭhitatā’’ti phalaṃ pati sāmatthiyato hetumeva vadati. Dhārīyati ^a^V2.0043^ea^ paccayehīti vā dhammo, tiṭṭhati tattha tadāyattavuttitāya phalanti ṭhiti, dhammassa ṭhiti ^b^dhammaṭṭhiti^eb^. Dhammoti vā kāraṇaṃ paccayabhāvena phalassa dhāraṇato, tassa ṭhiti sabhāvo, dhammato ca añño sabhāvo natthīti dhammaṭṭhiti, paccayo. Tenāha ‘‘paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa’’nti (paṭi. ma. mātikā 4). Dhammaṭṭhiti eva ^b^dhammaṭṭhitatā^eb^. Sā eva dhātu ‘‘jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa’’nti imassa sabhāvassa, hetuno vā aññathattābhāvato, ‘‘na jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa’’nti viññāyamānassa ca tabbhāvābhāvato niyāmatā vavatthitabhāvoti ^b^dhammaniyāmatā^eb^. Phalassa vā jarāmaraṇassa jātiyā sati sambhavo dhamme hetumhi ṭhitatāti ^b^dhammaṭṭhitatā,^eb^ asati asambhavo ^b^dhammaniyāmatā^eb^ti evaṃ phalena hetuṃ vibhāveti, taṃ ‘‘ṭhitāva sā dhātū’’tiādinā vuttaṃ. Imesaṃ jarāmaraṇādīnaṃ paccayatāsaṅkhātaṃ idappaccayataṃ ^b^abhisambujjhati^eb^ paccakkhakaraṇena ^a^M2.0050^ea^ abhimukhaṃ bujjhati yāthāvato paṭivijjhati, tato eva ^b^abhisameti^eb^ abhimukhaṃ samāgacchati, ādito kathento ācikkhati, uddisatīti attho. Tameva uddesaṃ pariyosāpento ^b^deseti^eb^. Yathāuddiṭṭhamattaṃ niddisanavasena pakārehi ñāpento ^b^paññāpeti^eb^. Pakārehi eva patiṭṭhapento ^b^paṭṭhapeti^eb^. Yathāniddiṭṭhaṃ paṭiniddesavasena ^b^vivarati vibhajati^eb^. Vivaṭañhi vibhattañca atthaṃ hetūdāharaṇadassanehi pākaṭaṃ karonto ^b^uttānīkaroti^eb^. Uttānīkaronto tathā paccakkhabhūtaṃ katvā nigamanavasena ^b^passathāti cāha^eb^.

[03]^b^Jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇantiādīsū^eb^ti jātiādīnaṃ jarāmaraṇapaccayabhāvesu. ^b^Tehi tehi paccayehī^eb^ti yāvatakehi paccayehi yaṃ phalaṃ uppajjamānārahaṃ, avikalehi teheva tassa uppatti, na ūnādhikehīti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anūnādhikehevā’’^eb^ti. Yathā taṃ cakkhurūpālokamanasikārehi cakkhuviññāṇassa sambhavoti. Tena taṃtaṃphalanipphādane tassā paccayasāmaggiyā tappakāratā ^b^tathatā^eb^ti vuttāti dasseti. ^b^Sāmaggi^eb^nti samodhānaṃ, samavāyanti attho. ^b^Asambhavābhāvato^eb^ti anuppajjanassa abhāvato. Tathāvidhapaccayasāmaggiyañhi satipi phalassa anuppajjane tassāvitathatā siyā. ^b^Aññadhammapaccayehī^eb^ti aññassa phaladhammassa paccayehi. ^b^Aññadhammānuppattito^eb^ti tato aññassa phaladhammassa anuppajjanato. Na hi kadāci cakkhurūpālokamanasikārehi sotaviññāṇassa sambhavo atthi. Yadi siyā, tassā sāmaggiyā aññathatā nāma siyā, na cetaṃ atthīti ^b^‘‘anaññathatā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Paccayato^eb^ti paccayabhāvato. ^b^Paccayasamūhato^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Idappaccayā eva ^b^idappaccayatā^eb^ti ^b^tā^eb^-saddena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ yathā ‘‘devoyeva devatā’’ti, idappaccayānaṃ samūho ^b^idappaccayatā^eb^ti samūhattho ^b^tā^eb^saddo yathā ‘‘janānaṃ samūho janatā’’ti imamatthaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘lakkhaṇaṃ panettha saddasatthato veditabba’’^eb^nti.

[03]Na ^a^V2.0044^ea^ niccaṃ sassatanti ^b^aniccaṃ. Jarāmaraṇaṃ na aniccaṃ^eb^ saṅkhārānaṃ vikārabhāvato anipphannattā, tathāpi ‘‘anicca’’nti pariyāyena vuttaṃ. Esa nayo saṅkhatādīsupi. ^b^Samāgantvā kataṃ^eb^ sahiteheva paccayehi nibbattetabbato yathāsabhāvaṃ samecca sambhuyya paccayehi katanti ^b^saṅkhataṃ^eb^^a^M2.0051^ea^. Paccayārahaṃ paccayaṃ paṭicca na vinā tena sahitasametameva uppannanti ^b^paṭiccasamuppannaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paccaye nissāya uppanna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Khayasabhāva^eb^nti bhijjanasabhāvaṃ. ^b^Vigacchanakasabhāva^eb^nti sakabhāvato apagacchanakasabhāvaṃ. ^b^Virajjanakasabhāva^eb^nti palujjanakasabhāvaṃ. ^b^Nirujjhanakasabhāva^eb^nti khaṇabhaṅgavasena pabhaṅgusabhāvaṃ. ^b^Vuttanayenā^eb^ti jarāya vuttanayena. ^b^Janakappaccayānaṃ^eb^ kammādīnaṃ. ^b^Kiccānubhāvakkhaṇe^eb^ti ettha ^b^kiccānubhāvo^eb^ nāma yathā pavattamāne paccaye tassa phalaṃ uppajjati, tathā pavatti, evaṃ santassa pavattanakkhaṇe. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmiṃ khaṇe paccayo attano phaluppādanaṃ pati byāvaṭo nāma hoti, imasmiṃ khaṇe ye dhammā rūpādayo upalabbhanti tato pubbe, pacchā ca anupalabbhamānā, tesaṃ tato uppatti niddhārīyati, evaṃ jātiyāpi sā niddhāretabbā taṃkhaṇūpaladdhatoti. Yadi evaṃ nippariyāyatova jātiyā kutoci uppatti siddhi, atha kasmā ‘‘ekena pariyāyenā’’ti vuttanti? Jāyamānadhammānaṃ vikārabhāvena upaladdhabbattā. Yadi nipphannadhammā viya jāti upalabbheyya, nippariyāyatova tassā kutoci uppatti siyā, na cevaṃ upalabbhati, atha kho anipphannattā vikārabhāvena upalabbhati. Tasmā ^b^‘‘ekena pariyāyenettha aniccātiādīni yujjantī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Na pana jarāmaraṇe, janakappaccayānaṃ kiccānubhāvakkhaṇe tassa alabbhanato. Teneva ‘‘ettha ca aniccanti…pe… aniccaṃ nāma jāta’’nti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Savipassanāyā^eb^ti ettha ^b^saha^eb^-saddo appadhānabhāvadīpano ‘‘samakkhikaṃ, samakasa’’ntiādīsu viya. Appadhānabhūtā hi vipassanā, yathābhūtadassanamaggapaññā pajānāti. ‘‘Purimaṃ anta’’nti vuccamāne paccuppannabhāvassapi gahaṇaṃ siyāti ^b^‘‘purimaṃ antaṃ atīta’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Vijjamānatañca avijjamānatañcā^eb^ti sassatāsaṅkaṃ nissāya ‘‘ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna’’nti atīte attano vijjamānataṃ, adhiccasamuppattiāsaṅkaṃ nissāya ‘‘yato pabhuti ahaṃ, tato pubbe na nu kho ahosi’’nti atīte attano avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati. Kasmā? Vicikicchāya ākāradvayāvalambanato. Tassā pana atītavatthutāya gahitattā sassatādhiccasamuppattiākāranissitatā dassitā eva. Āsappanaparisappanapavattikaṃ katthacipi appaṭivattihetubhūtaṃ vicikicchaṃ kasmā uppādetīti na vicāretabbametanti dassento āha ^b^‘‘kiṃkāraṇanti na vattabba’’^eb^nti ^a^M2.0052^ea^. ^b^Kāraṇaṃ^eb^ vā vicikicchāya ayonisomanasikāro, tassa andhabālaputhujjanabhāvo, ariyānaṃ adassāvitā cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Jātiliṅgupapattiyo^eb^ti khattiyabrāhmaṇādijātiṃ, gahaṭṭhapabbajitādiliṅgaṃ, devamanussādiupapattiñca. ^b^Nissāyā^eb^ti upādāya. Tasmiṃ ^a^V2.0045^ea^ kāle yaṃ santānaṃ majjhimaṃ pamāṇaṃ, tena yutto pamāṇiko, tadabhāvato adhikabhāvato vā ‘‘appamāṇiko’’ti veditabbo. ^b^Kecī^eb^ti sārasamāsācariyā. Te hi ‘‘kathaṃ nu kho’’ti issarena vā brahmunā vā pubbakatena vā ahetuto vā nibbattoti cintetīti vadanti. Ahetuto nibbattikaṅkhāpi hi hetuparāmasanamevāti. ^b^Parampara^eb^nti pubbāparappavattiṃ. ^b^Addhāna^eb^nti kālādhivacanaṃ, tañca bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Vijjamānatañca avijjamānatañcā^eb^ti sassatāsaṅkaṃ nissāya ‘‘bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṃ anāgatamaddhāna’’nti anāgate attano vijjamānataṃ, ucchedāsaṅkaṃ nissāya ‘‘yasmiñca attabhāve ucchedanakaṅkhā, tato paraṃ nu kho bhavissāmī’’ti anāgate attano avijjamānatañca kaṅkhatīti heṭṭhā vuttanayena yojetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Paccuppannaṃ addhāna^eb^nti addhāpaccuppannassa idhādhippetattā ^b^‘‘paṭisandhimādiṃ katvā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ‘‘Idaṃ kathaṃ, idaṃ katha’’nti pavattanato kathaṃkathā, vicikicchā, sā assa atthīti ^b^kathaṃkathī^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vicikicchī’’^eb^ti. Kā ettha cintā? Ummattako viya bālaputhujjanoti paṭikacceva vuttanti adhippāyo. ^b^Taṃ^eb^ mahāmātāya puttaṃ. ^b^Muṇḍesu^eb^nti muṇḍena anicchantaṃ jāgaraṇakāle na sakkāti suttaṃ muṇḍesuṃ kuladhammavasena yathā ekacce kulatāpasā. Rājabhayenāti ca vadanti. ^b^Sītibhūta^eb^nti idaṃ madhurakabhāvappattiyā kāraṇavacanaṃ. ‘‘Setabhūta’’ntipi pāṭho, udake ciraṭṭhānena setabhāvaṃ pattanti attho.

[03]^b^Attano khattiyabhāvaṃ kaṅkhati^eb^ kaṇṇo viya sūtaputtasaññī, sūtaputtasaññīti sūriyadevaputtassa puttasaññī. Jātiyā vibhāviyamānāya ‘‘aha’’nti tassa attano parāmasanaṃ sandhāyāha ‘‘evampi siyā kaṅkhā’’ti. ^b^Manussāpi ca rājāno viyā^eb^ti manussāpi ca keci ekacce rājāno viyāti adhippāyo. ^b^Vuttanayameva^eb^ ‘‘saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāyā’’tiādinā. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti ‘‘kathaṃ nu khosmī’’ti pade. ^b^Abbhantare jīvo^eb^ti ^a^M2.0053^ea^ paraparikappitaṃ antarattānaṃ vadati. ^b^Soḷasaṃsādīna^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena sarīraparimāṇāṅguṭṭha-yavaparamāṇuparimāṇatādike saṅgaṇhāti. Sattapaññatti jīvavisayāti diṭṭhigatikānaṃ matimattaṃ, paramatthato pana sā attabhāvavisayāvāti āha ^b^‘‘attabhāvassa āgatigatiṭṭhāna’’^eb^nti. Yatāyaṃ āgato, yattha ca gamissati, taṃ ṭhānanti attho. ^b^Sotāpanno adhippeto^eb^ vicikicchāpahānassa diṭṭhattā. ^b^Itarepi tayo^eb^ti sakadāgāmīādayo avāritā eva. ‘‘Ayañca…pe… sudiṭṭhā’’ti nippadesato saccasaṃpaṭivedhassa jotitattā.
[06]Paccayasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Āhāravaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^21^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭhamaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0046^ea^^b^dutiyasseva saṅkhepo^eb^ paṭhamasutte saṅkhepavuttassa atthassa vitthāravasena dutiyasuttassa desitattā, tañca pana bhagavā paṭhamasuttaṃ saṅkhepato desesi, dutiyaṃ tato vitthārato. Paṭhamaṃ vā saṃkhittarucīnaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayena saṅkhepato desesi, dutiyaṃ pana attano ruciyā tato vitthārato. Sīhasamānavuttikā hi buddhā bhagavanto, te attano ruciyā kathentā attano thāmaṃ dassentāva kathenti, tasmā dutiyasuttavasena cettha atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma, tasmiṃ saṃvaṇṇite paṭhamaṃ saṃvaṇṇitameva hotīti adhippāyo.
[06]Dasabalasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^22^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tatthā^eb^ti dutiyasutte. ^b^Dasahi balehī^eb^ti dasahi anaññasādhāraṇehi ñāṇabalehi, tāni tathāgatasseva balānīti tathāgatabalānīti vuccanti. Kāmañca tāni ekaccānaṃ sāvakānampi uppajjanti, yādisāni ^a^M2.0054^ea^ pana buddhānaṃ ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇādīni uppajjanti, na tādisāni tadaññesaṃ kadācipi uppajjantīti. ^b^Hatthikulānusārenā^eb^ti vakkhamānahatthikulānusārena. ^b^Kāḷāvaka^eb^nti kulasaddāpekkhāya napuṃsakaniddeso. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Pakatihatthikula^eb^nti giricaranadicaravanacarādippabhedā gocariyakāḷāvakanāmā sabbāpi balena pākatikā hatthijāti. ^b^Dasannaṃ purisāna^eb^nti thāmamajjhimānaṃ dasannaṃ purisānaṃ. Ekassa tathāgatassa kāyabalanti ānetvā sambandho. ^b^Ekassā^eb^ti ca tathā heṭṭhākathāyaṃ āgatattā desanāsotena vuttaṃ. ^b^Nārāyanasaṅghātabala^eb^nti ettha nārā vuccanti rasmiyo, tā bahū nānāvidhā ito uppajjantīti ^b^nārāyanaṃ,^eb^ vajiraṃ, tasmā nārāyanasaṅghātabalanti vajirasaṅghātabalanti attho. ^b^Tathāgatassa kāyabala^eb^nti tathāgatassa pākatikakāyabalaṃ. ^b^Saṅgahaṃ na gacchati^eb^ attano balābhāvato, tato evassa ^b^bāhirakatā lāmakatā ca^eb^. Tadubhayaṃ panassa kāraṇena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘etañhi nissāyā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Añña^eb^nti kāyabalato aññaṃ tato visuṃyeva. ^b^Dasasu ṭhānesu^eb^ dasasu ñātabbaṭṭhānesu. Yāthāvapaṭivedhato sayañca akampayaṃ, puggalañca taṃsamaṅgiṃ neyyesu adhibalaṃ karotīti āha ^b^‘‘akampanaṭṭhena upatthambhanaṭṭhena cā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Ṭhānañca^eb^^a^V2.0047^ea^^b^ṭhānato^eb^ti kāraṇañca kāraṇato. Kāraṇañhi yasmā phalaṃ tiṭṭhati tadāyattavuttitāya uppajjati ceva pavattati ca, tasmā ‘‘ṭhāna’’nti vuccati. Vipariyāyena ^b^aṭṭhāna^eb^nti akāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tadubhayaṃ bhagavā yena ñāṇena ye ye dhammā yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ hetū paccayā uppādāya, taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ, ye ye dhammā yesaṃ yesaṃ dhammānaṃ na hetū na paccayā uppādāya, taṃ taṃ aṭṭhānanti pajānāti. Taṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘ṭhānañca…pe… jānanaṃ eka’’^eb^nti. ^b^Kammasamādānāna^eb^nti kammaṃ samādiyitvā katānaṃ kusalākusalakammānaṃ, kammaññeva vā kammasamādānaṃ. ^b^Ṭhānaso hetuso^eb^ti paccayato ca hetuto ca. Tattha gatiupadhikālapayogā vipākassa ṭhānaṃ, kammaṃ hetu. ^b^Sabbatthagāminīpaṭipadājānana^eb^nti sabbagatigāminiyā agatigāminiyā ca paṭipadāya maggassa jānanaṃ, bahūsupi manussesu ekameva pāṇaṃ hanantesu ‘‘imassa cetanā nirayagāminī bhavissati, imassa tiracchānayonigāminī’’ti iminā nayena ekavatthusmimpi kusalākusalacetanāsaṅkhātānaṃ paṭipattīnaṃ aviparītato sabhāvajānanaṃ ^a^M2.0055^ea^. ^b^Anekadhātunānādhātulokajānana^eb^nti cakkhudhātuādīhi kāmadhātuādīhi vā bahudhātuno, tāsaṃyeva dhātūnaṃ viparītatāya nānappakāradhātuno khandhāyatanadhātulokassa jānanaṃ. ^b^Parasattāna^eb^nti paresaṃ sattānaṃ. ^b^Nānādhimuttikatājānana^eb^nti hīnādīhi adhimuttīhi nānādhimuttikabhāvassa jānanaṃ. ^b^Tesaṃyevā^eb^ti parasattānaṃyeva. ^b^Indriyaparopariyattajānana^eb^nti saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ parabhāvassa aparabhāvassa vuddhiyā ceva hāniyā ca jānanaṃ. ^b^Jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīna^eb^nti paṭhamādīnaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ, ‘‘rūpī rūpāni passatī’’tiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ, savitakkasavicārādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ samādhīnaṃ, paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiādīnañca navannaṃ anupubbasamāpattīnaṃ. ^b^Saṃkilesavodānavuṭṭhānajānana^eb^nti hānabhāgiyassa, visesabhāgiyassa ‘‘vodānampi vuṭṭhānaṃ, tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhānampi vuṭṭhāna’’nti (vibha. 828) evaṃ vuttapaguṇajjhānassa ceva bhavaṅgaphalasamāpattīnañca jānanaṃ. Heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimañhi paguṇajjhānaṃ uparimassa uparimassa padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, tasmā vodānampi ‘‘vuṭṭhāna’’nti vuccati. Bhavaṅgena pana sabbajhānehi vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Phalasamāpattiyā nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhānameva sandhāya ‘‘tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhāna’’nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Pubbenivāsajānana^eb^nti pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena nivuṭṭhakkhandhānaṃ jānanaṃ. ^b^Cutūpapātajānana^eb^nti sattānaṃ cutiyā upapattiyā ca yāthāvato jānanaṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ vuttanayeneva veditabbo. ^b^Āsavakkhayajānanaṃ^eb^ āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ, maggañāṇanti attho. Yattha panetāni vitthārato āgatāni saṃvaṇṇitāni, tāni dassento ^b^‘‘abhidhamme panā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Byāmohabhayavasena saraṇapariyesanaṃ sārajjanaṃ sārado, byāmohabhayaṃ. Vigato sārado etassāti ^a^V2.0048^ea^ visārado, tassa bhāvo ^b^vesārajjaṃ^eb^. Taṃ pana ñāṇasampadaṃ pahānasampadaṃ desanāvisesasampadaṃ khemaṃ nissāya pavattaṃ catubbidhaṃ paccavekkhaṇāñāṇaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘catūsu ṭhānesū’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Catūsū^eb^ti paraparikappitesu vatthūsu. Paraparikappitesu vā vatthumattesu codanākāraṇesu. ^b^Sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato^eb^ti ‘‘ahaṃ sammāsambuddho’’ti evaṃ paṭijānantena tayā. ^b^Ime dhammā^eb^ti ‘‘idaṃ pañcamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, ayaṃ chaṭṭho upādānakkhandho, idaṃ ^a^M2.0056^ea^ terasamaṃ āyatana’’nti veditabbā ime dhammā. ^b^Anabhisambuddhā^eb^ appaṭividdhattāti.

[03]^b^Tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ anabhisambuddhadhammasaṅkhāte codanāvatthusmiṃ. ^b^Kocī^eb^ti samaṇādīhi añño vā yo koci. ^b^Saha dhammenā^eb^ti saha hetunā. ‘‘Dhammapaṭisambhidā’’tiādīsu viya hetupariyāyo idha ^b^dhamma^eb^-saddo. ^b^Hetū^eb^ti ca uppattisādhanahetu veditabbo, na kārako sampāpako vā. ^b^Nimitta^eb^nti kāraṇaṃ, taṃ panettha codanāvatthumeva. ^b^Na samanupassāmi^eb^ sammāsambuddhabhāvato. ^b^Khemappatto^eb^ti akhemappattarūpāya codanāya anupaddavaṃ patto niccalabhāvappatto. ^b^Vesārajjappatto^eb^ti visāradabhāvappatto. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – ^b^ime āsavā^eb^ti kāmāsavādīsu ime nāma āsavā na parikkhīṇāti āsavakkhayavacanenettha sabbakilesappahānaṃ vuttaṃ. Na hi so kileso atthi, yo sabbaso āsavesu khīṇesu nappahīyeyya. ^b^Antarāyikā^eb^ti antarāyakarā, saggavimokkhādhigamassa antarāyakarāti attho. Dhammo hi yo saṃkilesato niyyāti, so ‘‘niyyāniko’’ti vutto. Dhamme niyyante taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo niyyānikoti voharito hotīti tassa paṭikkhipanto ^b^‘‘so na niyyātī’’^eb^ti āha. Kathaṃ pana desanādhammo niyyātīti vuccati? Niyyānatthasamādhānato, so abhedopacārena ‘‘niyyātī’’ti vutto. Atha vā ‘‘dhammo desito’’ti ariyadhammassa adhippetattā na koci virodho.

[03]Usabhassa idanti ^b^āsabhaṃ,^eb^ asantasanaṭṭhena āsabhaṃ viyāti ^b^āsabhaṃ,^eb^ seṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ sabbaññutaṃ. Āsabhaṭṭhānaṭṭhāyitāya ^b^āsabhā^eb^ nāma ^b^pubbabuddhā^eb^. Sabbaññutapaṭijānanavasena abhimukhaṃ gacchanti, catasso vā parisā upasaṅkamantīti ^b^āsabhā^eb^. Catassopi hi parisā buddhābhimukhā evaṃ tiṭṭhanti, na tiṭṭhanti parammukhā. ^b^Idampī^eb^ti ‘‘usabho’’ti idampi padaṃ. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti nisabhassa. Yesaṃ baluppādāvaṭṭhānānaṃ vasena usabhassa āsabhaṇṭhānaṃ icchitaṃ, tato sātisayānaṃ eva tesaṃ vasena āsabhaṇṭhānaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yaṃ kiñci loke upamaṃ nāma buddhaguṇānaṃ nidassanabhāvena vuccati, sabbaṃ taṃ nihīnameva. ^b^Tiṭṭhamāno cā^eb^ti atiṭṭhantopi tiṭṭhamāno eva paṭijānāti nāma. ^b^Upagacchatī^eb^ti anujānāti.

[03]^b^Aṭṭha^eb^^a^V2.0049^ea^^a^M2.0057^ea^^b^kho imā^eb^ti idaṃ vesārajjañāṇassa baladassanaṃ. Yathā hi byattaṃ parisaṃ ajjhogāhetvā viññūnaṃ cittaṃ ārādhanasamatthāya kathāya dhammakathikassa chekabhāvo paññāyati, evaṃ imā aṭṭha parisā patvā satthu vesārajjañāṇassa balaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘parisāsū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Khattiyaparisā^eb^ti khattiyānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ samūho. Esa nayo sabbattha. ^b^Māraparisā^eb^ti mārakāyikānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ samūho. Mārasadisānaṃ mārānaṃ parisāti māraparisā. Sabbā cetā parisā uggaṭṭhānadassanavasena gahitā. Manussā hi ‘‘ettha rājā nisinno’’ti vutte pakativacanampi vattuṃ na sakkonti, kacchehi sedā muccanti, evaṃ uggā khattiyaparisā, brāhmaṇā tīsu vedesu kusalā honti, gahapatayo nānāvohāresu ca akkharacintāya ca kusalā, samaṇā sakavādaparavādesu kusalā, tesaṃ majjhe dhammakathākathanaṃ nāma ativiya bhāriyaṃ. Devānaṃ uggabhāve vattabbameva natthi. Amanussoti hi vuttamatte manussānaṃ sakalasarīraṃ kampati, tesaṃ rūpaṃ disvāpi saddaṃ sutvāpi sattā visaññitāpi honti. Evaṃ amanussaparisā uggā. Iti cetā parisā uggaṭṭhānadassanavasena vuttā. Kasmā panettha yāmādiparisā na gahitāti? Bhusaṃ kāmābhigiddhatāya yonisomanasikāravirahato. Yāmādayo hi uḷāruḷāre kāme paṭisevantā tatthābhigiddhatāya dhammassavanāya sabhāvena cittampi na uppādenti, mahābodhisattānaṃ pana buddhānañca ānubhāvena ākaḍḍhiyamānā kadāci nesaṃ payirupāsanādīni karonti tādise mahāsamaye. Teneva hi vimānavatthudesanāpi taṃnimittā bahulā nāhosi. ^b^Seṭṭhanāda^eb^nti kenaci appaṭihatabhāvena uttamanādaṃ. ^b^Abhītanāda^eb^nti vesārajjayogato kutoci nibbhayanādaṃ. ^b^Sīhanādasuttenā^eb^ti khandhiyavagge āgatena sīhanādasuttena. ^b^Sahanato^eb^ti khamanato. ^b^Hananato^eb^ti vidhamanato viddhaṃsanato. ^b^Yathā vā^eb^tiādi ‘‘sīhanādasadisaṃ vā nādaṃ nadatī’’ti saṅkhepato vuttassa atthassa viññāpanaṃ.

[03]^b^Eta^eb^nti ‘‘brahmacakka’’nti etaṃ padaṃ. ^b^Paññāpabhāvita^eb^nti cirakālaparibhāvitāya pāramitāpaññāya vipassanāpaññāya ca uppāditaṃ. ^b^Karuṇāpabhāvita^eb^nti ‘‘kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno’’tiādinayappavattāya mahākaruṇāya uppāditaṃ. Yathā abhinikkhamanato pabhuti mahābodhisattānaṃ ariyamaggādhigamanavirodhinī ^a^M2.0058^ea^ paṭipatti natthi, evaṃ tusitabhavanato niyatabhāvāpattito ca paṭṭhāyāti dutiyatatiyanayā ca gahitā. ^b^Phalakkhaṇe^eb^ti aggaphalakkhaṇe. Paṭivedhaniṭṭhattā arahattamaggañāṇaṃ vajirūpamatāyeva sātisayo paṭivedhoti ^b^‘‘phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tena paṭiladdhassapi desanāñāṇassa kiccanipphatti parassa bujjhanamattena hotīti ^b^‘‘aññāsikoṇḍaññassa sotāpatti…pe… phalakkhaṇe pavattanaṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tato paraṃ pana yāva parinibbānā desanāñāṇappavatti, tasseva pavattitassa dhammacakkassa ṭhānanti veditabbaṃ ^a^V2.0050^ea^ pavattitacakkassa cakkavattino cakkaratanassa ṭhānaṃ viya. ^b^Ubhayampī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena lokiyadesanāñāṇassa itarena anaññasādhāraṇatāvasena samānataṃ sampiṇḍeti. Urasi jātatāya uraso sambhūtanti ^b^orasaṃ^eb^ ñāṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Iti rūpa^eb^nti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo anavasesato rūpassa sarūpanidassanatthoti tassa ^b^‘‘idaṃ rūpa’’^eb^nti etena sādhāraṇato ca sarūpanidassanamāha. ^b^Ettakaṃ rūpa^eb^nti etena anavasesato ‘‘ito uddhaṃ rūpaṃ natthī’’ti nimittassa aññassa abhāvaṃ. Idāni tamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ‘‘ruppanasabhāvañcevā’’tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^ruppanaṃ^eb^ sītādivirodhipaccayasamavāye visadisuppatti. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena ajjhattikabāhirādibhedaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Lakkhaṇa…pe… vasenā^eb^ti kakkhaḷattādilakkhaṇavasena sandhāraṇādirasavasena sampaṭicchanādipaccupaṭṭhānavasena bhūtattayādipadaṭṭhānavasena ca. ^b^Evaṃ pariggahitassā^eb^ti evaṃ sādhāraṇato ca lakkhaṇādito ca pariggahitassa. ^b^Avijjāsamudayā^eb^ti avijjāya uppādā, atthibhāvāti attho. Nirodhavirodhī hi atthibhāvo hoti, tasmā nirodhe asati atthibhāvo hoti, tasmā purimabhave siddhāya avijjāya sati imasmiṃ bhave rūpassa samudayo rūpassa uppādo hotīti attho. ^b^Taṇhāsamudayā kammasamudayā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Avijjādīhi ca tīhi atītakālikattā tesaṃ sahakārīkāraṇabhūtaṃ upādānampi gahitamevāti veditabbaṃ. Pavattipaccayesu kabaḷīkārāahārassa balavatāya, so eva gahito, ‘‘āhārasamudayā’’ti pana gahitena pavattipaccayatāmattena utucittānipi gahitāneva hontīti dvādasasamuṭṭhānikaṃ rūpassa paccayato dassanampi bhavitabbamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Nibbattilakkhaṇa^eb^ntiādinā kālavasena ^a^M2.0059^ea^ udayadassanamāha. Tattha bhūtavasena magge udayaṃ passitvā ṭhito idha santativasena anukkamena khaṇavasena passati. ^b^Avijjānirodhā rūpanirodho^eb^ti aggamaggañāṇena avijjāya anuppādanirodhato anāgatassa anuppādanirodho hoti paccayābhāve abhāvato. ^b^Paccayanirodhenā^eb^ti avijjāsaṅkhātassa paccayassa nirodhabhāvena. ^b^Taṇhānirodhā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Āhāranirodhā^eb^ti pavattipaccayassa kabaḷīkārāhārassa abhāvā. ^b^Rūpanirodhā^eb^ti taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassa abhāvo hoti. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ. ^b^Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇa^eb^nti bhavakālavasena hetudvayadassanaṃ. Tasmā taṃ padaṭṭhānavasena pageva passitvā ṭhito idha santativasena disvā anukkamena khaṇavasena passati.

[03]Iti ^b^vedanā^eb^tiādīsupi vuttanayena attho veditabbo. ^b^Sukhādibheda^eb^nti sukhadukkhādukkhamasukhādivibhāgaṃ. ^b^Rūpasaññādibheda^eb^nti rūpasaññā, sadda… gandha… rasa… phoṭṭhabba ^a^V2.0051^ea^… dhammasaññādivibhāgaṃ. ^b^Phassādibheda^eb^nti phassacetanāmanasikārādivibhāgaṃ. ^b^Lakkhaṇa…pe… vasenā^eb^ti iṭṭhānubhavanalakkhaṇādilakkhaṇavasena iṭṭhākārasambhogarasādirasavasena kāyikāssādādipaccupaṭṭhānavasena iṭṭhārammaṇādipadaṭṭhānavasena. ‘‘Phuṭṭho vedeti, phuṭṭho sañjānāti, phuṭṭho cetetī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 4.93) vacanato tīsu vedanādīsu khandhesu ^b^phassasamudayāti vattabbaṃ^eb^. Viññāṇappaccayā nāmarūpa’’nti vacanato ^b^viññāṇakkhandhe nāmarūpasamudayā^eb^ti vattabbaṃ. ^b^Tesaṃyeva vasenā^eb^ti ‘‘avijjānirodho vedanānirodho’’tiādinā tesaṃyeva avijjādīnaṃ vasena yojetabbaṃ.

[03]Upādānakkhandhānaṃ samudayatthaṅgamavasena titthiyānaṃ avisayopi sappadeso sīhanādo dassito. Idāni nippadeso anulomapaṭilomavasena saṅkhepato vitthārato paccayākāravisayo anaññasādhāraṇo dassīyatīti āha, ^b^‘‘ayampi aparo sīhanādo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti ‘‘imasmiṃ satī’’tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttapaṭiccasamuppādapāḷiyā. Ettha ca ‘‘imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujhtī’’ti avijjādīnaṃ bhāve saṅkhārādīnaṃ bhāvassa, avijjādīnaṃ nirodhe saṅkhārādīnaṃ nirodhassa kathanena purimasmiṃ paccayalakkhaṇe niyamo dassito ‘‘imasmiṃ ^a^M2.0060^ea^ sati eva, nāsati, imassa uppādā eva, nānuppādā, nirodhā eva, nānirodhā’’ti. Tenedaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ antogadhaniyamaṃ idha paṭiccasamuppādassa vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nirodhoti ca avijjādīnaṃ virāgā vigamena āyatiṃ anuppādo appavatti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ‘‘avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā’’tiādi. Nirodhavirodhī ca uppādo, yena so uppādanirodhavibhāgena vutto ‘‘imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatī’’ti. Tenetaṃ dasseti ‘‘asati nirodhe uppādo nāma, so cettha atthibhāvoti vuccatī’’ti. ‘‘Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotī’’ti idameva hi lakkhaṇaṃ. Pariyāyantarena ‘‘imassa uppādā idaṃ uppajjatī’’ti vadantena parena purimaṃ visesitaṃ hoti. Tasmā na vattamānaṃyeva sandhāya ‘‘imasmiṃ satī’’ti vuttaṃ, atha kho maggena anirujjhanasabhāvañcāti viññāyati. Yasmā ca ‘‘imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatī’’ti dvidhāpi uddiṭṭhassa lakkhaṇassa niddesaṃ vadantena bhagavatā ‘‘avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā saṅkhāranirodho’’tiādinā nirodhova vutto, tasmā natthibhāvopi nirodho evāti natthibhāvaviruddho atthibhāvo anirodhoti dassitaṃ hoti. Tena anirodhasaṅkhātena atthibhāvena uppādaṃ viseseti. Tato idha na kevalaṃ atthibhāvamattaṃ uppādoti attho adhippeto, atha kho anirodhasaṅkhāto atthibhāvo cāti ayamattho vibhāvito hoti. Evametaṃ lakkhaṇadvayavacanaṃ aññamaññaṃ visesanavisesitabbabhāvena sātthakanti veditabbaṃ. Ko panāyaṃ anirodho nāma, yo ‘‘atthibhāvo, uppādo’’ti ca vuttoti? Appahīnabhāvo ca anibbattitaphalabhāvena ^a^V2.0052^ea^ phaluppādanārahatā cāti ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana paramatthadīpaniyaṃ ^b^udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (udā. aṭṭha. 1). Vuttanayena veditabbo.

[03]^b^Pañcakkhandhavibhajanādivasenā^eb^ti pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ dvādasapadikassa paccayākārassa vibhajanavasena. Imasmiñhi dasabalasutte dhammassa desitākāro pañcakkhandhapaccayākāramatto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pañcakkhandhapaccayākāradhammo’’^eb^ti. Ācariyamuṭṭhiyā akaraṇena vibhūto, so pana atthato ca saddato ca pihito heṭṭhāmukhajāto vā na hotīti āha ^b^‘‘anikujjito’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vivaṭo^eb^ti vibhāvito. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vivaritvā ṭhapito’’^eb^ti ^a^M2.0061^ea^. ^b^Pakāsito^eb^ti ñāṇobhāsena obhāsito ādīpitoti āha ^b^‘‘dīpito jotito’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tattha tattha^eb^ chinnabhinnaṭṭhāne. ^b^Sibbitagaṇṭhita^eb^nti vākaṃ gahetvā sibbitaṃ, sibbituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṭṭhāne vākena gaṇṭhitañca. Chinnapilotikābhāvena vigatapilotiko dhammo, tassa chinnapilotikassa paṭilomatā chinnabhinnatābhāvenāti dassento ^b^‘‘na hetthā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Nivāsanapārupanaṃ ^b^pariggahaṇaṃ^eb^. Sayaṃ paṭibhānaṃ ^b^kappetvā. Vaḍḍhentā^eb^ attano samayaṃ. ^b^Samaṇakacavara^eb^nti samaṇavesadhāraṇavasena samaṇapaṭirūpatāya samaṇānaṃ kacavarabhūtaṃ. Attano rūpapavattiyā karaṇḍaṃ kucchitaṃ dhuttaṃ vāti pavattetīti kāraṇḍavo, dussīlo. Taṃ ^b^kāraṇḍavaṃ. Niddhamathā^eb^ti nīharatha. ^b^Kasambu^eb^nti samaṇakasaṭaṃ. ^b^Apakassathā^eb^ti apakaḍḍhatha nanti attho. ^b^Palāpe^eb^ti palāpasadise. Tathā hi taṇḍulasārarahito dhaññapaṭirūpako thusamattako palāpoti vuccati, evaṃ sīlādisārarahito samaṇapaṭirūpako palāpo viyāti palāpo, dussīlo. Te ^b^palāpe. Vāhethā^eb^ti apanetha. ^b^Patissatā^eb^ti bāḷhasatitāya patissatā hothāti.

[03]^b^Saddhāya pabbajitenā^eb^ti rājūpaddavādīhi anupaddutena ‘‘evañhi taṃ otiṇṇaṃ jātiādisaṃsārabhayaṃ vijinissāmī’’ti vaṭṭanissaraṇatthaṃ āgatāya saddhāya vasena pabbajitena. ^b^Ācārakulaputto^eb^ti ācārena abhijāto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yato kutocī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Jātikulaputto^eb^ti jātisampattiyā abhijāto. Viññuppasatthāni aṅgāni sammāpadhāniyaṅgabhāvena, kāye ca jīvite ca nirapekkhabhāvena vīriyaṃ ārabhantassa tathāpavattavīriyavasena ^b^‘‘taco ekaṃ aṅga’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Navasu ṭhānesu samādhātabba^eb^nti ‘‘kālavasena pañcasu, iriyāpathavasena catūsū’’ti evaṃ navasu ṭhānesu vīriyaṃ samādhātabbaṃ pavattetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^So dukkhaṃ viharatī^eb^ti kusītapuggalo niyyānikasāsane vīriyārambhassa akaraṇena sāmaññatthassa anuppattiyā dukkhaṃ viharati. Sakaṃ vā atthaṃ ^b^sadatthaṃ^eb^ ka-kārassa da-kāraṃ katvā ^a^V2.0053^ea^. Kusītassa atthaparihāyanaṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘cha dvārānī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Nisajjāvasena pīṭhamaddanato ^b^pīṭhamaddano,^eb^ nirassanavacanaṃ tassa, kassacipatthassa adhāraṇato kevalaṃ pīṭhabhārabhūtoti adhippāyo. Aññattha pana ‘‘makhamaddano’’ti ^a^M2.0062^ea^ vuccati, tattha dānamicchāya paresaṃ makhaṃ passantoti attho. ^b^Laṇḍapūrako^eb^ti kucchipūraṃ bhuñjitvā vaccakuṭipūrako.

[03]‘‘Āraddhavīriyo’’tiādīsu ‘‘kusīto puggalo’’ti ettha vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo, āsīsāya vasena thomito. ^b^Āraddhavīriye^eb^ti paggahitavīriye. ^b^Pahitatte^eb^ti nibbānaṃ patipesitacitte. Etena sāvakānaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ satthuvandanānisaṃsañca dassesi.

[03]^b^Hīnenā^eb^ti vaṭṭanissitena dhammena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘hīnāya saddhāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Aggenā^eb^ti seṭṭhena vivaṭṭanissitena dhammena, īsakampi katakālusiyavigataṭṭhena maṇḍaṭṭhena ca pasannampi surādi na pātabbaṃ. ^b^Sāsana^eb^nti pariyattipaṭipattipaṭivedhalakkhaṇaṃ sāsanaṃ. ^b^Pasannaṃ^eb^ vigatadosamalattā pasādaniyattā ca. ^b^Pātabbañca^eb^ pattena viya sukhena paribhuñjitabbato duccaritasabbakilesakasāvamalapaṅkadosarahitattā ca.

[03]Maṇḍabhūtā bodhipakkhiyadhammadesanāpi ^b^desanāmaṇḍo^eb^. Tassa ekasseva pana desanāmaṇḍassa paṭiggāhakā suppaṭipannā dosarahitā catasso parisā ^b^paṭiggahamaṇḍo^eb^. Maggabrahmacariyaṃ taggatikattā sakalopi bodhipakkhiyadhammarāsi ^b^brahmacariyamaṇḍo^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘katamo desanāmaṇḍo’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^viññātāro^eb^ti saccānaṃ abhisametāvino. Tathā hi ādito ‘‘catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ ācikkhaṇā’’tiādi vuttaṃ. Pubbabhāge ‘‘atthi ayaṃ loko’’tiādinā idhalokaparalokagatasammosavigamena pavatto adhimokkhova ^b^adhimokkhamaṇḍo. Chaḍḍetvā^eb^ samucchedavasena vijahitvā. Catubhūmakassa saddhindriyassa adhimokkhamaṇḍena maṇḍabhūtaṃ adhimokkhaṃ. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena ‘‘paggahamaṇḍo vīriyindriyaṃ kosajjakasaṭa’’ntiādiṃ pāḷisesaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ sāsane, ‘‘maṇḍasmi’’nti vā vacane. ^b^Kāraṇavacanaṃ,^eb^ tena ‘‘satthā sammukhībhūto’’ti sammukhabhāvanāyogo nirāsaṅkaphalāvahoti dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘asammukhā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Pamāṇa^eb^nti anurūpaṃ bhesajjassa pamāṇaṃ. ^b^Uggamana^eb^nti bhesajjassa vamanaṃ virecanaṃ, tassa vā vasena dosadhātūnaṃ vamanaṃ virecanaṃ. ^b^Evamevā^eb^ti yathā bhesajjamaṇḍaṃ vejjasammukhā nirāsaṅkā pivanti, evameva ^a^M2.0063^ea^ ‘‘satthā sammukhībhūto’’ti nirāsaṅkā vīriyaṃ katvā, maṇḍapeyya sāsanaṃ pivathāti yojanā. Abhiññāsamāpattipaṭilābhena ^b^sānisaṃsā^eb^. Maggaphalādhigamanena ^b^savaḍḍhi^eb^^a^V2.0054^ea^. ^b^Parattha^eb^nti attano diṭṭhānugatiāpattiyā, tathā sammāpaṭipajjantānaṃ paresaṃ atthanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
[06]Dutiyadasabalasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^23^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Jānato passato^eb^ti ettha dassanaṃ paññācakkhunāva dassanaṃ adhippetaṃ, na maṃsacakkhunāti āha ^b^‘‘dvepi padāni ekatthānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Evaṃ santepī^eb^ti padadvayassa ekatthattepi ñāṇalakkhaṇañāṇappabhāvavisayasssa tathādassanabhāvāvirodhanāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘jānanalakkhaṇañhi ñāṇa’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Ñāṇappabhāva^eb^nti ñāṇānubhāvena ñāṇakiccavisayobhāsanti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ñāṇena vivaṭṭe dhamme passatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Jānato passato^eb^ti ca jānanadassanamukhena puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā pavattāti āha – ^b^‘‘ñāṇalakkhaṇaṃ upādāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Jānato^eb^ti vā pubbabhāgañāṇena jānato, aparabhāgena ñāṇena ^b^passato. Jānato^eb^ti vā vatvā na jānanaṃ anussavākāraparivitakkamattavasena idhādhippetaṃ, atha kho rūpāni viya cakkhuviññāṇena rūpādīni tesañca samudayādike paccakkhe katvā dassananti vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘passato’’^eb^ti vuttanti evaṃ vā ettha attho.

[03]^b^Āsavānaṃ khaya^eb^nti āsavānaṃ accantappahānaṃ. So pana tesaṃ anuppādanirodho sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvo evāti āha ^b^‘‘asamuppādo khīṇākāro natthibhāvo’’^eb^ti. Āsavakkhayasaddassa khīṇākārādīsu āgataṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘āsavānaṃ khayā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Ujumaggānusārino^eb^ti kilesavaṅkakāyavaṅkādīnaṃ pahānena ujubhūte savipassanāheṭṭhimamaggadhamme anussarantassa. Yadeva hissa parikkhīṇaṃ. ^b^Khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ^eb^ ‘‘tato aññā anantarā’’ti khayasaṅkhāte aggamagge tappariyāpannameva ñāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppajjati, tadanantaraṃ pana aññā arahattanti. Yadipi gāthāya ‘‘khayasmiṃ’’icceva vuttaṃ, samucchedavasena pana ‘‘āsave ^a^M2.0064^ea^ khīṇe maggo khayo’’ti vuccatīti āha ‘‘maggo āsavakkhayoti vutto’’ti. ^b^Samaṇo^eb^ti samitapāpo adhippeto, so pana khīṇāsavo hotīti. ^b^‘‘Āsavānaṃ khayā’’^eb^ti idha phalaṃ, pariyāyena pana āsavakkhayo maggo, tena pattabbato phalaṃ. Eteneva nibbānassapi āsavakkhayabhāvo vuttoti veditabbo.

[03]Jānato eva passato evāti evamettha niyamo icchito, na aññathā visesābhāvato aniṭṭhāpannovāti tassa niyamassa phalaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘no ajānato no apassato’’ti vutta^eb^nti āha ^a^V2.0055^ea^^b^‘‘yo pana na jānāti, na passati, tassa no vadāmīti attho’’^eb^ti. Iminā khandhānaṃ pariññā āsavakkhayassa ekantikakāraṇanti dasseti. ^b^Etenā^eb^ti ‘‘no ajānato, no apassato’’ti etena vacanena. ^b^Te paṭikkhittā^eb^ti ke pana teti? ‘‘Bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karissanti (dī. ni. 1.168; ma. ni. 2.228) ahetū appaccayā sattā visujjhantī’’ti (dī. ni. 1.168; ma. ni. 2.101, 227) evamādivādā. Tesu keci abhijātisaṅkantimattena saṃsārasuddhiṃ paṭijānanti, aññe issarapajāpatikāraṇādivasena. Tayidaṃ sabbaṃ saṃsārādīhīti ettheva saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Purimena padadvayenā^eb^ti ‘‘jānato passato’’ti iminā padadvayena. ^b^Upāyo vutto^eb^ ‘‘āsavakkhayā’’ti adhikārato. ^b^Iminā^eb^ti ‘‘no ajānato, no apassato’’ti iminā padadvayena. Anupāyo hoti esa āsavānaṃ khayassa, yadidaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ apariññāti ‘‘jānato passato’’ti imināva aniyamavacanena anupāyapaṭisedhopi atthato bodhito hotīti. Tameva hi atthato bodhitabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ evaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā katāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Dabbajātiko^eb^ti dabbarūpo. So hi ^b^‘‘drabyo’’^eb^ti vuccati ‘‘drabyaṃ vinassati nādrabya’’ntiādīsu. ^b^Dabbajātiko^eb^ vā sārasabhāvo, sāruppasīlācāroti attho. Yathāha ‘‘na kho dabba dabbā evaṃ nibbeṭhentī’’ti (pārā. 384). ^b^Vattasīse ṭhatvā^eb^ti vattaṃ uttamaṃ dhuraṃ katvā. Yo hi parisuddhājīvo kātuṃ ajānantānaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ attano vā vassavātādipaṭibāhanatthaṃ chattādīni karoti, so vattasīse ṭhatvā karoti nāma. ^b^Padaṭṭhānaṃ na hotī^eb^ti na vattabbaṃ nāthakaraṇadhammabhāvena maggaphalādhigamassa upanissayabhāvato. Vuttañhi ‘‘yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnaṃ uccāvacāni kiccakaraṇīyāni, tattha dakkho hotī’’tiādi ^a^M2.0065^ea^ (dī. ni. 3.345). ^b^Evaṃ jānato^eb^ti evaṃ vejjakammādīnaṃ jānanahetu micchājīvapaccayā kāmāsavādayo āsavā vaḍḍhantiyeva, na pahīyanti. ‘‘Evaṃ kho…pe… āsavānaṃ khayo hotī’’ti imāya pāḷiyā arahattasseva gahaṇaṃ yuttaṃ phalaggahaṇena hetuno avuttasiddhattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘āsavānaṃ khayante jātattā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Āgamanaṃ āgamo, taṃ āvahatīti ^b^āgamanīyā,^eb^ pubbabhāgapaṭipadā. ^b^Khayasmi^eb^nti bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇe bhummaṃ, ^b^khaye^eb^ti pana visaye. Tenāha ^b^‘‘āsavakkhayasaṅkhāte’’^eb^ti. Upanisīdati phalaṃ etthāti kāraṇaṃ ^b^upanisā. Arahattaphalavimutti^eb^ ukkaṭṭhaniddesato. ^b^Sā^eb^ti vimutti. ^b^Assā^eb^ti paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa. Manasmiṃ vivaṭṭanissite pana anantarūpanissayāpi paccayā sambhavantīti ^b^‘‘labbhamānavasena paccayabhāvo veditabbo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]Virajjati ^a^V2.0056^ea^ asesasaṅkhārato etenāti ^b^virāgo,^eb^ maggo. Nibbindati etāyāti ^b^nibbidā,^eb^ balavavipassanā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘etenā’’^eb^tiādi. Paṭisaṅkhānupassanāpi muccitukamyatāpakkhikā evāti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhivacana’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Yāva maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi, tāva taruṇavipassanā’’ti hi vacanato upakkilesavimuttaudayabbayañāṇato paraṃ balavavipassanā. Rūpārūpadhammānaṃ visesabhūto sāmaññabhūto ca yo yo sabhāvo yathāsabhāvo, tassa jānanaṃ ^b^yathāsabhāvajānanaṃ^eb^. Tadeva ^b^dassanaṃ^eb^. Paccakkhakaraṇatthena ñātapariññā tīraṇapariññā ca gahitā hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘taruṇavipassana’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Saṅkhāraparicchedeñāṇa^eb^nti nāmarūpapariggahañāṇaṃ vadati. ^b^Kaṅkhāvitaraṇaṃ^eb^ paccayapariggaho dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇantipi vuccati. Nayavipassanādikaṃ anupassanāñāṇaṃ ^b^sammasanaṃ. Maggāmaggeñāṇa^eb^nti maggāmaggaṃ vavatthapetvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇaṃ. So hi pādakajjhānasamādhi taruṇavipassanāya paccayo hoti. ‘‘Samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti passatī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 3.5.; 4.99; 5.1071) hi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Pubbabhāgasukha^eb^nti upacārajjhānasahitasukhaṃ. ^b^Daratha paṭippassaddhī^eb^ti kāmacchandādikilesadarathassa paṭipassambhanaṃ. ‘‘Sukhaṃpāhaṃ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṃ vadāmī’’ti ettha adhippetasukhaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘appanāpubbabhāgassa sukhassā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedetī’’ti (dī. ni. 1.466;3.359; aṇi. 1.3.96) vuttāppanāsukhassa passaddhiyā paccayatte ^a^M2.0066^ea^ vattabbameva natthi. ^b^Sukha^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Balavapītī^eb^ti pharaṇalakkhaṇappattā pīti. Tādisā hi vitakkavicārasukhasamādhīhi laddhappaccayā nīvaraṇaṃ vikkhambhantī taṃnimittaṃ darathaṃ pariḷāhaṃ paṭipassambheti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sā hi darathappassaddhiyā paccayo hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dubbalapītī^eb^ti taruṇapīti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sā hi balavapītiyā paccayo hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Saddhā^eb^ti ratanattayaguṇānaṃ kammaphalassa ca saddahanavasena pavatto adhimokkho, sā pana yasmā attano visaye punappunaṃ uppajjati, na ekavārameva, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘aparāparaṃ uppajjanasaddhā’’^eb^ti. Yasmā saddahanto saddheyyavatthusmiṃ pamudito hoti, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘sā hi dubbalapītiyā paccayo hotī’’^eb^ti. Dukkhadukkhādibhedassa sabbassapi dukkhassa vaṭṭadukkhantogadhattā tassa ca idhādhippetattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dukkhanti vaṭṭadukkha’’^eb^nti. Jarāmaraṇadukkhanti keci, sokādayo cāti apare. Tadubhayassapi saṅgaṇhanato paṭhamo evattho yutto. Yasmā dukkhappatto kammassa phalāni saddahati, ratanattaye ca pasādaṃ uppādeti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tañhi aparāparasaddhāya paccayo hotī’’^eb^ti. Yasmā ‘‘ācariyānaṃ santike dhammaṃ sutvā pavattidukkha’’nti cintayato ‘‘ekantato ayaṃ dhammo imassa dukkhassa samatikkamāya hotī’’ti saddhā uppajjati. Tenāha ‘‘dhammaṃ sutvā tathāgate saddhaṃ paṭilabhatī’’tiādi (dī. ni. 1.191). ^b^Savikārā^eb^ti uppādavikārena savikārā ^b^khandhajāti^eb^^a^V2.0057^ea^ jāyanaṭṭhena. Jātiyā pana asati tattha tattha bhave natthi dukkhassa sambhavoti āha ^b^‘‘sā hi vaṭṭadukkhassa paccayo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kammabhavo^eb^ti kammabhavādiko tividhopi kammabhavo. So hi upapattibhavassa paccayo. Evamādiṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘etenupāyenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sesapadānī^eb^ti upādānādipadāni. Anulomañāṇaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāpakkhikattā nibbānaggahaṇena gahitaṃ, gotrabhuñāṇaṃ paṭhamamaggassa āvajjanaṃ. So hi tena vipassanāya kiñci kiñci visesaṭṭhānaṃ kayiratīti taṃ anāmasitvā nibbidūpaniso virāgoti ‘‘virāgo’’icceva vuttaṃ.

[03]Kena udakena vidārayitvā gatapadesoti katvā ^b^kandaro. Nitambo^eb^tipi udakassa. Yathā ninnaṃ udakaṃ pavattati, tathā nivattanabhāvena ^b^nadīkuñchotipi vuccati^eb^. Hemantagimhautuvasena aṭṭha māse pavatto pathavīvivaroti katvā ^b^padaro^eb^. Khuddikā udakavāhiniyo sākhā viyāti ^b^sākhā^eb^^a^M2.0067^ea^, khuddakā sobbhā kusubbhā o-kārassa u-kāraṃ katvā. ^b^Evameva kho^eb^tiādi ‘‘seyyathāpi, bhikkhave’’tiādinā upanītāya upamāya upameyyena saṃsandananti, taṃ yojetvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘avijjā pabbatoti daṭṭhabbā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha avijjā ca santānavasena ciraṃtanakālappavattanato pacurajanehi duppajahanato ‘‘pabbato’’ti vuttā. Lokattayābhibyāpanato abhisandanato ca abhisaṅkhārā meghasadisā. Abhisaṅkhārā meghoti daṭṭhabbāti ānetvā sambandho. Tathā sesapadadvayepi. Viññāṇādivaṭṭaṃ anupavattito paramparapaccayato ca kandarādisadisā. Vimutti ekarasattā, hānivuddhiabhāvato ca sāgarasadisāti upamāsaṃsandanaṃ.

[03]Tattha yasmā purimasiddhāya avijjāya sati abhisaṅkhārā, nāsati, tasmā te uparipabbate pavattā viya hontīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘avijjā…pe… vassanaṃ veditabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Assutavā hī^eb^tiādi vuttasseva atthassa samatthanaṃ. ^b^Taṇhāya abhilāsaṃ katvā^eb^ti etena sabbassapi abhisaṅkhāravuṭṭhitemanatthaṃ dīpeti. Taṇhā hi ‘‘sneho’’ti vuttā. Antimabhavikassa antabhavanibbattako abhisaṅkhāro nibbānaṃ na patto, tadantassa bhāgassa nibbānaṃ āhacca ṭhito viya hotīti ^b^‘‘mahāsamuddaṃ āhacca ṭhitakālo viyā’’^eb^ti upamānidassanaṃ kataṃ. ^b^Viññāṇādivaṭṭaṃ pūretvā^eb^pi imināpi hi antimabhavikasseva viññāṇappavatti dassitā. Sā hi pūritāti vattabbā tato paraṃ viññāṇādivaṭṭasseva abhāvato. Jātassa puggalassa jātipaccayavaṭṭadukkhavedanāya dhammassavanaṃ icchitabbaṃ, taṃ pana yadipi imasmiṃ sutte na āgataṃ, suttantaresu pana āgatamevāti tato āharitvā taṃ vattabbanti dassento ^b^‘‘buddhavacanaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tayidaṃ sāvakabodhisattānaṃ vasenāyaṃ desanāti katvā vuttaṃ. Itaresaṃ pana vasena vuccamānaṃ ^a^V2.0058^ea^ suttantaraggahaṇatthaṃ payojanaṃ natthīti ^b^‘‘yā hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Pāḷiyā vasena gahitamevā^eb^ti saṅkhepato vuttātthassa vitthārato dassanaṃ. ^b^Nibbattī^eb^ti nibbattamānā khandhā gahitāti āha ^b^‘‘savikārā’’^eb^ti. Aniccatālakkhaṇādidīpanato ^b^lakkhaṇāhaṭaṃ. Kammākamma^eb^nti vinicchayaṃ. ^b^Nijjaṭa^eb^nti niggumbaṃ, suddhanti attho. ^b^Pathavīkasiṇādīsu kammaṃ ārabhatī^eb^tiādi pāḷiyaṃ samathapubbaṅgamā vipassanā dassitāti katvā vuttaṃ ^a^M2.0068^ea^. Evañhi pāmojjādidassanaṃ sambhavatīti. ^b^Devassā^eb^ti meghassa. Kasmā panettha ‘‘khīṇāsavassa…pe… ṭhitakālo veditabbo’’ti vuttaṃ, nanu pubbe devaṭṭhāniyo abhisaṅkhāro vutto, na abhisaṅkhāro khīṇāsavoti? Nāyaṃ doso, kāraṇūpacārena phalassa vuttattā. Abhisaṅkhāramūlako hi khandhasantāno khandhasantāne ca ucchinnasaṃyoge khīṇāsavasamaññāti.
[06]Upanisasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^24^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^So^eb^ti sāriputtatthero. Yadi na tāva paviṭṭho, kasmā ‘‘pāvisī’’ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘pavisissāmī’’^eb^tiādi. Tena avassambhāvini bhūte viya upacāro hotīti dasseti. Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvento ^b^‘‘yathā ki’’^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^Atippagoyeva nikkhantadivaso^eb^ti pakatiyā bhikkhācaraṇavelāya ativiya pāto eva vihārato nikkhantadivasabhāgo. ^b^Etadahosī^eb^ti etaṃ ‘‘atippago kho’’tiādikaṃ cintanaṃ ahosi. ^b^Dakkhiṇadvārassā^eb^ti rājagahanagare dakkhiṇadvārassa veḷuvanassa ca antarā ahosi, tasmā ‘‘tenupasaṅkamissa’’nti cintanā ahosīti adhippāyo. ^b^Kiṃ vādī^eb^ti catūsu vādesu kataraṃ vādaṃ vadasi. ^b^Kimakkhāyī^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Kiṃ vadatīti pana cattāro vāde sāmaññato gahetvā napuṃsakaliṅgena vadati yathā kiṃ te jātaliṅgaṃ. Sabbanāmañhetaṃ, yadidaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ. Vadati etenāti ^b^vādo,^eb^ dassanaṃ. Taṃ sandhāyāha ‘‘kiṃ ettha…pe… dassananti pucchantī’’ti. ‘‘Dhammapaṭisambhidā’’tiādīsu viya ^b^dhamma^eb^-saddo hetuatthoti āha ^b^‘‘yaṃ vuttaṃ kāraṇaṃ, tassa anukāraṇa’’^eb^nti. Vādassa vacanassa anuppatti ^b^vādappavatti^eb^.

[03]^b^Idaṃ vacana^eb^nti ‘‘ekamidāha’’ntiādivacanaṃ. ^b^Sā^eb^ti ‘‘eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā’’ti evaṃ pavattakathā. Accharaṃ aṅguliphoṭanaṃ arahatīti ^b^acchariyaṃ. Abbhuta^eb^nti niruttinayena padasiddhi daṭṭhabbā. ^b^Sabbavādāna^eb^nti sabbesaṃ catubbidhavādānaṃ. Paṭhamo hettha sassatavādo, dutiyo ucchedavādo, tatiyo ekaccasassatavādo, catuttho adhiccasamuppannavādo, tesaṃ sabbesaṃ ^a^M2.0069^ea^ paṭikkhepato ^a^V2.0059^ea^ paṭikkhepakāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Paṭiccasamuppādakittanaṃ vā pacurajanañāṇassa alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhatāya ^b^gambhīrañceva,^eb^ tathā avabhāsanato cetasi upaṭṭhānato ^b^gambhīrāvabhāsañca karonto. Tadeva pada^eb^nti phassapadaṃyeva ādibhūtaṃ gahetvā.
[06]Aññatitthiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^25^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Purimasutte^eb^ti anantare purime sutte. ^b^Vuttanayeneva veditabba^eb^nti padatthe tato visiṭṭhaṃ aniddisitvā itaraṃ atthato vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘ayaṃ pana viseso’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Na kevalaṃ phassapaccayā uppajjati,^eb^ atha kho phassassa sahakārīkāraṇabhūtāññapaccayā ca uppajjatīti. ^b^Kāyenā^eb^ti copanakāyena, kāyaviññattiyāti attho. Sā hi kāmaṃ paṭṭhāne āgatesu catuvīsatiyā paccayesu kenaci paccayena cetanāya paccayo na hoti. Yasmā pana kāye sati eva kāyakammaṃ nāma hoti, nāsati, tasmā sā tassā sāmaggiyabhāvena icchitabbāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kāyenapi kariyamānaṃ karīyatī’’^eb^ti. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘kāye vā, hānanda, sati kāyasañcetanāhetu uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhaṃ dukkha’’nti. ^b^Vācāyapī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Manasā^eb^ti pātubhūtena manasā, na manamattenāti. ^b^Attanā^eb^ parehi anussāhitena. ^b^Parenā^eb^ti parena anussāhena. ^b^Sampajānenā^eb^ti ñāṇasampayuttacittavasena pajānantena. ^b^Asampajānenā^eb^ti tathā na sampajānantena. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti sukhadukkhassa. ^b^Kāyasañcetanāhetū^eb^ti kāyakammanimittaṃ, kāyikassa kammassa katattā upacitattāti attho. Esa nayo sesasañcetanāsupi. Uddhaccasahagatacetanā pavattiyaṃ vipākaṃ detiyevāti ^b^‘‘vīsati cetanā labbhantī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tathā vacīdvāre^eb^ti ettha ‘‘kāmāvacarakusalākusalavasena vīsati cetanā labbhantī’’ti idaṃ tathā-saddena upasaṃharati. ^b^Rūpārūpacetanāhī^eb^ti rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakusalacetanāhi. ^b^Tappaccayaṃ^eb^ yathārahanti adhippāyo. ^b^Tāpi cetanā^eb^ti yathāvuttā ekūnavīsati cetanā avijjāpaccayā honti kusalānampi pageva itarādhiṭṭhahitāvijjasseva uppajjanato, aññathā anuppajjanato. ^b^Yathāvuttacetanābheda^eb^nti ^a^M2.0070^ea^ yathāvuttaṃ kāyacetanādivibhāgaṃ. ^b^Parehi anussāhito^eb^ saraseneva pavattamāno. ^b^Parehi kāriyamāno^eb^ti parehi ussāhito hutvā kayiramāno. ^b^Jānantopī^eb^ti anussavādivasena jānantopi. ^b^Kammameva jānanto^eb^ti tadā attanā kariyamānakammameva jānanto.

[03]^b^Catūsū^eb^ti ‘‘sāmaṃ vā pare vā sampajāno vā asampajāno vā’’ti evaṃ vuttesu catūsu ṭhānesu. Yathāvutte ekūnavīsaticetanādhamme asaṅkhārikasasaṅkhārikabhāvena sampajānakatāsampajānakatabhāvena ^a^V2.0060^ea^ catuguṇe katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘chasattati dvesatā cetanādhammā’’^eb^ti. Yesaṃ sahajātakoṭi labbhati, tesampi upanissayakoṭi labbhatevāti ^b^‘‘upanissayakoṭiyā anupatitā’’^eb^tīcceva vuttā. ^b^Te^eb^ti yathāvuttā sabbepi dhammā. ^b^So kāyo na hotī^eb^ti ettha pasādakāyopi gahetabbo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yasmiṃ kāye satī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^So kāyo na hotī^eb^ti so kāyo paccayanirodhena na hoti. ^b^Vācā^eb^ti saddavācā. ^b^Mano^eb^ti yaṃ kiñci viññāṇaṃ. Idāni kammavaseneva yojetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ ‘‘vācāpi dvārabhūtā manopi dvārabhūto’’ti. Khīṇāsavassa kathaṃ kāyo na hoti, na tassa kāyakammādhiṭṭhānanti adhippāyo. ^b^Avipākattā^eb^ti avipākadhammattāti attho. Kāyo na hotīti vuttaṃ akammakaraṇabhāvato.

[03]^b^Ta^eb^nti kammaṃ. ^b^Khettaṃ na hotī^eb^ti tassa dukkhassa aviruhanaṭṭhānattā. Viruhanaṭṭhānādayo byatirekavasena vuttā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kāraṇaṭṭhenā^eb^ti ādhārabhūtakāraṇabhāvena. ^b^Sañcetanāmūlaka^eb^nti sañcetanānimittaṃ. ^b^Viruhanādīnaṃ atthāna^eb^nti ‘‘viruhanaṭṭhenā’’tiādinā vuttānaṃ atthānaṃ. Iminā viruhanādibhāvena vedanā ‘‘sukhadukkhavedanā’’ti kathitā, nayidha jeṭṭhalakkhaṇaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ nippayojakassa sukhassa dukkhassa ca adhippetattā. Upekkhāvedanāpettha sukhasaṇhasabhāvavipākabhūtā vedanāva.
[06]Bhūmijasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^26^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vaṭṭadukkhameva^eb^^a^M2.0071^ea^^b^kathitaṃ^eb^ itaradukkhassapi vipākassa saṅgaṇhanato.
[06]Upavāṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^27^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭipāṭiyā^eb^ti paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapanena. Catusaccayojanaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^pariyosāna…pe… ādi vuttaṃ. Dukkhasaccavasenā^eb^ti pariññeyyabhāvavasena. Jarāmaraṇāpadesena hi pañcupādānakkhandhā vuttā, te cassa attano phalassa paccayā na honti. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paccayaṃ jānātī’’^eb^ti. Vineyyajjhāsayavasena hettha desanā pavattā. ^b^Sampanno^eb^ti samannāgato. ^b^Āgato^eb^ti upagato, adhigatoti attho. ^b^Passatī^eb^ti paccavekkhaṇañāṇena paccakkhato passati, maggapaññāya evaṃ asammohapaṭivedhavasena passati. ^b^Maggañāṇeneva,^eb^ na phalañāṇena. ^b^Dhammasotaṃ samāpanno^eb^ti ^a^V2.0061^ea^ ariyadhammasotaṃ sammadeva āpanno patto. Anaye nairiyanato, aye ca iriyanato, sadevakena ca lokena ‘‘saraṇa’’nti akaraṇīyato ariyapakkhaṃ bhajanto ^b^puthujjanabhūmiṃ atikkanto. Nibbedhikapaññāyā^eb^ti catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ nibbijjhanakapaññāya. ^b^Āhacca tiṭṭhati^eb^ maggakkhaṇe, phalakkhaṇe pana āhacca ṭhito nāma.
[06]Paccayasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^28^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Uttānameva^eb^ sabbasova sattame āgatanayattā, vineyyajjhāsayavasena hi idaṃ suttaṃ satthārā aññasmiṃ āsane desitaṃ, parisāya vivaṭṭena sātthikāti satthu desanā āgatāti ayaṃ paṭiggāhakādhīnā hotīti dhammagāravena saṅgahaṃ āropentiyeva.
[06]Bhikkhusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^29^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Akkharabhāṇakāna^eb^nti ^a^M2.0072^ea^ akkhararucīnaṃ. Upasaggena padavaḍḍhanampi ruccanti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘te hī’’^eb^tiādi.
[06]Samaṇabrāhmaṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^30^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dvīsu suttesū^eb^ti navamadasamasuttesu.
[06]Dutiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Dasabalavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^31^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ajitamāṇavenā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0062^ea^ soḷasasu bāvariyabrāhmaṇaparicārakesu ‘‘ajito’’ti laddhanāmena māṇavena. Saṅkhā vuccati paññā, saṅkhātā pariññātā dhammā yesaṃ te ^b^saṅkhātadhammā,^eb^ paṭividdhasaccā khīṇāsavā. Sekkhā pana vipākassa apariññātattā ‘‘saṅkhātadhammā’’ti na vuccanti. Sekkhadhammasamannāgamena te ^b^sekkhā^eb^. Te pana kāmaṃ puggalapaṭilābhavasena anekasahassāva honti, catumaggaheṭṭhimaphalattayassa pana vasena taṃsamaṅgitāsāmaññena na sattajanato uddhanti āha ^b^‘‘satta jane’’^eb^ti niyametvā viseseti. Saṃkilesavajjaṃ, tato vā attānaṃ viya vineyyalokaṃ nipāti rakkhatīti nipako, tassa bhāvo ^b^nepakkaṃ,^eb^ ñāṇanti āha ^b^‘‘nepakkaṃ vuccati paññā, tāya samannāgatattā nipako’’^eb^ti.

[03]‘‘Ko nu kho imassa pañhassa attho’’ti cintento pañhāya kaṅkhati nāma. ‘‘Kathaṃ byākaramāno nu kho satthu ajjhāsayaṃ na virodhemī’’ti cintento ajjhāsayaṃ kaṅkhati nāma. Sujānanīyatthaparicchedaṃ katvā cintanā hettha ^a^M2.0073^ea^ ‘‘kaṅkhā’’ti adhippetā, na vicikicchāti. Pahīnavicikiccho hi mahāthero āyasmato assajimahātherassa santikeyeva, vicinanabhūtaṃ kukkuccasadisaṃ panetaṃ vīmaṃsanamattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Pattaṃ ādāya caranto^eb^ti pabbajitabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ. Dhammasenāpatibhāvena vā mama pattadhammadesanāvāraṃ ādāya carantoti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Jāta^eb^nti yathārahaṃ paccayato uppannaṃ, saṅkhatanti attho. ^b^Pañhabyākaraṇaṃ upaṭṭhāsī^eb^ti pañhassa byākaraṇatā paṭibhāsi. ‘‘Sammappaññāya passatī’’ti pāṭho, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘‘sammappaññāya passato’’ti padaṃ uddharitvā ‘‘passantassā’’ti attho vutto. Taṃ ‘‘bhūtanti…pe… paṭipanno hotī’’ti imāya pāḷiyā na sameti, tasmā yathādassitapāṭho eva yutto. ^b^Yāva arahattamaggā nibbidādīnaṃ atthāyā^eb^ti samitāpekkhadhammavasā padaṃ vadanti. ^b^Āhārasambhava^eb^nti paccayahetukaṃ. ^b^Sekkhapaṭipadā kathitā^eb^ ‘‘nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hotī’’ti vacanato. Esa nayo nirodhavārepi. ^b^Nibbidā^eb^ti karaṇe paccattavacanaṃ, ^b^virāgā nirodhā^eb^ti karaṇe nissakkavacananti ^a^V2.0063^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘sabbāni kāraṇavacanānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anupādā^eb^ti anupādāya. ^b^Bhūtamidantiādimāha^eb^ sabbasuttaṃ āhaccabhāsitaṃ jinavacanameva karonto.
[06]Bhūtasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^32^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tassa therassa nāmaṃ^eb^ jātisamudāgataṃ. ^b^Nivatto^eb^ti pubbe vaṭṭasotassa paṭisotaṃ gantuṃ āraddho, taṃ avisahanto anusotameva gacchanto, tato nivatto pariklesavidhame asaṃsaṭṭho viyutto hoti. Ettha cetanāti vā assāso. Hīnāyāvattanaṃ nāma kāmesu sāpekkhatāya, tattha ca nirapekkhatā tatiyamaggādhigamenāti dassento ^b^‘‘tayo magge’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ^eb^ therassa arahattādhigamena nipphannaṃ, tasmā tassa taṃ uparimakoṭiyā assāso vutto. ^b^Ugghāṭitā^eb^ti vivaṭā, vūpasamitāti attho. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti arahattappattiyaṃ. ^b^Vicikicchābhāva^eb^nti nibbematikataṃ.

[03]^b^Na^eb^^a^M2.0074^ea^^b^evaṃ byākatā^eb^ti ‘‘khīṇā jātī’’tiādikā evaṃ uttānakaṃ na byākatā, pariyāyena pana byākatā. ^b^Kenacī^eb^ti kenacipi kāraṇena. ^b^Evaṃ^eb^ uttānakaṃ ^b^byākarissati^eb^.

[03]^b^Tassa paccayassa khayā^eb^ti tassa kammabhavasaṅkhātassa paccayassa avijjāya sahakāritāyaṃ saṅgahitassa khayā anuppādā nirodhā. ^b^Khīṇasmi^eb^nti khīṇe. Anuppādanirodhena niruddhe ^b^jātiyā^eb^ yathāvutte ^b^paccaye. Jātisaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ khīṇaṃ^eb^ anuppattidhammataṃ āpāditanti. ^b^Viditaṃ^eb^ ñātaṃ. Ājānāti catusaccaṃ heṭṭhimamaggehi ñātaṃ anatikkamitvāva paṭivijjhatīti ^b^aññā^eb^ aggamaggo. Tadupacārena aggaphalaṃ idha ‘‘aññā’’ nāma. ^b^Paccayo^eb^ti bhavūpapattiyā paccayo paṭiccasamuppādo.
[03]^b^Me^eb^ti mayā. ^b^Aññāsi^eb^ ākāraggahaṇena cittācāraṃ jānāti. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti bhagavatā. ^b^Byākaraṇaṃ anumoditaṃ^eb^ pañhabyākaraṇassa visayakatabhāvato.

[03]^b^Ayamassa visayo^eb^ti ayaṃ vedanā assa sāriputtattherassa savisayo tattha visayabhāvena pavattattā. ^b^Kiñcāpī^eb^ti kiñcāpi sukhā vedanā ṭhitisukhā dukkhā vedanā vipariṇāmasukhā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā ñāṇasukhā. ^b^Vipariṇāmakoṭiyā^eb^ti aniccabhāvena ^b^sabbāva^eb^ vedanā ^b^dukkhā nāma^eb^^a^V2.0064^ea^. Sukhapaṭikkhepatopi hi sukhapītiyā pharaṇatāya sukhāti tikkhamattena vipariṇāmadukkhāti vipariṇāmato abhāvādhigamena sukhanirodhakkhaṇamattena. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ^b^papañcasūdaniyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘sukhāya vedanāya atthibhāvo sukha’’nti. Sukhakāmo dukkhaṃ titikkhati. Apariññātavatthukānañhi sukhavedanuparamo dukkhato upaṭṭhāti, tasmāyamattho viyogena dīpetabbo. ‘‘Dukkhā vipariṇāmasukhā’’ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Tathācāha ^b^papañcasūdaniyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘dukkhāya vedanāya natthibhāvo sukha’’nti. Dukkhavedanuparamo hi vuttānaṃ sukhato upaṭṭhāti evāti vadanti. Tassa yogassa vūpasamena ‘‘aho sukhaṃ jāta’’nti majjhattavedanāya jānanabhāvo yāthāvato avabujjhanaṃ sukhaṃ. Adukkhamasukhāpi vedanā vijānantassa sukhaṃ hoti tassa sukhumatāya viññeyyabhāvato. Yathā rūpārūpadhammānaṃ salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca sammadeva avabodho paramaṃ sukhaṃ. Tenāha –
[21]‘‘Yato ^a^M2.0075^ea^ yato sammasati, khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ;
[22]Labhatī pītipāmojjaṃ, amataṃ taṃ vijānata’’nti. (dha. pa. 374);

[03]^b^Aññāṇadukkhā^eb^ti ajānanabhāvo adukkhamasukhāvedanāya dukkhaṃ. Sammā vibhāgajānanasabhāvo ñāṇassa sambhavo. Ñāṇasampayuttā hi ñāṇūpanissayā adukkhamasukhā vedanā pasatthākārā, yato sā iṭṭhā ceva iṭṭhaphalā cāti. Ajānanabhāvoti ettha vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo. ‘‘Dukkhanti vidito’’ti pāḷi, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana viditanti paduddhāro kato, taṃ atthadassanamattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Vedanāparicchedajānane^eb^ti ‘‘tisso imā vedanā’’ti evaṃ paricchedato jānane. ^b^Aññāsī^eb^ti kadā aññāsi? Imasmiṃ desanākāleti vadanti, paṭivedhakāleti pana yuttaṃ. Yathāpaṭividdhā hi vedanā idha therena desitāti. ^b^Iminā kāraṇenā^eb^ti ‘‘yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha’’nti vedanānaṃ aniccatāya dukkhabhāvajānanasaṅkhātena kāraṇena. Taṃnimittaṃ hissa vedanāsu taṇhā na uppajjati. ^b^Atippapañco^eb^ti ativitthāro. ^b^Dukkhasmiṃ^eb^ antogadhaṃ dukkhapariyāpannattā. ^b^Dukkha^eb^nti sabbaṃ vedayitaṃ dukkhaṃ saṅkhāradukkhabhāvato. ^b^Ñātamatte^eb^ti yāthāvato avabujjhanamatte. ^b^Taṇhā na tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti na santiṭṭhati nappavattati.

[03]^b^Kathaṃ vimokkhā^eb^ti ajjhattabahiddhābhedesu vimuttā. Hetumhi cetaṃ nissakkavacananti hetuatthena karaṇavacanena atthamāha ^b^‘‘katarena vimokkhenā’’^eb^ti. Karaṇatthepi vā etaṃ nissakkavacananti ^a^V2.0065^ea^ tathā vuttaṃ. ^b^Abhiniveso^eb^ti vipassanārambho. ^b^Bahiddhādhammāpi daṭṭhabbāyeva^eb^ sabbassapi pariññeyyassa parijānitabbato. ^b^Ñāṇaṃ^eb^ pavattetvā. ^b^Te^eb^ti ajjhattasaṅkhāre. ^b^Vavatthapetvā^eb^ti salakkhaṇato paricchinditvā. ^b^Bahiddhā otāretī^eb^ti bahiddhāsaṅkhāresu ñāṇaṃ otāreti. ^b^Ajjhattaṃ otāretī^eb^ti ajjhattasaṅkhāre sammasati. ^b^Tatra^eb^ tasmiṃ catukke. ^b^Tesaṃ vavatthānakāle^eb^ti tesaṃ ajjhattasaṅkhārānaṃ vipassanākāle.

[03]^b^Sabbupādānakkhayā^eb^ti sabbaso upādānānaṃ khayā. Kāmaṃ diṭṭhisīlabbatāttavādupādānāni paṭhamamaggeneva khīyanti, kāmupādānaṃ pana aggamaggenāti tassa ^a^M2.0076^ea^ vasena ‘‘sabbupādānakkhayā’’ti vadanto thero attano arahattapattiṃ byākaroti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘āsavā nānussavantī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sato^eb^ti iminā sativepullappattiṃ dasseti. ^b^Cakkhuto rūpe savantī^eb^ti cakkhuviññāṇavīthiyaṃ tadanugatamanoviññāṇavīthiyañca rūpārammaṇā āsavā pavattantīti. Kiñcāpi tattha kusalādīnampi pavatti atthi, kāmāsavādayo eva vaṇato yūsaṃ viya paggharaṇakāsucibhāvena sandanti, tathā sesavāresu. Tenāha ^b^‘‘eva’’^eb^ntiādi, tasmā te eva ‘‘āsavā’’ti vuccanti. Tattha hi paggharaṇakāsucimhi niruḷho āsavasaddo. ‘‘Attānaṃ nāvajānāmī’’ti vuttattā ^b^‘‘omānapahānaṃ kathita’’^eb^nti āha. Tena āsavesu samudāyupalakkhaṇaṃ kathitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi seyyamānādippahānena vinā hīnamānaṃyeva pajahati. ^b^Pajānanā^eb^ti ‘‘nāparaṃ itthattāyā’’ti vuttapajānanasampanno hotīti.
[03]^b^Sarūpabhedatopī^eb^ti ‘‘cattāro’’ti evaṃ parimāṇaparicchedatopi. Idaṃ bhagavā dassento āhāti sambandho. ^b^Ida^eb^nti ca ‘‘ayampi kho’’tiādivacanaṃ sandhāyāha.

[03]^b^Asambhinnāya evā^eb^ti yathānisinnāya eva, avuṭṭhitāya evāti attho. ^b^Puggalathomanattha^eb^nti desanākusalānaṃ ānandattherādīnaṃ puggalānaṃ pasaṃsanatthaṃ ukkaṃsanatthaṃ. ^b^Dhammathomanattha^eb^nti paṭipattidhammassa pasaṃsanatthaṃ. ^b^Tepī^eb^ti ānandattherādayo bhikkhūpi. ^b^Dhammapaṭiggāhakā^eb^ bhikkhū. ^b^Atthe^eb^ti sīlādiatthe. ^b^Dhamme^eb^ti pāḷidhamme.

[03]^b^Assā^eb^ti bhagavato. ^b^Ānubhāvaṃ karissati^eb^ ‘‘divasañcepi bhagavā’’tiādinā. ^b^Na^eb^nti sāriputtattheraṃ. ^b^Ahampi tatheva thomessāmi^eb^ ‘‘sā hi bhikkhū’’tiādinā. ^b^Evaṃ cintesī^eb^ti evaṃ vakkhamānena dhammadāyādadesanāya cintitākārena cintesi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yathā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ekajjhāsayāyā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0066^ea^ samānādhippāyāya. ^b^Matiyā^eb^ti paññāya. ^b^Ayaṃ desanā aggā^eb^ti bhagavā dhammasenāpatiṃ guṇato evaṃ paggaṇhātīti katvā vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Pakāsetvā^eb^ti guṇato pākaṭaṃ paññātaṃ katvā sabbasāvakehi seṭṭhabhāve ^b^ṭhapetukāmo. Cittagatiyā^eb^ cittavasena kāyassa pariṇāmanena ‘‘ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū’’ti kāyasamānagatikattādhiṭṭhānena. Kathaṃ pana kāyo dandhappavattiko lahuparivattena cittena ^a^M2.0077^ea^ samānagatiko hotīti? Na sabbathā samānagatiko. Yatheva hi kāyavasena cittavipariṇāmane cittaṃ sabbathā kāyena samānagatikaṃ hoti. Na hi tadā cittaṃ sabhāvasiddhena attano khaṇena avattitvā dandhavuttikassa rūpadhammassa khaṇena vattituṃ sakkoti, ‘‘idaṃ cittaṃ ayaṃ kāyo viya hotū’’ti panādhiṭṭhānena dandhagatikassa kāyassa anuvattanato yāva icchitaṭṭhānappatti hoti, tāva kāyagatianulomeneva hutvā santānavasena pavattamānaṃ cittaṃ kāyagatiyā pariṇāmitaṃ nāma hoti, evaṃ ‘‘ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū’’ti adhiṭṭhānena pageva sukhalahusaññāya sampāditattā abhāvitiddhipādānaṃ viya dandhaṃ avattitvā yathā lahukatipayacittavāreheva icchitaṭṭhānappati hoti, evaṃ pavattarūpatā viññāyatīti.

[03]^b^Adhippāyānurūpameva^eb^ tassa bhagavato thomanāya katattā. ^b^Idaṃ nāma^eb^ atthajātaṃ bhagavā ^b^pucchissatī^eb^ti pubbe mayā ^b^aviditaṃ^eb^ apassaṃ. ^b^Āsayajānanattha^eb^nti ‘‘evaṃ byākarontena satthu ajjhāsayo gahito hotī’’ti evaṃ satthu ajjhāsayajānanatthaṃ. ^b^Dutiyaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanto^eb^ bhagavā ^b^paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ anumodi^eb^ dutiyaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanteneva paṭhamapañhavissajjanassa sampaṭicchitabhāvato.

[03]^b^Etaṃ ahosī^eb^ti etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosi. ^b^Assā^eb^ti kaḷārakhattiyassa bhikkhuno. Dhamme dahatīti ^b^dhammadhātu,^eb^ sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ, sāvakavisaye dhamme dahati yāthāvato ajite katvā ṭhapetīti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dhammadhātū’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sabbaññutaññāṇagatikameva^eb^ visaye. ^b^Gocaradhamme^eb^ti gocarabhūte ñeyyadhamme.
[06]Kaḷārasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^33^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ñāṇameva ñāṇavatthu^eb^ sampattīnaṃ kāraṇabhāvato. ^b^Catūsū^eb^ti catusaccassa bodhanavasena vuttesu catūsu ñāṇesu. ^b^Paṭhama^eb^nti ‘‘jarāmaraṇe ñāṇa’’nti evaṃ vuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ, yena dhāraṇaparicayamanasikāravasena ^a^V2.0067^ea^ pavattaṃ sabbaṃ gaṇhi. Sannicayañāṇamayaṃ ^b^savanamayaṃ^eb^ nāmatveva veditabbaṃ. Sabhāvato ^a^M2.0078^ea^ paccayato cassa pariggaṇhanañāṇaṃ ^b^sammasanañāṇaṃ^eb^tveva veditabbaṃ. Jarāmaraṇasīsena cettha jarāmaraṇavantova dhammā gahitā. ^b^Paṭivedhañāṇa^eb^nti asammohato paṭivijjhanañāṇaṃ. ^b^Iminā dhammenā^eb^ti hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ. Imassa hi dhammassa adhigamahetu ayaṃ ariyo atītānāgate nayenapi catusaccadhamme abhisambujjhati. Maggañāṇameva pana atītānāgate nayanasadisaṃ katvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘maggañāṇadhammena vā’’^eb^ti dutiyavikappo vutto. Evañhi ‘‘akālika’’nti samatthitaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Ñāṇacakkhunā diṭṭhenā^eb^ti dhammacakkhubhūtena ñāṇacakkhunā asammohapaṭivedhavasena paccakkhato diṭṭhena. ^b^Paññāya viditenā^eb^ti maggapaññāya tatheva viditena. Yasmā tathā diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sabbaso pattaṃ mahāupāyo hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pariyogāḷhenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Diṭṭhenā^eb^ti vā dassanena, dhammaṃ passitvā ṭhitenāti attho. ^b^Viditenā^eb^ti cattāri saccāni viditvā pākaṭāni katvā ṭhitena. ^b^Akālikenā^eb^ti na kālantaravipākadāyinā. ^b^Pattenā^eb^ti cattāri saccāni patvā ṭhitattā dhammaṃ pattena. ^b^Pariyogāḷhenā^eb^ti catusaccadhamme pariyogāhitvā ṭhitena. ^b^Atītānāgate nayaṃ netī^eb^ti atīte ca anāgate ca nayaṃ neti harati peseti. Idaṃ pana paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa kiccaṃ, satthārā pana maggañāṇaṃ atītānāgate nayanasadisaṃ kataṃ taṃmūlakattā. Atītamaggassa hi paccavekkhaṇaṃ nāma hoti, tasmā maggañāṇaṃ nayanasadisaṃ kataṃ nāma hoti, paccavekkhaṇañāṇena pana nayaṃ neti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ettha cā’’^eb^tiādi. Yathā pana tena nayaṃ neti. Taṃ ākāraṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ye kho kecī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Ettha ca nayanuppādanaṃ nayañāṇasseva pavattiviseso. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa kicca’’nti. Kiñcāpi ‘‘imināti maggañāṇadhammena vā’’ti vuttaṃ, duvidhaṃ pana maggaphalañāṇaṃ sammasanañāṇapaccavekkhaṇāya mūlakāraṇaṃ, na nayanassāti duvidhena ñāṇadhammenāti na na yujjati. Tathā catusaccadhammassa ñātattā maggaphalasaṅkhātassa vā dhammassa saccapaṭivedhasampayogaṃ gatattā ‘‘nayanaṃ hotū’’ti tena ‘‘iminā dhammenā’’ti ñāṇassa visayabhāvena ñāṇasampayogena tadañātenāti ca attho na na yujjati. ^b^Anuaye^eb^ti dhammañāṇassa anurūpavasena aye bujjhanañāṇe diṭṭhānaṃ adiṭṭhānayanato adiṭṭhassa diṭṭhatāya ñāpanato ca. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dhammañāṇassa anugamane ñāṇa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Khīṇāsavassa sekkhabhūmi^eb^ nāma aggamaggakkhaṇo ^a^M2.0079^ea^. Kasmā panetaṃ evaṃ vuttanti ce? ‘‘Evaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ pajānātī’’tiādinā vattamānavasena desanāya pavattattā.
[06]Ñāṇavatthusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^34^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sattarī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0068^ea^ ta-kārassa ra-kārādesaṃ vuttaṃ. Sattatisaddena vā samānattho sattarisaddo. Byañjanarucivasena byañjanaṃ bhaṇantīti ^b^byañjanabhāṇakā^eb^. Tenāha ‘‘bahubyañjanaṃ katvā’’tiādi. Tiṭṭhati tattha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhiti, paccuppannalakkhaṇassa dhammassa ṭhiti dhammaṭṭhiti. Atha vā dhammoti kāraṇaṃ, paccayoti attho. Dhammassa yo ṭhitisabhāvo, sova dhammato añño natthīti dhammaṭṭhiti, paccayo. Tattha ñāṇaṃ ^b^dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ^eb^. Tenāha āyasmā dhammasenāpati – ‘‘paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa’’nti (paṭi. ma. mātikā 4). Tathā cāha ^b^‘‘paccayākāre ñāṇa’’^eb^ntiādi. Tattha ^b^dhammāna^eb^nti paccayuppannadhammānaṃ. ^b^Pavattiṭṭhitikāraṇattā^eb^ti pavattisaṅkhātāya ṭhitiyā kāraṇattā. ‘‘Jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa’’ntiādinā addhattaye anvayabyatirekavasena pavattiyā ^b^chabbidhassa ñāṇassa. Khayo^eb^ nāma vināso, sova bhedoti. ^b^Virajjanaṃ^eb^ palujjanaṃ. ^b^Nirujjhanaṃ^eb^ antaradhānaṃ. ^b^Ekekasmi^eb^nti jarāmaraṇādīsu ekekasmiṃ. Pubbe ‘‘yathābhūtañāṇa’’nti taruṇavipassanaṃ āha. Tasmā idhāpi dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ vipassanāti gahetvā ^b^‘‘vipassanāpaṭivipassanā kathitā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.
[06]Dutiyañāṇavatthusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^35^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Desanaṃ osāpesī^eb^ti yathāraddhakathaṃ ṭhapesi. Tattha nisinnassa diṭṭhigatikassa laddhiyā bhindanavasena upari kathetukāmo. Buddhānañhi desanāvāraṃ pacchindāpetvā pucchituṃ samattho nāma koci natthi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘diṭṭhigatikassa okāsadānattha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Duppañho eso^eb^ sattūpaladdhiyā pucchitattā ^a^M2.0080^ea^. ^b^Sattūpaladdhivādapadenā^eb^ti ‘‘satto jīvo upalabbhatī’’ti evaṃ pavattadiṭṭhidīpakapadavasena. Vadanti etenāti ^b^vādo^eb^. Diṭṭhi-saddo pana dvayasaṅgahito, brahmacariyavāso pana paramatthato ariyamaggabhāvanāti āha ^b^‘‘ariyamaggavāso’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ayaṃ diṭṭhī^eb^ti anaññe sarīrajīvāti diṭṭhi. ‘‘Jīvo’’ti ca jīvitameva vadanti. ^b^Vaṭṭa^eb^nti duvidhaṃ vaṭṭaṃ. ^b^Nirodhento^eb^ti anuppattidhammataṃ āpādento. ^b^Samucchindanto^eb^ti appavattiyaṃ pāpanena upacchindanto. Tadetaṃ maggena nirodhetabbaṃ vaṭṭaṃ nirujjhatīti yojanā. ‘‘Ayaṃ satto vināsaṃ abhāvaṃ patvā sabbaso ucchijjatī’’ti evaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiyā gahitākārassa ^b^sambhave^eb^ saccabhāve ^b^sati. Na hotī^eb^ti sātthako na hoti.

[03]^b^Gacchatī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0069^ea^ sarīrato nikkhamitvā gacchati. ^b^Vivaṭṭento^eb^ti appavattiṃ karontoti attho. ^b^Vivaṭṭetuṃ na sakkoti^eb^ niccassa appavattiṃ pāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā. Micchādiṭṭhi sammādiṭṭhiṃ vijjhati asamāhitapuggalasevanavasena tathā pavattituṃ appadānavasena ca pajahitabbāpajahanavasena sammādiṭṭhiṃ vijjhati. ^b^Visūkamivā^eb^ti kaṇḍako viya. Na kevalaṃ ananuvattakova, atha kho virodhopi ‘‘nicca’’ntiādinā pavattanadhammatāya viññāpanato. Virūpaṃ bībhacchaṃ phanditaṃ ^b^vipphanditaṃ^eb^. Paṇṇapupphaphalapallavānaṃ avatthubhūto tālo eva tālāvatthu ‘‘asive sivā’’ti vohāro viya. Keci pana ‘‘tālavatthukatānī’’ti paṭhanti, avatthubhūtatāya tālo viya katānīti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘matthakacchinnatālo viyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anuabhāva^eb^nti vināsaṃ.
[06]Avijjāpaccayasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^36^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Iti vā^eb^ti evaṃ vā. Jarāmaraṇassa ceva jarāmaraṇasāmikassa ca khaṇavasena ^b^yo vadeyya. Avisāradadhātuko^eb^ pucchituṃ acchekatāya maṅkubhāvena jāto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pucchituṃ na sakkotī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Dutiyāvijjāpaccayasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
