[03]^b^37^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na^eb^^a^M2.0081^ea^^b^tumhāka^eb^nti kāyassa anattaniyabhāvadassanameva panetanti yā tassa anattaniyatā, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘attani hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Yadi na attaniyaṃ, parakiyaṃ nāma siyāti, tampi natthīti dassento ^b^‘‘nāpi aññesa’’^eb^nti āha. ^b^Nayidaṃ purāṇakammamevā^eb^ti ‘‘idaṃ kāyo’’ti vuttasarīraṃ purāṇakammameva na hoti. Na hi kāyo vedanāsabhāvo. ^b^Paccayavohārenā^eb^ti kāraṇopacārena. ^b^Abhisaṅkhata^eb^ntiādi napuṃsakaliṅgavacanaṃ. ^b^Purimaliṅgasabhāgatāyā^eb^ti ‘‘purāṇamidaṃ kamma’’nti evaṃ vuttapurimanapuṃsakaliṅgasabhāgatāya. Aññamaññābhimukhehi samecca paccayehi kato abhisaṅkhatoti āha ^b^‘‘paccayehi katoti daṭṭhabbo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Abhisañcetayita^eb^nti tathā abhisaṅkhatattasaṅkhātena abhimukhabhāvena cetayitaṃ pakappitaṃ, pavattitanti attho. ^b^Cetanāvatthuko^eb^ti cetanāhetuko. ^b^Vedaniya^eb^nti vedanāya hitaṃ vatthārammaṇabhāvena vedanāya paccayabhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vedaniyavatthū’’^eb^ti.
[06]Natumhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^38^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yañcā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0070^ea^ ettha ^b^ca^eb^-saddo aṭṭhāne. Tena cetanāya viya pakappānānusayānampi viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā vakkhamānaṃyeva avisiṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇabhāvaṃ joteti. Kāmaṃ tīsupi padesu ‘‘pavatteti’’icceva attho vutto, vattanattho pana cetanādīnaṃ yathākkamaṃ cetayanapakappanānusayanarūpo visiṭṭhaṭṭho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Tebhūmakakusalākusalacetanā gahitā^eb^ kammaviññāṇassa paccayaniddhāraṇametanti. ^b^Taṇhādiṭṭhikappā gahitā^eb^ yathārahanti adhippāyo. Aṭṭhasupi hi lobhasahagatacittesu taṇhākappo, tattha catūsveva diṭṭhikappoti. Kāmaṃ anusayā lokiyakusalacetanāsupi anusentiyeva, akusalesu pana pavatti pākaṭāti ^b^‘‘dvādasannaṃ cetanāna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sahajātakoṭiyā^eb^ti idaṃ paccuppannāpi kāmarāgādayo anusayāva vuccanti taṃsadisatāyāti vuttaṃ. Na hi kālabhedena lakkhaṇappabhedo atthīti. Anāgatā eva hi kāmarāgādayo nippariyāyato ‘‘anusayā’’ti vattabbataṃ arahanti. Paccayuppanno ^a^M2.0082^ea^ vaṭṭatīti āha ‘‘ārammaṇaṃ paccayo’’ti. ^b^Kammaviññāṇassa ṭhitattha^eb^nti kammaviññāṇasseva pavattiyā. ^b^Tasmiṃ paccaye satī^eb^ti tasmiṃ cetanāpakappanānusayasaññite paccaye sati ^b^patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa hoti^eb^. Santāne phaladānasamatthatāyeva hotīti ^b^‘‘patiṭṭhā hoti, tasmiṃ patiṭṭhite’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāvasena ^b^viruḷhe^eb^ti. Patiṭṭhiteti hi iminā kammassa katabhāvo vutto, ‘‘viruḷhe’’ti iminā upacitabhāvo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kammaṃ javāpetvā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha puretaraṃ uppannāhi kammacetanāhi laddhapaccayattā balappattāya sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya kammaviññāṇaṃ laddhapatiṭṭhaṃ viruḷhamūlañca hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nibbattamūle jāte’’^eb^ti. Tathā hi sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā vipākaṃ dentaṃ anantare jātivasena deti upapajjavedanīyakammanti.

[03]^b^Tebhūmakacetanāyā^eb^ti tebhūmakakusalākusalacetanāya. ^b^Appavattanakkhaṇo^eb^ti idha pavattanakkhaṇo jāyamānakkhaṇo. Na jāyamānakkhaṇo ^b^appavattanakkhaṇo^eb^ na kevalaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇo appahīnānusayassa adhippetattā. ^b^Appahīnakoṭiyā^eb^ti asamucchinnabhāvena. Tadidaṃ tebhūmakakusalākusalacetanāsu appavattamānāsu anusayānaṃ sahajātakoṭiādinā pavatti nāma natthi, vipākādīsu appahīnakoṭiyā pavattati karontassa abhāvatoti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Avāritattā^eb^ti paṭipakkheti avāritabbattā. ^b^Paccayova hoti^eb^ viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā.

[03]Paṭhamadutiyavārehi vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā tatiyavāre ^b^‘‘no ce’’^eb^tiādinā vivaṭṭaṃ dassitanti ^b^‘‘paṭhamapade tebhūmakakusalākusalacetanā nivattā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^nivattā^eb^ti akaraṇato appavattiyā ^a^V2.0071^ea^ apagatā. Taṇhādiṭṭhiyo nivattāti yojanā. ^b^Vuttappakāresū^eb^ti ‘‘tebhūmakavipākesū’’tiādinā vuttappakāresu.

[03]^b^Etthā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sutte. Ettha cetanāpakappanānaṃ pavattanavasena dhammaparicchedo dassitoti ‘‘cetetīti tebhūmakakusalākusalacetanā gahitā’’tiādinayo idheva hotīti dassito. ^b^Catasso^eb^ti paṭighadvayamohamūlasamāgatā catasso akusalacetanā. ^b^Catūsu akusalacetanāsū^eb^ti yathāvuttāsu eva catūsu akusalacetanāsu, itarā pana ‘‘na pakappetī’’ti iminā paṭikkhepena nivattāti. ^b^Sutte āgataṃ vāretvā^eb^ti ‘‘no ca pakappetī’’ti evaṃ paṭikkhepavasena ^a^M2.0083^ea^ sutte āgataṃ vajjetvā. ‘‘Na pakappetī’’ti hi iminā aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatacittesu sahajātakoṭiyā pavattānusayo nivattito tesaṃ cittānaṃ appavattanato, tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ ṭhapetvāti attho. ^b^Purimasadisova^eb^ purimanayesu vuttanayena gahetabbo dhammaparicchedattā.

[03]^b^Tadappatiṭṭhite^eb^ti samāsabhāvato vibhattilopo, sandhivasena da-kārāgamo, tassa appatiṭṭhitaṃ tadappatiṭṭhitaṃ, tasmiṃ tadappatiṭṭhiteti evamettha samāsapadasiddhi daṭṭhabbā. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ tatiyavāre arahattamaggassa kiccaṃ kathitaṃ sabbaso anusayanibbattibhedanato. ^b^Khīṇāsavassa kiccakaraṇantipi^eb^ vattuṃ vaṭṭati sabbaso vedanādīnaṃ paṭikkhepabhāvato. ^b^Nava lokuttaradhammātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati^eb^ maggapaṭipāṭiyā anusayasamugghāṭanato maggānantarāni phalāni, tadubhayārammaṇañca nibbānanti. ^b^Viññāṇassā^eb^ti kammaviññāṇassa. Punabbhavasīsena anantarabhavasaṅgahitaṃ nāmarūpaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇameva vā gahitanti āha ^b^‘‘punabbhavassa ca antare eko sandhī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bhavajātīna^eb^nti ettha ‘‘dutiyabhavassa tatiyabhave jātiyā’’ti evaṃ paramparavasena gahetabbaṃ. Āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattigahaṇena pana nānantariyato kammabhavo gahito, jātihetuphalasiddhipettha vuttā evāti veditabbaṃ. Ettha ca ‘‘no ce, bhikkhave, ceteti no ca pakappeti, atha kho anusetī’’ti evaṃ bhagavatā dutiyanaye pubbabhāge bhavanibbattakakusalākusalāyūhanaṃ, pakappanañca vināpi bhavesu diṭṭhādīnavassa yogino anusayapaccayā vipassanācetanāpi paṭisandhijanakā hotīti dassanatthaṃ kusalākusalassa appavatti cepi, tadā vijjamānatebhūmakavipākādidhammesu appahīnakoṭiyā anusayitakilesappaccayā bhavavajjassa kammaviññāṇassa patiṭṭhitatā hotīti dassanatthañca vutto. ‘‘Na ceteti pakappeti anusetī’’ti ayaṃ nayo na gahito cetanaṃ vinā pakappanassa abhāvato.
[06]Cetanāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^39^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Viññāṇanāmarūpānaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0072^ea^^a^M2.0084^ea^^b^antare eko sandhī^eb^ti hetuphalasandhi viññāṇaggahaṇena kammaviññāṇassa gahitattā. Nāmarūpaṃ pana vipākanāmarūpamevāti pākaṭameva. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Dutiyacetanāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^40^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Rūpādīsu^eb^ chasu ārammaṇesu. Tena cettha bhavattayaṃ saṅgaṇhāti chaḷārammaṇapariyāpannattā. Tasseva bhavattayassa patthanā paṇidhānādivasena ^b^nati^eb^ nāma. ^b^Āgatimhi gatī^eb^ti paccupaṭṭhānavasena abhimukhaṃ gati pavatti etasmāti āgati, kammādinimittaṃ. Tasmiṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇassa gati pavatti nibbatti hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘āgate’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Cutūpapāto^eb^ti cavanaṃ cuti, maraṇaṃ. Upapajjanaṃ nibbatti, upapāto. Cutito upapāto punaruppādo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘evaṃ viññāṇassā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ito^eb^ti nibbattabhavato. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti punabbhavasaṅkhāte āyatibhave. ^b^Ekova sandhī^eb^ti eko hetuphalasandhi eva kathito.
[06]Tatiyacetanāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Kaḷārakhattiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^41^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yato^eb^ti yasmiṃ kāle. Ayañhi ^b^to^eb^-saddo dā-saddo viya idha kālavisayo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yadā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bhayaveracetanāyo^eb^ti bhāyitabbaṭṭhena bhayaṃ, verapasavanaṭṭhena veranti ca laddhanāmā cetanāyo. Pāṇātipātādayo hi yassa pavattanti, yañca uddissa pavattiyanti, ubhaye sabhayabheravāti te eva bhāyitabbabhayaverajanakāvāti. Sotassa ariyamaggassa ādito paṭṭhāya paṭipattiadhigamo sotāpatti ^a^M2.0085^ea^, tadatthāya tattha patiṭṭhitassa ca aṅgāni ^b^sotāpattiyaṅgāni,^eb^ tadubhayaṃ ^a^V2.0073^ea^ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘duvidhaṃ sotāpattiyā aṅga’’^eb^nti, sotāpattiatthaṃ aṅganti attho. ^b^Yaṃ pubbabhāge^eb^ti yaṃ sayaṃ sotāpattimaggaphalapaṭilābhato pubbabhāge tadatthāya saṃvattati. Kiṃ pana tanti āha ‘‘sappurisasaṃsevo’’tiādi. Sappurisānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ ariyañāṇasaññāṇajātā payirupāsanā, ^b^saddhammassavanaṃ^eb^ catusaccadhammassavanaṃ, yoniso upāyena aniccādito manasi karaṇaṃ ^b^yoniso manasikāro,^eb^ ussukkāpentena dhammassa nibbānassa anudhammapaṭipajjanaṃ ^b^dhammānudhammapaṭipattī^eb^ti etāni sotāpattiyā aṅgāni. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sotāpattiaṅganti padaṃ apekkhitvā ^b^‘‘evaṃ āgata’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ṭhitassa^eb^ puggalassa ^b^aṅgaṃ^eb^. Sotāpanno aṅgīyati ñāyati etenāti ^b^sotāpannassa aṅganti^eb^pi vuccati. ^b^Idaṃ^eb^ pacchā vuttaṃ aṅgaṃ. Dosehi ārakāti ^b^ariyo^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘niddoso’’^eb^ti. Kathaṃ avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ paccayotiādinā kenacipi anupārambhiyattā ^b^nirupārambho^eb^. Ñāṇaṃ sandhāya ‘‘niddoso’’ti vuttaṃ, paṭiccasamuppādaṃ sandhāya ‘‘nirupārambho’’ti vadanti. Ubhayampi pana sandhāya ubhayaṃ vuttanti apare. ^b^Paṭiccasamuppādo^eb^ ettha adhippeto. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘aparāparaṃ uppannāya vipassanāpaññāyā’’^eb^ti. Na hi maggañāṇaṃ vipassanāpaññāti. Sammā upāyattā tassa paṭiccasamuppanne yāthāvato ñāyatīti ^b^ñāyo,^eb^ paṭiccasamuppādo. Ñāṇaṃ pana ñāyati so etenāti ^b^ñāyo^eb^.

[03]^b^Tatthā^eb^ti niraye. ^b^Maggasota^eb^nti maggassa sotaṃ. ^b^Āpanno^eb^ti adhigato. Apāyesu uppajjanasaṅkhāto vinipātadhammo etassāti vinipātadhammo, na vinipātadhammo ^b^avinipātadhammo^eb^. Paraṃ ayananti ativiya savisaye ayitabbaṃ bujjhitabbaṃ. Yesañhi dhātūnaṃ gatiattho, buddhipi tesaṃ attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘avassaṃ abhisambujjhanako’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Pāṇātipātakammakāraṇā^eb^ti pāṇātipātasaṅkhātassa pāpakammassa karaṇahetu. ^b^Veraṃ^eb^ vuccati virodho, tadeva bhāyitabbato ^b^bhaya^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘bhayaṃ veranti atthato eka’’^eb^nti. ^b^Idaṃ bāhiraṃ veraṃ nāma^eb^ tassa verassa mūlabhūtato verakārapuggalato bahibhāvattā. Teneva hi tassa verakārapuggalassa uppannaṃ veraṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘idaṃ ajjhattikaveraṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, tannissitassa verassa mūlabhūtā verakārapuggalacetanā uppajjati paharituṃ asamatthassapīti adhippāyo. Na hi nerayikā nirayapālesu ^a^M2.0086^ea^ paṭipaharituṃ sakkonti. ^b^Nirayapālassa cetanā uppajjatī^eb^ti etena ‘‘atthi niraye nirayapālā’’ti dasseti. ^b^Yaṃ panetaṃ bāhiravera^eb^nti yamidaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ samparāyikañca bāhiraṃ veraṃ. ^b^Puggalaveranti vuttaṃ^eb^ attakiccaṃ sādhetuṃ asakkonto kevalaṃ parapuggale uppannamattaṃ veranti katvā. ^b^Atthato ekameva^eb^ ‘‘cetasika’’nti visesetvā vuttattā. ^b^Sesapadesū^eb^ti ‘‘adinnādānapaccayā’’tiādinā āgatesu sesakoṭṭhāsesu. ^b^Attho bhaggo^eb^ti attho dhaṃsito ^a^V2.0074^ea^. ^b^Adhigatenā^eb^ti maggena adhigatena. ‘‘Abhigatenā’’tipi pāṭho, adhivuttenāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘acalappasādenā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Pañcaverabhayasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^42^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhikkhūnaṃ kathitabhāvamattameva viseso^eb^ti etena yā satthārā ekaccānaṃ desitadesanā, puna tadaññesaṃ veneyyadamakusalena kālantare teneva desitā, sā dhammasaṃgāhakehi ‘‘mā no satthudesanā sampaṭiggahaṃ vinā nassatū’’ti visuṃ saṅgahaṃ āropitāti dasseti.
[06]Dutiyapañcaverabhayasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^43^eb^^b^.^eb^ Samudayanaṃ ^b^samudayo,^eb^ samudeti etamhāti ^b^samudayo,^eb^ evaṃ ubhinnaṃ samudayānamatthatopi bhedo veditabbo. Paccayāva ^b^paccayasamudayo^eb^. Āraddhavipassako ‘‘imañca imañca paccayasāmaggiṃ paṭicca ime dhammā khaṇe khaṇe uppajjantī’’ti passanto ^b^‘‘paccayasamudayaṃ passantopi bhikkhu khaṇikasamudayaṃ passatī’’^eb^ti vutto paccayadassanamukhena nibbattikkhaṇassa dassanato. So pana khaṇe khaṇe saṅkhārānaṃ nibbattiṃ passituṃ āraddho ‘‘imehi nāma paccayehi nibbattatī’’ti passati. ‘‘So khaṇikasamudayaṃ passanto paccayaṃ passatī’’ti vadanti. Yasmā pana paccayato saṅkhārānaṃ ^a^M2.0087^ea^ udayaṃ passanto khaṇato tesaṃ udayadassanaṃ hoti, khaṇato etesaṃ udayaṃ passato pageva paccayānaṃ suggahitattā paccayato dassanaṃ sukhena ijjhati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paccayasamudayaṃ passantopī’’^eb^tiādi. Atthaṅgamadassanepi eseva nayo. ^b^Accantatthaṅgamo^eb^ti appavatti nirodho nibbānanti. ^b^Bhedatthaṅgamo^eb^ti khaṇikanirodho. Tadubhayaṃ pubbabhāge uggahaparipucchādivasena passanto aññatarassa dassane itaradassanampi siddhameva hoti, pubbabhāge ca ārammaṇavasena khayato vayasammasanādikāle bhedatthaṅgamaṃ passanto atirekavasena anussavādito accantaṃ atthaṅgamaṃ passati. Maggakkhaṇe panārammaṇato accantātthaṅgamaṃ passati, asammohato itarampi passati. Taṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘accantatthaṅgamaṃ passantopī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Samudayatthaṅgamaṃ nibbattibheda^eb^nti samudayasaṅkhātaṃ nibbattiṃ atthaṅgamasaṅkhātaṃ bhedañca. ^b^Nissayavasenā^eb^ti cakkhussa sannissayavasena paccayaṃ katvā. ^b^Ārammaṇavasenā^eb^ti rūpe ārammaṇaṃ katvā. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ ^b^madhupiṇḍikasuttaṭīkāyaṃ^eb^ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. ^b^Tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso^eb^ti ‘‘cakkhu rūpāni ^a^V2.0075^ea^ viññāṇa’’nti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati samāgame nibbatti phassoti vuttoti āha ^b^‘‘tiṇṇaṃ saṅgatiyā phasso’’^eb^ti. Tiṇṇanti ca pākaṭapaccayavasena vuttaṃ, tadaññepi pana manasikārādayo phassapaccayā hontiyeva. ^b^Eva^eb^nti taṇhādīnaṃ asesavirāganirodhakkamena. ^b^Bhinnaṃ hotī^eb^ti anuppādanirodhena niruddhaṃ hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘appaṭisandhiya’’^eb^nti.
[06]Dukkhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^44^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ayamettha viseso^eb^ti ‘‘ayaṃ lokassā’’ti samudayatthaṅgamānaṃ visesadassanaṃ. ^b^Ettha^eb^ catutthasutte tatiyasuttato ^b^viseso^eb^.
[06]Lokasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^45^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aññamaññaṃ ^a^M2.0088^ea^ dvinnaṃ ñātīnaṃ gāmo ñātikoti vuttoti āha ^b^‘‘dvinnaṃ ñātakānaṃ gāme’’^eb^ti. Giñjakā vuccanti iṭṭhakā, giñjakāhi eva kato āvasatho ^b^giñjakāvasatho^eb^. So kira āvāso yathā sudhāparikammena payojanaṃ natthi, evaṃ iṭṭhakāhi eva cinitvā chādetvā kato. Tādisañhi chadanaṃ sandhāya bhagavatā iṭṭhakāchadanaṃ anuññātaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘iṭṭhakāhi kate mahāpāsāde’’^eb^ti. Tattha dvārabandhakavāṭaphalakādīni pana dārumayāniyeva. Pariyāyati attano phalaṃ pariggahetvā vattatīti pariyāyo, kāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘dhammapariyāyanti dhammakāraṇa’’^eb^nti, pariyattidhammabhūtaṃ visesādhigamassa hetunti attho. Upecca suyyati etthāti upassutīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘upassutīti upassutiṭṭhāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Attano kamma^eb^nti yadatthaṃ tattha gato, taṃ pariveṇasamajjanakiriyaṃ. ^b^Pahāyā^eb^ti akatvā. Evaṃ mahatthañhi vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā suṇantassa mahato atthāya saṃvattati. ^b^Ekaṅgaṇaṃ ahosī^eb^ti sabbaṃ vivaṭaṃ ahosi. Tīsu hi bhavesu saṅkhāragataṃ paccayuppannavasena manasikaroto bhagavato kiñci asesetvā sabbampi taṃ ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ upagacchi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yāvabhavaggā ekaṅgaṇaṃ ahosī’’^eb^ti. Tantivasena tamatthaṃ vācāya nicchārento ^b^‘‘vacasā sajjhāyaṃ karonto’’^eb^ti vutto. Paccayapaccayuppannavasena ca atthaṃ āharitvā tesaṃ nirodhena vivaṭṭassa āhatattā ^b^‘‘yathānusandhinā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Addasa^eb^ ñāṇacakkhunā.

[03]Manasā ^a^V2.0076^ea^ sajjhāyaṃ karonto ^b^‘‘tuṇhībhūtova paguṇaṃ karonto’’^eb^ti vutto. ^b^Padānupada^eb^nti padañca anupadañca. Purimañhi padaṃ nāma, tadanantaraṃ anupadaṃ. ^b^Ghaṭetvā^eb^ sambandhaṃ katvā avicchinditvā. ^b^Pariyāpuṇātī^eb^ti ajjhayati. ^b^Ādhārappatta^eb^nti ādhāraṃ cittasantānappattaṃ appamuṭṭhaṃ gatattā ādhārappattaṃ nāma. ^b^Kāraṇanissito^eb^ti lokuttaradhammassa kāraṇasannissito. ^b^Ādibrahmacariyako^eb^ti ādibrahmacariyaṃ, tadeva ^b^ādibrahmacariyakaṃ^eb^. Dhammapariyāyāpekkhāya pulliṅganiddeso. ^b^Tīsupi imesū^eb^ti tatiyacatutthapañcamesu tīsu suttesu.
[06]Ñātikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^46^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nāmavasenā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0089^ea^ gottanāmavasena ca kittivasena ca apākaṭo, tasmā ‘‘jātivasena brāhmaṇo’’ti vuttaṃ.
[06]Aññatarabrāhmaṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^47^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Evaṃladdhanāmo^eb^ti ‘‘jāṇussoṇī’’ti evaṃladdhanāmo rañño santikā adhigatanāmo.
[06]Jāṇussoṇisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^48^eb^^b^.^eb^ Āyatiṃ hitaṃ tena loko na yatati na īhatīti lokāyataṃ. Na hi taṃ laddhiṃ nissāya sattā puññakiriyāya cittampi uppādenti, kuto payogo, taṃ etassa atthi, tattha vā niyuttoti ^b^lokāyatiko^eb^. Paṭhamasaddo ādiatthavācakattā jeṭṭhavevacanoti āha ^b^‘‘paṭhamaṃ lokāyata’’^eb^nti. Sādhāraṇavacanopi lokasaddo visiṭṭhavisayo idhādhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘bālaputhujjanalokassā’’^eb^ti. Ittarabhāvena lakuṇḍakabhāvena tassa vipulādibhāvena bālānaṃ upaṭṭhānamattanti dassento ^b^‘‘āyataṃ mahanta’’^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^Paritta^eb^nti khuddakaṃ. ^b^Ekasabhāva^eb^nti ekaṃ sabhāvaṃ. Avipariṇāmadhammatāyāti āha ^b^‘‘niccasabhāvamevāti pucchatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Purimasabhāvena nānāsabhāva^eb^nti purimasabhāvato bhinnasabhāvaṃ. ^b^Pacchā na hotī^eb^ti pacchā kiñci na hoti sabbaso ^a^V2.0077^ea^ samucchijjanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ucchedaṃ sandhāya pucchatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ekatta^eb^nti sabbakālaṃ attasambhavaṃ. Tathā ceva gahaṇena ^b^dvepi^eb^ vādā ^b^sassatadiṭṭhiyo^eb^ honti. ^b^Natthi^eb^ na hoti. ^b^Puthuttaṃ^eb^ nānāsabhāvaṃ, ekarūpaṃ na hotīti vā gahaṇena ^b^dvepi^eb^ vādā ^b^ucchedadiṭṭhiyo^eb^ti.
[06]Lokāyatikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^49^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Saṃsayuppatti^eb^^a^M2.0090^ea^^b^ākāradassana^eb^nti ‘‘kasmiṃ sati kiṃ hotī’’ti kāraṇassa phalassa ca paccāmasanena vinā kevalaṃ idappaccayatāya saṃsayassa uppajjanākāradassanaṃ. ^b^Samudaya^eb^ti samudetīti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘uppajjatī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Ariyasāvakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^50^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dvepi nayā ekato vuttā^eb^ti idaṃ ‘‘viññāṇe sati nāmarūpaṃ hotī’’tiādinā navame vuttassa nayassa ‘‘avijjāya sati saṅkhārā hontī’’tiādinā dasame vuttanaye antogadhattā. ^b^Nānatta^eb^nti purimato navamato dasamassa nānattaṃ.
[06]Dutiyāriyasāvakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Gahapativaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^51^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Upaparikkhamāno^eb^ti pavattipavattihetuṃ, nivattinivattihetuñca paritulento. Kuto panetanti? ‘‘Sammā dukkhakkhayā’’ti vacanato. Na hi sabbadukkhaparivīmaṃsaṃ vinā sammā dukkhakkhayo sambhavati. ^b^Kasmā^eb^tiādinā jarāmaraṇasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ pucchati. Jātiādīnampi ^a^V2.0078^ea^ pavatti dukkhabhāvinīti adhippāyo. Yasmā jarāmaraṇe gahite sati jātipi gahitā hoti, tassā abhāve jarāmaraṇasseva abhāvato. Esa nayo bhavādīsupi. Evaṃ yāva jātidhammo jarāmaraṇe gahite gahitova hoti, jarāmaraṇapadesena tabbikāravanto sabbe tebhūmakā saṅkhārā gahitāti evampi jarāmaraṇaggahaṇena sabbampi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ gahitameva hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tasmiṃ gahite sabbadukkhassa gahitattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anekavidha^eb^nti bahuvidhaṃ bahukoṭṭhāsaṃ. ‘‘Aneka’’nti vā pāṭho ^a^M2.0091^ea^. ^b^Aneka^eb^nti bahulavacanaṃ. ^b^Vidha^eb^nti khaṇḍiccapāliccādivasena viparītakoṭṭhāsaṃ. ^b^Nānappakāraka^eb^nti tato eva nānappakāraṃ. ^b^Nhatvā ṭhitaṃ purisaṃ viyā^eb^ti bālānaṃ attabhāvassa subhākārena upaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāyāha.

[03]^b^‘‘Sāruppabhāvenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, kiṃ sabbathā sāruppabhāvenāti āha ^b^‘‘nikkilesatāya parisuddhatāyā’’^eb^ti. Na hi tassesā asaṅkhatatādibhāvena sadisā. ^b^Paṭipanno^eb^ti paṭimukho abhisaṅkhāramukho hutvā panno adhigato. ^b^Anugata^eb^nti anucchavikabhāvena gataṃ, yathā ca nibbānassa adhigamo hoti, evaṃ tadanurūpabhāvena gataṃ. Ettha ca pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘pajānātī’’ti pubbabhāgavasena pajānanā vuttā, ‘‘tathā paṭipanno ca hotī’’ti niyatavasena. ‘‘Aparabhāgavasenā’’ti apare. Keci pana ‘‘yathā paṭipannassa jarāmaraṇaṃ nirujjhati, tathā paṭipanno’’ti vadanti. Padavīmaṃsanā pubbabhāgavasena veditabbā, na maggakkhaṇavasena. ^b^Saṅkhāranirodhāyā^eb^ti ettha nayidaṃ avijjāpaccayasaṅkhāraggahaṇaṃ, atha kho saṅkhatasaṅkhāraggahaṇanti āha ^b^‘‘saṅkhāradukkhassa nirodhatthāyā’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ettāvatā yāva arahattā desanā kathitā’’^eb^ti.

[03]‘‘Paccattaṃyeva parinibbāyatī’’tiādinā ^b^arahattaphalapaccavekkhaṇaṃ,^eb^ ‘‘so sukhañca vedanaṃ vedayatī’’tiādinā ^b^satatavihārañca dassetvā desanā^eb^ sabbathāva vaṭṭadesanāto ^b^nivattetabbā siyā. Avijjāgatoti^eb^ ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho, tena evamādikaṃ idaṃ vaṭṭavivaṭṭakathanaṃ puna gaṇhāti. Puggalasaddo itarāsaṃ dvinnaṃ pakatīnaṃ vācakoti tato visesetvā gahaṇe paṭhamapakatimeva dassento ‘‘purisapuggalo’’ti avocāti āha ^b^‘‘purisoyeva puggalo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ubhayenā^eb^ti purisapuggalaggahaṇena. Sammutiyā avijjamānāya kathā desanā ^b^sammutikathā^eb^. Paramatthassa kathā desanā ^b^paramatthakathā. Tatthā^eb^ti sammutiparamatthakathāsu, na sammutiparamatthesu. Tenāha ^b^‘‘evaṃ pavattā sammutikathā nāmā’’^eb^tiādi. Tatridaṃ sammutiparamatthānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ – yasmiṃ bhinne buddhiyā vā avayavavinibbhoge kate na taṃsamaññā, sā ghaṭapaṭādippabhedā sammuti, tabbipariyāyato paramattho. Na hi kakkhaḷaphusanādisabhāve ayaṃ nayo labbhati. Tattha rūpādidhammaṃ ^a^V2.0079^ea^ samūhasantānavasena pavattamānaṃ upādāya ‘‘satto’’tiādi vohāroti āha ^b^‘‘satto naro…pe… sammutikathā nāmā’’^eb^ti ^a^M2.0092^ea^. Yasmā rūpādayo paramatthadhammā ‘‘khandhā dhātuyo’’tiādinā vuccanti, na vohāramattaṃ, tasmā ^b^‘‘khandhā…pe… paramatthakathā nāmā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Nanu khandhakathāpi sammutikathāva, sammuti hi saṅketo khandhaṭṭho rāsaṭṭho vā koṭṭhāsaṭṭho vāti? Saccametaṃ, ayaṃ pana khandhasamaññā phassādīsu tajjāpaññatti viya paramatthasannissayā tassa āsannatarā puggalasamaññādayo viya na dūreti paramatthasaṅgahatā vuttā. Khandhasīsena vā tadupādānā sabhāvadhammā eva gahitā. Nanu ca sabbepi sabhāvadhammā sammutimukheneva desanaṃ ārohanti, na sammukhenāti sabbāpi desanā sammutidesanāva siyāti? Nayidamevaṃ desetabbadhammavibhāgena desanāvibhāgassa adhippetattā, na ca saddo kenaci pavattinimittena vinā atthaṃ pakāsetīti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paramatthaṃ kathentāpi sammutiṃ amuñcitvāva kathentī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Saccameva^eb^ aviparītameva ^b^kathenti^eb^.

[03]^b^Sammutī^eb^ti samaññā. Paramo uttamo atthoti paramattho, dhammānaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvo. Taṃ ^b^paramatthaṃ, sammuti^eb^ pana lokassa saṅketamattasiddhā. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ sammutikathāya saccatāti āha ^b^‘‘lokasammutikāraṇa’’^eb^nti lokasamaññaṃ nissāya pavattanato. Lokasamaññāya hi abhinivesanaṃ vinā paññāpanā ekaccassa sutassa sāvanā viya, na musā anatikkamitabbato tassā. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘janapadaniruttiṃ nābhiniveseyya, samaññaṃ nātidhāveyyā’’ti. ^b^Dhammānaṃ^eb^ sabhāvadhammānaṃ. ^b^Bhūtalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ bhāvassa lakkhaṇaṃ dīpentīti katvā.

[03]^b^Terasacetanābheda^eb^nti aṭṭhakāmāvacarakusalacetanāpañcarūpāvacarakusalacetanābhedaṃ. Attano santānassa punanato pujjabhavaphalassa abhisaṅkharaṇato ^b^puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ. Kammapuññenā^eb^ti kammabhūtena. ^b^Vipākapuññenā^eb^ti vipākasaṅkhātena. Puññaphalampi hi uttarapadalopena ‘‘puñña’’nti vuccati ‘‘evamidaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī’’tiādīsu viya. ‘‘Apuññūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇa’’nti idaṃ ‘‘puññūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇa’’nti ettha vuttanayamevāti na uddhataṃ. Apuññaphalaṃ uttarapadalopena ‘‘apuñña’’nti vuccati. ^b^Saṅkhāra^eb^nti saṅkhārassa gahitattā ‘‘avijjāgatoya’’nti iminā saṅkhārassa paccayo gahito, ‘‘puññūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇa’’ntiādinā paccayuppannaṃ viññāṇaṃ. Tasmiñca ^a^M2.0093^ea^ gahite nāmarūpādi sabbaṃ gahitameva hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dvādasapadiko paccayākāro gahitova hotī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Vijjā^eb^ti arahattamaggañāṇaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddesena. Tassā hi uppādā sabbaso avijjā pahīnā ^a^V2.0080^ea^ hoti. ^b^Paṭhamamevā^eb^ti idaṃ avijjāpahānavijjuppādānaṃ samānakālatādassanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yathā panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Padīpujjalenā^eb^ti padīpujjalanahetunā saheva. ^b^Vijjuppādā^eb^ti vijjuppādahetu, evaṃ satīpi samakālatteti adhippāyo. ^b^Na gaṇhātī^eb^ti ‘‘etaṃ mamā’’tiādinā na gaṇhāti. ^b^Na taṇhāyati na bhāyati^eb^ taṇhāvuttino abhāvā, tato eva bhayavatthuno ca abhāvā.

[03]^b^Gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvā^eb^ti gilitvā viya aññassa avisayaṃ viya karaṇena pariniṭṭhāpetvā. Sāmisasukhassa anekadukkhānubandhabhāvato, sukhābhinandassa dukkhahetubhāvato ca ^b^sukhaṃ abhinandantoyeva dukkhaṃ abhinandati nāma^eb^ aggisantāpasukhaṃ icchanto dhūmadukkhānuññāto viya. ^b^Dukkhaṃ patvā sukhaṃ patthanato^eb^ti ettha dubbalagahaṇikādayo nidassanabhāvena veditabbā. Te hi yāva sāyanhasamayāpi abhutvā sāyamāsādīni karonto jighacchādiṃ uppādetvā bhuñjanādīni karonti. Sukhassa vipariṇāmadukkhato sukhaṃ abhinandanto dukkhaṃ abhinandati nāmāti yojanā. Keci pana dukkhassa abhāvato vipariṇāmasukhato taṃ sukhaṃ abhinandanto dukkhaṃ abhinandatīti vadanti. Taṃ na, na hi tādisaṃ sukhanimittaṃ koci dukkhaṃ abhinandanto diṭṭho, dukkhahetuṃ pana sāmisaṃ sukhaṃ abhinandanto diṭṭho. Dukkhahetuṃ sāmisaṃ sukhaṃ abhinandanto atthato dukkhaṃ abhinandati nāmāti vuttovāyamattho. Kāyoti pañcadvārakāyo, so pariyanto avasānaṃ etassāti ^b^kāyapariyantikaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yāva pañcadvārakāyo pavattati, tāva pavatta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Jīvitapariyantika^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Pacchā uppajjitvā paṭhamaṃ nirujjhatī^eb^ti ekasmiṃ attabhāve manodvārikavedanāto pacchā uppajjitvā tato paṭhamaṃ nirujjhati, tato eva siddhamatthaṃ sarūpeneva dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘manodvārikavedanā paṭhamaṃ uppajjitvā pacchā nirujjhatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Idāni tameva saṅkhepena vuttaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘sā hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Yāva tettiṃsavassāpi ^b^paṭhamavayo. Paṇṇāsavassakāle^eb^ti paṭhamavayato yāva paññāsavassakālā, tāva ^b^ṭhitā hotī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0094^ea^ vuḍḍhihāniyo anupagantvā sarūpeneva ṭhitā hoti. ^b^Mandā^eb^ti mudukā atikhiṇā. ^b^Tadā^eb^ti asītinavutivassakāle. Tathā ciraparivitakkepi. ^b^Bhaggā^eb^ nittejā bhaggavibhaggā dubbalā. ^b^Hadayakoṭiṃyevā^eb^ti cakkhādivatthūsu avattetvā tesaṃ khīṇattā koṭibhūtaṃ hadayavatthuṃyeva. ^b^Yāva esā^eb^ vedanā vattati.
[03]^b^Vāpiyā^eb^ti mahātaḷākena. ^b^Pañcaudakamaggasampanna^eb^nti pañcahi udakassa pavisananikkhamanamaggehi yuttaṃ. ^b^Tato tato vissandamānaṃ^eb^ sabbaso puṇṇattā.
[03]^b^Paṭhamaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0081^ea^^b^deve vassante^eb^tiādi upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. ^b^Imaṃ vedanaṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti imaṃ yathāvuttaṃ pariyosānappattaṃ manodvārikavedanaṃ sandhāya.

[03]^b^Kāyassa bhedā^eb^ti attabhāvassa vināsato. ‘‘Uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā’’ti pāḷi, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana jīvitapariyādānā uddhanti paduddhāro kato. Paralokavasena ^b^agantvā^eb^. Vedanānaṃ sītibhāvo nāma saṅkhāradarathapariḷāhabhāvo, so panāyaṃ appavattivasenāti āha ^b^‘‘pavatti…pe… bhavissantī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dhātusarīrānī^eb^ti aṭṭhikaṅkalasaṅkhātadhātusarīrāni. Sarīrekadese hi sarīrasamaññā.

[03]^b^Kumbhakārapākā^eb^ti kumbhakārapākato. Ettha paccatīti pāko, pacanaṭṭhānaṃ. Tadeva pācanavasena āvasanti etthāti āvāso, tasmā kumbhakārāvāsato. Avigatavūpasamaṃ saṅkharitaṃ kumbhaṃ uddharitvā ṭhapento chārikāya sati pidhānavasena ṭhapeti. Tathā ṭhapanaṃ pana sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paṭisisseyyā’’^eb^ti. Kumbhassa padesabhūtatāya ābaddhā avayavā ^b^‘‘kumbhakapālānī’’^eb^ti adhippetāni, na chinnabhinnāni. Avayavamukhena hi samudāyo vutto. Tattha kapālasamudāyo hi ghaṭo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mukhavaṭṭiyā ekabaddhānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Avasisseyyu^eb^nti vaṇṇavisesauṇhabhāvāpagatā ghaṭakārāneva tiṭṭheyyunti. ^b^Āditta…pe… tayo bhavā daṭṭhabbā^eb^ ekādasahi aggīhi ādittabhāvato. Yathā kumbhakāro kumbhakārāvāsaṃ ādittaṃ paccavekkhati, evaṃ āraddhavipassakopesa bhavattayaṃ rāgādīhi ādittanti āha ^b^‘‘kumbhakāro viya yogāvacaro’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nīharaṇadaṇḍako^eb^^a^M2.0095^ea^^b^viya arahattamaggañāṇaṃ^eb^ bhavattayapākato nīharaṇato. ^b^Samo bhūmibhāgo viya nibbānatalaṃ^eb^ sabbavisamā nivattanato.

[03]‘‘Ādānanikkhepanato, vayovuddhatthaṅgamato, āhāramayato, utumayato, cittasamuṭṭhānato, kammajato, dhammatārūpato’’ti (visuddhi. 2.706) imehi sattahi ākārehi sammasanto ^b^rūpasattakaṃ^eb^ vipassati nāma. ‘‘Kalāpato, yamakato, khaṇikato, paṭipāṭito, diṭṭhiugghāṭanato, mānasamugghāṭato, nikantipariyādānato’’ti (visuddhi. 2.717) imehi sattahi ākārehi sammasanto ^b^arūpasattakaṃ^eb^ vipassati nāma, tasmā yathāvuttaṃ imaṃ ^b^rūpasattakaṃ arūpasattakañca^eb^ nīharitvā ^b^vipassantassa^eb^. Yadipi arahato attabhāvo sabbabhavehipi uddhaṭo, yāva pana anupādisesaparinibbānaṃ na pāpuṇāti, tāva tasmimpi sugatibhave ṭhitoyevāti vattabbataṃ labbhatīti ^b^‘‘catūhi apāyehi attabhāvaṃ uddharitvā’’^eb^icceva vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘khīṇāsavo panā’’^eb^tiādi. Tathā ca vakkhati ‘‘anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutassa vaṭṭavūpasamo ^a^V2.0082^ea^ veditabbo’’ti. ^b^Na parinibbāti^eb^ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyāti adhippāyo, saupādisesāya pana nibbānadhātuyā parinibbānaṃ arahattappattiyeva. Abhisaṅkhārahetuto hettha pariḷāhavūpasamassa upasamabhāvena adhippetattā uṇhakumbhanibbānanidassanampi na virujjhati. ^b^Anupādinnakasarīrānī^eb^ti utusamuṭṭhānikarūpakalāpe vadanti. ^b^Bhikkhaveti^eb^ ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho. ^b^Idaṃ pana^eb^ vacanaṃ. ^b^Anuyogāropanattha^eb^nti kāyapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno khīṇāsavo api nu puññābhisaṅkhārādikammaṃ kareyyāti pañhaṃ kātuṃ. Atha vā ^b^anuyogāropanattha^eb^nti ‘‘api nu kho khīṇāsavo bhikkhu puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ vā abhisaṅkhareyyā’’tiādinā anuyogaṃ āropetuṃ vuttaṃ, na tāva yathāraddhadesanaṃ niṭṭhāpetunti attho.

[03]Paṭisandhiviññāṇe siddhe tasmiṃ bhave uppajjanārahānaṃ viññāṇānaṃ siyā sambhavo, nāsatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘viññāṇaṃ paññāyethāti paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ paññāyethā’’^eb^ti. Sabbaso saṅkhāresu asantesu paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ api nu kho paññāyeyya. Tasmiñhi apaññāyamāne sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ na paññāyeyya. ^b^Therāna^eb^nti ‘‘bhikkhave’’ti ālapitattherānaṃ ^a^M2.0096^ea^. Pañha^b^byākaraṇaṃ sampahaṃsati^eb^ tassa sabbaññutaññāṇena saṃsandanato. ^b^Appaññāṇa^eb^nti appaññāyanaṃ. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena viññāṇe asati nāmarūpassa appaññāṇanti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Sanniṭṭhānasaṅkhāta^eb^nti saddahanākārena pavattasanniṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ. ^b^Adhimokkha^eb^nti nicchayākāravimokkhaṃ saddhāvimokkhañca. Tenāha pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘saddahatha metaṃ, bhikkhave’’ti. Saddhāsahitañhi nicchayākāravimokkhaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘sanniṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ adhimokkha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Anto^eb^ti pariyanto. Parito chijjati etthāti ^b^paricchedo^eb^.
[06]Parivīmaṃsanasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^52^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ārammaṇādibhāvena saṃvattanato upādānānaṃ hitāni upādāniyāni, tesu ^b^upādāniyesu^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘catunnaṃ upādānānaṃ paccayesū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Assādaṃ anupassantassā^eb^ti asādetabbaṃ micchāñāṇena anupassato. ^b^Tadāhāro^eb^ti soḷasa vā vīsaṃ tiṃsaṃ cattālīsaṃ paññāsaṃ vā āhāro paccayo etassāti tadāhāro. ^b^Aggikkhandho viya tayo bhavā^eb^ ekādasahi aggīhi ādittabhāvato etadeva bhavattayaṃ. ^b^Aggi…pe… puthujjano^eb^ aggikkhandhasadisassa bhavattayassa paribandhanato.

[03]^b^Kammaṭṭhānassā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0083^ea^ vipassanākammaṭṭhānassa. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tebhūmakadhammesū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dhammapāsāda^eb^nti lokuttaradhammapāsādaṃ. So hi accuggataṭṭhena ‘‘pāsādo’’ti vuccati. ^b^Satipaṭṭhānamahāvīthiyaṃ^eb^ phalakkhaṇe pavattāyāti.
[06]Upādānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^53-54^eb^^b^.^eb^ Mahantavaṭṭappabandhaopammabhāvena telapadīpassa āhatattā ^b^‘‘mahantañca vaṭṭikapālaṃ gahetvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Purimanayenevā^eb^ti purimasmiṃ upādāniyasutte ^a^M2.0097^ea^ vuttanayeneva. Tathā vinetabbānaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena hi imesaṃ suttānaṃ evaṃ vacanaṃ evaṃ desanā. Esa nayo ito paresupi.
[06]Saṃyojanasuttadvayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^55-56^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ojaṃ abhiharantī^eb^ti rasaharaṇiyo viya purisassa sarīre rukkhamūlāni rukkhassa pathavīāporase upari āropenti. Tesaṃ tathā āropanaṃ ^b^‘‘ojāyā’’^eb^tiādinā vibhāveti. Hatthasatubbedhamassāti ^b^hatthasatubbedho,^eb^ hatthasataṃ ubbiddhassapi. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etissaṃ vaṭṭakathāyaṃ. ^b^Kammārohana^eb^nti kammapaccayo.

[03]Puna ^b^etthā^eb^ti etissaṃ vivaṭṭakathāyaṃ. Vaṭṭadukkhaṃ nāsetukāmassa daḷhaṃ uppannasaṃvegañāṇaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘kuddālo viyā’’^eb^ti āha. Tato nibbattitañāṇaṃ samādhipacchiyā ṭhitaṃ nissāya pavattetabbavipassanārambhañāṇaṃ. ^b^Rukkhacchedanapharasu viyā^eb^ti evaṃbhūtassa vipassanā ekantato vaṭṭacchedāya hotiyevāti āha ^b^‘‘rukkhassa…pe… manasikarontassa paññā’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^kammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ. Taṃ catubbidhavavatthānavasena vīsati pathavīkoṭṭhāsā, dvādasa āpokoṭṭhāsā, cattāro tejokoṭṭhāsā, cha vāyokoṭṭhāsāti ^b^dvecattālīsāya koṭṭhāsesu. Viññāṇassa cā^eb^ti ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho pakārattho ca. Tena bhūtarūpāni viññāṇasampayuttadhamme ca saṅgaṇhāti. Sattasu sappāyesu yassa alabhantassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ vibhūtaṃ hutvā na upaṭṭhāti, taṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘aññataraṃ sappāya’’^eb^nti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Mahārukkhasuttadvayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^57-59^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Palimajjeyyā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0084^ea^^a^M2.0098^ea^ allakaraṇavasena parito pāḷiṃ bandheyya. Tathā karonto yasmā ca tattha tiṇagacchādīnaṃ mūlasantānaggahaṇena taṃ ṭhānaṃ sodheti nāma, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sodheyyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṃsu^eb^nti assa pavaḍḍhakārakaṃ, āgantukaṃ paṃsunti attho. ^b^Dadeyyā^eb^ti pakkhipeyya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘thaddha’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Vuttanayenevā^eb^ti ‘‘rukkhaṃ nāsetukāmo puriso viyā’’tiādinā pañcamasutte vuttanayena. Aṭṭhamanavamāni uttānatthāneva vuttanayattā.
[06]Taruṇarukkhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^60^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bahuvacanavasenā^eb^ti kurū nāma jānapadino rājakumārā, tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīvasena ^b^‘‘kurū’’ti evaṃ bahuvacanavasena^eb^. Yattha bhagavato vasanokāsabhūto koci vihāro na hoti, tattha kevalaṃ gocaragāmakittanaṃ nidānakathāya pakati yathā ‘‘sakkesu viharati devadahaṃ nāma sakyānaṃ nigamo’’ti. ‘‘Āyasmā’’ti vā ‘‘devānaṃ piyo’’ti vā bhavanti vā piyasamudāhāro esoti āha ^b^‘‘āyasmāti piyavacanameta’’^eb^nti. Tayidaṃ piyavacanaṃ gāravavasena vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘garuvacanameta’’^eb^nti. Atidūraṃ accāsannaṃ atisammukhā atipacchato uparivāto unnatappadesoti ime cha ^b^nisajjadosā^eb^. Nīlapītalohitodātamañjiṭṭhapabhassaravasena ^b^chabbaṇṇānaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Kulasaṅgahatthāyā^eb^ti kulānuddayatāvasena kulānuggaṇhanatthāya. ^b^Sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ nikkhipanto viya^eb^ bhikkhāpaṭiggaṇhanena tesaṃ abhivādanādisampaṭicchanena ca puññābhisandassa jananena. ^b^Paṭisammajjitvā^eb^ti antevāsikehi sammaṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ sakkaccakāritāya puna sammajjitvā. ^b^Ubhayantato paṭṭhāya majjha^eb^nti ādito paṭṭhāya vedanaṃ, jarāmaraṇato paṭṭhāya ca vedanaṃ pāpetvā sammasanamāha. ^b^Tikkhattu^eb^nti ‘‘ādito paṭṭhāya anta’’ntiādinā ^a^M2.0099^ea^ vuttacaturākārupasaṃhite tayo vāre. Tena dvādasakkhattuṃ sammasanamāha. Amhākaṃ bhagavatā gambhīrabhāveneva kathitattā sesabuddhehipi evameva kathitoti dhammanvaye ṭhatvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sabbabuddhehi…pe… kathito’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Pamāṇātikkame^eb^ti aparimāṇatthe ‘‘yāvañcidaṃ tena bhagavatā’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 1.3) viya. Atirekabhāvajotano hi yaṃ yāva-saddo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘atigambhīroti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Avabhāsati^eb^^a^V2.0085^ea^ khāyati upaṭṭhāti ñāṇassa. Tathā upaṭṭhānañhi sandhāya ^b^‘‘dissatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Nanu esa paṭiccasamuppādo ekantagambhīrova, atha kasmā gambhīrāvabhāsatā jotitāti? Saccametaṃ, ekantagambhīratādassanatthameva panassa gambhīrāvabhāsaggahaṇaṃ, tasmā aññattha labbhamānaṃ cātukoṭikaṃ byatirekamukhena nidassetvā tamevassa ekantagambhīrataṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘ekaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Etaṃ natthī^eb^ti agambhīro agambhīrāvabhāso cāti etaṃ dvayaṃ natthi. Tena yathādassite cātukoṭike pacchimā ekakoṭi labbhatīti dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ayaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Yehi gambhīrabhāvehi paṭiccasamuppādo ‘‘gambhīro’’ti vuccati, te catūhi upamāhi ulliṅgento ^b^‘‘bhavaggaggahaṇāyā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Yathā bhavaggaggahaṇatthaṃ hatthaṃ pasāretvā gahetuṃ na sakkā dūrabhāvato, evaṃ saṅkhārādīnaṃ avijjādipaccayasambhūtasamudāgatattho pakatiñāṇena gahetuṃ na sakkā. Yathā sineruṃ bhinditvā miñjaṃ pabbatarasaṃ pākatikapurisena nīharituṃ na sakkā, evaṃ paṭiccasamuppādagate dhammatthādike pakatiñāṇena bhinditvā vibhajja paṭivijjhanavasena jānituṃ na sakkā. Yathā mahāsamuddaṃ pakatipurisassa bāhudvayavasena pāraṃ tarituṃ na sakkā. Evaṃ vepullaṭṭhena mahāsamuddasadisaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ pakatiñāṇena desanāvasena pariharituṃ na sakkā. Yathā pathaviṃ parivattetvā pākatikapurisassa pathavojaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkā, evaṃ itthaṃ avijjādayo saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayā hontīti tesaṃ paṭiccasamuppādasabhāvo pākatikañāṇena nīharitvā gahetuṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ catubbidhagambhīratāvasena catasso upamā yojetabbā. Pākatikañāṇavasena cāyamatthayojanā katā diṭṭhasaccānaṃ tattha paṭivedhasabbhāvato, tathāpi yasmā sāvakānaṃ paccekabuddhānañca tattha sappadesameva ^a^M2.0100^ea^ ñāṇaṃ, buddhānaṃyeva nippadesaṃ. Tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘buddhavisayaṃ pañha’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Mā^eb^ti paṭisedhe nipāto. Svāyaṃ ‘‘uttānakuttānako viya khāyatī’’ti vacanaṃ sandhāya vuttoti āha ^b^‘‘mā bhaṇīti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ussādento^eb^ti paññāvasena ukkaṃsantoti attho. ^b^Apasādento^eb^ti nibbhacchanto, niggaṇhantoti attho. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti mahāpaññabhāvena.

[03]^b^Tatthā^eb^ti therassa satipi uttānabhāve paṭiccasamuppādassa aññesaṃ gambhīrabhāve. ^b^Subhojanarasapuṭṭhassā^eb^ti sundarena bhojanarasena positassa. ^b^Katayogassā^eb^ti nibbuddhapayoge kataparicayassa. ^b^Mallapāsāṇa^eb^nti mallehi mahābaleheva khipitabbapāsāṇaṃ. ^b^Kuhiṃ imassa bhāriyaṭṭhāna^eb^nti kasmiṃ passe imassa pāsāṇassa garutarapadesoti tassa sallahukabhāvaṃ dīpento vadati.

[03]^b^Timirapiṅgaleneva^eb^^a^V2.0086^ea^^b^dīpenti^eb^ tassa mahāvipphārabhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tassa kirā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Pakkuthatī^eb^ti pakkuthantaṃ viya parivattati parito vattati. Lakkhaṇavacanañhetaṃ. Piṭṭhiyaṃ sakalikāṭṭhikā piṭṭhipattaṃ. ^b^Kāyūpapannassā^eb^ti mahatā kāyena upetassa, mahākāyassāti attho. ^b^Piñcha vaṭṭī^eb^ti piñcha kalāpo. ^b^Supaṇṇavāta^eb^nti nāgaggahaṇādīsu pakkhapapphoṭanavasena uppajjanakavātaṃ.

[03]‘‘Pubbūpanissayasampattiyā’’tiādinā uddiṭṭhakāraṇāni vitthārato vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘ito kirā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^ito^eb^ti ito bhaddakappato. ^b^Satasahassime^eb^ti satasahassame. ^b^Haṃsavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi^eb^ jātanagaraṃ. ^b^Dhurapattānī^eb^ti bāhirapattāni, yāni dīghatamāni.

[03]^b^Kaniṭṭhabhātā^eb^ti vemātikabhātā kaniṭṭho yathā amhākaṃ bhagavato nandatthero. Buddhānañhi sahodarā bhātaro nāma na honti. Tattha jeṭṭhā tāva nuppajjanti, kaniṭṭhānaṃ pana asambhavo eva. ^b^Bhoga^eb^nti vibhavaṃ. ^b^Upasanto^eb^ti corajanitasaṅkhobhavūpasamena upasanto janapado.
[03]^b^Dve^eb^^a^M2.0101^ea^^b^sāṭake nivāsetvā^eb^ti sāṭakadvayameva attano kāyaparihāriyaṃ katvā, itaraṃ sabbasambhāraṃ attanā mocetvā.

[03]^b^Pattaggahaṇattha^eb^nti antopakkhittauṇhabhojanattā pattassa aparāparaṃ hatthe parivattentassa sukhena pattaggahaṇatthaṃ. ^b^Uttarisāṭaka^eb^nti attano uttariyaṃ sāṭakaṃ. ^b^Etāni pākaṭaṭṭhānānī^eb^ti etāni yathāvuttāni bhagavato desanāya pākaṭāni buddhe buddhasāvake ca uddissa therassa puññakaraṇaṭṭhānāni, paccekabuddhaṃ pana bodhisattañca uddissa therassa puññakaraṇaṭṭhānāni bahūniyeva.
[03]^b^Paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā^eb^ti amhākaṃ bodhisattassa paṭisandhiggahaṇadivaseyeva paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā.

[03]^b^Uggahanaṃ^eb^ pāḷiyā uggaṇhanaṃ, ^b^savanaṃ^eb^ atthasavanaṃ, ^b^paripucchanaṃ^eb^ gaṇṭhiṭṭhānesu atthaparipucchanaṃ, ^b^dhāraṇaṃ^eb^ pāḷiyā pāḷiatthassa ca citte ṭhapanaṃ. Sabbañcetaṃ idha paṭiccasamuppādavasena veditabbaṃ, sabbassapi buddhavacanassa vasenātipi vaṭṭati. ^b^Sotāpannānañca…pe… upaṭṭhāti^eb^ tattha sammohavigamena ‘‘yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma’’nti attapaccakkhavasena upaṭṭhānato ^a^V2.0087^ea^. ^b^Nāmarūpaparicchedo^eb^ti saha paccayena nāmarūpassa paricchijja avabodho. ^b^Catūhī^eb^ti dhammagambhīrādīhi catūhi gambhīratāhi sabbāpi ^b^gambhīratā^eb^.

[03]Sāvakehi desitā desanāpi pana satthu eva desanāti āha ^b^‘‘mayā dinnanaye ṭhatvā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Sekkhena nāma nibbānaṃ sabbākārena paṭividdhaṃ na hotī’’ti na tassa gambhīratāti tassa gambhīrassa upādānassa gambhīratā viya suṭṭhu diṭṭhā nāma hoti. Tasmā āha ^b^‘‘idaṃ nibbānameva gambhīraṃ, paccayākāro pana uttānako jāto’’^eb^ti. Nibbānañhi sabbepi asekkhā sabbaso paṭivijjhanti nippadesattā, paccayākāraṃ pana sammāsambuddhāyeva anavasesato paṭivijjhanti, na itare. Tasmā paccayavasena ‘‘idaṃ aparaddha’’nti vuttaṃ theraṃ apasādentena. Tameva hissa anavasesato paṭivedhābhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘atha kasmā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Asatipi dhammato bhede saṃyojanatthānusayatthavasena pana tesaṃ labbhamānabhedaṃ gahetvā ^b^‘‘ime cattāro kilese’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Añño hi tesaṃ bandhanattho, añño thāmagamanaṭṭhoti. Esa nayo sesesupi. Iti imesaṃ kilesānaṃ appahīnattā tathārūpaṃ upanissayasampadaṃ ^a^M2.0102^ea^ abhāvayatova anuttānameva dhammaṃ uttānanti na vattabbamevāti adhippāyo. ^b^Cattāri aṭṭha soḷasa vā asaṅkhyeyyānī^eb^ti idaṃ mahābodhisattānaṃ santāne bodhiparipācakadhammānaṃ tikkhamajjhimamudubhāvasiddhakālavisesadassanaṃ, tañca kho mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāyāti vadanti. ^b^Etehī^eb^ti yathāvuttabuddhasāvakāggasāvakapaccekabuddhasammāsambuddhānaṃ visesādhigamehi. ^b^Paccanīka^eb^nti paṭikkūlaṃ viruddhaṃ. Sabbathā paccayākārapaṭivedho nāma sammāsambodhiyādhigamo evāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paccayākāraṃ paṭivijjhituṃ vāyamantassevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Navahi ākārehī^eb^ti uppādādīhi navahi paccayākārehi. Vuttañhetaṃ ^b^paṭisambhidāyaṃ^eb^ (paṭi. ma. 1.45) –

[03]‘‘Avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ uppādaṭṭhiti ca pavattaṭṭhiti ca nimittaṭṭhiti ca āyūhanaṭṭhiti ca saṃyogaṭṭhiti ca palibodhaṭṭhiti ca samudayaṭṭhiti ca hetuṭṭhiti ca paccayaṭṭhiti ca, imehi navahākārehi avijjā paccayo, saṅkhārā paccayasamuppannā’’tiādi.

[03]Tattha ^b^navahākārehī^eb^ti navahi paccayabhāvūpagamanehi ākārehi. Uppajjati etasmā phalanti ^b^uppādo,^eb^ phaluppattiyā kāraṇabhāvo. Sati ca avijjāya saṅkhārā uppajjanti, nāsati, tasmā avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ uppādo hoti. Tathā avijjāya sati saṅkhārā pavattanti ca nimiyanti ca. Yathā ca bhavādīsu khipanti, evaṃ tesaṃ avijjā paccayo hoti, tathā āyūhanti phaluppattiyā ghaṭenti saṃyujjanti attano phalena. Yasmiṃ santāne sayaṃ uppannā, taṃ ^a^V2.0088^ea^ palibundhanti paccayantarasamavāye udayanti uppajjanti, hinoti ca saṅkhārānaṃ kāraṇabhāvaṃ upagacchati. Paṭicca avijjaṃ saṅkhārā ayanti pavattantīti evaṃ avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ kāraṇabhāvūpagamanavisesā uppādādayo veditabbāti. ^b^Uppādaṭṭhitī^eb^ti ca tiṭṭhati etenāti ṭhiti, kāraṇaṃ. Uppādo eva ṭhiti uppādaṭhiti. Esa nayo sesesupi. Idañca paccayākāradassanaṃ yathā purimehi mahābodhimūle pavattitaṃ, tathā amhākaṃ bhagavatāpi pavattitanti acchariyavegābhihatā dasasahassilokadhātu saṅkampi sampakampīti dassento ^b^‘‘diṭṭhamatte’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^Etassa dhammassā^eb^ti etassa paṭiccasamuppādasaññitassa dhammassa. So pana yasmā atthato hetuppabhavānaṃ hetu. Tenāha ^b^‘‘etassa paccayadhammassā’’^eb^ti ^a^M2.0103^ea^. Jātiādīnaṃ jarāmaraṇapaccayatāyāti attho. Nāmarūpaparicchedo tassa ca paccayapariggaho na paṭhamābhinivesamattena hoti, atha kho tattha aparāparaṃ ñāṇuppattisaññitena anu anu bujjhanena. Tadubhayabhāvaṃ pana dassento ^b^‘‘ñātapariññāvasena ananubujjhanā’’^eb^ti āha. Niccasaññādīnaṃ pajahanavasena pavattamānā vipassanādhamme paṭivijjhati eva nāma hoti paṭipakkhavikkhambhanena tikkhavisadabhāvāpattito, tadadhiṭṭhānabhūtā ca tīraṇapariññā ariyamaggo ca pariññāpahānābhisamayavasena pavattiyā tīraṇappahānapariññāsaṅgaho cāti tadubhayapaṭivedhābhāvaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘tīraṇappahānapariññāvasena appaṭivijjhanā’’^eb^ti āha. Tantaṃ vuccati paṭavīnanatthaṃ tantavāyeti tantaṃ āvañchitvā pasāritasuttavaṭṭitaṃ nīyatīti katvā, taṃ pana tantākulatāya nidassanabhāvena ākulameva gahitanti āha ^b^‘‘tantaṃ viya ākulajātā’’^eb^ti. Saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassento ^b^‘‘yathā nāmā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Samānetu^eb^nti pubbenāparaṃ samaṃ katvā ānetuṃ, avisamaṃ ujuṃ kātunti attho. Tantameva vā ākulaṃ tantākulaṃ, tantākulaṃ viya jātā bhūtā ^b^tantākulakajātā^eb^. Majjhimaṃ paṭipadaṃ anupagantvā antadvayapakkhandena paccayākāre khalitvā ākulabyākulā honti, teneva antadvayapakkhandena taṃtaṃdiṭṭhiggāhavasena paribbhamantā ujukaṃ dhammaṭṭhititantaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na jānanti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na sakkonti paccayākāraṃ ujuṃ kātu’’^eb^nti. ^b^Dve bodhisatte^eb^ti paccekabodhisattamahābodhisatte. ^b^Attano dhammatāyā^eb^ti attano sabhāvena, paropadesena vināti attho. ^b^Tattha tattha guḷakajāta^eb^nti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne jātaguḷakaṃ piṇḍisuttaṃ. Tato eva ^b^gaṇṭhibaddha^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Paccayesu pakkhalitvā^eb^ti aniccadukkhānattādisabhāvesu paccayadhammesu niccādibhāvavasena pakkhalitvā. ^b^Paccaye ujuṃ kātuṃ asakkonto^eb^ti tasseva niccādigāhassa avissajjanato paccayadhammanimittaṃ attano dassanaṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ asakkonto idaṃsaccābhinivesakāyaganthavasena ^a^V2.0089^ea^ gaṇṭhikajātā hontīti āha ^b^‘‘dvāsaṭṭhi…pe… gaṇṭhibaddhā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Ye hi keci^eb^ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā sassatadiṭṭhiādi ^b^diṭṭhiyo nissitā^eb^ allīnā, vinanato kulāti itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmassa tantavāyassa ^a^M2.0104^ea^ gaṇṭhikaṃ nāma ākulabhāvena aggato vā mūlato vā duviññeyyāvayavaṃ khalitabandhasuttanti āha ^b^‘‘kulāgaṇṭhikaṃ vuccati pesakārakañjiyasutta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sakuṇikā^eb^ti vaṭṭacāṭakasakuṇikā. Sā hi rukkhasākhāsu olambanakulāvakā hoti. Tañhi sā kulāvakaṃ tato tato tiṇahīrādike ānetvā tathā tathā vinandhati, yathā tesaṃ pesakārakañjiyasuttaṃ viya aggena vā aggaṃ, mūlena vā mūlaṃ samānetuṃ vivecetuṃ vā na sakkā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yathā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tadubhayampī^eb^ti kulāgaṇṭhikanti vuttaṃ kañjiyasuttaṃ kulāvakañca. ^b^Purimanayenevā^eb^ti ‘‘evameva sattā’’tiādinā pubbe vuttanayeneva.

[03]Kāmaṃ muñjapabbajatiṇāni yathājātānipi dīghabhāvena patitvā araññaṭṭhāne aññamaññaṃ vinandhitvā ākulāni hutvā tiṭṭhanti, tāni pana tathā dubbiveciyāni yathā rajjubhūtānīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.

[03]^b^Apāyo^eb^ti ayena sukhena, sukhahetunā vā virahito. ^b^Dukkhassa gatibhāvato^eb^ti apāyikassa dukkhassa pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato. ^b^Sukhasamussayato^eb^ti ‘‘abbhudayato vinipatitattā’’ti virūpaṃ nipatitattā yathā tenattabhāvena sukhasamussayo na hoti, evaṃ nipatitattā. ^b^Itaro^eb^ti saṃsāro nanu ‘‘apāya’’ntiādinā vuttopi saṃsāro evāti? Saccametaṃ, nirayādīnaṃ pana adhimattadukkhabhāvadassanatthaṃ apāyādiggahaṇaṃ gobalibaddañāyena ayamattho veditabbo. ^b^Khandhānañca paṭipāṭī^eb^ti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ hetuphalabhāvena aparāparuppatti. ^b^Abbhocchinnaṃ vattamānā^eb^ti avicchedena pavattamānā.

[03]^b^Taṃ sabbampī^eb^ti taṃ ‘‘apāya’’ntiādinā vuttaṃ sabbaṃ apāyadukkhañceva vaṭṭadukkhañca. ^b^Mahāsamudde vātakkhittā nāvā viyā^eb^ti idaṃ paribbhamanaṭṭhānassa mahantabhāvadassanatthañceva paribbhamanassa anavattitadassanatthañca veditabbaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06]Nidānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Dukkhavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^61^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Assutavā’’^eb^ti ^a^V2.0090^ea^^a^M2.0105^ea^ sotadvārānusārena upadhāritaṃ, upadhāraṇaṃ vā sutaṃ assa atthīti sutavā, tappaṭikkhepena na sutavāti assutavā. Vā-saddo cāyaṃ pasaṃsāyaṃ, atisayassa vā bodhanako, tasmā yassa pasaṃsitaṃ, atisayena vā sutaṃ atthi, so ‘‘sutavā’’ti saṃkilesaviddhaṃsanasamattho pariyattidhammaparicayo ‘‘taṃ sutvā tathattāya paṭipatti ca sutavā’’ti iminā padena pakāsito. Atha vā sotabbayuttaṃ sutvā kattabbanipphattiṃ suṇīti sutavā. Tappaṭikkhepena na sutavāti assutavā. Tenāhu porāṇā ‘‘āgamādhigamābhāvā, ñeyyo assutavā itī’’ti. Tathā cāha ‘‘khandhadhātu…pe… vinicchayarahito’’ti. Tattha vācuggatakaraṇaṃ ^b^uggaho,^eb^ tattha paripucchanaṃ ^b^paripucchā,^eb^ kusalehi saha codanāpariharaṇavasena vinicchayassa kāraṇaṃ ^b^vinicchayo. Puthūna^eb^nti bahūnaṃ. ^b^Kilesādīnaṃ^eb^ kilesābhisaṅkhārānaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ paṭisambhidāmagganiddesesu (mahāni. 51, 94) āgatanayena. ^b^Andhaputhujjano gahito^eb^ ‘‘nālaṃ nibbinditu’’ntiādivacanato. Āsannapaccakkhavācī ^b^idaṃ^eb^-saddoti āha ^b^‘‘imasminti paccuppannapaccakkhakāyaṃ dassetī’’^eb^ti. Catūsu mahābhūtesu niyuttoti ^b^cātumahābhūtiko^eb^. Yathā pana mahāmattikāya nibbattaṃ mattikāmayaṃ, evamayaṃ catūhi mahābhūtehi nibbatto ^b^‘‘catumahābhūtamayo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Nibbindeyyā^eb^ti nibbindanampi āpajjeyya. Nibbindanā nāma ukkaṇṭhanā anabhiratibhāvatoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ukkaṇṭheyyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Virajjeyyā^eb^ti vītarāgo bhaveyya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na rajjeyyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vimucceyyā^eb^ti idha pana accantāya vimuccanaṃ adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘muccitukāmo bhaveyyā’’^eb^ti. Catūhi ca rūpajanakapaccayehi āgato cayoti, ^b^ācayo,^eb^ vuddhi. Cayato apakkamoti ^b^apacayo,^eb^ parihāni. ^b^Ādāna^eb^nti gahaṇaṃ, paṭisandhiyā nibbatti. ^b^Bhedoti^eb^ khandhānaṃ bhedo. So hi kaḷevarassa nikkhepoti vuttoti āha ^b^‘‘nikkhepananti bhedo’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Paññāyantī^eb^ti pakārato ñāyanti. ^b^Rūpaṃ pariggahetuṃ^eb^ pariggaṇhanavasenapi rūpaṃ ālambituṃ. ^b^Ayuttarūpaṃ katvā^eb^ taṇhādīhi pariggahetuṃ arūpaṃ pariggaṇhituṃ yuttarūpaṃ ^a^M2.0106^ea^ karoti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sappāyabhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kasmā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Nikkaḍḍhanto^eb^ti tato gāhato nīharanto.

[03]^b^Manāyatanasseva^eb^^a^V2.0091^ea^^b^nāmaṃ,^eb^ na samādhipaññattīnaṃ ‘‘cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ (saṃ. ni. 1.23, 192; peṭako. 22; mi. pa. 1.9.9), citto gahapatī’’tiādīsu (dha. pa. aṭṭha. 74) viya. Cittīkātabbabhūtaṃ vatthu etassāti cittavatthu, tassa bhāvo ^b^cittavatthutā,^eb^ tena kāraṇena cittabhāvamāha. ^b^Cittagocaratāyā^eb^ti cittavicittavisayatāya. ^b^Sampayuttadhammacittatāyā^eb^ti rāgādisaddhādisampayuttadhammavasena cittasabhāvattā. Tena cittatāya cittattamāha. ^b^Vijānanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti bujjhanaṭṭhena. ^b^Ajjhosita^eb^nti ajjhosābhūtāya taṇhāya gahitaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘taṇhāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Parāmasitvā^eb^ti dhammasabhāvaṃ aniccatādiṃ atikkamitvā parato niccādito āmasitvā. ^b^Aṭṭhasata^eb^nti aṭṭhādhikaṃ sataṃ. ^b^Nava mānā^eb^ti seyyassa ‘‘seyyohamasmī’’tiādinā āgatā navavidhamānā. Brahmajāle āgatā sassatavādādayo ^b^dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiyo. Eva^eb^nti vuttākārena. Yasmā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāhavasena puthujjanena daḷhaggāhaṃ gahitaṃ, tasmā so tattha ^b^nibbindituṃ^eb^ nibbidāñāṇaṃ uppādetuṃ ^b^na samattho^eb^.

[03]^b^Bhikkhave^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho, tena ‘‘vara’’nti evamādikaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Idaṃ anusandhivacanaṃ ^b^‘‘kasmā āhā’’^eb^ti kathetukāmatāya kāraṇaṃ pucchati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paṭhamaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi. Assutavatā puthujjanena. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti bhagavatā. ^b^Ayuttarūpaṃ kataṃ^eb^ ‘‘nibbindeyyā’’tiādinā ādīnavassa vibhāvitattā. Arūpe pana tathā ādīnavassa avibhāvitattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘arūpaṃ^eb^ pariggahetuṃ ^b^yuttarūpa’’^eb^nti, yuttarūpaṃ viya katanti adhippāyo. ^b^Gāho^eb^ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāho. ^b^‘‘Nikkhamitvā arūpaṃ gato’’^eb^ti idaṃ bhagavatā ādīnavaṃ dassetvā rūpe gāho paṭikkhitto, na arūpe, tasmā ‘‘kātabbo nu kho so tatthā’’ti micchāgaṇhantānaṃ so tato rūpato nikkhamitvā arūpaṃ gato viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Tiṭṭhamāna^eb^nti tiṭṭhantaṃ. ‘‘Āpajjitvā viya hotī’’ti sabhāvena pavattamānaṃ ^b^‘‘paṭhamavaye’’^eb^tiādinā rūpassa bhedaṃ vayādīhi vibhajitvā dasseti.

[03]^b^Pādassa uddharaṇe^eb^ti yathā ṭhapitassa pādassa ukkhipane. ^b^Atiharaṇa^eb^nti yathāuddhataṃ yathāṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā haraṇaṃ. ^b^Vītiharaṇa^eb^nti uddhato ^a^M2.0107^ea^ pādo yathāṭṭhitaṃ pādaṃ yathā na ghaṭṭeti, evaṃ thokaṃ passato pariṇāmetvā haraṇaṃ. ^b^Vossajjana^eb^nti tathā parapādaṃ vītisāretvā bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipanatthaṃ avossajjanaṃ. ^b^Sannikkhepana^eb^nti vossajjetvā bhūmiyaṃ samaṃ nikkhipanaṃ ṭhapanaṃ. ^b^Sannirujjhana^eb^nti nikkhittassa sabbaso nirujjhanaṃ uppīḷanaṃ. ^b^Tattha tatthevā^eb^ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ paṭhamavayādike eva. Avadhāraṇena tesaṃ koṭṭhāsantarasaṅkamanābhāvamāha. ^b^Odhī^eb^ti bhāvo, ^b^pabba^eb^nti sandhi. Paṭhamavayādayo eva hettha odhi pabbanti ca adhippetā. ^b^Paṭapaṭāyantā^eb^ti ‘‘paṭapaṭā’’iti ^a^V2.0092^ea^ karontā viya, tena nesaṃ pavattikkhaṇassa ittarataṃ dasseti. ^b^Eta^eb^nti etaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ yathāvuttaṃ tattha tattheva bhijjanaṃ evaṃ vuttappakārameva. ^b^Vaṭṭippadesa^eb^nti vaṭṭiyā pulakaṃ barahaṃ. Tañhi vaṭṭiyā pulakaṃ anatikkamitvāva sā dīpajālā bhijjati. ^b^Paveṇisambandhavasenā^eb^ti santativasena.

[03]^b^Ratti^eb^nti rattiyaṃ. Bhummatthe hetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. ^b^Evaṃ pana attho na gahetabbo^eb^ anuppannassa nirodhābhāvato. ^b^Purimapaveṇito^eb^ti rūpe vuttapaveṇito. ^b^Anekāni cittakoṭisatasahassāni uppajjantī^eb^ti vuttamatthaṃ theravādena dīpetuṃ ^b^‘‘vuttampi ceta’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Aḍḍhacūḷa^eb^nti thokena ūnaṃ upaḍḍhaṃ, tassa pana upaḍḍhaṃ adhikārato vāhasatassāti viññāyati. ‘‘Aḍḍhacuddasa’’nti keci, ‘‘aḍḍhacatuttha’’nti apare. ‘‘Sādhikaṃ diyaḍḍhasataṃ vāhā’’ti daḷhaṃ katvā vadantīti vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Catunāḷiko tumbo. Mahāraññatāya pavaddhaṃ vanaṃ ^b^pavana^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘pavaneti mahāvane’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ta^eb^nti paṭhamaṃ gahitasākhaṃ. ^b^Ayamattho^eb^ti ayaṃ bhūmiṃ anotaritvā ṭhitasākhāya eva gahaṇasaṅkhāto attho. Etadatthameva hi bhagavā ‘‘araññe’’ti vatvāpi ‘‘pavane’’ti āha.

[03]^b^Araññamahāvanaṃ viyā^eb^ti araññaṭṭhāne brahāraññe viya. ^b^Ārammaṇolambana^eb^nti ārammaṇassa avalambanaṃ. ^b^Na vattabbaṃ^eb^ ārammaṇapaccayena vinā anuppajjanato. ^b^Ekajātiya^eb^nti rūpādinīlādiekasabhāvaṃ. ‘‘Dissati, bhikkhave, imassa cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa ācayopi apacayopī’’ti vadantena ^b^rūpato nīharitvā arūpe gāho patiṭṭhāpito^eb^ nāma, ‘‘varaṃ, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano’’tiādiṃ vadantena ^b^arūpato nīharitvā rūpe^eb^ gāho patiṭṭhāpito nāma.

[03]^b^Na^eb^nti ^a^M2.0108^ea^ gāhaṃ. ^b^Ubhayato^eb^ti rūpato ca arūpato ca. ^b^Harissāmī^eb^ti nīharissāmi. ^b^Parivattetvā^eb^ti mantaṃ jappitvā. ^b^Kaṇṇe dhumetvā^eb^ti kaṇṇe dhametvā. ^b^Assā^eb^ti visassa. ^b^Nimmathetvā^eb^ti nimmadditvā, nīharitvāti adhippāyo.
[03]^b^Maggo^eb^ti lokuttaramaggo. ‘‘Nibbinda’’nti iminā balavavipassanā kathitā.
[06]Assutavāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^62^eb^^b^.^eb^ Paccayabhāvena ^a^V2.0093^ea^ sukhavedanāya hitanti ^b^sukhavedaniyaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sukhavedanāya paccaya’’^eb^nti. Paccayabhāvo ca upanissayakoṭiyā, na sahajātakoṭiyā. Tenāha ‘‘nanu cā’’tiādi. ^b^Javanavedanāyā^eb^ti javanacittasahagatāya vedanāya. ^b^Taṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti taṃ upanissayapaccayataṃ sandhāya. ^b^Eta^eb^nti etaṃ ‘‘sukhavedanāya paccaya’’nti vacanaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti iminā ‘‘nanu ca sotasamphasso sukhavedanāya paccayo na hotī’’ti evamādiṃ atidisati. So samphasso jāti uppattiṭṭhānaṃ etassāti ^b^tajjātikaṃ,^eb^ vedayitaṃ. Taṃ pana yasmā tassa phassassa anucchavikameva hoti, tasmā ^b^tassāruppaṃ tassa phassassa anurūpanti ca attho^eb^ vutto. ^b^Vuttanayenā^eb^ti ‘‘sukhavedanāya paccayo’’tiādinā vuttavidhianusārena. Adharāraṇiyaṃ uttarāraṇiyā mantanavasena ghaṭṭanaṃ iva saṅghaṭṭanaṃ phassena yugaggāho, tassa pana ghaṭṭanassa nirantarappavattiyā piṇḍitabhāvo idha samodhānaṃ, na kesañci dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā sahāvaṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘saṅghaṭṭanasampiṇḍanenāti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aggicuṇṇo^eb^ti vipphuliṅgaṃ. ^b^Vatthū^eb^ti cakkhādivatthu visayasaṅghaṭṭanato. Labbhamānova dhammo saṅghaṭṭanaṃ viya gayhatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘saṅghaṭṭanaṃ viya phasso’’^eb^ti. ^b^Usmādhātu viya vedanā^eb^ dukkhasabhāvattā.
[06]Dutiyāssutavāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^63^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vuttanayamevā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0109^ea^ heṭṭhā āhāravaggassa paṭhamasutte vuttanayameva. ^b^Lābhasakkārenā^eb^ti lābhasakkārasaṅkhātāya aṭṭhuppattiyāti keci. Lābhasakkāre vā aṭṭhuppattiyāti apare. Yo hi lābhasakkāranimittaṃ paccayesu gedhena bhikkhūnaṃ apaccavekkhitaparibhogo jāto, taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā bhagavā imaṃ desanaṃ nikkhipi. ^b^Yamakamahāmegho^eb^ti heṭṭhā olambanaupariuggamanavasena satapaṭalasahassapaṭalo yugaḷamahāmegho.

[03]^b^Tiṭṭhanti ceva^eb^ bhagavati katthaci nibaddhavāsaṃ vasante, cārikampi gacchante anubandhanti ca. Bhikkhūnampi yebhuyyena kappasatasahassaṃ tato bhiyyopi pūritadānapāramisañcayattā tadā mahālābhasakkāro uppajjatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘evaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassapī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sakkato^eb^ti sakkārappatto. ^b^Garukato^eb^ti garukārappatto. ^b^Mānito^eb^ti bahumato manasā piyāyito ca. ^b^Pūjito^eb^ti mālādipūjāya ceva catupaccayābhipūjāya ca pūjito. ^b^Apacito^eb^ti apacāyanappatto. Yassa hi cattāro ^a^V2.0094^ea^ paccaye sakkatvā suabhisaṅkhate paṇītapaṇīte upanenti, so sakkato. Yasmiṃ garubhāvaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā denti, so garukato. Yaṃ manasā piyāyanti bahumaññanti, so bahumato. Yassa sabbametaṃ pūjāvasena karonti, so pūjito. Yassa abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānañjalikammādivasena paramanipaccakāraṃ karonti, so apacito. Bhagavati bhikkhusaṅghe ca loko evaṃ paṭipanno. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘tena kho pana samayena…pe… parikkhārāna’’nti (udā. 14; saṃ. ni. 2.70). ^b^Lābhaggayasaggappatta^eb^nti lābhassa ca yasassa ca aggaṃ ukkaṃsaṃ pattaṃ.

[03]^b^Assā^eb^ti bhagavato. Dhammasabhāvacintāvasena pavattaṃ sahottappañāṇaṃ ^b^dhammasaṃvego^eb^. Dhuvapaṭisevanaṭṭhānañhetaṃ sattānaṃ, yadidaṃ āhāraparibhogo, tasmā na tattha apaccavekkhaṇamattena pārājikaṃ paññapetuṃ sakkāti adhippāyo. ^b^Āhārā^eb^ti ‘‘paccayā’’tiādinā pubbe āhāresu vuttavidhiṃ sandhāya āha ^b^‘‘āhārā’’^eb^tiādi. Idāni tattha kattabbaṃ atthavaṇṇanaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘heṭṭhā vuttatthamevā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Ādīnava^eb^nti ^a^M2.0110^ea^ dosaṃ. ^b^Jāyā^eb^ti bhariyā. ^b^Patī^eb^ti bhattā. Apekkhāsaddā cete pitāputtasaddā viya, pāḷiyaṃ pana ā-kārassa rassattaṃ sānunāsikañca katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘jāyampatikā’’^eb^ti. Sammā phalaṃ vahatīti sambalaṃ, sukhāvahanti attho. Tathā hi taṃ ‘‘pathe hitanti pātheyya’’nti vuccati. Maggassa kantārapariyāpannattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kantārabhūtaṃ magga’’^eb^nti. Dullabhatāya taṃ udakaṃ tattha tāretīti kantāraṃ, nirudakaṃ mahāvanaṃ. Ruḷhīvasena itarampi mahāvanaṃ tathā vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘corakantāra’’^eb^ntiādi. Pararājūnaṃ veriādīnañca vasena sappaṭibhayampi araññaṃ ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pañcavidha’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Ghanaghanaṭṭhānato^eb^ti maṃsassa bahalabahalaṃ thūlathūlaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṭṭhānato. ‘‘Tādisañhi maṃsaṃ gahetvā sukkhāpitaṃ ^b^vallūraṃ^eb^. Sūle āvunitvā pakkamaṃsaṃ ^b^sūlamaṃsaṃ. Viraḷacchāyāyaṃ nisīdiṃsu^eb^ gantuṃ asamattho hutvā. ^b^Govatakukkuravatadevatāyācanādīhī^eb^ti govatakukkuravatādivatacaraṇehi ceva devatāyācanādīhi paṇidhikammehi ca mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhūtaṃ.

[03]Yasmā pana sāsane sammāpaṭipajjantassa bhikkhuno āhāraparibhogassa opammabhāvena tesaṃ jāyampatikānaṃ puttamaṃsaparibhogo idha bhagavatā ānīto, tasmāssa nānākārehi opammattaṃ ^a^V2.0095^ea^ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘tesaṃ so puttamaṃsāhāro’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ^b^sajātimaṃsatāyā^eb^ti samānajātikamaṃsabhāvena, manussamaṃsabhāvenāti attho. Masussamaṃsañhi kulappasutamanussānaṃ amanuññaṃ hoti aparicitabhāvato gārayhabhāvato ca, tato eva ñātiādimaṃsatāyātiādi vuttaṃ. Taruṇamaṃsatāyātiādi pana sabhāvato anabhisaṅkhārato ca amanuññāti katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Adhūpitatāyā^eb^ti adhūpitabhāvato. ^b^Majjhattabhāveyeva ṭhitā^eb^. Tato eva ^b^nicchandarāgaparibhoge ṭhitā^eb^ti vuttaṃ kantārato nittharaṇajjhāsayatāya. Idāni ye ca te anapanītāhāro, na yāvadatthaparibhogo vigatamaccheramalatā sammohābhāvo āyatiṃ tattha patthanābhāvo sannidhikārābhāvo apariccajanamadatthābhāvo ahīḷanā avivādaparibhogo cāti upamāyaṃ labbhamānā pakāravisesā, te tathā nīharitvā upameyye yojetvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘na^eb^^a^M2.0111^ea^^b^aṭṭhinhārucammanissitaṭṭhānānī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Taṃ kāraṇa^eb^nti taṃ tesaṃ jāyampatīnaṃ yāvadeva kantāranittharaṇatthāya puttamaṃsaparibhogasaṅkhātaṃ kāraṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Nissandapāṭikulyataṃ paccavekkhantopi^eb^ kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ parivīmaṃsati. ^b^Yathā te jāyampatikā^eb^tiādipi opammasaṃsandanaṃ. ‘‘Paribhuñjitabbo āhāro’’ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Esa nayo ito paresupi. ^b^Apaṭikkhipitvā^eb^ti anapanetvā. ^b^Vaṭṭakena viya kukkuṭena viya cā^eb^ti visadisūdāharaṇaṃ. ^b^Odhiṃ adassetvā^eb^ti mahantaggahaṇavasena odhiṃ akatvā. ^b^Sīhena viyā^eb^ti sadisūdāharaṇaṃ. So kira sapadānameva khādati.

[03]Agadhitāmucchitādibhāvena paribhuñjitabbato ^b^‘‘amaccharāyitvā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Abbhantare attā nāma atthīti diṭṭhi ^b^attūpaladdhi,^eb^ taṃsahagatena sammohena attā āhāraṃ paribhuñjatīti. ^b^Satisampajaññavasenapī^eb^ti ‘‘asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī hotī’’ti ettha vuttasatisampajaññavasenapi.
[03]‘‘Aho vata mayaṃ…pe… labheyya’’nti patthanaṃ vā, ‘‘hiyyo viya…pe… na laddha’’nti anusocanaṃ vā akatvāti yojanā.
[03]‘‘Sannidhiṃ na akaṃsu, bhūmiyaṃ vā nikhaṇiṃsu, agginā vā jhāpayiṃsū’’ti na-kāraṃ ānetvā yojanā. Evaṃ sabbattha.

[03]Piṇḍapātaṃ vā ahīḷentena dāyakaṃ vā ahīḷentena paribhuñjitabboti yojanā. ^b^Sa pattapāṇī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0096^ea^ so pattahattho. ^b^Nāvajāniyā^eb^ti na avajāniyā. ^b^Atimaññatī^eb^ti atikkamitvā maññati, avajānātīti attho.

[03]‘‘Tīhi pariññāhi pariññāte’’ti vatvā tāhi kabaḷīkārāhārassa parijānanavidhiṃ dassento ^b^‘‘katha’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Tattha ^b^savatthukavasenā^eb^ti sasambhāravasena, sabhāvato pana rūpāharaṇaṃ ojamattaṃ hoti. Idañhi kabaḷīkārāhārassa lakkhaṇaṃ. Kāmaṃ rasārammaṇaṃ jivhāpasāde paṭihaññati, tena pana avinābhāvato sampattavisayagāhitāya ca jivhāpasādassa ^b^‘‘ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ kattha paṭihaññatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti jivhāpasādassa ^a^M2.0112^ea^. ^b^Ime dhammā^eb^ti ime yathāvuttabhūtupādāyadhammā. ^b^Ta^eb^nti rūpakhandhaṃ. ^b^Pariggaṇhato^eb^ti pariggaṇhantassa. ^b^Uppannā phassapañcamakā dhammā^eb^ti sabbepi ye yathāniddhāritā, tehi sahappavattāva sabbepi ime. ^b^Sarasalakkhaṇato^eb^ti attano kiccato lakkhaṇato ca. ^b^Tesaṃ^eb^ nāmarūpabhāvena vavatthapitānaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ paccayo viññāṇaṃ. ‘‘Tassa saṅkhārā tesaṃ avijjā’’ti evaṃ uddhaṃ ārohanavasena ^b^paccayaṃ^eb^. Adhoorohanavasena pana saḷāyatanādike ^b^pariyesanto anulomapaṭilomaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ passati^eb^. Saḷāyatanādayopi hi rūpārūpadhammānaṃ yathārahaṃ paccayabhāvena vavatthapetabbāti. ^b^Yāthāvato diṭṭhattā^eb^ti ‘‘idaṃ rūpaṃ, ettakaṃ rūpaṃ, na ito bhiyyo, idaṃ nāmaṃ, ettakaṃ nāmaṃ, na ito bhiyyo’’ti ca yathābhūtaṃ diṭṭhattā. Aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā, nibbidānupassanā, virāgānupassanā, nirodhānupassanā, paṭinissaggānupassanāti imāsaṃ ^b^sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena. So^eb^ti kabaḷīkārāhāro. ^b^Tilakkhaṇa…pe… saṅkhātāyā^eb^ti aniccatādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ paṭivijjhanavasena lakkhaṇavantasammasanavasena ca pavattañāṇasaṅkhātāya. ^b^Pariññāto hoti^eb^ anavasesato nāmarūpassa ñātattā tappariyāpannattā ca āhārassa. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tasmiṃ yevā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Chandarāgāvakaḍḍhanenā^eb^ti chandarāgassa pajahanena.

[03]Pañca kāmaguṇā kāraṇabhūtā etassa atthīti ^b^pañcakāmaguṇiko^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pañcakāmaguṇasambhavo’’^eb^ti. Ekissā taṇhāya pariññā ^b^ekapariññā^eb^. Sabbassa pañcakāmaguṇikassa rāgassa pariññā, ^b^sabbapariññā^eb^. Tadubhayassapi mūlabhūtassa āhārassa pariññā ^b^mūlapariññā^eb^. Idāni imā tissopi pariññāyo vibhāgena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yo bhikkhū’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^Jivhādvāre ekarasataṇhaṃ parijānātī^eb^ti jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā iti paṭisañcikkhati ‘‘yo yamettha raso, so vatthukāmavasena ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ hoti jivhāyatanaṃ pasādo. So kiṃ nissito? Catumahābhūtanissito. Taṃsahajāto vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā jīvitindriyanti ime dhammā rūpakkhandho nāma. Yo tasmiṃ rase assādo, ayaṃ rasataṇhā. Taṃsahagatā ^a^V2.0097^ea^ phassādayo dhammā cattāro arūpakkhandhā’’tiādivasena. Sabbaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatavasena veditabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tena pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo pariññātova hotī’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^a^M2.0113^ea^^b^tenā^eb^ti yo bhikkhu jivhādvāre rasataṇhaṃ parijānāti, tena. Kathaṃ pana ekasmiṃ dvāre taṇhaṃ parijānato pañcasu dvāresu rāgo pariññāto hotīti āha ^b^‘‘kasmā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tassāyevā^eb^ti taṇhāya eva taṇhāsāmaññato ekattanayavasena vuttaṃ. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti pañcasu dvāresu. ^b^Uppajjanato^eb^ti rūparāgādibhāvena uppajjanato. Lobho eva hi taṇhāyanaṭṭhena ‘‘taṇhā’’tipi, rajjanaṭṭhena ‘‘rāgo’’tipi vuccati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sāyeva hī’’^eb^tiādi. Idāni vuttamevatthaṃ ^b^‘‘yathā’’^eb^tiādinā upamāya sampiṇḍeti. ^b^Pañcamagge hanato^eb^ti pañcasu maggesu sañcarittaṃ karontena maggagāmino hananto ‘‘magge hanato’’ti vutto.

[03]Sabyañjane piṇḍapātasaññite bhattasamūhe manuññe rūpe rūpasaddādayo labbhanti, tattha pañcakāmaguṇarāgassa sambhavaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘katha’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Satisampajaññena pariggahetvā^eb^ti sabbabhāgiyena kammaṭṭhānaparipālakena pariggahetvā. ^b^Nicchandarāgaparibhogenā^eb^ti maggādhigamasiddhena nicchandarāgaparibhogena paribhutte. ^b^So^eb^ti kāmaguṇiko rāgo.

[03]^b^Tasmiṃ satī^eb^ti kabaḷīkārāhāre sati. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassa. ^b^Uppattito^eb^ti uppajjanato. Na hi āhārālābhena jighacchādubbalyaparetassa kāmaparibhogicchā sambhavati. ^b^Upanijjhānacitta^eb^nti rāgavasena aññamaññaṃ olokanacittaṃ.

[03]^b^Natthi taṃ saṃyojana^eb^nti pañcavidhampi uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tena rāgena…pe… natthī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti kāmarāgena. ^b^Ettakenā^eb^ti yathāvuttāya desanāya. ^b^Kathetuṃ vaṭṭatī^eb^ti imaṃ paṭhamāhārakathaṃ kathentena dhammakathikena.
[06]Paṭhamāhāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^Dutiye^eb^ti dutiye āhāre. ^b^Uddālitacammā^eb^ti uppāṭitacammā, sabbaso apanītacammāti attho. ^b^Na sakkoti^eb^ dubbalabhāvato, tathā hi itthī ‘‘abalā’’ti vuccati. ^b^Silākuṭṭādīna^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena iṭṭhakakuṭṭamattikākuṭṭādīnaṃ saṅgaho. ^b^Uṇṇanābhī^eb^ti makkaṭakaṃ. ^b^Sarabū^eb^ti gharagoḷikā ^a^V2.0098^ea^^a^M2.0114^ea^. ^b^Uccāliṅgapāṇakā^eb^ nāma lomasā pāṇakā. ^b^Ākāsanissitā^eb^ti ākāsacārino. ^b^Luñcitvā^eb^ti uppāṭetvā.

[03]^b^Tisso pariññā^eb^ti heṭṭhā vuttā ñātapariññādayo tisso pariññā. ^b^Tammūlakattā^eb^ti phassamūlakattā. ^b^Desanā yāva arahattā kathitā^eb^ sabbaso vedanāsu pariññātāsu kilesānaṃ lesassapi abhāvato.
[06]Dutiyāhāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^Aṅgārakāsu^eb^nti aṅgārarāsiṃ. ^b^Phuṇantī^eb^ti attano upari sayameva ākirantīti attho. Tenāha ‘‘narā rudantā paridaḍḍhagattā’’ti. ^b^Narā^eb^ti purisāti attho, na manussā. ^b^Bhayañhi maṃ vindatī^eb^ti bhayassa vasena karonto bhayaṃ labhati nāma. ^b^Santaramānovā^eb^ti suṭṭhu taramāno eva hutvā. Porisaṃ vuccati purisappamāṇaṃ, tasmā ^b^atirekaporisā^eb^ purisappamāṇato adhikā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pañcaratanappamāṇā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Assā^eb^ti kāsuyā. ^b^Tadabhāve^eb^ti tesaṃ jālādhūmānaṃ abhāve. ^b^Ārakāvassā^eb^ti ārakā eva assa.

[03]^b^Aṅgārakāsu viya^eb^ tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ ekādasannaṃ aggīnaṃ vasena mahāpariḷāhato. ^b^Jivi…pe… puthujjano^eb^ tehi aggīhi dahitabbato. ^b^Dve bala…pe… kammaṃ^eb^ anicchantasseva tassa vaṭṭadukkhe pātanato. Āyūhanūpakaḍḍhanānaṃ kālabhedo na cintetabbo ekantabhāvino phalassa nipphāditattāti āha ^b^‘‘kammaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Phasse vuttanayenevā^eb^ti tattha ‘‘phasso saṅkhārakkhandho’’ti vuttaṃ, idha ‘‘manosañcetanā saṅkhārakkhandho’’ti vattabbaṃ. Sesaṃ ^b^vuttanayamevā^eb^ti. ‘‘Taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ, upādānapaccayā bhavo’’ti vacanato manosañcetanāya taṇhā mūlakāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘taṇhāmūlakattā manosañcetanāyā’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na hī’’^eb^tiādi. Keci pana yasmā manosañcetanāya phalabhūtaṃ vedanaṃ paṭicca taṇhā uppajjati, tasmā evaṃ vuttanti vadanti.
[06]Tatiyāhāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]Aniṭṭhapāpanavasena ^a^V2.0099^ea^^a^M2.0115^ea^ taṃsamaṅgīpuggalaṃ āgacchatīti āgu, pāpaṃ, taṃ carati sīlenāti ^b^āgucārī^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pāpacāri’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Rājā viya kammaṃ^eb^ paramissarabhāvato. ^b^Āgucārī puriso viya…pe… puthujjano^eb^ dukkhavatthubhāvato. Ādinnappahāravaṇāni ^b^tīṇi sattisatāni viya^eb^ puthujjanassa āturamānamahādukkhapatiṭṭhaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ. Tenāha ^b^satti…pe… dukkha^eb^nti.
[03]^b^Tammūlakattā^eb^ti paṭisandhiviññāṇamūlakattā ito paraṃ pavattanāmarūpassa.
[06]Catutthāhāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Puttamaṃsūpamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^64^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ^b^so^eb^ti lobho. ^b^Rañjanavasenā^eb^ti raṅgajātaṃ viya tassa cittassa anurañjanavasena. ^b^Nandanavasenā^eb^ti sappītikatāya ārammaṇassa abhinandanavasena. ^b^Taṇhāyanavasenā^eb^ti visayakattukāmatāya vasena. Eko eva hi lobho pavattiākāravasena tathā vutto. ^b^Patiṭṭhita^eb^nti laddhasabhāvaṃ. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti vaṭṭe. Āhāreti keci. ^b^Viññāṇa^eb^nti abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ. ^b^Viruḷha^eb^nti phalanibbattiyā viruḷhippattaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kammaṃ javāpetvā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^javāpetvā^eb^ti phalaṃ gāhāpetvā. Abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇañhi attanā sahajātānaṃ sahajātādipaccayehi ceva āhārapaccayena ca paccayo hutvā tassa attano phaluppādane sāmatthiyattā viruḷhippattaṃ. Tenāha ‘‘kammaṃ santāne laddhabhāvaṃ viruḷhippattañcassa hotī’’ti. Vaṭṭakathā esāti katvā ^b^‘‘yatthāti tebhūmakavaṭṭe bhumma’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbesu. ^b^Purimapade etaṃ bhumma^eb^nti ‘‘yattha tatthā’’ti āgataṃ etaṃ bhummavacanaṃ purimasmiṃ purimasmiṃ pade visayabhūte. Tañhi ārabbha etaṃ ‘‘yattha tatthā’’ti bhummavacanaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Imasmiṃ vipākavaṭṭe^eb^ti paccuppanne vipākavaṭṭe. Āyatiṃ vaṭṭahetuke saṅkhāre sandhāya vuttaṃ ‘‘yattha atthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattī’’ti vacanato ^a^M2.0116^ea^. ^b^Punabbhavābhinibbattī^eb^ti ca paṭisandhi adhippetāti vuttaṃ ^a^V2.0100^ea^ ‘‘yattha atthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti, atthi tattha āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇa’’nti. ^b^Jātī^eb^ti cettha mātukucchito nikkhamanaṃ adhippetaṃ. ^b^Yasmiṃ ṭhāne^eb^ti yasmiṃ kāraṇe sati.

[03]Kāraṇañcettha saṅkhārā veditabbā. Te hi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiyā hetū, taṇhāavijjāyo, kālagatiādayo ca kammassa sambhārā. Keci pana kilesavaṭṭakammagatikālā cāti adhippāyena ‘‘kālagatiādayo ca kammassa sambhārā’’ti vadanti. Taṃtaṃbhavapatthanāya tathā tathā gato tividho bhavova ^b^tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ‘‘yatthāti tebhūmakavaṭṭe’’ti. Tathā cāha ^b^‘‘sasambhārakakammaṃ bhavesu rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Rūpa^eb^nti attabhāvaṃ.

[03]^b^Saṅkhipitvā^eb^ti tīsu akatvā viññāṇena ekasaṅkhepaṃ katvāti attho. ^b^Eko sandhī^eb^ti eko hetuphalasandhi. ^b^Vipākavidhi^eb^nti saḷāyatanādikaṃ vedanāvasānaṃ vipākavidhiṃ. ‘‘Nāmarūpena saddhi’’nti padaṃ ānetvā sambandho. ^b^Nāmarūpenā^eb^ti vā sahayoge karaṇavacanaṃ. Idha ^b^eko sandhī^eb^ti eko hetuphalasandhi. ^b^Āyatibhavassā^eb^ti āyatiṃ upapattibhavassa. Tena cettha eko sandhi hetuphalasandhi veditabbo.

[03]^b^Khīṇāsavassa^eb^ aggamaggādhigamanatova pavattakammassa maggena sahāyavekallassa katattā avijjamānaṃ. ^b^Sūriyarasmisama^eb^nti tato eva vuttanayeneva appatiṭṭhitasūriyarasmisamaṃ. ^b^Sā^eb^ti rasmi. ^b^Kāyādayo^eb^ti kāyadvārādayo. ^b^Katakamma^eb^nti paccayehi katabhāvaṃ upādāya vuttaṃ, na kammalakkhaṇapattato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kusalākusalaṃ nāma na hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kiriyamatte^eb^ti avipākadhammattā kāyikādipayogamatte ṭhatvā. ^b^Avipākaṃ hoti^eb^ tesaṃ avipākadhammattā.
[06]Atthirāgasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^65^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcamasutte ‘‘pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhā’’tiādi heṭṭhā saṃvaṇṇitamevāti avuttameva saṃvaṇṇetuṃ ^b^‘‘nāmarūpe kho satī’’^eb^ti āraddho ^a^M2.0117^ea^. Tattha dvādasapadike paṭiccasamuppāde imasmiṃ sutte yāni dve padāni aggahitāni, nesaṃ aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ pucchitvā vissajjetukāmo tesaṃ gahetabbakāraṇaṃ tāva dassento ^b^‘‘etthā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Paccakkhabhūtaṃ paccuppannaṃ bhavaṃ paṭhamaṃ gahetvā tadanantaraṃ anāgatassa ‘‘dutiya’’nti gahaṇe atīto tatiyo hotīti ^a^V2.0101^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘avijjāsaṅkhārā hi tatiyo bhavo’’^eb^ti. Nanu cettha anāgatassa bhavassa gahaṇaṃ na sambhavati paccuppannabhavavasena abhinivesassa jotitattāti? Saccametaṃ, kāraṇe pana gahite phalaṃ gahitameva hotīti tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Apicettha anāgato addhā atthato saṅgahito eva yato ‘‘nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana’’ntiādinā anāgataddhasaṃgāhitā desanā pavattā, catuvokāravasena viññāṇapaccayā nāmanti viseso atthi. Tasmā ^b^‘‘pañcavokāravasenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tehī^eb^ti avijjāsaṅkhārehi ārammaṇabhūtehi. ^b^Ayaṃ vipassanā^eb^ti addhāpaccuppannavasena udayabbayaṃ passantassa pavattavipassanā. ^b^Na ghaṭīyatī^eb^ti na samijjhati. ^b^Mahā…pe… abhiniviṭṭho^eb^ti na ghaṭane kāraṇamāha, heṭṭhā gahitattā pāṭiyekkaṃ sammasanīyaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Adiṭṭhesū^eb^ti anavabuddhesu. Catusaccassa anubodhena na bhavitabbanti āha ^b^‘‘na sakkā buddhena bhavitu’’^eb^nti. ^b^Iminā^eb^ti mahāsattena. ^b^Te^eb^ti avijjāsaṅkhārā. ^b^Bhavaupādānataṇhāvasenā^eb^ti bhavaupādānataṇhādassanavasena. ^b^Diṭṭhāva^eb^ ‘‘taṃsahagatā’’ti samānayogakkhamattā. ^b^Na parabhāgaṃ khaneyya^eb^ attanā icchitassa gahitattā parabhāge aññassa abhāvato ca. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kassaci natthitāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṭinivattesī^eb^ti paṭisaṃhari. Paṭinivattane pana kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tadeta’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Abhinnaṭṭhāna^eb^nti akhaṇitaṭṭhānaṃ.

[03]^b^Paccayato^eb^ti hetuto, saṅkhāratoti attho. ‘‘Kimhi nu kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hotī’’tiādinā hetuparamparavasena phalaparamparāya kittamānāya, kimhi nu kho sati viññāṇaṃ hotīti ca vicāraṇāya saṅkhāre kho sati viññāṇassa visesato kāraṇabhūto saṅkhāro aggahito, tato viññāṇaṃ paṭinivattati nāma, na sabbapaccayato. Tenevāha ‘‘nāmarūpe kho sati viññāṇaṃ hotī’’ti. Kiṃ nāma hettha ^a^M2.0118^ea^ sahajātādivaseneva paccayabhūtaṃ adhippetaṃ, na kammūpanissayavasena paccuppannavasena abhinivesassa jotitattā. ^b^Ārammaṇato^eb^ti avijjāsaṅkhārasaṅkhātāarammaṇato, atītabhavasaṅkhātāarammaṇato. Atītaddhapariyāpannā hi avijjāsaṅkhārā. Tato paṭinivattamānaṃ viññāṇaṃ atītabhavopi paṭinivattati nāma. ^b^Ubhayampī^eb^ti paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ vipassanāviññāṇampi. ^b^Nāmarūpaṃ na atikkamatī^eb^ti paccayabhūtaṃ ārammaṇabhūtañca nāmarūpaṃ na atikkamati tena vinā avattanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nāmarūpato paraṃ na gacchatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Viññāṇe nāmarūpassa paccaye honte^eb^ti paṭisandhiviññāṇe nāmarūpassa paccaye honte. ^b^Nāmarūpe viññāṇassa paccaye honte^eb^ti nāmarūpe paṭisandhiviññāṇassa paccaye honte. Catuvokārapañcavokārabhavavasena yathārahaṃ yojanā veditabbā. ^b^Dvīsupi aññamaññaṃ paccayesu hontesū^eb^ti ^a^V2.0102^ea^ pana pañcavokārabhavavasena. ^b^Ettakenā^eb^ti evaṃ viññāṇanāmarūpānaṃ aññamaññaṃ upatthambhavasena pavattiyā. ^b^Jāyetha vā upapajjetha vā^eb^ti ‘‘satto jāyati upapajjatī’’ti samaññā hoti viññāṇanāmarūpavinimuttassa sattapaññattiyā upādānabhūtassa dhammassa abhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ito hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Etadevā^eb^ti ‘‘viññāṇaṃ nāmarūpa’’nti etaṃ dvayameva.

[03]^b^Aparāparacutipaṭisandhīhī^eb^ti aparāparacutipaṭisandhidīpakehi ‘‘cavati, upapajjatī’’ti dvīhi padehi. ^b^Pañca padānī^eb^ti ‘‘jāyetha vā’’tiādīni pañca padāni. Nanu tattha paṭhamatatiyehi catutthapañcamāni atthato abhinnānīti? Saccaṃ, viññāṇanāmarūpānaṃ aparāparuppattidassanatthaṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aparāparacutipaṭisandhīhī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ettāvatā^eb^ti vuttamevatthanti yo ‘‘ettāvatā’’ti padena pubbe vutto, tameva yathāvuttamatthaṃ ‘‘yadida’’ntiādinā niyyātento puna vatvā. ^b^Anulomapaccayākāravasenā^eb^ti paccayadhammadassanapubbakapaccayuppannadhammadassanavasena. Paccayadhammānañhi attano paccayuppannassa paccayabhāvo idappaccayatā paccayākāro, so ca ‘‘avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā’’tiādinā vutto saṅkhāruppattiyā anulomanato anulomapaccayākāro, tassa vasena.

[03]^b^Āpato^eb^ti ^a^M2.0119^ea^ parikhāgataudakato. Dvārasampattiyā tattha vasantānaṃ pavesananiggamanaphāsutāya upabhogaparibhogavatthusampattiyā sarīracittasukhatāya nagarassa manuññatāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘samantā …pe… ramaṇīya’’^eb^nti. Pubbe suññabhāvena araññasadisaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ janavāsaṃ karonte nagarassa lakkhaṇappattaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘taṃ aparena samayena iddhañceva assa phītañcā’’^eb^ti.

[03]‘‘Pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo ca suparisuddho’’ti vacanato tīhi viratīhi saddhiṃ pubbabhāgamaggopi aṭṭhaṅgikavohāraṃ laddhuṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘aṭṭhaṅgikassa vipassanāmaggassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vipassanāya ciṇṇante^eb^ti vipassanāya sañcaritatāya tattha tattha tāya vipassanāya tīrite pariyesite. ^b^Lokuttaramaggadassana^eb^nti anumānādivasena lokuttaramaggassa dassanaṃ. Tathā hi nibbānanagarassa dassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Diṭṭhakālo^eb^ti adhigamavasena diṭṭhakālo. Maggaphalavasena uppannā ^b^paropaṇṇāsa^eb^ anavajjadhammā, paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ pana tesaṃ vavatthāpakaṃ. Yāpetvāti ^b^carāpetvā^eb^.

[03]^b^Avattamānakaṭṭhenā^eb^ti buddhasuññe loke kassaci santāne appavattanatova uppādādivasena vattamānavasena. Tathā hi bhagavā ‘‘anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā, asañjātassa sañjanetā’’tiādikehi ^a^V2.0103^ea^ thomito. Pubbakehi mahesīhi paṭipanno hi ariyamaggo itarehi antarā kehici avaḷañjitoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘avaḷañjanaṭṭhena purāṇamaggo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Jhānassādenā^eb^ti jhānasukhena jhānapītiyā. ^b^Subhikkhaṃ^eb^ paṇītadhammāmatatāya tittiāvahaṃ. ^b^Pupphitaṃ^eb^ upasobhitaṃ. ^b^Yāva dasasahassacakkavāḷe^eb^ti vuttaṃ ‘‘ekissā lokadhātuyā’’ti paricchinnabuddhakhettattā. Tassa atthitāya hi paricchedo atthi. ^b^Etasmiṃ antare^eb^ti etasmiṃ okāse.
[06]Nagarasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^66^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^b^assā^eb^ti bhagavato. Saṇhasukhumadhammaparidīpanato ^b^sukhumā^eb^. Tīhi lakkhaṇehi aṅkiyattā ^b^tilakkhaṇāhatā,^eb^ aniccādilakkhaṇaparidīpinīti attho. Ariyadhammādhigamassa upanissayabhūtena hetunā ^b^sahetukā^eb^. Tihetukapaṭisandhipaññāya pāṭihāriyapaññāya ca atthitāya ^b^paññavanto^eb^^a^M2.0120^ea^ na kevalaṃ ajjhattikāṅgasampattiyeva, bāhiraṅgasampattipi nesamatthīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘siniddhānī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Abbhantara^eb^nti ajjhattaṃ. ^b^Paccayasammasana^eb^nti paccayuppannānaṃ paccayavīmaṃsaṃ.

[03]Ārambhānurūpā anusandhi ^b^yathānusandhi. Na gatā^eb^ti na sampattā. ^b^Asambhinnapada^eb^nti avomissakapadaṃ, aññattha evaṃ anāgataṃ vākyanti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aññattha hi evaṃ vuttaṃ nāma natthī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Eva^eb^nti ‘‘tenahānandā’’ti ekavacanaṃ, ‘‘suṇātha manasi karothā’’ti bahuvacanaṃ katvā ^b^vuttaṃ nāma natthī^eb^ti attho. Keci pana ‘‘tenahānandā’’ti idhāpi bahuvacanameva katvā paṭhanti ‘‘sādhu anuruddhā’’tiādīsu viya. ^b^Upadhīti adhippetaṃ^eb^ upadhīyati ettha dukkhanti. ^b^Uppajjati^eb^ uppādakkhaṇaṃ udayaṃ paṭilabhati ‘‘pākaṭabhāvo ṭhitiko, attalābho udayo’’ti. ^b^Nivisati^eb^ nivesaṃ okāsaṃ paṭilabhati. Ekavārameva hi uppannamattassa dhammassa dubbalattena okāse viya patiṭṭhahanaṃ natthi, punappunaṃ ārammaṇe pavattamānaṃ niviṭṭhaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ nāma hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nivisatīti punappunaṃ pavattivasena patiṭṭhahatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Piyasabhāva^eb^nti piyāyitabbajātikaṃ. ^b^Madhurasabhāva^eb^nti iṭṭhajātikaṃ. ^b^Abhiniviṭṭhā^eb^ti taṇhābhinivesena otiṇṇā. ^b^Sampattiya^eb^nti bhavasampattiyaṃ. ^b^Nimittaggahaṇānusārenā^eb^ti paṭibimbaggahaṇānusārena. Kaṇṇassa chiddapadesaṃ ^b^rajatanāḷikaṃ viya,^eb^ kaṇṇabaddhaṃ pana pāmaṅgasuttaṃ viya. Tuṅgā uccā dīghā nāsikā ^b^tuṅganāsā^eb^. Evaṃ laddhavohāraṃ attano ^b^ghānaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Laddhavohārā’’ti ^a^V2.0104^ea^ vā pāṭho. Tasmiṃ sati tuṅgā nāsā yesaṃ te tuṅganāsā. Evaṃ laddhavohārā sattā attano ghānanti yojanā vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato ^b^rattakambalapaṭalaṃ viya^eb^. Samphassato ^b^mudusiniddhaṃ^eb^ kiccato ^b^siniddhamadhurarasadaṃ. Sālalaṭṭhi^eb^nti sālakkhandhaṃ.
[03]^b^Addasaṃsū^eb^ti passiṃsu. ^b^Evaṃ vutta^eb^nti ‘‘kaṃse’’ti evaṃ vuttaṃ adhiṭṭhānavohārena.
[03]^b^Sampatti^eb^nti vaṇṇādiguṇaṃ. ^b^Ādīnava^eb^nti maraṇaggatato.
[03]^b^Sattupānīyenā^eb^ti sattuṃ pakkhipitvā ālolitapānīyena. ^b^Cattāri pānāni viya cattāro maggā^eb^ taṇhāpipāsāvūpasamanato.
[06]Sammasasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^67^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ^a^M2.0121^ea^^b^kasmā pucchatī^eb^ti mahākoṭṭhikatthero sayaṃ tattha nikkaṅkho samāno kasmā pucchatīti adhippāyo. ^b^Ajjhāsayajānanattha^eb^nti idampi tassa mahāsāvakassa paracittajānanena appāṭihīraṃ siyā, tena taṃ aparitussanto ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^dve aggasāvakā^eb^ti sīlādiguṇehi uttamasāvakāti attho, na hi mahākoṭṭhikatthero aggasāvakalakkhaṇappatto, atha kho mahāsāvakalakkhaṇappatto. ^b^Idāneva kho maya^eb^ntiādi heṭṭhā paccayuppannaṃ anāloḷentena dassetvā desanā āhaṭā, na aññamaññapaccayatāvasena, idha pana yenādhippāyena taṃ āloḷetvā nivattetvā kathitaṃ mahātherena, tamevassa adhippāyaṃ teneva pakāsetukāmo mahākoṭṭhikatthero āha ‘‘idāneva kho maya’’ntiādi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘idaṃ thero’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Ettake ṭhāne^eb^ti ‘‘kiṃ nu kho āvuso’’tiādinā paṭhamārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva ‘‘nirodho hotī’’ti padaṃ, ettake ṭhāne. Avijjāsaṅkhāre aggahetvā ‘‘nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇa’’nti desanāya pavattattā ^b^‘‘paccayuppannapañcavokārabhavavasena desanā kathitā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Phale gahite kāraṇaṃ gahitamevā’’ti viññāṇe gahite saṅkhārā, tesañca kāraṇabhūtā avijjā gahitā eva hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘heṭṭhā vissajjitesu dvādasasu padesū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ekekasmi^eb^nti ekekasmiṃ pade. ^b^Tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vasenā^eb^ti ‘‘nirodhāya dhammaṃ desesi, nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti, nirodhā anupādāvinimutto hotī’’ti evamāgatānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vārānaṃ vasena. ‘‘Aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhī’’tiādīsu ^a^V2.0105^ea^ (mahāva. 468) viya idha vatthusaddo kāraṇapariyāyoti āha ^b^‘‘chattiṃsāya kāraṇehī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṭhamo^eb^ anumodanāvidhi. ^b^Dhammakathikaguṇo^eb^ti vipassanāvisayo abhedopacārena vutto. Sesadvayesupi eseva nayo. ^b^Dutiyo^eb^ anumodanā, ^b^tatiyaṃ^eb^ anumodananti abhidheyyānurūpaṃ vattabbaṃ. ^b^Desanāsampatti kathitā^eb^ ‘‘nibbidāya…pe… dhammaṃ desetī’’ti vuttattā. ^b^Sekkhabhūmi^eb^ kathitā ‘‘nibbidāya…pe… paṭipanno hotī’’ti vuttattā. ^b^Asekkhabhūmi^eb^ kathitā ‘‘nibbidā …pe… anupādāvimutto hotī’’ti vuttattā.
[06]Naḷakalāpīsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^68^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^a^M2.0122^ea^^b^parassa saddahitvā^eb^ti parassa vacanaṃ saddahitvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yaṃ esa bhaṇati, taṃ bhūtanti gaṇhātī’’^eb^ti. Parapattiyo hi eso paraneyyabuddhiko. ^b^Yaṃ kāraṇa^eb^nti yaṃ attanā cintitavatthu. ^b^Ruccatī^eb^ti ‘‘evametaṃ bhavissati, na aññathā’’ti attano matiyā cintentassa ruccati. ^b^Ruciyā gaṇhātī^eb^ti parapattiyo ahutvā sayameva tathā rocento gaṇhāti. ^b^Anussavo^eb^ti ‘‘anu anu suta’’nti ^b^evaṃ^eb^ cirakālagatāya anussutiyā labbhamānaṃ ‘‘kathamidaṃ siyā, kasmā bhūtameta’’nti anussavena gaṇhāti. ^b^Vitakkayato^eb^ti ‘‘evametaṃ siyā’’ti parikappentassa. ^b^Ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ upaṭṭhātī^eb^ti yathāparikappitavatthu cittassa upaṭṭhāti. ^b^Ākāraparivitakkenā^eb^ti attanā kappitākārenā taṃ ^b^gaṇhāti. Ekā diṭṭhi uppajjatī^eb^ti ‘‘yathāparikappitaṃ kiñci atthaṃ evametaṃ, nāññathā’’ti abhinivisantassa eko abhiniveso uppajjati. ^b^Yāyassā^eb^ti yāya diṭṭhiyā assa puggalassa. ^b^Nijjhāyantassā^eb^ti paccakkhaṃ viya nirūpetvā cintentassa. ^b^Khamatī^eb^ti tathā gahaṇakkhamo hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘so…pe… gaṇhātī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Etānī^eb^ti saddhādīni. Tāni hi saddheyyānaṃ vatthūnaṃ gahaṇahetubhāvato ‘‘kāraṇānī’’ti vuttāni. ^b^Bhavanirodho nibbāna^eb^nti navavidhopi bhavo nirujjhati ettha etasmiṃ adhigateti bhavanirodho, nibbānaṃ. Svāyaṃ bhavo pañcakkhandhasaṅgaho tabbinimutto natthīti āha ^b^‘‘pañcakkhandhanirodho nibbāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Bhavanirodho nibbānaṃ nāmā^eb^ti ‘‘nibbānaṃ nāma bhavanirodho’’ti esa pañho sekkhehipi jānitabbo, na asekkheheva. ^b^Imaṃ ṭhāna^eb^nti imaṃ yāthāvakāraṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Suṭṭhu diṭṭha^eb^nti ‘‘bhavanirodho nibbāna’’nti mayā suṭṭhu yāthāvato diṭṭhaṃ, bhavassa pīḷanasaṅkhatasantāpavipariṇāmaṭṭhānaṃ, bhavanirodhassa ca nissaraṇavivekāsaṅkhatāmataṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya ^a^V2.0106^ea^ diṭṭhattā.
