Anāgāmiphale ṭhito hi anāgāmimagge ṭhito eva nāma uparimaggassa anadhigatattāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘anāgāmimagge ṭhitattā’’^eb^ti. Nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattampi therassetaṃ ñāṇaṃ ‘‘nibbānaṃ paccavekkhatī’’ti vuttañāṇaṃ viya na hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ekūnavīsatiyā…pe… paccavekkhaṇañāṇa’’^eb^nti. Etena etaṃ nibbānapaccavekkhaṇā viya na hoti sappadesabhāvatoti dasseti. Evañca katvā idha udapānanidassanampi samatthitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Paccavekkhaṇañāṇenā^eb^ti avasesakilesānaṃ, nibbānasseva ^a^M2.0123^ea^ vā paccavekkhaṇañāṇena. ^b^Upari arahattaphalasamayo^eb^ti upari sijjhanato arahattapaṭilābho tathā ^b^atthi^eb^. ‘‘Yenāhaṃ taṃ pariyesato nibbānaṃ sacchikarissāmī’’ti ^b^jānāti^eb^.
[06]Kosambisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^69^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^b^udakavaḍḍhanasamaye^eb^ti sabbadivasesu mahāsamuddassa anto mahantacandakantamaṇipabbatānaṃ juṇhasamphassena pahatattā jalābhisandanavasena udakassa vaḍḍhanasamaye. ^b^Upari gacchanto^eb^ti pakatiyā udakassa tiṭṭhaṭṭhānassa tato upari gacchantoti attho. ^b^Upari yāpetī^eb^ti udakaṃ tattha uparūpari vaḍḍheti. Tathābhūto ca taṃ brūhento pūrentoti vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘vaḍḍheti pūretīti attho’’^eb^ti. Yasmā paccayadhammā attano phalasamavāyapaccaye honte tassa upari ṭhito viya hoti tassa attano vase vattāpanato, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘avijjā upari gacchantī’’^eb^ti. Paccayabhāvena hi sā tathā vuccati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo bhavituṃ sakkuṇantī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Apagacchanto^eb^ yāyanto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘osaranto’’^eb^ti, avaḍḍhanto parihīyamānoti attho.
[06]Upayantisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^70^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^b^garukato^eb^ti garubhāvahetūnaṃ uttamaguṇānaṃ matthakappattiyā anaññasādhāraṇena garukārena garukato. ^b^Mānito^eb^ti sammāpaṭipattiyā mānito. Tāya hi viññūnaṃ manāpatāti āha ^b^‘‘manena piyāyito’’^eb^ti. ^b^Catupaccayapūjāya ca pūjito^eb^ti idaṃ atthavacanaṃ. Yadatthaṃ saṃgītikārehi ‘‘tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hotī’’tiādinā imassa suttassa nidānaṃ nikkhittaṃ, tassa atthassa ulliṅgavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Esa nayo sesapadesupi. ^b^Aṃsakūṭato^eb^ti ^a^V2.0107^ea^^a^M2.0124^ea^ uttarāsaṅgena ubho aṃsakūṭe paṭicchādetvā ṭhitā dakkhiṇāṃsakūṭato, ubhayato vā apanenti. Paricitaganthavasena ^b^paṇḍitaparibbājako,^eb^ yato pacchā visesabhāgī jāto. Vicittanayāya dhammakathāya kathanato ^b^‘‘kaviseṭṭho’’^eb^ti āhaṃsu.

[03]^b^Tejussado^eb^ti mahātejo. Purebhattakiccādīnaṃ niyatabhāvena ^b^niyamamanuyutto. Vipassanālakkhaṇamhī^eb^ti ñāṇaṃ tattha kathitaṃ. ^b^Dhamma^eb^nti tassaṃ tassaṃ parisāyaṃ therassa asammukhā desitaṃ dhammaṃ. ^b^Āharitvā katheti^eb^ tathā varassa dinnattā.

[03]Kiñcāpi susimo pūraṇādayo viya satthupaṭiñño na hoti, titthiyehi pana ‘‘ayaṃ brāhmaṇapabbajito paññavā vedaṅgakusalo’’ti gaṇācariyaṭṭhāne ṭhapito, tathā cassa sambhāvito. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ahaṃ satthāti paṭijānanto’’^eb^ti, na sassatadiṭṭhikattā. Tathā hesa bhagavato sammukhā upagantuṃ asakkhi.

[03]^b^Aññāti arahattassa nāmaṃ^eb^ aññindriyassa ciṇṇante pavattattā. ^b^Taṃ pavatti^eb^nti yaṃ aññabyākaraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ sutvā. ^b^Assa^eb^ susimassa, ^b^paramappamāṇa^eb^nti uttamakoṭi. ^b^Ācariyamuṭṭhī^eb^ti ācariyassa muṭṭhikatadhammo.

[03]^b^Aṅgasantatāyā^eb^ti nīvaraṇādīnaṃ paccanīkadhammānaṃ vidūrabhāvena jhānaṅgānaṃ vūpasantatāya. Nibbutasabbadarathapariḷāhatāya hi tesaṃ jhānānaṃ paṇītatarabhāvo. ^b^Ārammaṇasantatāyā^eb^ti rūpapatibhāgavigamena saṇhasukhumādibhāvappattassa ārammaṇassa santabhāvena. Yadaggena hi tesaṃ bhāvanātisayasambhāvitasaṇhasukhumappakārāni ārammaṇāni santāni, tadaggena jhānaṅgānaṃ santatā veditabbā. ^b^Ārammaṇasantatāya^eb^ vā tadārammaṇadhammānaṃ santatā lokuttaradhammārammaṇāhi paccavekkhaṇāhi dīpetabbā. ^b^Āruppavimokkhā^eb^ti arūpajjhānasaññāvimokkhā. ^b^Paññāmatteneva vimuttā,^eb^ na ubhatobhāgavimuttā. Dhammānaṃ ṭhitatā taṃsabhāvatā dhammaṭṭhiti, aniccadukkhānattatā, tattha ñāṇaṃ ^b^dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘vipassanāñāṇa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Evamāhā^eb^ti ‘‘pubbe kho, susima, dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ, pacchā nibbāne ñāṇa’’nti evamādi.

[03]^b^Vināpi^eb^^a^M2.0125^ea^^b^samādhi^eb^nti samathalakkhaṇappattaṃ purimasiddhaṃ vināpi samādhinti vipassanāyānikaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Eva^eb^nti vuttākārena. Na ^b^samādhinissando^eb^ anupubbavihārā viya. ^b^Na samādhiānisaṃso^eb^^a^V2.0108^ea^ lokiyābhiññā viya. ^b^Na samādhissa nipphatti^eb^ sabbabhavaggaṃ viya. Vipassanāya nipphatti maggo vā phalaṃ vāti yojanā.

[03]Rūpādīsu cetesu tiṇṇaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ parivattanavasena desanā ^b^teparivaṭṭadesanā. Anuyogaṃ āropento^eb^ti nanu vuttaṃ, susima, idāni arahattādhigamena sabbaso paccayākāraṃ paṭivijjhitvā tattha vigatasammohoti anuyogaṃ karonto. ^b^Pākaṭakaraṇattha^eb^nti yathā tvaṃ, susima, nijjhānako sukkhavipassako ca hutvā āsavānaṃ khayasammasane suppatiṭṭhito, evametepi bhikkhū, tasmā ‘‘api pana tumhe āyasmanto’’tiādinā na te tayā anuyuñjitabbāti.
[06]Susimasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Mahāvaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^71-72^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekekaṃ^eb^ suttaṃ ^b^katvā ekādasa suttāni vuttāni^eb^ avijjāya vasena desanāya anāgatattā, tathānāgamanañcassā catusaccavasena ekekassa padassa uddhaṭattā. Kāmañca ‘‘āsavasamudayā avijjāsamudayo’’ti attheva aññattha suttapadaṃ, idha pana veneyyajjhāsayavasena tathā na vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[06]Jarāmaraṇasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Samaṇabrāhmaṇavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^73^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ayaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0109^ea^^a^M2.0126^ea^^b^satthā nāmā^eb^ti ayaṃ ariyamaggassa atthāya sāsati vimuttidhammaṃ anusāsatīti satthā nāma. Adhisīlādivasena ^b^tividhāpi sikkhā. Yogo^eb^ti bhāvanānuyogo. ^b^Chando^eb^ti niyyānetā ^b^kattukamyatākusalacchando^eb^. Sabbaṃ bhāvanāya parissayaṃ sahati, sabbaṃ vāssa upakārāvahaṃ sahati vāhetīti ^b^sabbasahaṃ. Appaṭivānī^eb^ti na paṭinivattatīti appaṭivānī. Antarāya sahanaṃ mohanāsanavīriyaṃ ātappati kileseti ^b^ātappaṃ^eb^. Vidhinā īretabbattā pavattetabbattā ^b^vīriyaṃ^eb^. Satataṃ pavattiyamānabhāvanānuyogakammaṃ ^b^sātacca^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘satatakiriya’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tādisamevā^eb^ti yādisī sati vuttā, tādisameva ñāṇaṃ, jarāmaraṇādivasena catusaccapariggāhakaṃ ñāṇanti attho.
[06]Antarapeyyālavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sāratthappakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Nidānasaṃyuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^74^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sukhumā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0110^ea^^a^M2.0127^ea^ taruṇā parittā kesaggamattabhāvato. Yathā kesā dīghaso dvaṅgulamattāya sabbasmiṃ kāle etappamāṇāva, na tacchindanaṃ, evaṃ nakhaggāpi kesaggamattāva, na tesaṃ chindanaṃ avaḍḍhanato. ^b^Parato^eb^ti ‘‘sahassimaṃ satasahassima’’nti vuttaṭṭhāne. ^b^Abhisametvā^eb^ti paṭivijjhitvā, tasmā abhisametāvino paṭividdhasaccassāti attho. Kāmaṃ purimapadaṃ dukkhakkhandhassa atītabhāvaṃ upādāyapi vattuṃ yuttaṃ. Puretaraṃyeva pana vuttabhāvaṃ upādāya vuttanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘purimaṃ dukkhakkhandha’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Purimaṃ^eb^ nāma pacchimaṃ apekkhitvā. Purimapacchimatā hi taṃ taṃ upādāya vuccatīti idhādhippetaṃ purimaṃ nīharitvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘katamaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ‘‘Atītampi parikkhīṇa’’nti idhādhippetaṃ parikkhīṇameva vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘katamaṃ pana parikkhīṇa’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Sotāpannassa dukkhakkhayo idha coditoti taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘paṭhamamaggassa abhāvitattā uppajjeyyā’’^eb^ti vatvā idāni taṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ puna ^b^‘‘katama’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Sattasu attabhāvesu yaṃ apāye uppajjeyya aṭṭhamaṃ paṭisandhiṃ ādiṃ katvā yattha katthaci^eb^ apāyesu cāti yaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjeyya, taṃ sabbaṃ parikkhīṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Assā^eb^ti sotāpannassa, yaṃ parimāṇaṃ, tato uddhañca upapātaṃ atthīti adhippāyo. Mahā attho guṇo mahattho, so etassa atthīti ^b^mahatthiyo^eb^ ka-kārassa ya-kāraṃ katvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mahato atthassa nipphādako’’^eb^ti.
[06]Nakhasikhāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^75^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ubbedhenā^eb^ti avavedhena adhodisatāya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘gambhīratāyā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Pokkharaṇīsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^76-77^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sambhijjaṭṭhāne^eb^ti ^a^V2.0111^ea^^a^M2.0128^ea^ sambhijjasamodhānagataṭṭhāne. ^b^Samenti^eb^ sametā honti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samāgacchantī’’^eb^ti. Pāḷiyaṃ vibhattilopena niddesoti tamatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘tīṇi vā’’^eb^ti āha. Sambhijjati missībhāvaṃ gacchati etthāti sambhejjaṃ, missitaṭṭhānaṃ. Tattha udakaṃ ^b^sambhejjaudakaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sambhinnaṭṭhāne udaka’’^eb^nti.
[06]Saṃbhejjaudakasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^78-84^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cakkavāḷabbhantarāyā^eb^ti cakkavāḷapabbatassa antogadhāya.
[03]^b^Chaṭṭhādīsu vuttanayenevā^eb^ti idha chaṭṭhasuttādīsu paṭhamasuttādīsu vuttanayenevāti attho veditabbo visesābhāvato.

[03]^b^Pariyosāne^eb^ti imassa abhisamayasaṃyuttassa osānaṭṭhāne. ^b^Aññatitthiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇaparibbājakāna^eb^nti aññatitthiyānaṃ. ^b^Guṇādhigamo^eb^ti jhānābhiññāsahito guṇādhigamo. ^b^Satabhāgampi…pe… na upagacchati^eb^ saccapaṭivedhassa mahānubhāvattā. Tenāha bhagavā paccakkhasabbadhammo ‘‘evaṃ mahādhigamo, bhikkhave, diṭṭhisampanno puggalo evaṃ mahābhiñño’’ti.
[06]Pathavīsuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sāratthappakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Abhisamayasaṃyuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^85^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭhama^eb^nti ^a^V2.0112^ea^^a^M2.0129^ea^ imasmiṃ nidānavagge saṃyuttānaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgītattā. ^b^Nissattaṭṭhasuññataṭṭhasaṅkhātenā^eb^ti dhammamattatāya nissattatāsaṅkhātena niccasubhasukhāttasuññatatthasaṅkhātena. ^b^Sabhāvaṭṭhenā^eb^ti yathābhūtasabhāvaṭṭhena. Tato eva sabhāvassa dhāraṇaṭṭhena ^b^dhātūti laddhanāmānaṃ. Nānāsabhāvo^eb^ aññamaññavisadisatā ^b^dhātunānattaṃ^eb^. Cakkhusaṅkhāto pasādo ^b^cakkhupasādo^eb^. So eva cakkhanaṭṭhena cakkhu, nissattasuññataṭṭhena dhātu cāti ^b^cakkhudhātu^eb^. Cakkhupasādavatthuṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā pavattaṃ ^b^cakkhupasādavatthukaṃ^eb^. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Dve sampaṭicchanamanodhātuyo, ekā kiriyā manodhātūti ^b^tisso manodhātuyo manodhātu^eb^ ‘‘mananamattā dhātū’’ti katvā. ^b^Vedanādayo…pe… nibbānañca dhammadhātu^eb^ visesasaññāparihārena sāmaññasaññāya pavattanato. Tathā hete dhammā āyatanadesanāya ‘‘dhammāyatana’’nteva desitā. Na hi nesaṃ rūpāyatanādīnaṃ viya viññāṇehi aññaviññāṇena gahetabbatākāro atthi. ^b^Sabbampī^eb^ti chasattatividhaṃ ^b^manoviññāṇaṃ. Kāmāvacarā^eb^ kāmadhātupariyāpannattā. ^b^Avasāne dve^eb^ti dhammadhātumanoviññāṇadhātuyo. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāsu daṭṭhabbo.
[06]Dhātunānattasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^86^eb^^b^.^eb^ Jātipasutiārammaṇādibhedena nānābhāvo ^b^phasso^eb^. Jātipaccayabhedena hi paccayuppannassa bhedo hotiyeva. Dhammaparicchedavasena dhātudesanāyaṃ tisso mananamattā dhātuyova manodhātuyo. Kiriyāmayassa cittuppattivibhāgena paccayuppannassa vasena dhātudesanāyaṃ ^a^M2.0130^ea^ mananaṭṭhena dhātutāya ^a^V2.0113^ea^ sāmaññato manodvārāvajjanaṃ ‘‘manodhātū’’ti adhippetanti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘manosamphasso manodvāre paṭhamajavanasampayutto’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā kāmaṃ sampaṭicchanamanodhātuanantaraṃ uppajjamāno santīraṇaviññāṇadhātuyā sampayutto phassopi manosamphasso eva nāma, dubbalattā pana so sabbabhavesu asambhavato ca gahito anavasesato gahaṇaṃ na hotīti manodvāre javanasamphasso hoti, tasmā. ^b^Ayamettha attho^eb^ti ayaṃ idha adhippāyānugato attho.
[06]Phassanānattasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^87^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Manosamphassaṃ paṭiccā^eb^ti manodvāre paṭhamajavanasampayutto phasso manosamphasso, taṃ manosamphassaṃ paṭicca. ^b^Manodhātū^eb^ti āvajjanakiriyamanodhātu. Manoviññāṇadhātu manodhātūti veneyyajjhāsayavasena vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘manodvāre…pe… evamattho daṭṭhabbo’’^eb^ti. Tathā hi vakkhati ‘‘sabbāni cetānī’’tiādi.
[06]Nophassanānattasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^88^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sabbāpi tasmiṃ dvāre vedanā vatteyyuṃ^eb^ cakkhusamphassavedanā upanissayapaccayabhāvitā. ^b^Nibbattiphāsukattha^eb^nti nibbattiyā upanissayabhāvena pavattiyā dassanasukhatthaṃ. ^b^Sampaṭicchanavedanameva gahetuṃ vaṭṭati,^eb^ tāya gahitāya itarāsaṃ gahaṇaṃ ñāyāgatamevāti. ^b^Vuttaṃ^eb^ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ. ^b^Āvajjanasamphassa^eb^nti āvajjanamanosamphassaṃ. Anantarūpanissayabhūtaṃ paṭicca paṭhamajavanavasena uppajjatīti yojanā. ^b^Ayamadhippāyo^eb^ upanissayassa adhippetattā.
[06]Vedanānānattasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^89^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tatiyacatutthesu^eb^^a^M2.0131^ea^^b^vuttanayāvā^eb^ti ‘‘no cakkhusamphassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati cakkhudhātū’’ti evaṃ vuttanayo, catutthe ‘‘cakkhudhātuṃ, bhikkhave, paṭicca uppajjati cakkhusamphasso’’tiādinā vuttanayo ca. ^b^Ekato katvā^eb^ti ekajjhaṃ katvā desitā. Kasmā pana tesu suttesu evaṃ desanā pavattāti āha ^b^‘‘sabbāni cetānī’’^eb^tiādi. Paṭisedho pana tesaṃ vedanānānattādīnaṃ ^a^V2.0114^ea^ phassanānattādikassa paccayabhāvato tathāuppattiyā asambhavato. ^b^Ito paresū^eb^ti ‘‘no pariyesanānānattaṃ paṭicca uppajjati pariḷāhanānatta’’ntiādīsu.
[06]Dutiyavedanānānattasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^90^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pañca dhātuyo kāmāvacarā^eb^ rūpasabhāvattā.
[06]Bāhiradhātunānattasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^91^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āpāthe patita^eb^nti cakkhussa āpāthagataṃ sāṭakaveṭhanādisaññitaṃ bhūtasaṅghātaṃ sammā nissitaṃ. Cakkhudvāre sampaṭicchanādisampayuttasaññānaṃ saṅkappagatikattā, cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttasaññāgahaṇeneva vā gahetabbato ^b^‘‘rūpasaññāti cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttā saññā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ tattha saññāya eva labbhanato. Eteneva hi taṃsampayutto saṅkappoti idampi saṃvaṇṇitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘saññāsaṅkappachandā ekajavanavārepi nānājavanavārepi labbhantī’’^eb^ti. Javanasampayuttassa vitakkassa chandagatikattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tīhi cittehi sampayutto saṅkappo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Chandikataṭṭhenā^eb^ti chandakaraṇaṭṭhena, icchitaṭṭhenāti attho. ^b^Anuḍahanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti pariḍahanaṭṭhena. Sannissayaḍāharasā hi rāgaggiādayo ‘‘rūpe’’ti pana tassa ārammaṇadassanametaṃ. ^b^Pariḷāho^eb^ti pariḷāhasīsena apekkhaṃ vadati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pariḷāhe uppanne’’^eb^tiādi. ‘‘Pariḷāho’’ti daḷhajjhosānā ^a^M2.0132^ea^ balavākārappattā vuttāti āha ^b^‘‘pariḷāhapariyesanā pana nānājavanavāreyeva labbhantī’’^eb^ti. Tāsaṃ laddhūpanissayabhāvatoti dasseti. ^b^Iminā nayenā^eb^ti ‘‘uppajjati saññānānatta’’nti ettha vuttanayena attho veditabbo. ‘‘Rūpasaññādinānāsabhāvaṃ saññaṃ paṭicca kāmasaṅkappādinānāsabhāvo saṅkappo uppajjatī’’tiādinā nayena veditabbo.
[06]Saññānānattasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^92^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭisedhamattameva nānaṃ,^eb^ sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayamevāti adhippāyo.
[06]Nopariyesanānānattasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^93^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vuttappakāre^eb^^a^V2.0115^ea^^b^ārammaṇe^eb^ti ‘‘āpāthe patita’’ntiādinā heṭṭhā vuttappakāre rūpārammaṇe. ^b^Saññā^eb^ti rūpasaññāva. Arūpadhammopi samāno yasmiṃ ārammaṇe pavattati, taṃ phusanto viya hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ārammaṇaṃ phusamāno’’^eb^ti. Taṇhāya vatthubhūtaṃyeva rūpārammaṇaṃ labbhatīti katvā ‘‘rūpalābho’’ti adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘saha taṇhāya ārammaṇaṃ rūpalābho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbasaṅgāhikanayo^eb^ti ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe sabbesaṃ saññādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ uppattiyā sabbasaṅgaṇhanavasena dassitanayo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekasmiṃyevā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sabbasaṅgāhikanayo^eb^ti vā dhuvaparibhogavasena nibaddhārammaṇanti vā āgantukārammaṇanti vā vibhāgaṃ akatvā sabbasaṅgāhikanayo. ^b^Aparo^eb^ nayo. ^b^Missako^eb^ti āgantukārammaṇe nibaddhārammaṇe ca visayato nibaddhārammaṇena missako. ^b^Nibaddhārammaṇe^eb^ sattānaṃ kileso mando hoti. Tathā hi saññāsaṅkappaphassavedanāva dassitā. ^b^Yaṃ kiñci viyā^eb^ti yaṃ kiñci aññamaññaṃ viya. ^b^Khobhetvā^eb^ti kutūhaluppādanavasena cittaṃ khobhetvā.
[03]^b^Upāsikā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0133^ea^ tassa amaccaputtassa bhariyaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^Tasmi^eb^nti āgantukārammaṇe. ^b^Lābho^eb^ nāma ‘‘labbhatī’’ti katvā.

[03]^b^Uruvalliyavāsī^eb^ti uruvalliyaleṇavāsī, uruvalliyavihāravāsīti vadanti. ^b^Pāḷiyā^eb^ti ‘‘dhātunānattaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭicca uppajjatī’’tiādinayapavattāya imissā suttapāḷiyā. ^b^Parivaṭṭetvā^eb^ti majjhe gahitaphassavedanāpariyosāne ṭhapanavasena pāḷiṃ parivaṭṭetvā. ^b^Vuttappakāre^eb^tiādi parivattetabbākāradassanaṃ. Tattha ^b^vuttappakāre^eb^ti āpāthagatarūpārammaṇe. ^b^Avibhūtavāra^eb^nti avibhūtārammaṇavāraṃ. Ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^Gaṇhanti^eb^ kathenti. ^b^Ekajavanavārepi labbhanti^eb^ cirataranivesābhāvā. ^b^Nānājavanavāreyeva^eb^ daḷhataranivesatāya.
[03]^b^94^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dasamaṃ uttānameva^eb^ navame vuttanayattā. Paṭisedhamattameva hettha nānattanti.
[06]Bāhiraphassanānattasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Nānattavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^95^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ābhātīti ^a^V2.0116^ea^ ābhā, ālokabhāvena nipphajjati, upaṭṭhātīti vā attho. So eva nijjīvaṭṭhena dhātūti ^b^ābhādhātu. Ālokassā^eb^ti ālokakasiṇassa. Suṭṭhu, sobhanaṃ vā bhātīti ^b^subhaṃ^eb^. Kasiṇasahacaraṇato jhānaṃ ^b^subhaṃ^eb^. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Suparisuddhavaṇṇaṃ ^b^kasiṇaṃ^eb^. Ākāsānañcādayopi subhārammaṇaṃ evāti keci. ^b^Desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesī^eb^ti desanaṃ uddesamatte eva ṭhapesi. Pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘andhakāraṃ paṭicca paññāyatī’’ti etthāpi ārammaṇameva gahitaṃ, tathā ‘‘ayaṃ dhātu asubhaṃ paṭicca paññāyatī’’ti etthāpi. Yathā hi idha suvaṇṇaṃ kasiṇaṃ subhanti adhippetaṃ, evaṃ dubbaṇṇaṃ asubhanti.

[03]^b^Andhakāraṃ paṭiccā^eb^ti andhakāraṃ paṭicchādakapaccayaṃ paṭicca. ^b^Paññāyatī^eb^ti pākaṭo hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘andhakāro hī’’^eb^tiādi. Ālokopi, andhakārena ^a^M2.0134^ea^ paricchinno hotīti yojanā. Andhakāro tāva ālokena paricchinno hotu ‘‘yattha āloko natthi, tattha andhakāro’’ti āloko kathaṃ andhakārena paricchinno hotīti āha ^b^‘‘andhakārena hi so pākaṭo hotī’’^eb^ti. Paricchedalekhāya viya cittarūpaṃ andhakārena hi parito paricchinno hutvā paññāyati, yathā taṃ chāyāya ātapo. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti asubhasubhānaṃ aññamaññaparicchinnataṃ atidisitvā tattha adhippetameva dassento ^b^‘‘asubhe sati subhaṃ paññāyatī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Evamāhā^eb^ti ‘‘asubhaṃ paṭicca subhaṃ paññāyatī’’ti avoca. ‘‘Rūpī rūpāni passatī’’tiādīsu viya uttarapadalopenāyaṃ niddesoti āha ^b^‘‘rūpaṃ paṭiccāti rūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ paṭiccā’’^eb^ti. Tāya hi sati adhigatāya. ^b^Rūpasamatikkamā vā hotī^eb^ti sabhāvārammaṇānaṃ rūpajjhānānaṃ samatikkamā ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpatti nāma hotīti attho. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti iminā ‘‘ākāsānañcāyatanasamatikkamā viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpatti nāma hotī’’tiādinā dvepi pakāre atidisati. ^b^Paṭisaṅkhā^eb^ti paṭisaṅkhāñāṇena. ^b^Appavatti^eb^nti yathāparicchinnakālaṃ appavattanaṃ. Etena khaṇanirodhādiṃ paṭikkhipati.

[03]^b^Kathaṃ samāpatti pattabbā^eb^ti imāsu sattasu dhātūsu kā pakārā saññāsamāpatti nānā hutvā samāpajjitabbā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kīdisā samāpattiyo’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Saññāya atthibhāvenā^eb^ti paṭukiccāya ^a^V2.0117^ea^ saññāya atthibhāvena. ^b^Sukhumasaṅkhārānaṃ^eb^ tattha samāpattiyaṃ avasissatāya. ^b^Nirodhovā^eb^ti saṅkhārānaṃ nirodho eva.
[06]Sattadhātusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^96^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhāvanapuṃsakametaṃ^eb^ ‘‘visamaṃ candimasūriyā parivattantī’’tiādīsu (a. ni. 4.70) viya. ^b^Sanidāna^eb^nti attano phalaṃ nidadātīti nidānaṃ, kāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘sanidāno^eb^^a^M2.0135^ea^^b^sappaccayo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kāmapaṭisaṃyutto^eb^ti kāmarāgasaṅkhātena kāmena paṭisaṃyutto vā kāmapaṭibaddho vā. Takketīti ^b^takko^eb^. Abhūtakāraṃ samāropetvā kappetīti ^b^saṅkappo^eb^. Ārammaṇe cittaṃ appetīti ^b^appanā^eb^. Visesena appetīti ^b^byappanā^eb^. Ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropentaṃ viya pavattatīti ^b^cetaso abhiniropanā^eb^. Micchā viparīto pāpako saṅkappoti ^b^micchāsaṅkappo^eb^. Aññesu ca kāmapaṭisaṃyuttesu vijjamānesu vitakko eva kāmadhātusaddena niruḷho daṭṭhabbo vitakkassa kāmapasaṅgappattisātisayattā. Esa nayo byāpādadhātuādīsupi. ^b^Sabbepi akusalā dhammā kāmadhātu^eb^ hīnajjhāsayehi kāmetabbadhātubhāvato.

[03]Kilesakāmassa ārammaṇabhāvattā sabbākusalasaṃgāhikāya kāmadhātuyā itarā dve saṅgahetvā kathanaṃ ^b^sabbasaṅgāhikā^eb^. Tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato kathā ^b^asambhinnā. Imaṃ^eb^ kāmāvacarasaññitaṃ kāmavitakkasaññitañca ^b^kāmadhātuṃ. Paṭiccā^eb^ti paccayabhūtaṃ labhitvā. ^b^Tīhi kāraṇehī^eb^ti tīhi sārabhūtehi kāraṇehi.

[03]Byāpādavitakko byāpādo uttarapadalopena, so eva nijjīvaṭṭhena sabhāvadhāraṇaṭṭhena dhātūti ^b^byāpādadhātu^eb^. Byāpajjati cittaṃ etenāti ^b^byāpādo,^eb^ doso. Byāpādopi dhātūti yojanā. ^b^Sahajātapaccayādivasenā^eb^ti sahajātāññamaññanissayasampayuttātthiavigatapaccayavasena. Visesena hi parassa attano ca dukkhāpanaṃ vihiṃsā, sā eva dhātu, atthato rosanā parūpaghāto, tathā pavatto vā dosasahagatacittuppādo.

[03]^b^Tiṇagahane araññe^eb^ti tiṇehi gahanabhūte araññe. ^b^Anayabyasana^eb^nti apāyabyasanaṃ, pariharaṇūpāyarahitaṃ vipattinti vā attho. ^b^Avaḍḍhiṃ vināsa^eb^nti avaḍḍhiñceva vināsañcāti vadanti sabbaso vaḍḍhirahitaṃ. ^b^Sukkhatiṇadāyo viya ārammaṇaṃ^eb^ kilesaggisaṃvaddhanaṭṭhena. ^b^Tiṇukkā viya^eb^^a^V2.0118^ea^^b^akusalasaññā^eb^ anudahanaṭṭhena. ^b^Tiṇakaṭṭha…pe… sattā^eb^ anayabyasanāpattito. ‘‘Ime sattā’’ti hi ayoniso paṭipajjamānā adhippetā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yathā sukkhatiṇadāye’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]Samatābhāvato ^a^M2.0136^ea^ samatāvirodhato visamatāhetuto ca visamā rāgādayoti āha ^b^‘‘rāgavisamādīni anugata’’^eb^nti. ^b^Icchitabbā^eb^ avassaṃbhāvinibhāvena.

[03]Saṃkilesato nikkhamanaṭṭhena nekkhammo, so eva nijjīvaṭṭhena dhātūti ^b^nekkhammadhātu^eb^. Svāyaṃ nekkhammasaddo pabbajjādīsu kusalavitakke ca niruḷhoti āha ^b^‘‘nekkhammavitakkopi nekkhammadhātū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Itarāpi dve dhātuyo^eb^ti abyāpādāvihiṃsādhātuyo vadati. ^b^Visuṃ dīpetabbā^eb^ sarūpena āgatattā. ^b^Vitakkādayo^eb^ti nekkhammasaṅkappacchandapariḷāhapariyesanā. ^b^Yathānurūpaṃ^eb^ attano attano paccayānurūpaṃ. Kathaṃ panettha kusaladhammesu pariḷāho vuttoti? Saṅkhārapariḷāhamattaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ, soḷasasu ākāresu dukkhasacce santāpaṭṭho viya vutto, yassa vigamena arahato sītibhāvappatti vuccati.

[03]Sayaṃ na byāpajjati, tena vā taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo na kiñci byāpādetīti ^b^abyāpādo,^eb^ vihiṃsāya vuttavipariyāyehi sā veditabbā. Hitesibhāvena mijjati siniyhatīti ^b^mitto,^eb^ mittassa esāti ^b^metti,^eb^ abyāpādo. ^b^Mettāyanā^eb^ti mettākāraṇaṃ, mettāya vā ayanā pavattanā. ^b^Mettāyitatta^eb^nti mettāyitassa mettāya pavattassa bhāvo. ^b^Mettācetovimuttī^eb^ti mettāyanavasena pavatto cittasamādhi. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
[06]Sanidānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^97^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ito paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti ‘‘dhātuṃ, bhikkhave’’ti imasmā tatiyasuttato paṭṭhāya. Yāva kammavaggo, tāva netvā upagantvā seti etthāti āsayo, hīnādibhāvena adhīno āsayo ajjhāsayo, taṃ ^b^ajjhāsayaṃ,^eb^ adhimuttanti attho. ^b^Saññā uppajjatī^eb^tiādīsu hīnādibhedaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ paṭicca hīnādibhedā saññā, tannissayadiṭṭhivikappanā, vitakko ca uppajjati sahajātakoṭiyā upanissayakoṭiyā ca. ^b^Satthāresū^eb^ti tesaṃ satthupaṭiññatāya vuttaṃ, na satthulakkhaṇasabbhāvato. ^b^Asammāsambuddhesū^eb^ti ādhāre visaye ca bhummaṃ ekato katvā ^a^M2.0137^ea^ vuttanti paṭhamaṃ tāva dassento ‘‘mayaṃ sammāsambuddhā’’tiādiṃ vatvā itaraṃ dassento ‘‘tesu sammāsambuddhā ^a^V2.0119^ea^ ete’’tiādimāha. Tesaṃ ‘‘mayaṃ sammāsambuddhā’’ti uppannadiṭṭhi idha mūlabhāvena pucchitā, itarā anusaṅkitāti ^b^pucchatiyevā^eb^ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati.

[03]^b^‘‘Mahatī’’^eb^ti ettha mahāsaddo ‘‘mahājano’’tiādīsu viya bahuatthavācakoti daṭṭhabbo. Avijjāpi hīnahīnatarahīnatamādibhedena bahupakārā. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti diṭṭhiyā. Kasmā panettha ‘‘yadidaṃ avijjā dhātū’’ti avijjaṃ uddharitvā ‘‘hīnaṃ dhātuṃ paṭiccā’’ti ajjhāsayadhātu niddiṭṭhāti? Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, ‘‘aññaṃ uddharitvā aññaṃ niddiṭṭhā’’ti, yato avijjāsīsena ajjhāsayadhātu eva gahitā. Avijjāgahito hi purisapuggalo diṭṭhajjhāsayo hīnādibhedaṃ avijjādhātuṃ nissāya tato saññādiṭṭhiādike saṅkappeti. ^b^Paṇidhi^eb^ patthanā, sā pana tathā tathā cittassa ṭhapanavasena hotīti āha ^b^‘‘cittaṭṭhapana’’^eb^nti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sā panesā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ete^eb^ti hīnapaccayā saññādiṭṭhivitakkacetanā patthanā paṇidhisaṅkhātā hīnā dhammā. ^b^Hīno^eb^ nāma hīnadhammasamāyogato. ^b^Sabbapadānī^eb^ti ‘‘paññapetī’’tiādīni padāni yojetabbāni hīnasaddena majjhimuttamaṭṭhānantarassa asambhavato. Upapajjanaṃ ‘‘upapattī’’ti āha ^b^‘‘dve upapattiyo paṭilābho ca nibbatti cā’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^hīnakulādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena hīnarūpabhogaparisādīnaṃ saṅgaho. ^b^Hīnattikavasenā^eb^ti hīnattike vuttattikapadavasenāti adhippāyo. ^b^Cittuppādakkhaṇe^eb^ti idaṃ hīnattikapariyāpannānaṃ cittuppādānaṃ vasena tattha tattha laddhattā vuttaṃ. ^b^Pañcasu nīcakulesū^eb^ti caṇḍālavenanesādarathakārapukkusakulesu. Dvādasākusalacittuppādānaṃ pana yo koci paṭilābho hīnoti yojanā. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^Imasmiṃ ṭhāne^eb^ti ‘‘yāyaṃ, bhante, diṭṭhī’’tiādinā āgate imasmiṃ ṭhāne. ‘‘Dhātuṃ, bhikkhave, paṭicca uppajjatī’’tiādinā āgatattā ^b^nibbattiyeva adhippetā,^eb^ na paṭilābho.
[06]Giñjakāvasathasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^98^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekato^eb^^a^M2.0138^ea^^b^hontī^eb^ti samānacchandatāya ajjhāsayato ekato honti. ^b^Nirantarā hontī^eb^ti tāya eva samānacchandatāya cittena nibbisesā honti. Idha adhimutti nāma ajjhāsayadhātūti āha ^b^‘‘hīnādhimuttikāti hīnajjhāsayā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Hīnādhimuttikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^99^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mahāpaññesū^eb^ti ^a^V2.0120^ea^ vipulapaññesu. ^b^Na^eb^nti sāriputtattheraṃ. ^b^Khandhantara^eb^nti khandhavibhāgaṃ, khandhānaṃ vā antaraṃ viseso atthīti ^b^khandhantaro^eb^. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Parikamma^eb^nti iddhividhādhigamassa pubbabhāgaparikammañceva uttaraparikammañca. ^b^Ānisaṃsa^eb^nti iddhānisaṃsañceva ānisaṃsañca. ^b^Adhiṭṭhānaṃ vikubbana^eb^nti adhiṭṭhānavidhānañceva vikubbanavidhānañca. ^b^Vuttanayenevā^eb^ti ‘‘pathaviṃ pattharanto viyā’’tiādinā.

[03]^b^Dhutaṅgaparihāra^eb^nti dhutaṅgānaṃ pariharaṇavidhiṃ. Pariharaṇaggahaṇeneva samādānaṃ siddhaṃ hotīti taṃ na gahitaṃ. ^b^Ānisaṃsa^eb^nti taṃtaṃdhutaṅgapariharaṇe daṭṭhabbaṃ ānisaṃsameva. ^b^Samodhāna^eb^nti ‘‘ettakā piṇḍapātapaṭisaṃyuttā, ettakā senāsanapaṭisaṃyuttā’’ti paccayavasena aññamaññañca antogadhattā. ^b^Adhiṭṭhāna^eb^nti adhiṭṭhānavidhiṃ. ^b^Bheda^eb^nti ukkaṭṭhādibhedañceva bhinnākārañca.

[03]^b^Parikamma^eb^nti ‘‘dibbacakkhu evaṃ uppādetabbaṃ, evaṃ visodhetabba’’ntiādinā parikammavidhānaṃ. ^b^Ānisaṃsa^eb^nti paresaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpāyatanādiānisaṃsapabhedaṃ. ^b^Upakkilesa^eb^nti sādhāraṇaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ duvidhaṃ upakkilesaṃ. Vipassanābhāvanupakkilesā hi dibbacakkhussa upakkilesāti veditabbā.
[03]^b^Saṅkhepavitthāragambhīruttānavicitrakathādīsū^eb^ti saṅkhepo vitthāro gambhīratā uttānatā vicitrabhāvo neyyatthatā nītatthatāti evamādīsu dhammassa kathetabbappakāresu taṃ taṃ kathetabbākāraṃ.
[03]^b^Iti^eb^-saddo ^a^M2.0139^ea^ ādiattho, pakārattho vā. Tena –
[21]‘‘Ādimhi sīlaṃ deseyya, (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.190; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.291)
[27]Majjhe cittaṃ viniddise;
[26]Ante paññā kathetabbā,
[22]Eso dhammakathāvidho’’ti. –
[07]Evaṃ kathetabbākāraṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
[21]‘‘Sithilaṃ ^a^V2.0121^ea^ dhanitañca dīgharassaṃ, garukaṃ lahukañca niggahītaṃ;
[22]Sambandhaṃ vavatthitaṃ vimuttaṃ, dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedo’’ti. (dī. ni. 1.190; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.291; pari. 485) –

[07]Evaṃ vuttaṃ dasavidhaṃ ^b^byañjanabuddhiṃ. Aṭṭhuppatti^eb^nti tassa tassa suttassa jātakassa ca aṭṭhuppattiṃ. ^b^Anusandhi^eb^nti pacchānusandhiādianusandhiṃ. ^b^Pubbāpara^eb^nti sambandhaṃ. ^b^Idaṃ^eb^ padaṃ ^b^evaṃ vattabbaṃ, idaṃ^eb^ pubbāparaṃ ^b^evaṃ gahetabba^eb^nti.
[03]^b^Kulasaṅgaṇhanaparihāra^eb^nti lābhuppādanatthaṃ kulānaṃ saṅgaṇhanavidhino pariharaṇaṃ tanniyamitaṃ ekantikaṃ kulasaṅgahaṇavidhiṃ.
[06]Caṅkamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^100^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Dhātuso saṃsandantī’’ti idaṃ ajjhāsayato sarikkhatādassanaṃ, na kāyena missībhāvadassananti āha ^b^‘‘samuddantare’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Nirantaro^eb^ti nibbiseso. ^b^Saṃsaggā^eb^ti pañcavidhasaṃsaggahetu. Saṃsaggagahaṇena cettha saṃsaggavatthukā taṇhā gahitā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dassana…pe… snehenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Vanati bhajati sajjati tenāti vanaṃ, vanathoti ca kileso vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘vanatho jātoti kilesavanaṃ jāta’’^eb^nti. Itare saṃsaggamūlakāti tameva paṭikkhipanto āha ^b^‘‘adassanenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sādhujīvī^eb^ti sādhu suṭṭhu jīvī, taṃjīvanasīlo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘parisuddhajīvitaṃ jīvamāno’’^eb^ti.
[06]Sagāthāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^101^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nirojā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0140^ea^ saddhāsnehābhāvena nisnehā. Tato eva arasabhāvena ^b^nirasā. Ekasadisā^eb^ti samasamā nibbisesā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nirantarā’’^eb^ti. Alajjitāya ekasīmakatā ^b^bhinnamariyādā^eb^. Saddhā tesaṃ atthīti ^b^saddhā. Tantipālakā^eb^ti saddhammatantiyā pālakā. ^b^Vaṃsānurakkhakā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0122^ea^ ariyavaṃsassa anurakkhakā. ^b^Āraddhavīriyā^eb^ti paggahitavīriyā. Yasmā tādisānaṃ vīriyaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ nāma hoti kiccasiddhiyā, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paripuṇṇaparakkamā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbakiccapariggāhikāyā^eb^ti catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ bhāvanākiccapariggāhikāya.
[06]Assaddhasaṃsandanasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^102-106^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aṭṭhamādīnī^eb^ti aṭṭhamaṃ navamaṃ dasamaṃ ekādasamaṃ dvādasamanti imāni pañca suttānīti eke. Apare pana nava suttānīti icchanti. Svāyamattho aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttoyeva. Pāḷiyañca kesuci potthakesu likhīyati.
[06]Assaddhamūlakasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Dutiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^107-108^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ito paresū^eb^ti ito dutiyavaggato paresu suttesu. ^b^Paṭhama^eb^nti paṭhamavagge paṭhamaṃ. Kasmā panettha evaṃ desanā pavattāti āha ^b^‘‘evaṃ vuccamāne’’^eb^tiādi.
[06]Asamāhitasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^109-111^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Surāmerayasaṅkhāta^eb^nti ^a^M2.0141^ea^ piṭṭhasurādisurāsaṅkhātaṃ pupphāsavādimerayasaṅkhātañca. Majjanaṭṭhena ^b^majjaṃ. Surāmerayamajjappamādoti vuccati^eb^ ‘‘majjati tenā’’ti katvā. ^b^Tasmiṃ tiṭṭhantī^eb^ti tasmiṃ pamāde pamajjanavasena tiṭṭhantīti attho. Sesaṃ tatiyacatutthesu suviññeyyamevāti.

[03]Pañcame ^a^V2.0123^ea^ tāni padāni saṃvaṇṇetuṃ ^b^‘‘pañcame’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha pāṇo nāma vohārato satto, paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ, taṃ ^b^pāṇaṃ atipātenti^eb^ aticca antareyeva, atikkamma vā satthādīhi abhibhavitvā pātenti saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā sīghaṃ pātentīti attho. Kāyena vācāya vā ^b^adinnaṃ^eb^ parasantakaṃ. ^b^Ādiyantī^eb^ti gaṇhanti. ^b^Micchā^eb^ti na sammā, gārayhavasena. ^b^Musā^eb^ti atathaṃ vatthu. ^b^Vadantī^eb^ti visaṃvādanavasena vadanti. Piyasuññakaraṇato ^b^pisuṇā,^eb^ pisati vā pare satte, hiṃsatīti attho. ^b^Mammacchedikā^eb^ti etena parassa mammacchedavasena ekantapharusasañcetanā ^b^pharusavācā^eb^ nāmāti dasseti. ^b^Abhijjhā^eb^saddo lubbhane niruḷhoti āha ^b^‘‘parabhaṇḍe lubbhanasīlāti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Byāpanna^eb^nti dosavasena vipannaṃ. Pakativijahanena ^b^pūtibhūtaṃ^eb^. Sādhūhi garahitabbataṃ pattā ‘‘natthi dinna’’ntiādinayappavattā natthikāhetukākiriyadiṭṭhi ^b^kammapathapariyāpannā^eb^ nāma. Micchattapariyāpannā sabbāpi lokuttaramaggapaṭipakkhā viparītadiṭṭhi.

[03]^b^Tesa^eb^nti kammapathānaṃ. ^b^Vohārato^eb^ti indriyabaddhaṃ upādāya paññattimattato. ^b^Tiracchānagatādīsū^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena petānaṃ saṅgaho. Payogavatthumahantatādīhi ^b^mahāsāvajjatā^eb^ tehi paccayehi uppajjamānāya cetanāya balavabhāvato. Yathāvuttapaccayavipariyāyepi taṃtaṃpaccayehi cetanāya balavabhāvavasena ^b^appasāvajjamahāsāvajjatā^eb^ vā veditabbā. ^b^Iddhimayo^eb^ti kammavipākiddhimayo dāṭhākoṭanādīnaṃ viya.

[03]^b^Methunasamācāresū^eb^ti sadāraparadāragamanavasena duvidhesu methunasamācāresu. Tepi hīnādhimuttikehi kattabbato kāmā nāma. ^b^Micchācāro^eb^ti gārayhācāro. Gārayhatā cassa ekantanihīnatāyāti āha ^a^M2.0142^ea^^b^‘‘ekantanindito lāmakācāro’’^eb^ti ^b^asaddhammādhippāyenā^eb^ti asaddhammasevanādhippāyena. ^b^Gottarakkhitā^eb^ti sagottehi rakkhitā. ^b^Dhammarakkhitā^eb^ti sahadhammehi rakkhitā. Sassāmikā nāma ^b^sārakkhā^eb^. Yassā gamane daṇḍo ṭhapito, sā ^b^saparidaṇḍā^eb^. Bhariyabhāvāya dhanena kītā ^b^dhanakkītā^eb^. Chandena vasatīti ^b^chandavāsinī^eb^. Bhogatthaṃ vasatīti ^b^bhogavāsinī^eb^. Paṭatthaṃ vasatīti ^b^paṭavāsinī^eb^. Udakapattaṃ āmasitvā gahitā ^b^odapattakinī^eb^. Cumbaṭaṃ apanetvā gahitā ^b^obhaṭacumbaṭā^eb^. Karamarānītā ^b^dhajāhaṭā^eb^. Taṅkhaṇikaṃ gahitā ^b^muhuttikā^eb^. Abhibhavitvā vītikkamo micchācāro ^b^mahāsāvajjo,^eb^ na tathā dvinnaṃ samānacchandatāya. Abhibhavitvā vītikkamane satipi maggenamaggapaṭipattiadhivāsane purimuppannasevanābhisandhipayogābhāvato micchācāro na hoti abhibhuyyamānassāti vadanti. Sevanācitte sati payogābhāvo appamāṇaṃ yebhuyyena itthiyā sevanāpayogassa abhāvato. Tathā sati puretaraṃ sevanācittassa upaṭṭhānepi ^a^V2.0124^ea^ tassā micchācāro na siyā, tathā purisassapi sevanāpayogābhāve. Tasmā attano ruciyā pavattitassa vasena tayo, balakkārena pavattitassa vasena tayoti sabbepi aggahitaggahaṇena ^b^‘‘cattāro sambhārā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^Āsevanamandatāyā^eb^ti yāya akusalacetanāya samphaṃ palapati, tassā ittarakālatāya pavattiyā anāsevanāti paridubbalā hoti cetanā.

[03]Upasaggavasena atthavisesavācino dhātusaddāti ^b^abhijjhāyatī^eb^ti padassa ^b^parabhaṇḍābhimukhī^eb^tiādiattho vutto. ^b^Tanninnatāyā^eb^ti tasmiṃ parabhaṇḍe lubbhanavasena ninnatāya. Abhipubbo jhe-saddo lubbhane niruḷhoti daṭṭhabbo. Yassa bhaṇḍaṃ abhijjhāyati, tassa appaguṇatāya ^b^appasāvajjā,^eb^ mahāguṇatāya ^b^mahāsāvajjā^eb^tiādinā nayena tattha appasāvajjamahāsāvajjavibhāgo veditabbo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘adinnādānaṃ viyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Attano pariṇāmanaṃ^eb^ cittenevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Hitasukhaṃ byāpādayatī^eb^ti yo naṃ uppādeti, yassa uppādeti, tassa sati samavāye hitasukhaṃ vināseti. ^b^Aho vatā^eb^ti iminā yathā abhijjhāne vatthuno ekantato attano pariṇāmanaṃ dassitaṃ ^a^M2.0143^ea^, evamidhāpi vatthuno ‘‘aho vatā’’ti iminā parassa vināsacintāya ekantato niyamitabhāvaṃ dasseti. Evañhi nesaṃ dāruṇappavattiyā kammapathappavatti.

[03]^b^Yathābhuccagahaṇābhāvenā^eb^ti yathātacchagahaṇassa abhāvena aniccādisabhāvassa niccādito gahaṇena. ^b^Micchā passatī^eb^ti vitathaṃ passati. ^b^Samphappalāpo viyā^eb^ti iminā āsevanassa appamahantatāhi micchādiṭṭhiyā appasāvajjamahāsāvajjatā. ^b^Vatthuno^eb^ti gahitavatthuno. ^b^Gahitākāraviparītatā^eb^ti micchādiṭṭhiyā gahitākārassa viparītatā. ^b^Tathābhāvenā^eb^ti attano gahitākāreneva tassā diṭṭhiyā, gahitassa vā vatthuno ^b^upaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ ‘‘evametaṃ, na ito aññathā’’ti.

[03]^b^Dhammato^eb^ti sabhāvato. ^b^Koṭṭhāsato^eb^ti cittaṅgakoṭṭhāsato, yaṃkoṭṭhāsā honti, tatoti attho. ^b^Cetanādhammāvā^eb^ti cetanāsabhāvā eva. ^b^Paṭipāṭiyā sattā^eb^ti ettha nanu cetanā abhidhamme kammapathesu na vuttāti paṭipāṭiyā sattannaṃ kammapathabhāvo na yuttoti? Na, avacanassa aññahetukattā. Na hi tattha cetanāya akammapathattā kammapatharāsimhi avacanaṃ, kadāci pana kammapatho ^a^V2.0125^ea^ hoti, na sabbadāti kammapathabhāvassa aniyatattā avacanaṃ. Yadā, panassa kammapathabhāvo hoti, tadā kammapatharāsisaṅgaho na nivārito. Etthāha – yadi cetanāya sabbadā kammapathabhāvābhāvato aniyato kammapathabhāvoti kammapatharāsimhi avacanaṃ, nanu abhijjhādīnampi kammapathabhāvaṃ appattānaṃ atthitāya aniyato kammapathabhāvoti tesampi kammapatharāsimhi avacanaṃ āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati, kammapathatātaṃsabhāgatāhi tesaṃ tattha vuttattā. Yadi evaṃ cetanāpi tattha vattabbā siyā? Saccametaṃ. Sā pana pāṇātipātādikāti pākaṭo tassā kammapathabhāvoti na vuttā siyā. Cetanāya hi ‘‘cetanāhaṃ, bhikkhave, kammaṃ vadāmi (a. ni. 6.63; kathā. 539) tividhā, bhikkhave, kāyasañcetanā akusalaṃ kāyakamma’’ntiādivacanato (kathā. 539) kammabhāvo pākaṭo. Kammaṃyeva ca sugatiduggatīnaṃ tatthuppajjanakasukhadukkhānañca pathabhāvena pavattaṃ kammapathoti vuccatīti pākaṭo, tassā kammapathabhāvo. Abhijjhādīnaṃ pana cetanāsamīhanabhāvena sucaritaduccaritabhāvo, cetanājanitapiṭṭhivaṭṭakabhāvena sugatiduggatitaduppajjanakasukhadukkhānaṃ ^a^M2.0144^ea^ pathabhāvo cāti, na tathā pākaṭo kammapathabhāvoti, te eva tena sabhāvena dassetuṃ abhidhamme kammapatharāsibhāvena vuttā. Atathājātiyakattā vā cetanā tehi saddhiṃ na vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Mūlaṃ patvā^eb^ti mūladesanaṃ patvā, mūlasabhāvesu dhammesu desiyamānesūti attho.

[03]^b^Adinnādānaṃ sattārammaṇa^eb^nti idaṃ ‘‘pañca sikkhāpadā parittārammaṇā evā’’ti imāya pāḷiyā virujjhati. Yañhi pāṇātipātādidussīlyassa ārammaṇaṃ, tadeva taṃ veramaṇiyā ārammaṇaṃ. Vītikkamitabbavatthuto eva hi viratīti. ‘‘Sattārammaṇa’’nti vā sattasaṅkhātaṃ saṅkhārārammaṇameva upādāya vuttattā na koci virodho. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ^b^sammohavinodaniyaṃ^eb^ (vibha. aṭṭha. 714) ‘‘yāni sikkhāpadāni ettha ‘sattārammaṇānī’ti vuttāni, tāni yasmā ‘sattoti’ti saṅkhaṃ gate saṅkhāreyeva ārammaṇaṃ karontī’’ti. Ito paresupi eseva nayo. Visabhāgavatthuno ‘‘itthipurisā’’ti gahetabbato ^b^sattārammaṇotipi eke^eb^. ‘‘Eko diṭṭho, dve sutā’’tiādinā samphappalapane ^b^diṭṭhasutamutaviññātavasena. Tathā abhijjhā^eb^ti ettha ^b^tathā^eb^-saddo ‘‘diṭṭhasutamutaviññātavasenā’’ti idampi upasaṃharati, na sattasaṅkhārārammaṇataṃ eva dassanādivasena abhijjhāyanato. ‘‘Natthi sattā opapātikā’’ti pavattamānāpi micchādiṭṭhi tebhūmakadhammārammaṇā evāti adhippāyena tassā saṅkhārārammaṇatā vuttā. Kathaṃ pana micchādiṭṭhiyā mahaggatappattā dhammā ārammaṇaṃ hontīti? Sādhāraṇato. Natthi sukaṭadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipākoti hi pavattamānāya atthato rūpārūpāvacaradhammāpi gahitāva hontīti.

[03]Sukhabahulatāya ^a^V2.0126^ea^ rājāno hasamānāpi ‘‘coraṃ ghātethā’’ti vadanti, hāso pana tesaṃ aññavisayoti āha ^b^‘‘sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā pana nesaṃ dukkhasampayuttāva hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Majjhattavedano na hoti,^eb^ sukhavedanova. Tattha ‘‘kāmānaṃ samudayā’’tiādinā vedanābhedo veditabbo. Lobhasamuṭṭhāno musāvādo sukhavedano vā siyā majjhattavedano vā, dosasamuṭṭhāno dukkhavedano vāti ^b^musāvādo tivedano^eb^ siyā. Iminā nayena sesesupi yathārahaṃ vedanānaṃ ^a^M2.0145^ea^ ‘‘lobho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāyā’’tiādinā bhedo veditabbo.

[03]^b^Pāṇātipāto dosamohavasena dvimūlako^eb^ti sampayuttamūlameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tassa hi mūlaṭṭhena upakārabhāvo dosaviseso, nidānamūle pana gayhamāne lobhamohavasenapi vaṭṭati. Sammūḷho āmisakiñjakkhakāmopi hi pāṇaṃ hanati. Tenevāha ‘‘lobho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāyā’’tiādi (a. ni. 3.34). Sesesupi eseva nayo.

[03]Asamādinnasīlassa sampattato yathāupaṭṭhitavītikkamitabbavatthuto virati ^b^sampattavirati^eb^. Samādānena uppannā virati ^b^samādānavirati^eb^. Kilesānaṃ samucchindanavasena pavattā maggasampayuttā virati ^b^samucchedavirati^eb^. Kāmañcettha pāḷiyaṃ viratiyova āgatā, sikkhāpadavibhaṅge pana cetanāpi āharitvā dassitāti tadubhayampi gaṇhanto ^b^‘‘cetanāpi vaṭṭanti viratiyopī’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]Adussīlyārammaṇā jīvitindriyādiārammaṇā kathaṃ dussīlyāni pajahantīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Pāṇātipātādīhi viramaṇavasena pavattanato tadārammaṇabhāveneva tāni pajahanti. Na hi tadeva ārabbha taṃ pajahituṃ sakkā tato anissaṭabhāvato.
[03]^b^Anabhijjhā…pe… viramantassā^eb^ti abhijjhaṃ pajahantassāti attho. Na hi manoduccaritato virati atthi anabhijjhādīheva tappahānasiddhito.
[06]Pañcasikkhāpadasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^113^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Micchattasammattavasenā^eb^ti ettha micchābhāvo ^b^micchattaṃ,^eb^ tathā sammābhāvo ^b^sammattaṃ^eb^. Tathā tathā pavattā akusalakkhandhāva micchāsati, evaṃ micchāñāṇampi daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi ñāṇassa ^a^V2.0127^ea^ micchābhāvo nāma atthi. Tasmā ^b^micchāñāṇino^eb^ti micchāsaññāṇāti attho, ayoniso pavattacittuppādāti ^a^M2.0146^ea^ adhippāyo. ^b^Micchāpaccavekkhaṇenā^eb^ti micchādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ micchā ayoniso paccavekkhaṇena. ^b^Kusalavimuttī^eb^ti pakatipurisasantarajānanaṃ, guṇaviyuttassa attano sakattani avaṭṭhānanti evamādiṃ akusalapavattiṃ ‘‘kusalavimuttī’’ti gahetvā ṭhitā micchāvimuttikā. ^b^Sammāpaccavekkhaṇā^eb^ti jhānavimokkhādīsu sammā aviparītaṃ pavattā paccavekkhaṇā.
[06]Dasaṅgasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Tatiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^114^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Patiṭṭhādhātū^eb^ti sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ patiṭṭhābhūtā dhātu. ^b^Ābandhanadhātū^eb^ti nahāniyacuṇṇassa udakaṃ viya sahajātadhammānaṃ ābandhanabhūtā dhātu. ^b^Paripācanadhātū^eb^ti sūriyo phalādīnaṃ viya sahajātadhammānaṃ paripācanabhūtā dhātu. ^b^Vitthambhanadhātū^eb^ti dutiyo viya sahajātadhammānaṃ vitthambhanabhūtā dhātu. Kesādayo ^b^vīsati koṭṭhāsā. Ādi^eb^-saddena pittādayo santappanādayo uddhaṅgamā vātādayo gahitā. ^b^Etā^eb^ti dhātuyo.
[06]Catudhātusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^115^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ayaṃ pathavīdhātuṃ nissāya taṃ ārabbha pavatto ^b^assādo. Evaṃ pavattāna^eb^nti evaṃ kāye pabhāvassa pavedanavaseneva pavattānaṃ. ^b^Hutvā abhāvākārenā^eb^ti pubbe avijjamānā paccayasāmaggiyā hutvā uppajjitvā puna bhaṅgupagamanato uddhaṃ abhāvākārena. Na niccāti ^b^aniccā^eb^ addhuvattā, dhuvaṃ niccaṃ. ^b^Paṭipīḷanākārenā^eb^ti udayabbayavasena abhiṇhaṃ pīḷanākārena ^a^M2.0147^ea^ dukkhaṭṭhena. ^b^Sabhāvavigamākārenā^eb^ti attano sabhāvassa vigacchanākārena. Sabhāvadhammā hi appamattaṃ khaṇaṃ patvā nirujjhanti. Tasmā te ‘‘jarāya maraṇena cā’’ti dvedhā vipariṇamanti. Tenāha ^a^V2.0128^ea^^b^‘‘vipariṇāmadhammā’’^eb^ti. Ādīnaṃ vāti pavattetīti ^b^ādīnavo,^eb^ paramakāpaññatā. ^b^Vinīyatī^eb^ti vūpasamīyati. Accantappahānavasena nissarati etenāti ^b^nissaraṇaṃ^eb^.
[03]^b^Sāyaṃ nipannā^eb^ sabbarattiṃ khepetvā ^b^pāto uṭṭhahāma, māsapuṇṇaghaṭo viya no sarīraṃ^eb^ nissandābhāvato.
[03]^b^Phusitamattesupī^eb^ti udakassa phusitamattesupi.
[03]^b^Atināmenti^eb^ kālaṃ. ^b^Evaṃ^eb^ vuttanayena ^b^pavattā^eb^ puggalā ^b^etā^eb^ pathavīdhātuādayo ^b^assādenti nāma^eb^ abhirativasena tattha ākaṅkhuppādanato.

[03]^b^Abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇenā^eb^ti aggamaggañāṇena. Rukkho ^b^bodhi^eb^ ‘‘bujjhati etthā’’ti katvā. Maggo ^b^bodhi^eb^ ‘‘bujjhati etenā’’ti katvā. Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ^b^bodhi^eb^ sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ bujjhanato. Nibbānaṃ ^b^bodhi^eb^ bujjhitabbato. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^Sāvakapāramīñāṇa^eb^nti sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ yāthāvato dassanavatthu.

[03]^b^Akuppā^eb^ti paṭipakkhehi akopetabbo. ^b^Kāraṇato^eb^ti ariyamaggato. Tato hissa akuppatā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sā hī’’^eb^tiādī. ^b^Ārammaṇato^eb^ti nibbānārammaṇato nibbānārammaṇānaṃ lokiyasamāpattīnaṃ abhāvato.

[03]^b^Vitthāravasenā^eb^ti ekekadhātuvasenāti vadanti, ekekissā pana dhātuyā lakkhaṇavibhattidassanavasena. ^b^Ya^eb^nti hetuatthe nipāto, yaṃ nimittanti attho. Assādeti etenāti ^b^assādo,^eb^ taṇhā. ^b^Ayaṃ pathavīdhātuyā assādo^eb^ti ettha ayaṃ-saddo ‘‘pahānapaṭivedho’’ti etthāpi ānetvā sambandhitabbo ‘‘ayaṃ pahānapaṭivedho paṭivijjhitabbaṭṭhena samudayasacca’’nti. Esa nayo sesasaccesupi. ^b^Yā^eb^ti yathāvuttesu assādo ādīnavo nissaraṇanti imesu tīsu ṭhānesu pavattā ^a^M2.0148^ea^ yā diṭṭhi…pe… yo samādhi, ayaṃ bhāvanāpaṭivedho maggasaccanti vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
[06]Pubbesambodhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^116^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yathā ^a^V2.0129^ea^ yāvatā nissaraṇapariyesanaṭṭhāne ādīnavapariyesanā, evaṃ yāvatā ādīnavapariyesanaṭṭhāne assādapariyesanā sammāpaṭipannassāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘acarinti ñāṇacārena acariṃ, anubhavanacārenā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Acariṃsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^117^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nissaṭātiādīni^eb^ padāni, ^b^ādito vuttapaṭisedhenā^eb^ti ‘‘nevā’’ti ettha vuttena nakārena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na nissaṭā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Vimariyādikatenā^eb^tiādi ca ettha viharaṇapekkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ. ^b^Dutiyanaye^eb^ti ‘‘yato ca kho, bhikkhave’’tiādinā vuttanaye. Kilesavaṭṭamariyādāya sabbaso abhāvato ^b^nimmariyādikatena^eb^ cittena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tīsū^eb^ti dutiyādīsu tīsu.
[06]Nocedaṃsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^118^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekanteneva dukkhā^eb^ti avīcimahānirayo viya ekantato dukkhā eva sukhena avomissā. ^b^Dukkhena anupatitā^eb^ti dukkheneva sabbaso upagatā. ^b^Dukkhena okkantā^eb^ti bahiddhā viya antopi dukkhena avakkantā anupaviṭṭhā. Sukhavedanāpaccayatāya imāsaṃ dhātūnaṃ sukhatā viya dukkhavedanāpaccayatāpi veditabbā, saṅkhāradukkhatā pana sabbattha caritā eva ^a^M2.0149^ea^. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbāsu dhātūsu, sabbaṭṭhānesu vā. Paṭhamaṃ sukhaṃ dassetvāpi pacchā dukkhassa kathitattā ^b^‘‘dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ kathita’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ.
[06]Ekantadukkhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^119-123^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhasattamesu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ^b^‘‘vivaṭṭaṃ kathita’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ ^a^V2.0130^ea^. ^b^Tīsu^eb^ suttesu. ^b^Catusaccamevā^eb^ti cattāri saccāni samāhaṭāni catusaccanti tesaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahaṇaṃ, niyamo pana tabbinimuttassa paramatthassa abhāvato.
[06]Abhinandasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Catutthavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sāratthappakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Dhātusaṃyuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^124^eb^^b^.^eb^ Upasaggo ^a^V2.0131^ea^^a^M2.0150^ea^ samāsavisaye sasādhanaṃ kiriyaṃ dassetīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ñāṇena anugantvāpī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vassasataṃ vassasahassa^eb^nti nidassanamattametaṃ, tato bhiyyopi anugantvā anamataggo eva saṃsāro. ^b^Agga^eb^-saddo idha mariyādavacano, anuddesikañcetaṃ vacananti āha ^b^‘‘aparicchinnapubbāparakoṭiko’’^eb^ti. Aññathā antimabhavikaparicchinnakatavimuttiparipācanīyadhammādīnaṃ vasena aparicchinnapubbāparakoṭi na sakkā vattuṃ. Saṃsaraṇaṃ ^b^saṃsāro. Pacchimāpi na paññāyati^eb^ andhabālānaṃ vasenāti adhippāyo. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘dīgho bālāna saṃsāro’’ti (dha. pa. 60). ^b^Vemajjheyeva pana sattā saṃsaranti^eb^ pubbāparakoṭīnaṃ alabbhanīyattā. ^b^Attho paritto hoti^eb^ yathābhūtāvabodhābhāvato. ^b^Buddhasamaye^eb^ti sāsaneti attho. ^b^Attho mahā^eb^ yathābhūtāvabodhisambhavato, atthassa vipulatāya taṃsadisā upamā natthīti parittaṃyeva upamaṃ āharantīti adhippāyo. Idāni vuttamevatthaṃ ^b^‘‘pāḷiyaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādinā samattheti. ^b^Mātu mātaro^eb^ti mātu mātāmahiyo. ^b^Tassevā^eb^ti dukkhasseva. ^b^Tibba^eb^nti dukkhapariyāyoti.
[06]Tiṇakaṭṭhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^125^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mahāpathavi^eb^nti avisesena anavasesapariyādāyinīti āha ^b^‘‘cakkavāḷapariyanta’’^eb^nti. Parikappavacanañcetaṃ.
[06]Pathavīsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^126^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kandanaṃ ^a^V2.0132^ea^^a^M2.0151^ea^ sasaddaṃ, rodanaṃ pana kevalamevāti āha ^b^‘‘kandantānanti sasaddaṃ rudamānāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Pavatta^eb^nti sandanavasena pavattaṃ. ‘‘Sinerurasmīhi paricchinnesū’’ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘sinerussā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Maṇimaya^eb^nti indanīlamaṇimayaṃ. Sinerussa pubbadakkhiṇakoṇasamapadesā ‘‘pubbadakkhiṇapassā’’ti adhippetā. Tehi nikkhantarajatarasmiyo indanīlarasmiyo ca ^b^ekato hutvā. Tāsaṃ rasmīnaṃ antaresū^eb^ti tāsaṃ catūhi koṇehi nikkhantarasmīnaṃ catūsu antaresu. ^b^Cattāro^eb^ti dakkhiṇādibhedā cattāro mahāsamuddā honti. ^b^Viasana^eb^nti visesena khepanaṃ. Kiṃ pana tanti āha ^b^‘‘vināsoti attho’’^eb^ti.
[06]Assusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^127^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mātuthañña^eb^nti pītaṃ mātuyā thanato nibbattakhīraṃ bahutaranti veditabbaṃ.
[06]Khīrasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^128^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Anamataggassa saṃsārassa dīghatamattā na sukaraṃ nasukara’’nti aṭṭhakathāpāṭho. ^b^Kathaṃ nacchindatī^eb^ti kathaṃ na pariyosāpeti, kāyacipi gahaṇatāyāti adhippāyo. ^b^Tayo kappāsaṃsū^eb^ti tayo ekakappāsaṃsū. Yehi naṃ phuṭṭhaṃ, tatopi sukhumataraṃ ^b^sāsapamattaṃ^eb^ khīyeyya pabbataṃ sabbabhāgehi aticiravelaṃ parimajjante.
[06]Pabbatasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^129^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nagara^eb^nti ^a^M2.0152^ea^ nagarasaṅkhepena pākārena parikkhittataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Anto pana sabbaso vicittasāsapehi eva puṇṇaṃ, evaṃ cuṇṇikābaddhaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na pana…pe… daṭṭhabba’’^eb^nti.
[06]Sāsapasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^130^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tassa^eb^^a^V2.0133^ea^^b^ṭhitaṭṭhānato^eb^ti bhikkhuno anussaritvā ṭhitaṭṭhānato, tena anussaritassa satasahassakappassa anantarakappato paṭṭhāyāti attho. ^b^Eva^eb^nti vuttappakārena. ^b^Cattāropi^eb^ bhikkhū abhiññālābhino. ^b^Cattāri kappasatasahassāni^eb^ divase divase ^b^anussareyyu^eb^nti parikappanavasena vadanti.
[06]Sāvakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^131^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Etasmiṃ antare^eb^ti etasmiṃ pabhavasamuddapadesaparicchinne āyāmato pañcayojanasatike atirekayojanasatike vā ṭhāne.
[06]Gaṅgāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^132^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^b^khitto^eb^ti punappunaṃ khitto. Ekavārañhi khitto mūlādīsu ekeneva nipateyya. Tathā sati adhippeto pātassa aniyamo na nidassito siyā. Tattha ca dhammaṃ suṇantā bhikkhū manussaloke, te sandhāya ^b^‘‘asmā lokā’’^eb^ti āha, tadaññaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘paraloka’’^eb^nti. Tassa tassa vā puggalassa yathādhippeto ayaṃ loko, tadañño paraloko.
[06]Daṇḍasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^133^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samaṭṭhikālo^eb^ti ^a^M2.0153^ea^ samena ākārena laddhabbāṭṭhikālo. ^b^Giriparikkhepe^eb^ti pañcahi girīhi parikkhittattā ‘‘giriparikkhepo’’ti laddhanāme rājagahe.
[06]Puggalasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Paṭhamavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^134^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Duggata^eb^nti ^a^V2.0134^ea^ kicchajīvikattā sabbathā dukkhaṃ gataṃ upagataṃ. Tathābhūto pana daliddo varāko nāma hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘daliddaṃ kapaṇa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Hatthapādehī^eb^ti nidassanamattaṃ, aññehipi sarīrāvayavehi dussaṇṭhānehi upeto durupeto evāti.
[06]Duggatasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^135^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sukhita^eb^nti sañjātasukhaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sukhasamappita’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Susajjita^eb^nti sukhumupakaraṇehi sabbathā sajjitaṃ.
[06]Sukhitasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^136^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dhutaṅgasamādānavasena,^eb^ na araññavāsādimattena. ^b^Sasaṃyojanā^eb^ sabbaso saṃyojanānaṃ appahīnattā, na puthujjanabhāvato. ^b^Ekekavaṇṇakālova gahetabbo^eb^ti etena mahiṃsādīnaṃ rassadīghapiṅgalādīsu ekekāneva gahetvā dasseti.
[06]Tiṃsamattasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^137-142^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Liṅganiyamena^eb^^a^M2.0154^ea^^b^ceva cakkavāḷaniyamena cā^eb^ti ‘‘purisānañhi mātugāmakālo, mātugāmānañca purisakālo’’ti yathā sattasantāne liṅganiyamo natthi, evaṃ kadāci imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe nibbattanti, kadāci aññatarasminti cakkavāḷaniyamopi natthi. Evameva ṭhite
[07]Cakkavāḷe ^a^V2.0135^ea^ mātugāmakāle namātābhūtapubbo natthītiādinā liṅganiyamena cakkavāḷaniyamo ca veditabbo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tesū’’^eb^tiādi.
[06]Mātusuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^143^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekaṃ apadānaṃ āharitvā dasseti^eb^ ‘‘evaṃ saṃvegaṃ janetvā bhikkhū visesaṃ pāpessāmī’’ti. ^b^Catūhena ārohanti^eb^ catuyojanubbedhattā. ^b^Dvinnaṃ buddhāna^eb^nti kakusandhassa koṇāgamanassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ buddhānaṃ. ‘‘Tivarā rohitassā suppiyā’’ti manussānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle samaññā tattha desanāmavasena jātāti veditabbā, yathā etarahi māgadhāti.

[03]^b^Puna vassasata^eb^nti paṭhamavassasatato uparivassasataṃ jīvanako nāma manusso natthi. ^b^Parihīnasadisaṃ kataṃ^eb^ desanāya. ^b^Vaḍḍhitvā^eb^ti dasavassāyukabhāvato paṭṭhāya yāva asaṅkhyeyyāyukabhāvā vaḍḍhitvā. ‘‘Parihīna’’nti vatvā taṃ parihīnabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘katha’’^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^Yaṃ āyuppamāṇesū^eb^ti yattakaṃ āyuppamāṇesūti.
[06]Vepullapabbatasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Dutiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sāratthappakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Anamataggasaṃyuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^144^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Santuṭṭho^eb^ti ^a^V2.0136^ea^^a^M2.0155^ea^ sakena uccāvacena paccayena samameva ca tussanako. Tenāha ^b^‘‘itarītarenā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha duvidhaṃ itarītaraṃ – pākatikaṃ, ñāṇasañjanitañcāti. Tattha pākatikaṃ paṭikkhipitvā ñāṇasañjanitameva dassento ^b^‘‘thūlasukhumā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Itaraṃ vuccati hīnaṃ paṇītato aññattā. Tathā paṇītampi itaraṃ hīnato aññattā. Apekkhāsaddā hi itarītarāti. Iti yena kenaci hīnena vā paṇītena vā cīvarādipaccayena santussito tathāpavatto alobho itarītarapaccayasantoso, taṃsamaṅgitāya santuṭṭho. Yathālābhaṃ attano lābhānurūpaṃ santoso ^b^yathālābhasantoso^eb^. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Labbhatīti vā lābho, yo yo lābho yathālābho, tena santoso ^b^yathālābhasantoso. Bala^eb^nti kāyabalaṃ. ^b^Sāruppa^eb^nti bhikkhuno anucchavikatā.

[03]Yathāladdhato aññassa apatthanā nāma siyā appicchatāya pavattiākāroti tato vinivattitameva santosassa sarūpaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘labhantopi na gaṇhātī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Taṃ parivattetvā^eb^ti pakatidubbalādīnaṃ garucīvaraṃ na phāsubhāvāvahaṃ sarīrabādhāvahañca hotīti payojanavasena, nātricchatādivasena parivattetvā. Lahukacīvaraparibhoge santosavirodhi na hotīti āha ^b^‘‘lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hotī’’^eb^ti. Mahagghacīvaraṃ bahūni vā cīvarāni labhitvā tāni vissajjetvā aññassa gahaṇaṃ yathāsāruppanaye ṭhitattā na santosavirodhīti āha ^b^‘‘tesaṃ…pe… dhārentopi santuṭṭhova hotī’’^eb^ti. Evaṃ sesapaccayesu yathābalayathāsāruppaniddesesu ^b^api^eb^-saddaggahaṇe adhippāyo veditabbo.
[03]^b^Pakatī^eb^ti vācāpakatiādikā. Avasesaniddāya abhibhūtattā paṭibujjhato sahasā pāpakā vitakkā pātubhavantīti.

[03]^b^Muttaharītaka^eb^nti ^a^V2.0137^ea^^a^M2.0156^ea^ gomuttaparibhāvitaṃ, pūtibhāvena vā chaḍḍitattā muttaharītakaṃ. ^b^Buddhādīhi vaṇṇita^eb^nti ‘‘pūtimuttabhesajjaṃ nissāya yā pabbajjā’’tiādinā sammāsambuddhādīhi pasatthaṃ.

[03]^b^Eko^eb^ ekacco ^b^santuṭṭho hoti, santosassa vaṇṇaṃ na katheti^eb^ seyyathāpi āyasmā bākulatthero. ^b^Na santuṭṭo hoti, santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti^eb^ seyyathāpi thero upanando sakyaputto. ^b^Neva santuṭṭho hoti, na santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti^eb^ seyyathāpi thero lāḷudāyī. ^b^Aya^eb^nti āyasmā mahākassapo. ^b^Anesana^eb^nti ayoniso micchājīvavasena paccayapariyesanaṃ. ^b^Uttasatī^eb^ti ‘‘kathaṃ nu kho labheyya’’nti jātuttāsena uttasati. Tathā ^b^paritassati^eb^. ^b^Aya^eb^nti mahākassapatthero. ^b^Evaṃ^eb^ yathāvuttaekaccabhikkhu viya ^b^na paritassati,^eb^ alābhaparittāsena vighātappattiyā na parittāsaṃ āpajjati. Lobhoyeva ārammaṇena saddhiṃ ganthanaṭṭhena bajjhanaṭṭhena gedho ^b^lobhagedho. Muccha^eb^nti gedhaṃ momūhattabhāvaṃ. ^b^Ādīnava^eb^nti dosaṃ. ^b^Nissaraṇamevā^eb^ti cīvare idamatthitādassanapubbakaṃ alaggabhāvasaṅkhātaniyyānameva pajānanto. ^b^Yathāladdhādīna^eb^nti yathāladdhapiṇḍapātādīnaṃ. Niddhāraṇe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.

[03]^b^Yathā mahākassapatthero^eb^ti attanā vattabbaniyāmena vadati, bhagavatā pana vattabbaniyāmena ‘‘yathā kassapo bhikkhū’’ti bhavitabbaṃ. ^b^Kassapena^eb^ nidassanabhūtena. ^b^Kathanaṃ nāma bhāro^eb^ ‘‘mutto moceyya’’nti paṭiññānurūpattā. ^b^Paṭipattiṃ paripūraṃ katvā pūraṇaṃ bhāro^eb^ satthu āṇāya sirasā sampaṭicchitabbato.
[06]Santuṭṭhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^145^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tena rahito^eb^ti tena sammāvāyāmena rahito. ^b^Nibbhayo^eb^ti bhayarahito. Kusalānuppādanampi hi sāvajjameva aññāṇālasiyahetukattā. ^b^Sambujjhanatthāyā^eb^ti ariyamaggehi sambujjhanāya. ^b^Yogehi khemaṃ^eb^ tehi anupaddutattā.

[03]^b^Manuññavatthu^eb^nti ^a^M2.0157^ea^ manoramaṃ lobhuppattikāraṇaṃ. ^b^Yathā vā tathā vā^eb^ti subhasukhādivasena. ^b^Te^eb^ti lobhādayo. ^b^Anuppannāti veditabbā^eb^ tathārūpe vatthārammaṇe tathā anuppannapubbattā. ^b^Aññathā^eb^ti vuttanayeneva vatthārammaṇehi ayojetvā gayhamāne. ^b^Vatthumhī^eb^ti upaṭṭhākādicīvarādivatthumhi. ^b^Ārammaṇe^eb^ti manāpiyādibhede ārammaṇe. ^b^Tādisena paccayenā^eb^ti ayonisomanasikārasativossaggādipaccayena ^a^V2.0138^ea^. ^b^Ime^eb^ti vuttanayena paccayalābhena pacchā uppajjamānā pāḷiyaṃ tathā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ uppajjamānatāya ^b^nappahīyanti nāma^eb^. Anuppādo hi paramatthato pahānaṃ kathitaṃ, tasmā tattha kathitanayeneva gahetabbanti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Appaṭiladdhā^eb^ti anuppattiyā. ^b^Te^eb^ti yathāvuttasīlādianavajjadhammā. ^b^Paṭiladdhā^eb^ti adhigatā. ‘‘Sīlādidhammā’’ti ettha yadi maggaphalānipi gahitāni, atha kasmā ‘‘parihānivasenā’’ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘ettha cā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Imassa pana sammappadhānassā^eb^ti catutthassa sammappadhānassa vasena. ^b^Ayaṃ desanā^eb^ti ‘‘uppannā me kusalā dhammā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyu’’nti ayaṃ desanā katā. ^b^Dutiyamaggo vā…pe… saṃvatteyyā^eb^ti idaṃ āyatiṃ sattasu attabhāvesu uppajjamānadukkhasaṅkhātānatthuppattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ‘‘Ātāpī ottappī bhabbo sambodhāyā’’tiādivacanato ^b^‘‘ime cattāro sammappadhānā pubbabhāgavipassanāvasena kathitā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.
[06]Anottappīsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^146^eb^^b^.^eb^ Piyamanāpaniccanavakādiguṇehi cando upamā etesanti ^b^candūpamā. Santhavā^eb^dīni padāni aññamaññavevacanāni. ^b^Pariyuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ puna citte kilesādhigamo. Sabbehipi padehi katthaci satte anurodharodhābhāvamāha. Attano pana sommabhāvena ^b^mahājanassa piyo manāpo^eb^. Yadatthamettha candūpamā āhaṭā, taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘eva’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Na kevalaṃ candūpamatāya ettako eva guṇo, atha kho aññepi santīti te dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Evamādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena yathā. Cando ^a^M2.0158^ea^ lokānuggahena ajavīthiādikā nānāvīthiyo paṭipajjati, evaṃ bhikkhu taṃ taṃ disaṃ upagacchati kulānuddayāya. Yathā cando kaṇhapakkhato sukkapakkhaṃ upagacchanto kalāhi vaḍḍhamāno hutvā niccanavo hoti, evaṃ bhikkhu kaṇhapakkhaṃ pahāya sukkapakkhaṃ upagantvā guṇehi vaḍḍhamāno lokassa vā pāmojjapāsaṃsattho niccanavatāya candasamacitto adhunupasampanno viya ca niccanavo hutvā carati.

[03]^b^Apakassitvā^eb^ti kilesakāmavatthukāmehi vivecetvā. Taṃ nekkhammābhimukhaṃ kāyacittānaṃ ākaḍḍhanaṃ kāyato apanayanañca hotīti āha ^b^‘‘ākaḍḍhitvā apanetvāti attho’’^eb^ti. Catukkañcettha sambhavatīti taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yo hi bhikkhū’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Niccanavayā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0139^ea^ ‘‘niccanavakā’’icceva vuttaṃ hoti. Ka-saddena hi padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ, ka-kārassa ca ya-kārādeso. ^b^Evaṃ vicariṃsū^eb^ti kiñjakkhavasena pariggahābhāvena yathā ime, evaṃ vicariṃsu aññeti anukampamānā.

[03]^b^Dvebhātikavatthū^eb^ti dvebhātikattherapaṭibaddhaṃ vatthuṃ. ^b^Appatirūpakaraṇa^eb^nti bhikkhūnaṃ asāruppakaraṇaṃ. ^b^Ādhāyitvā^eb^ti āropanaṃ ṭhapetvā. ^b^Tathā^eb^ti yathā saṅghamajjhe gaṇamajjhe ca, tathā vuḍḍhatare puggale appatirūpakaraṇaṃ. ^b^Evamādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena antaragharappavesane aññattha ca yathāvuttato aññaṃ asāruppakiriyaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Tatthevā^eb^ti saṅghamajjhe gaṇamajjhe ^b^puggalassa ca^eb^ vuḍḍhassa ^b^santike^eb^.
[03]Yathāvuttesu aññesu ca ^b^tesu ṭhānesu. Pāpicchatāpi manopāgabbhiya^eb^nti eteneva kodhūpanāhādīnaṃ samudācāro manopāgabbhiyanti dassitaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Ekato bhāriya^eb^nti piṭṭhipassato onataṃ. ^b^Vāyupatthambha^eb^nti cittasamuṭṭhānavāyunā upatthambhanaṃ. Anubbejetvā cittanti ānetvā sambandho. Cittassa hi tato anubbejanaṃ tadanunayanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sampiyāyamāno oloketī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vāyupatthambhakaṃ gāhāpetvā^eb^ti kāyaṃ tathā upatthambhakaṃ katvā.
[03]^b^Opammasaṃsandanaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0159^ea^ suviññeyyameva. Kāmagiddhatāya ^b^hīnādhimuttiko,^eb^ avisuddhasīlācāratāya ^b^micchāpaṭipanno^eb^.

[03]Aṅgulīhi nikkhantapabhā ākāsasañcalanena diguṇā hutvā ākāse vicariṃsūti āha ^b^‘‘yamakavijjutaṃ cārayamāno viyā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Ākāse pāṇiṃ cālesī’’ti padassa aññattha anāgatattā ^b^‘‘asambhinnapada’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Attamano^eb^ti pītisomanassehi gahitamano. Yañhi cittaṃ anavajjaṃ pītisomanassasahitaṃ, taṃ sasantakaṃ hitasukhāvahattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sakamano’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Na domanassena…pe… gahitamano^eb^ sakacittassa tabbiruddhattā. ^b^Purimanayenevā^eb^ti ‘‘idāni yo hīnādhimuttiko’’tiādinā pubbe vuttanayeneva.

[03]^b^Pasannākāra^eb^nti pasannehi kātabbakiriyaṃ. Taṃ sarūpato dasseti ^b^‘‘cīvarādayo paccaye dadeyyu’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tathabhāvāyā^eb^ti yadatthaṃ bhagavatā dhammo desito, yadatthañca sāsane pabbajjā, tadatthāya ^a^V2.0140^ea^. ^b^Rakkhaṇabhāva^eb^nti apāyabhayato ca rakkhaṇajjhāsayaṃ. ^b^Candopamādivasenā^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ākāse calitapāṇi viya katthaci alaggatāya parisuddhajjhāsayatā sattesu kāruññanti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho.
[06]Candūpamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^147^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kulāni upagacchatīti ^b^kulūpako. Sandīyatī^eb^ti sabbaso dīyati, avakhaṇḍīyatīti attho. Sā pana avakhaṇḍiyanā dukkhāpanā aṭṭiyanā hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘aṭṭīyatī’’^eb^ti. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘so tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedayatī’’ti. ^b^Vuttanayānusārena^eb^ heṭṭhā vuttanayassa anusaraṇena.
[06]Kulūpakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^148^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Chinnabhinnaṭṭhāne^eb^^a^M2.0160^ea^ chiddassa aputhulattā aggaḷaṃ adatvāva suttena saṃsibbanamattena aggaḷadānena ca chidde puthule. ^b^Nibbasanānī^eb^ti ciranisevitavasanakiccāni, paribhogajiṇṇānīti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pubbe…pe… laddhanāmānī’’^eb^ti, saññāpubbako vidhi aniccoti ^b^‘‘gahapatānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ yathā ‘‘vīriya’’nti.

[03]^b^Senāpati^eb^nti senāpatibhāvinaṃ, senāpaccārahanti attho. ^b^Attano kammenā^eb^ti attanā kātabbakammena. ^b^So^eb^ti satthā. ^b^Tasmi^eb^nti mahākassapatthere karotīti sambandho. ^b^Na karotī^eb^ti vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘kasmā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Yadi satthā dhutaṅgāni na vissajjāpetukāmo, atha kasmā ‘‘jiṇṇosi dāni tva’’ntiādimavocāti āha ^b^‘‘yathā panā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāra^eb^nti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve phāsuvihāraṃ. ^b^Amānusikā savanaratī^eb^ti atikkantamānusikāya araññasadduppattiyā araññehaṃ vasāmīti vivekavāsūpanissayādhīnasaddasavanapaccayā dhammarati uppajjati. ^b^Aparo^eb^ti añño, dutiyoti attho. ^b^Tatthevā^eb^ti tasmiṃyeva ekassa viharaṇaṭṭhāne viharaṇasamaye ca phāsu bhavati cittavivekasambhavato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekassa ramato vane’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Tathā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0141^ea^ yathā āraññikassa rati, tathā piṇḍapātikassa labbhati diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro. Esa nayo sesesu. Apiṇḍapātikādhīno itarassa visesajotakoti tamevassa visesaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘akālacārī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]Amhākaṃ salākaṃ gahetvā bhattatthāya gehaṃ anāgacchantassa sattāhaṃ na pātetabbanti sāmikehi dinnattā ^b^sattāhaṃ salākaṃ na labhati,^eb^ na katikavasena. Piṇḍacārikavatte avattanato ^b^‘‘yassa cesā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]Paṭhamataraṃ kātabbaṃ yaṃ, taṃ ^b^vattaṃ,^eb^ itaraṃ ^b^paṭivattaṃ^eb^. Mahantaṃ vā ^b^vattaṃ,^eb^ khuddakaṃ ^b^paṭivattaṃ^eb^. Keci ‘‘vattapaṭipatti’’nti paṭhanti, vattassa karaṇanti attho. Uddharaṇa-atiharaṇa-vītiharaṇavossajjana-sannikkhepana-sannirumbhanānaṃ ^a^M2.0161^ea^ vasena ^b^cha koṭṭhāse. Garubhāvenā^eb^ti thirabhāvena.

[03]‘‘Amukasmiṃ senāsane vasantā bahuṃ vassavāsikaṃ labhantī’’ti tathā ^b^na vassavāsikaṃ pariyesanto carati^eb^ vassavāsikasseva aggahaṇato. Tasmā senāsanaphāsukaṃyeva cinteti. ^b^Tena^eb^ bahuparikkhārabhāvena ^b^phāsuvihāro natthi^eb^ parikkhārānaṃ rakkhaṇapaṭijagganādidukkhabahulatāya. ^b^Appicchādīna^eb^nti appicchasantuṭṭhādīnaṃyeva labbhati diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro.
[06]Jiṇṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^149^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Attano ṭhāne^eb^ti sabrahmacārīnaṃ ovādakaviññāpakabhāvena attano mahāsāvakaṭṭhāne ṭhapanatthaṃ. Atha vā yasmā ‘‘ahaṃ dāni na ciraṃ ṭhassāmi, tathā sāriputtamoggallānā, ayaṃ pana vīsaṃvassatāyuko, ovadanto anusāsanto mamaccayena bhikkhūnaṃ mayā kātabbakiccaṃ karissatī’’ti adhippāyena bhagavā imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. Tasmā ^b^attano ṭhāne^eb^ti satthārā kātabbaovādadāyakaṭṭhāne. Tenāha ^b^‘‘evaṃ panassā’’^eb^tiādi. Yathāha bhagavā ‘‘ovada, kassapa…pe… tvaṃ vā’’ti. ^b^Dukkhena vattabbā^eb^ appadakkhiṇaggāhibhāvato. ^b^Dubbacabhāvakaraṇehī^eb^ti kodhūpanāhādīhi. Anusāsaniyā padakkhiṇaggahaṇaṃ nāma anudhammacaraṇaṃ, chinnapaṭipatti katā vāmaggāho nāmāti āha ^b^‘‘anusāsani’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Atikkamma vadante^eb^ti aññamaññaṃ atikkamitvā atimaññitvā vadante. ^b^Bahuṃ bhāsissatī^eb^ti dhammaṃ kathento ko vipulaṃ ^a^V2.0142^ea^ katvā kathessati. ^b^Asahita^eb^nti pubbenāparaṃ nasahitaṃ hetupamāvirahitaṃ. ^b^Amadhura^eb^nti na madhuraṃ na kaṇṇasukhaṃ na pemanīyaṃ. ^b^Lahuññeva uṭṭhāti^eb^ appavattanena kūlaṭṭhānaṃ viya tassa kathanaṃ.
[06]Ovādasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^150^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Okappanasaddhā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0162^ea^ saddheyyavatthuṃ ogāhitvā ‘‘evameta’’nti kappanasaddhā. ^b^Kusaladhammajānanapaññā^eb^ti anavajjadhammānaṃ sabbaso jānanapaññā. ^b^Parihāna^eb^nti sabbāhi sampattīhi parihānaṃ. Na hi kalyāṇamittarahitassa kāci sampatti nāma atthīti.
[06]Dutiyaovādasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^151^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pubbe^eb^ti paṭhamabodhiyaṃ. ^b^Etarahī^eb^ti tato pacchime kāle. ^b^Kāraṇapaṭṭhapane^eb^ti kāraṇārambhe. ^b^Tesu^eb^ vuttaguṇayuttesu ^b^theresu. Tasmi^eb^nti tasmiṃ yathāvuttaguṇayutte puggale. ^b^Evaṃ sakkāre kayiramāne^eb^ti ‘‘bhaddako vatāyaṃ bhikkhū’’ti ādarajātehi bhikkhūhi sakkāre kayiramāne. ^b^Ime^eb^ sabrahmacārī. ‘‘Ehi bhikkhū’’ti taṃ bhikkhuṃ attano mukhābhimukhaṃ karontā vadanti. ^b^Yañhi ta^eb^nti ettha ^b^ta^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ ^b^upaddavo^eb^ti vuccati anatthajananato. Patthayati bhajati bajjhatīti ^b^patthanā,^eb^ abhisaṅgoti āha ^b^‘‘abhipatthanāti adhimattapatthanā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Tatiyaovādasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^152^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yāvadevā^eb^ti iminā samānatthaṃ ‘‘yāvade’’ti idaṃ padanti āha ^b^‘‘yāvade ākaṅkhāmīti yāvadeva icchāmī’’^eb^ti. Yadicchakaṃ jhānasamāpattīsu vasībhāvadassanatthaṃ tadetaṃ āraddhaṃ. ^b^Vitthāritameva,^eb^ tasmā tattha vitthāritameva gahetabbanti adhippāyo. ^b^Āsavānaṃ khayā^eb^ti āsavānaṃ khayahetu ariyamaggena sabbaso āsavānaṃ khepitattā. ^b^Apaccayabhūta^eb^nti ārammaṇapaccayabhāvena apaccayabhūtaṃ.
[06]Jhānābhiññasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^153^eb^^b^.^eb^ Lābhasakkārahetupi ^a^V2.0143^ea^^a^M2.0163^ea^ ekacce bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā bhikkhuniyo ovadanti, evamevaṃ ayaṃ pana thero na lābhasakkārahetu bhikkhunupassayagamanaṃ yācati, atha kasmāti āha ^b^‘‘kammaṭṭhānatthikā’’^eb^tiādi. Eso hi ānandatthero ussukkāpetvā paṭipattiguṇaṃ dassento yasmā tā bhikkhuniyo catusaccakammaṭṭhānikā, tasmā pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ udayabbayādipakāsaniyā dhammakathāya vipassanāpaṭipattisampadaṃ dassesi. Aniccādilakkhaṇāni ceva udayabbayādike ca sammā dassesi. Hatthena gahetvā viya paccakkhato dassesi. ^b^Samādapesī^eb^ti tattha lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanaṃ samādapesi. Yathā vīthipaṭipanno hutvā pavattati, evaṃ ^b^gaṇhāpesi. Samuttejesī^eb^ti vipassanāya āraddhāya saṅkhārānaṃ udayabbayādīsu upaṭṭhahantesu yathākālaṃ paggahasamupekkhaṇehi bojjhaṅgānaṃ anupavattanena bhāvanāmajjhimavīthiṃ pāpetvā yathā vipassanāñāṇaṃ suppasannaṃ hutvā vahati, evaṃ indriyānaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇena vipassanācittaṃ sammā uttejesi, nibbānavasena vā samādapesi. ^b^Sampahaṃsesī^eb^ti tathā pavattiyamānāya vipassanāya samappavattabhāvanāvasena upari laddhabbabhāvanāvasena cittaṃ sampahaṃsesi, laddhassādavasena suṭṭhu tosesi. Evamettha attho veditabbo.

[03]Manute pariññādivasena saccāni bujjhatīti ^b^muni. Te^eb^ti taṃ. Upayogatthe hi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^Uttarī^eb^ti upari, tava yathābhūtasabhāvato paratoti attho. Pakkhapatito agatigamanaṃ ^b^atirekaokāso. Upaparikkhī^eb^ti anuvicca nivārako na bahumato. ^b^Buddhapaṭibhāgo^eb^ thero. ‘‘Bālā bhikkhunī dubbhāsitaṃ āhā’’ti avatvā ‘‘khamatha, bhante’’ti vadantena pakkhapātena viya vuttaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘ekā bhikkhunī na vāritā’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^Cutā^eb^ saliṅgato naṭṭhā, desantarapakkamena adassanaṃ na gatā. ^b^Kaṇṭakasākhā viyā^eb^ti kuraṇṭakāpāmaggakaṇṭakalasikāhi sākhā viya.
[06]Upassayasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^154^eb^^b^.^eb^ Rājagahassa ^a^M2.0164^ea^ dakkhiṇabhāge giri dakkhiṇāgiri ṇa-kāre a-kārassa dīghaṃ katvā, tassa dakkhiṇabhāge janapadopi ^b^‘‘dakkhiṇāgirī’’^eb^ti vuccati, ‘‘girito dakkhiṇabhāgo’’ti ^a^V2.0144^ea^ katvā. ^b^Ekadivasenā^eb^ti ekena divasena uppabbājesuṃ tesaṃ saddhāpabbajitābhāvato.

[03]Yattha cattāro vā uttari vā bhikkhū akappiyanimantanaṃ sādiyitvā pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhojanaṃ ekato paṭiggaṇhitvā bhuñjanti, etaṃ gaṇabhojanaṃ nāma, taṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti ^b^‘‘tikabhojanaṃ paññatta’’^eb^nti vacanena gaṇabhojanaṃ paṭikkhittanti vuttaṃ hoti. Tayo atthavase paṭicca anuññātattāpi ^b^‘‘tikabhojana’’^eb^nti vadanti.

[03]‘‘Dummaṅkūnaṃ niggaho eva pesalānaṃ phāsuvihāro’’ti idaṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘dummaṅkūnaṃ niggahenevā’’^eb^tiādi. ‘‘Yathā devadatto…pe… saṅghaṃ bhindeyyu’’nti ^b^iminā kāraṇena^eb^ tikabhojanaṃ paññattaṃ.

[03]^b^Atha kiñcarahī^eb^ti atha kasmā tvaṃ asampannagaṇaṃ bandhitvā carasīti adhippāyo. Asampannāya parisāya cārikācaraṇaṃ kulānuddayāya na hoti, kulānaṃ ghātitattāti adhippāyena thero ^b^‘‘sassaghātaṃ maññe carasī’’^eb^tiādimavoca.

[03]^b^Sodhento^eb^ tassā ativiya parisuddhabhāvadassanena. ^b^Uddisituṃ na jānāmi^eb^ tathā cittasseva anuppannapubbattā. ^b^Kiñcanaṃ^eb^ kilesavatthu. Saṅgahetabbakhettavatthu ^b^palibodho,^eb^ ālayo apekkhā. ^b^Okāsābhāvato^eb^ti bahukiccakaraṇīyatāya kusalakiriyāya okāsābhāvato. ^b^Sannipātaṭṭhānato^eb^ti saṅketaṃ katvā viya kilesarajānaṃ tattha sannijjhapavattanato.

[03]^b^Sikkhattayabrahmacariya^eb^nti adhisīlasikkhādisikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ cariyaṃ. Khaṇḍādibhāvāpādanena ^b^akhaṇḍaṃ katvā^eb^. Lakkhaṇavacanañhetaṃ. Kiñci sikkhekadesaṃ asesetvā ekanteneva paripūretabbatāya ^b^ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ^eb^. Cittuppādamattampi saṃkilesamalaṃ anuppādetvā accantameva visuddhaṃ katvā pariharitabbatāya ^b^ekantaparisuddhaṃ^eb^. Tato eva saṅkhaṃ viya likhitanti ^b^saṅkhalikhitaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘likhitasaṅkhasadisa’’^eb^nti. Dāṭhikāpi taggahaṇeneva gahetvā ^a^M2.0165^ea^ ‘‘massu’’tveva vuttaṃ, na ettha kevalaṃ massuyevāti attho. Kasāyena rattāni ^b^kāsāyāni^eb^.

[03]^b^Vaṅgasāṭako^eb^ti vaṅgadese uppannasāṭako. ^b^Esā^eb^ti mahākassapatthero. ^b^Abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya^eb^ paṇidhānato pabhuti, ayaṃ idāni vuccamānā. Aggasāvakadvayaṃ upādāya tatiyattā ^b^‘‘tatiyasāvaka’’^eb^nti ^a^V2.0145^ea^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassa^eb^nti bhikkhūnaṃ satasahassañceva saṭṭhisahassāni ca aṭṭha ca sahassāni.
[03]^b^Ayañca ayañca guṇo^eb^ti sīlato paṭṭhāya yāva aggaphalā guṇoti kittento mahāsamuddaṃ pūrayamāno viya kathesi.
[03]^b^Kolāhala^eb^nti devatāhi nibbattito kolāhalo.

[03]Khuddakādivasena ^b^pañcavaṇṇā. Taraṇaṃ vā hotu maraṇaṃ vā^eb^ti mahoghaṃ ogāhanto puriso viya maccherasamuddaṃ uttaranto ^b^pacchāpi…pe… pādamūle ṭhapesi^eb^ bhagavato dhammadesanāya maccherapahānassa kathitattā.
[03]Satthu guṇā kathitā nāma hontīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘satthu guṇe kathentassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tato paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti tadā satthu sammukhā dhammassavanato paṭṭhāya.
[03]^b^Tathāgatamañcassā^eb^ti tathāgatassa paribhogamañcassa. ^b^Dānaṃ datvā^eb^ brāhmaṇassa ^b^purohitaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Tādisasseva^eb^ seṭṭhino ^b^dhītā hutvā^eb^.

[03]^b^Adinnavipākassā^eb^ti pubbe katūpacitassa sabbaso na dinnavipākassa. ^b^Tassa kammassā^eb^ti tassa paccekabuddhassa patte piṇḍapātaṃ chinditvā kalalapūraṇakammassa. Tasmiṃyeva attabhāve ^b^sattasu ṭhānesu^eb^ duggandhasarīratāya ^b^paṭinivattitā. Iṭṭhakapantī^eb^ti suvaṇṇiṭṭhakapanti. ^b^Ghaṭaniṭṭhakāyā^eb^ti tassa pantiyaṃ paṭhamaṃ ṭhapitaiṭṭhakāya saddhiṃ ghaṭetabbaiṭṭhakāya ūnā hoti. ^b^Bhaddake kāle^eb^ti īdisiyā iṭṭhakāya icchitakāleyeva āgatāsi. ^b^Tena bandhanenā^eb^ti tena silesasambandhena.

[03]^b^Olambakā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0166^ea^ muttāmaṇimayā olambakā. ^b^Puñña^eb^nti natthi no puññaṃ taṃ, yaṃ nimittaṃ yaṃ kāraṇā ito sukhumatarassa paṭilābho siyāti attho. ^b^Puññaniyāmenā^eb^ti puññānubhāvasiddhena niyāmena. So ca ^b^assa^eb^ bārāṇasirajjaṃ dātuṃ katokāso.

[03]^b^Phussaratha^eb^nti maṅgalarathaṃ. Uṇhīsaṃ vālabījanī khaggo maṇipādukā setacchattanti ^b^pañcavidhaṃ rājakakudhabhaṇḍaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0146^ea^. Setacchattaṃ visuṃ gahitaṃ. Dibbavatthaṃ sādiyituṃ puññānubhāvacodito ‘‘nanu tātā thūla’’ntiādimāha.
[03]^b^Pañca caṅkamanasatānī^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddena ādiatthena aggisālādīni pabbajitasāruppaṭṭhānāni saṅgaṇhāti.
[03]^b^Sādhukīḷita^eb^nti ariyānaṃ parinibbutaṭṭhāne kātabbasakkāraṃ vadati.

[03]^b^Nappamajji nirogā ayyā^eb^ti pucchitākāradassanaṃ. ^b^Parinibbutā devā^eb^ti devī paṭivacanaṃ adāsi. ^b^Paṭiyādetvā^eb^ti niyyātetvā. ^b^Samaṇakapabbajja^eb^nti samitapāpehi ariyehi anuṭṭhātabbapabbajjaṃ. So hi rājā paccekabuddhānaṃ vesassa diṭṭhattā ‘‘idameva bhaddaka’’nti tādisaṃyeva liṅgaṃ gaṇhi.

[03]^b^Tatthevā^eb^ti brahmalokeyeva. Vīsatime vasse sampatteti āharitvā sambandho. Brahmalokato āgantvā nibbattattā brahmacariyādhikārassa cirakālaṃ saṅgahitattā ^b^‘‘evarūpaṃ kathaṃ mā kathethā’’^eb^tiādimāha.
[03]Vīsati dharaṇāni ‘‘nikkha’’nti vadanti. Alabhanto na vasāmīti saññāpessāmīti sambandho.

[03]^b^Itthākaro^eb^ti itthiratanassa uppattiṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Ayyadhītā^eb^ti amhākaṃ ayyassa dhītā, bhaddakāpilānīti attho. Pasādarūpena nibbisiṭṭhatāya ‘‘mahāgīva’’nti paṭimāya sadisabhāvamāha. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ayyadhītāyā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Samānapaṇṇa^eb^nti sadisapaṇṇaṃ, kumārassa kumāriyā ca vuttantapaṇṇaṃ. ^b^Ito ca etto cā^eb^ti te purisā samāgamaṭṭhānato magadharaṭṭhe mahātitthagāmaṃ ^a^M2.0167^ea^ maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagarañca uddissa pakkamantā aññamaññaṃ vissajjentā nāma hontīti ‘‘ito ca etto ca pesesu’’nti vuttā.

[03]^b^Pupphadāma^eb^nti hatthihatthappamāṇaṃ pupphadāmaṃ. ^b^Tāni^eb^ pupphadāmāni. ^b^Te^eb^ti ubho bhaddā ceva pippalikumāro ca. ^b^Lokāmisenā^eb^ti gehassitapemena, kāmassādenāti attho. ^b^Asaṃsaṭṭhā^eb^ti na saṃsaṭṭhā ^a^V2.0147^ea^. Vicārayiṃsu ghaṭe jalantena viya padīpena ajjhāsayena samujjalantena vimokkhabījena samussāhitacittā. ^b^Yantabaddhānī^eb^ti sassasampādanatthaṃ tattha tattha iṭṭhakadvārakavāṭayojanavasena yantabaddhaudakanikkhamanatumbāni. ^b^Kammanto^eb^ti kasikammakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Dāsagāmā^eb^ti dāsānaṃ vasanagāmā.

[03]^b^Osāpetvā^eb^ti pakkhipitvā. ^b^Ākappakuttavasenā^eb^ti ākāravasena kiriyāvasena ca. ^b^Ananucchavika^eb^nti pabbajitavesassa ananurūpaṃ. ^b^Tassa matthake^eb^ti dvedhāpathassa dvidhābhūtaṭṭhāne.

[03]Etesaṃ saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti nisīdīti sambandho. Sā pana satthu tattha nisajjā edisīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘nisīdanto panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yā buddhānaṃ aparimitakālasaṅgahitā acinteyyāparimeyyapuññasambhārūpacayanibbattā nirūpitasabhāvabuddhaguṇavijjotitā lakkhaṇānubyañjanasamujjalā byāmappabhāketumālālaṅkatā sabhāvasiddhatāya akittimā rūpakāyasirī, taṃyeva mahākassapassa adiṭṭhapubbaṃ pasādasaṃvaḍḍhanatthaṃ aniggahetvā nisinno bhagavā ‘‘buddhavesaṃ gahetvā…pe… nisīdī’’ti vutto. Asītihatthaṃ padesaṃ byāpetvā pavattiyā ‘‘asītihatthā’’ti vuttā. ^b^Satasākho^eb^ti bahusākho anekasākho. ^b^Suvaṇṇavaṇṇo ahosi^eb^ nirantaraṃ buddharasmīhi samantato samokiṇṇattā. ^b^Evaṃ^eb^ vuttappakārena ^b^veditabbā^eb^.

[03]^b^Rājagahaṃ nāḷanda^eb^nti ca sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṃ antarāsaddayogatoti āha ^b^‘‘rājagahassa nāḷandāya cā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Na hi me ito aññena satthārā bhavituṃ sakkā^eb^ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi sattānaṃ yathārahaṃ anusāsanasamatthassa aññassa sadevake abhāvato. ^b^Na hi me ito aññena sugatena bhavituṃ sakkā^eb^ sobhanagamanaguṇagaṇayuttassa aññassa abhāvato. ^b^Na hi me ito aññena sammāsambuddhena bhavituṃ sakkā^eb^ sammā sabbadhammānaṃ sayambhuñāṇena abhisambuddhassa abhāvato. ^b^Iminā^eb^ti ‘‘satthā me, bhante’’ti iminā vacanena.

[03]^b^Ajānamānova^eb^^a^M2.0168^ea^ sabbaññeyyanti adhippāyo. ^b^Sabbacetasā^eb^ti sabbājjhattikaṅgaparipuṇṇacetasā. ^b^Samannāgata^eb^nti sampannaṃ sammadeva anu anu āgataṃ upagataṃ. ^b^Phaleyyā^eb^ti vidāleyya. ^b^Vilaya^eb^nti vināsaṃ.

[03]^b^Evaṃ sikkhitabba^eb^nti idāni vuccamānākārena. Hirottappassa bahalatā nāma vipulatāti āha ^b^‘‘mahanta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Paṭhamataramevā^eb^ti pageva upasaṅkamanato. Tathā atimānapahīno assa, hiriottappaṃ ^a^V2.0148^ea^ yathā saṇṭhāti. ^b^Kusalasannissita^eb^nti anavajjadhammanissitaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhika^eb^nti tena dhammena aṭṭhikaṃ. Ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā savanacittaṃ ‘‘sabbaceto’’ti adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘cittassa thokampi bahi gantuṃ adento’’^eb^ti. Tena samodhānaṃ dasseti. ^b^Sabbena…pe… samannāharitvā^eb^ ārambhato pabhuti yāva desanā nipphannā, tāva antarantarā pavattena sabbena samannāhāracittena dhammaṃyeva samannāharitvā. ^b^Ṭhapitasoto^eb^ti dhamme nihitasoto. ^b^Odahitvā^eb^ti apihitaṃ katvā. ^b^Paṭhamajjhānavasenā^eb^ti idaṃ asubhesu tasseva ijjhato, itaratthañca sukhasampayuttatā vuttā.

[03]Saṃsārasāgare paribbhamantassa iṇaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhanti kilesā āsavasabhāvāpādanatoti āha ^b^‘‘saraṇoti sakileso’’^eb^ti. ^b^Cattāro hi paribhogā^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ visuddhimaggattaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāsu vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Ettha ca bhagavā paṭhamaṃ ovādaṃ therassa brāhmaṇajātikattā jātimānapahānatthamabhāsi, dutiyaṃ bāhusaccaṃ nissāya uppajjanakāhaṃkārapahānatthaṃ, tatiyaṃ upadhisampattiṃ nissāya uppajjanakāttasinehapahānatthaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhame divase^eb^ti bhagavatā samāgatadivasato aṭṭhame divase.

[03]^b^Maggato okkamanaṃ paṭhamataraṃ^eb^ bhagavatā samāgatadivaseyeva ahosi. Yadi arahattādhigamo pacchā, atha kasmā pāḷiyaṃ pageva siddhaṃ viya vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘desanāvārassā’’^eb^tiādi. ‘‘Sattāhameva khvāhaṃ, āvuso saraṇo, raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ bhuñji’’nti vatvā avasarappattaṃ arahattaṃ pavedento ‘‘aṭṭhamiyā aññā udapādī’’ti āha. Ayamettha desanāvārassa āgamo. Tato paraṃ bhagavatā attano kataṃ anuggahaṃ cīvaraparivattanaṃ dassento ‘‘atha kho, āvuso’’tiādimāha.

[03]^b^Antantenā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0169^ea^ catugguṇaṃ katvā paññattāya saṅghāṭiyā antantena. ^b^Jātipaṃsukūlikena…pe… bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī^eb^ti etena pubbe jātiāraññakaggahaṇena ca terasa dhutaṅgā gahitā evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Anucchavikaṃ kātu^eb^nti anurūpaṃ paṭipattiṃ paṭipajjituṃ. Thero pārupīti sambandho.

[03]Bhagavato ovādaṃ bhagavato vā dhammakāyaṃ nissāya urassa vasena jātoti ^b^oraso^eb^. Bhagavato vā dhammasarīrassa mukhato sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyato jāto. Teneva dhammajātadhammanimmitabhāvopi saṃvaṇṇitoti daṭṭhabbo. Ovādadhammo eva satthārā dātabbato therena ādātabbato ^a^V2.0149^ea^^b^ovādadhammadāyādo,^eb^ ovādadhammadāyajjoti attho, taṃ arahatīti. Esa nayo sesapadesupi.

[03]‘‘Pabbajjā ca parisodhitā’’ti vatvā tassā sammadeva sodhitabhāvaṃ byatirekamukhena dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘āvuso, yassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^eva^eb^nti yathā ahaṃ labhiṃ, evaṃ so satthu santikā labhatīti yojanā. ^b^Sīhanādaṃ naditu^eb^nti etthāpi sīhanādanadanā nāma desanāva, thero satthārā attano katānuggahameva anantarasutte vuttanayena ulliṅgeti, na aññathā. Na hi mahāthero kevalaṃ attano guṇānubhāvaṃ vibhāveti. ^b^Sesa^eb^nti yaṃ idha asaṃvaṇṇitaṃ. ^b^Purimanayenevā^eb^ti anantarasutte vuttanayeneva.
[06]Cīvarasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^155^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yathā atītakappe atītāsu jātīsu kammakilesavasena āgato, tathā etarahipi āgatoti ^b^tathāgato,^eb^ yathā yathā vā pana kammaṃ katūpacitaṃ, tathā taṃ taṃ attabhāvaṃ āgato upagato upapannoti ^b^tathāgato,^eb^ sattoti āha ^b^‘‘tathāgatoti satto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Eta^eb^nti ‘‘evaṃ hoti bhavati tiṭṭhati sassatisama’’nti evaṃ pavattaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ. ^b^Atthasannissitaṃ na hotī^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthato sukhanti pasatthasannissitaṃ na hoti. ^b^Ādibrahmacariyaka^eb^nti ettha maggabrahmacariyaṃ adhippetaṃ tassa padhānabhāvato. Tassa pana etaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ ādipaṭipadāmattaṃ ^a^M2.0170^ea^ na hoti anupakārakattā vilomanato ca. Tato eva itarabrahmacariyassapi anissayova. Sesaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
[06]Paraṃmaraṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^156^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ājānāti heṭṭhimamaggehi ñātamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvāva jānāti paṭivijjhatīti ^b^aññā,^eb^ aggamaggapaññā. Aññassa ayanti ^b^aññā,^eb^ arahattaphalaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘arahatte’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Obhāse^eb^ti obhāsanimittaṃ. ‘‘Cittaṃ vikampatī’’ti padadvayaṃ ānetvā sambandho. ^b^Obhāse^eb^ti ^a^V2.0150^ea^ visayabhūte. Upakkilesehi cittaṃ vikampatīti yojanā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yehi cittaṃ pavedhatī’’^eb^ti. Sesesupi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Upaṭṭhāne^eb^ti satiyaṃ. ^b^Upekkhāya cā^eb^ti vipassanupekkhāya ca. Ettha ca vipassanācittasamuṭṭhānasantānavinimuttaṃ pabhāsanaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ ^b^obhāso. Ñāṇā^eb^dayo vipassanācittasampayuttāva. Sakasakakicce saviseso hutvā pavatto ^b^adhimokkho^eb^ saddhādhimokkho. ^b^Upaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ sati. ^b^Upekkhā^eb^ti āvajjanupekkhā. Sā hi āvajjanacittasampayuttā cetanā. Āvajjanājjhupekkhanavasena pavattiyā idha ‘‘āvajjanupekkhā’’ti vuccati. Puna ^b^upekkhāyā^eb^ti vipassanupekkhāva anena samajjhattatāya evaṃ vuttā. ^b^Nikanti^eb^ nāma vipassanāya nikāmanā apekkhā. Sukhumatarakileso vā siyā duviññeyyo.

[03]^b^Imāni dasa ṭhānānī^eb^ti imāni obhāsādīni upakkilesuppattiyā ṭhānāni upakkilesavatthūni. ^b^Paññā yassa paricitā^eb^ti yassa paññā paricitavatī yāthāvato jānāti. ‘‘Imāni nissāya addhā maggappatto phalappatto aha’’nti pavattādhimāno ^b^dhammuddhaccaṃ^eb^ dhammūpanissayo vikkhepo. Tattha kusalo hi taṃ yāthāvato jānanto ^b^na ca^eb^ tattha ^b^sammohaṃ gacchati^eb^.

[03]^b^Adhigamasaddhammappatirūpakaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0171^ea^^b^nāma^eb^ anadhigate adhigatamānibhāvāvahattā. Yadaggena vipassanāñāṇassa upakkileso, tadaggena paṭipattisaddhammappatirūpakotipi sakkā viññātuṃ. ^b^Dhātukathā^eb^ti mahādhātukathaṃ vadati. ^b^Vedallapiṭaka^eb^nti vetullapiṭakaṃ. Taṃ nāgabhavanato ānītanti vadanti. Vādabhāsitanti apare. ^b^Abuddhavacanaṃ^eb^ buddhavacanena virujjhanato. Na hi sambuddho pubbāparaviruddhaṃ vadati. Tattha sallaṃ upaṭṭhapenti kilesavinayaṃ na sandissati, aññadatthu kilesuppattiyā paccayo hotīti.
[03]^b^Avikkayamāna^eb^nti vikkayaṃ agacchantaṃ. ^b^Ta^eb^nti suvaṇṇabhaṇḍaṃ.
[03]^b^Na sakkhiṃsu^eb^ ñāṇassa avisadabhāvato. Esa nayo ito paresupi.

[03]Idāni ‘‘bhikkhū paṭisambhidāppattā ahesu’’ntiādinā vuttameva atthaṃ kāraṇato vibhāvetuṃ puna ^b^‘‘paṭhamabodhiyaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^paṭipattiṃ pūrayiṃsū^eb^ti atīte kadā te paṭisambhidāvahaṃ ^a^V2.0151^ea^ paṭipattiṃ pūrayiṃsu? Paṭhamabodhikālikā bhikkhū. Na hi attasammāpaṇidhiyā pubbekatapuññatāya ca vinā tādisaṃ bhavati. Esa nayo ito paresupi. ^b^Tadā paṭipattisaddhammo antarahito nāma bhavissatī^eb^ti etena ariyamaggena āsannā eva pubbabhāgapaṭipadā paṭipattisaddhammoti dasseti.

[03]^b^Dvīsū^eb^ti suttābhidhammapiṭakesu antarahitesupi. ^b^Anantarahitameva^eb^ adhisīlasikkhāyaṃ ṭhitassa itarasikkhādvayasamuṭṭhāpitato. ^b^Kiṃ kāraṇā^eb^ti kena kāraṇena, aññasmiṃ dhamme antarahite aññatarassa dhammassa anantaradhānaṃ vuccatīti adhippāyo. ^b^Paṭipattiyā paccayo hoti^eb^ anavasesato paṭipattikkamassa paridīpanato. ^b^Paṭipatti adhigamassa^eb^ paccayo visesalakkhaṇapaṭivedhabhāvato. ^b^Pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṃ^eb^ sāsanassa ṭhitiyāti adhippāyo.

[03]Nanu ca sāsanaṃ osakkitaṃ pariyattiyā vattamānāyāti adhippāyo. ^b^Anārādhakabhikkhū^eb^ti sīlamattassapi na ārādhako dussīlo. ^b^Imasmi^eb^nti imasmiṃ pātimokkhe. ^b^Vattantā^eb^ti ‘‘sīlaṃ akopetvā ṭhitā atthī’’ti pucchi.

[03]^b^Etesū^eb^ti ^a^M2.0172^ea^ evaṃ mahantesu sakalaṃ lokaṃ ajjhottharituṃ samatthesu catūsu mahābhūtesu. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā aññena kenaci atimahantenapi saddhammo na antaradhāyati, samayantarena pana vattabbameva natthi, tasmā. ^b^Evamāhā^eb^ti idāni vuccamānākāraṃ vadati.
