[03]Ādānaṃ ādi, ādi eva ^b^ādika^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘ādikenāti ādānenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Heṭṭhāgamanīyā^eb^ti adhobhāgagamanīyā, apāyadukkhassa saṃsāradukkhassa ca nibbattakāti attho. ^b^Gāravarahitā^eb^ti garukārarahitā. Patissayanaṃ nīcabhāvena patibaddhavuttitā, patisso patissayoti atthato ekaṃ, so etesaṃ natthīti āha ^b^‘‘appatissāti appatissayā anīcavuttikā’’^eb^ti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Saddhammappatirūpakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sāratthappakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Kassapasaṃyuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^157^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Thaddho^eb^ti ^a^V2.0152^ea^^a^M2.0173^ea^ kakkhaḷo aniṭṭhassa padānato. ^b^Catupaccayalābho^eb^ti catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ paṭilābho. ^b^Sakkāro^eb^ti tehiyeva paccayehi susaṅkhatehi pūjanā, so pana atthato sampattiyevāti āha ^b^‘‘tesaṃyeva…pe… lābho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vaṇṇaghoso^eb^ti guṇakittanā. Antarāyassa anativattanato ^b^antarāyiko^eb^ anatthāvahattā.
[06]Dāruṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^158^eb^^b^.^eb^ Baḷisena carati, tena vā jīvatīti ^b^bāḷisiko^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘baḷisaṃ gahetvā caramāno’’^eb^ti. ^b^Āmisagata^eb^nti āmisūpagataṃ āmisapatitaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘āmisamakkhita’’^eb^nti. Bhinnādhikaraṇānampi bāhiratthasamāso hotevāti āha ^b^‘‘āmise cakkhudassana’’^eb^nti. Ayo vuccati sukhaṃ, tabbidhuratāya ^b^anayo,^eb^ dukkhanti āha ^b^‘‘dukkhaṃ patto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Assā^eb^ti etena. Kattuatthe hi etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Yathā kilesā vattanti, evaṃ pavattamāno puggalo kilesavippayogo na hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yathā kilesamārassa kāmo, evaṃ kattabbo’’^eb^ti.
[06]Baḷisasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^159-160^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhikacchapā vuccanti yesaṃ kapālamatthake tikhiṇā aṭṭhikoṭi hoti, tesaṃ samūho ^b^aṭṭhikacchapakulaṃ^eb^. Macchakacchapādīnaṃ sarīre lambantī papatatīti ^b^papatā,^eb^ vuccamānākāro ^a^V2.0153^ea^ ayakaṇṭako. ^b^Ayakosake^eb^ti ^a^M2.0174^ea^ ayomayakosake. ^b^Kaṇṇikasallasaṇṭhāno^eb^ti attanikāpanasallasaṇṭhāno. ^b^Ayakaṇṭako^eb^ti ayomayavaṅkakaṇṭako. ^b^Nikkhamati^eb^ ettha athāvarato. Pavesitamatto hi so. ^b^Idāni tvaṃ^eb^ ‘‘amhāka’’nti na vattabbo. ^b^Ito anantarasutte^eb^ti catutthasuttamāha.
[06]Kummasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^161^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mīḷhakā^eb^ti evaṃ itthiliṅgavasena vuccamānā. ^b^Gūthapāṇakā^eb^ti gūthabhakkhapāṇakā. ^b^Anto^eb^ti kucchiyaṃ.
[06]Mīḷhakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^162^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Ime lābhasakkāraṃ anāharantā jighacchādidukkhaṃ pāpuṇantū’’ti evaṃ na sattānaṃ dukkhakāmatāya evamāhāti ānetvā sambandho. ^b^Anantadukkhaṃ anubhoti^eb^ aparāparaṃ uppajjanakākusalacittānaṃ bahubhāvato.
[06]Asanisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^163^eb^^b^.^eb^ Acchavisayuttāti vā diddhe gatena ^b^gatadiddhena^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘visamakkhitenā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Diddhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^164^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Jarasiṅgālo^eb^tveva ^a^M2.0175^ea^ vuccati sarīrasobhāya abhāvato. Sarīrassa uggatakaṇṭakattā ^b^ukkaṇṭakena nāma. Phuṭatī^eb^ti phalati bhijjati.
[06]Siṅgālasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^165^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kāyaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0154^ea^^b^na rakkhati nāma^eb^ chabbīsatiyā sāruppānaṃ pariccajanato. ^b^Vācaṃ na rakkhati nāma^eb^ rāgasāmantā ca kodhasāmantā ca yāva nicchāraṇato.
[06]Verambhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^166^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Yassa sakkariyamānassā’’^eb^ti ettha ^b^asakkārena cūbhaya^eb^nti asakkārena ca ubhayañca, kadāci sakkārena, kadāci asakkārena kadāci ubhayenāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘asakkārenā’’^eb^tiādi. Satatavihārānaṃ sampattiyā ^b^sātatiko^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘arahatta…pe… sukhumadiṭṭhī’’^eb^tiādi. Tathā hi sā ‘‘vajirūpamañāṇa’’nti vuccati. ^b^Āgatattā^eb^ti phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjituṃ tassā pubbaparikammaṃ upagatattā.
[06]Sagāthakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Paṭhamavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^167-168^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cāletuṃ na sakkoti^eb^ sīlapabbatasannissitattā. ^b^Aññaṃ vā kiccaṃ karoti^eb^ pageva sīlassa chaḍḍitattā. Tatiyādīsu apubbaṃ natthi.
[06]Suvaṇṇapātisuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Dutiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^170^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yaṃ ^a^V2.0155^ea^^a^M2.0176^ea^ visabhāgavatthu purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhātuṃ sakkotīti vuccati, tato visesato lābhasakkārova sattānaṃ cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhātuṃ sakkotīti dassento bhagavā ‘‘na tassa, bhikkhave’’tiādimavocāti dassento ^b^‘‘na tassā’’^eb^tiādimāha.
[06]Mātugāmasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^171^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dutiyaṃ uttānameva,^eb^ tasseva atthassa kevalaṃ janapadakalyāṇīvasena vuttaṃ.
[06]Kalyāṇīsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^172-175^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Saddhā^eb^ti ariyamaggena āgatasaddhā adhippetāti āha ^b^‘‘sotāpannā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Ekaputtakasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^176^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Evamādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena bāhusaccasaṃvarasīlādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Lābhasakkārassa samudayaṃ^eb^ uppattikāraṇaṃ samudayasaccavasena dukkhasaccassa uppattihetutāvasena.
[06]Tatiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^177^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Lābhasakkārasiloko^eb^^a^V2.0156^ea^^a^M2.0177^ea^^b^narakādīsu nibbattento^eb^ti idaṃ tannissayaṃ kilesagaṇaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^Nibbattento^eb^ti nibbattāpento. ^b^Imaṃ^eb^ manussa^b^attabhāvaṃ nāseti^eb^ manussattaṃ puna nibbattituṃ appadānavasena. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti duggatinibbattāpanato idha maraṇadukkhāvahanato ca.
[06]Chavisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^178^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kharā pharusā^eb^ chaviādīni chindane samatthā.
[06]Rajjusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^179^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Taṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārassa okāsābhāvaṃ sandhāya.
[06]Bhikkhusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Tatiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^180-183^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Devadatto sagge vā nibbatteyyā^eb^tiādi parikappavacanaṃ. Na hi paccekabodhiyaṃ niyatagatiko antarā maggaphalāni adhigantuṃ bhabboti. ^b^So^eb^ti anavajjadhammo. ^b^Assā^eb^ti devadattassa. ^b^Samucchedamagamā^eb^ katūpacitassa mahato pāpadhammassa balena tasmiṃ attabhāve samucchedabhāvato, na accantāya. Akusalaṃ nāmetaṃ abalaṃ, kusalaṃ viya na mahābalaṃ, tasmā tasmiṃyeva attabhāve tādisānaṃ puggalānaṃ atekicchatā, aññathā sammattaniyāmo viya micchattaniyāmo accantiko ^a^M2.0178^ea^ siyā. Yadi evaṃ vaṭṭakhāṇukajotanā kathanti? Āsevanāvasena, tasmā ^a^V2.0157^ea^ yathā ‘‘sakiṃ nimuggo nimuggo eva bālo’’ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ vaṭṭakhāṇukajotanā. Yādise hi paccaye paṭicca puggalo taṃ dassanaṃ gaṇhi, tathā ca paṭipanno, puna acintappativatte paccaye patitato sīsukkhipanamassa na hotīti na vattabbaṃ.
[06]Bhindisuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^184^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kāle sampatte^eb^ti gabbhassa paripākagatattā vijāyanakāle sampatte. ^b^Pota^eb^nti assatariyā puttaṃ. ^b^Eta^eb^nti ‘‘gabbho assatariṃ yathā’’ti etaṃ vacanaṃ.
[06]Acirapakkantasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^185^eb^^b^.^eb^ Abhiharīyatīti abhihāro, bhattaṃyeva abhihāro ^b^bhattābhihāro^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘abhiharitabbaṃ bhatta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Macchapitta^eb^nti vāḷamacchapittaṃ. ^b^Pakkhipeyyu^eb^nti uragādinā osiñceyyuṃ.
[06]Pañcarathasatasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^186-187^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mātupi hetū^eb^ti attano mātuyā uppannānatthāvahassa pahānahetupi. ^b^Ito paresū^eb^ti ‘‘pitupi hetū’’ti evamādīsu.
[06]Mātusuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sāratthappakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Lābhasakkārasaṃyuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^188-195^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekavihārī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0158^ea^^a^M2.0179^ea^ catūsupi iriyāpathesu ekākī hutvā viharanto. ^b^Vivekaṭṭho^eb^ti vivittaṭṭho, tenāha ^b^‘‘nissaddo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Satiyā avippavasanto^eb^ti satiyā avippavāsena ṭhito, sabbadā avijahanavasena pavatto. ^b^Ātāpīti vīriyasampanno^eb^ti sabbaso kilesānaṃ ātāpanaparitāpanavasena pavattavīriyasamaṅgībhūto. ^b^Pahitatto^eb^ti tasmiṃ visesādhigame pesitacitto, tattha ninno tappabbhāroti attho. ^b^Hutvā abhāvākārenā^eb^ti uppattito pubbe avijjamāno paccayasamavāyena hutvā uppajjitvā bhaṅguparamasaṅkhātena abhāvākārena. ^b^Anicca^eb^nti niccadhuvatābhāvato. ^b^Uppādavayavantatāyā^eb^ti khaṇe khaṇe uppajjitvā nirujjhanato. ^b^Tāvakālikatāyā^eb^ti taṅkhaṇikatāya. ^b^Vipariṇāmakoṭiyā^eb^ti vipariṇāmavantatāya. Cakkhuñhi upādāya vikārāpajjanena vipariṇamantaṃ vināsaṃ paṭipīḷaṃ pāpuṇāti. ^b^Niccapaṭikkhepato^eb^ti niccatāya paṭikkhipitabbato lesamattassapi anupalabbhanato. ^b^Dukkhamanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti nirantaradukkhatāya dukkhena khamitabbato. ^b^Dukkhavatthukaṭṭhenā^eb^ti nānappakāradukkhādhiṭṭhānato. ^b^Satatasampīḷanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti abhiṇhatāpasabhāvato. ^b^Sukhapaṭikkhepenā^eb^ti sukhabhāvassa paṭikkhipitabbato. ^b^Taṇhāgāho^eb^ mamaṃkārabhāvato. ^b^Mānagāho^eb^ ahaṃkārabhāvato. ^b^Diṭṭhigāho^eb^ ‘‘attā me’’ti vipallāsabhāvato. ^b^Virāgavasenā^eb^ti virāgaggahaṇena. Tathā ^b^vimuttivasenā^eb^ti vimuttiggahaṇena.
[03]^b^Pasādāva gahitā^eb^ dvārabhāvappattassa adhippetattā. ^b^Sammasanacāracittaṃ^eb^ dvārabhūtamanoti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Chaṭṭhe^eb^ ārammaṇe ^b^tebhūmakadhammā^eb^ sammasanacārassa adhippetattā. Yathā paṭhamasutte pañca pasādā gahitā, na sasambhāracakkhuādayo, evaṃ ^a^M2.0180^ea^ tatiyasutte na pasādavatthukacittameva gahitaṃ. Na ^a^V2.0159^ea^ taṃsampayuttā dhammā. Evañhi avadhāraṇaṃ sātthakaṃ hoti aññathā tena apanetabbassa abhāvato. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbesu catutthasuttādīsu. ^b^Javanappattā^eb^ti javanacittasaṃyuttā.
[06]Cakkhusuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^196^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ākāsadhātu rūpaparicchedatāya rūpapariyāpannanti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘sesāhi rūpa’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Nāmarūpa^eb^nti tebhūmakaṃ nāmaṃ rūpañca kathitaṃ.
[06]Dhātusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^197^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sabbasaṅgāhikaparicchedenā^eb^ti dhammasaṅgaṇhanapariyāyena. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sutte. ^b^Tebhūmakāti gahetabbā^eb^ sammasanacārassa adhippetattā.
[06]Khandhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Paṭhamavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^200^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiyavagge ^b^attano^eb^ti āyasmā rāhulo attano saviññāṇakaṃ kāyaṃ dasseti. ^b^Parassā^eb^ti parassa aviññāṇakakāyaṃ dasseti. Parasantāne vā arūpe dhamme aggahetvā rūpakāyameva gaṇhanto vadati. Apare ‘‘asaññasattānaṃ attabhāvaṃ sandhāya tathā vutta’’nti vadanti. ^b^Purimenā^eb^ti ‘‘imasmiṃ saviññāṇake kāye’’ti iminā padena. ^b^Pacchimenā^eb^ti ‘‘bahiddhā’’ti iminā padena. ^b^Ete kilesā^eb^ti ete ^a^M2.0181^ea^ diṭṭhitaṇhāmānasaññitā kilesā. ^b^Etesu vatthūsū^eb^ti ajjhattabahiddhāvatthūsu. ^b^Samma…pe… passatī^eb^ti pubbabhāge vipassanāñāṇena sammasanavasena, maggakkhaṇe abhisamayavasena suṭṭhu attapaccakkhena ñāṇena passati.
[06]Anusayasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^201^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Ahameta’’nti ^a^V2.0160^ea^ ahaṃkārādīnaṃ anavasesappahānena accantameva ^b^apagataṃ^eb^.
[06]Apagatasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Dutiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^Dvīsū^eb^ti paṭhamavaggādīsu. Desanāya asekkhabhūmiyā desitattā ^b^asekkhabhūmi kathitā. Paṭhamo^eb^ti paṭhamavaggo ‘‘sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā’’tiādinā ^b^āyācantassa, dutiyo anāyācantassa^eb^ therassa ajjhāsayavasena kathito. ^b^Vimuttiparipācanīyadhammā^eb^ nāma vivaṭṭasannissitā saddhindriyādayo. Tena pana vipassanāya kathitattā kathitā evāti. Taṃtaṃdesanānusārena hi thero te dhamme paripākaṃ pāpesi. Tathā hi bhagavā dutiyavaggaṃ anāyācitopi desesi.
[06]Sāratthappakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Rāhulasaṃyuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^202^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āyasmā^eb^^a^V2.0161^ea^^a^M2.0182^ea^^b^ca lakkhaṇo^eb^tiādīsu ‘‘ko nāmāyasmā lakkhaṇo, kasmā ca ‘lakkhaṇo’ti nāmaṃ ahosi, ko cāyasmā moggallāno, kasmā ca sitaṃ pātvākāsī’’ti taṃ sabbaṃ pakāsetuṃ ^b^‘‘yvāya’’^eb^ntiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^Lakkhaṇasampannenā^eb^ti purisalakkhaṇasampannena.

[03]Īsaṃ hasitaṃ ‘‘sita’’nti vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘mandahasita’’^eb^nti. ^b^Aṭṭhisaṅkhalika^eb^nti nayidaṃ aviññāṇakaṃ aṭṭhisaṅkhalikamattaṃ, atha kho eko petoti āha ^b^‘‘petaloke nibbatta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Ete attabhāvā^eb^ti petattabhāvā. ^b^Na āpāthaṃ āgacchantī^eb^ti devattabhāvā viya na āpāthaṃ āgacchanti pakatiyā. Tesaṃ pana ruciyā āpāthaṃ āgaccheyyuṃ manussānaṃ. Dukkhābhibhūtānaṃ anāthabhāvadassanapadaṭṭhānā karuṇāti āha ^b^‘‘kāruññe kattabbe’’^eb^ti. Attano ca sampattiṃ buddhañāṇassa ca sampattinti paccekaṃ sampattisaddo yojetabbo. Tadubhayaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘taṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha attano sampattiṃ anussaritvā sitaṃ pātvākāsīti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^Dhammadhātū^eb^ti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Dhammadhātū^eb^ti vā dhammānaṃ sabhāvo.

[03]^b^Itaro^eb^ti lakkhaṇatthero. ^b^Upapattī^eb^ti jāti. Upapattisīsena hi tathārūpaṃ attabhāvaṃ vadati. ^b^Lohatuṇḍakehī^eb^ti lohamayeheva tuṇḍakehi. ^b^Carantī^eb^ti ākāsena gacchanti. ^b^Acchariyaṃ vatā^eb^ti garahacchariyaṃ nāmetaṃ. ^b^Cakkhubhūtā^eb^ti sampattadibbacakkhukā, lokassa cakkhubhūtāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Yatrā^eb^ti hetuatthe nipātoti āha ^b^‘‘yatrāti kāraṇavacana’’^eb^nti. Aññatra hi ‘‘yatra hi nāmā’’ti attho vuccati. ^b^Appamāṇe sattanikāye^eb^ te ca kho vibhāgena kāmabhavādibhede bhave, nirayādibhedā ^a^V2.0162^ea^ gatiyo, nānattakāyanānattasaññiādiviññāṇaṭṭhitiyo, tathārūpe sattāvāse ca sabbaññutaññāṇañca me upanetuṃ ^b^paccakkhaṃ karontena^eb^.

[03]^b^Goghātako^eb^ti ^a^M2.0183^ea^ gunnaṃ abhiṇhaṃ hananako. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vadhitvā vadhitvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti gunnaṃ vadhakakammassa. ^b^Aparāpariyakammassā^eb^ti aparāpariyavedanīyakammassa. Balavatā goghātakakammena vipāke dīyamāne aladdhokāsaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ tasmiṃ vipakkavipāke idāni laddhokāsaṃ ^b^‘‘avasesakamma’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Paṭisandhī^eb^ti pāpakammajanitā paṭisandhi. ^b^Kammasabhāgatāyā^eb^ti kammasadisabhāvena. ^b^Ārammaṇasabhāgatāyā^eb^ti ārammaṇassa sabhāgabhāvena sadisabhāvena. Yādise hi ārammaṇe pubbe taṃ kammaṃ tassa ca vipāko pavatto, tādiseyeva ārammaṇe idaṃ kammaṃ imassa vipāko ca pavattoti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesenā’’^eb^ti. Bhavati hi taṃsadisepi tabbohāro yathā ‘‘so eva tittiro, tāniyeva osadhānī’’ti. ^b^Nimittaṃ ahosī^eb^ti pubbe katūpacitassa petūpapattinibbattanavasena katokāsassa tassa kammassa nimittabhūtaṃ idāni tathā upaṭṭhahantaṃ tassa vipākassa nimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ahosi. ^b^So^eb^ti goghātako. ^b^Aṭṭhisaṅkhalikapeto jāto^eb^ kammasarikkhakavipākatāvasena.
[06]Aṭṭhisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^203^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Gomaṃsapesiyo katvā^eb^ti gāviṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā gomaṃsaṃ phāletvā pesiyo katvā. ^b^Sukkhāpetvā^eb^ti kālantaraṃ ṭhapanatthaṃ sukkhāpetvā. Sukkhāpiyamānānaṃ maṃsapesīnañhi vallūrasamaññā.
[06]Pesisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^204^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nippakkhacamme^eb^ti vigatapakkhacamme.
[03]^b^205^eb^^b^.^eb^ Urabbhe hanatīti ^b^orabbhiko. Eḷake^eb^ti aje.
[03]^b^206^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nivāpapuṭṭhe^eb^ti ^a^V2.0163^ea^^a^M2.0184^ea^ attanā dinnanivāpena posite. ^b^Asinā vadhitvā vadhitvā^eb^ vikkiṇanto.
[03]^b^207^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekaṃ miga^eb^nti ekaṃ dīpakamigaṃ.
[03]^b^208^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kāraṇāhī^eb^ti yātanāhi. ^b^Ñatvā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānaṃ ñatvā.
[03]^b^209^eb^^b^.^eb^ Suṇoti pūretīti ^b^sūto,^eb^ assadamakādiko.
[03]^b^210^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pesuññūpasaṃhāravasena ito sutaṃ amutra, amutra vā sutaṃ idha sūcetīti ^b^sūcako^eb^. Anayabyasanaṃ pāpesi manusseti sambandho.

[03]^b^211^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vinicchayāmacco^eb^ti raññā aḍḍakaraṇe ṭhapito vinicchayamahāmatto. So hi gāmajanakāyaṃ kūṭeti vañcetīti ^b^gāmakūṭako^eb^ti vuccati. Keci ‘‘tādiso eva gāmajeṭṭhako gāmakūṭako’’ti vadanti. ^b^Samena bhavitabbaṃ,^eb^ ‘‘dhammaṭṭho’’ti vattabbato. Rahassaṅge nisīdanavasena ^b^visamā nisajjāva ahosi^eb^.
[06]Kumbhaṇḍasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Paṭhamavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^212^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Phusanto^eb^ti ^a^V2.0164^ea^^a^M2.0185^ea^ theyyāya phusanto.
[03]^b^214^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mātugāmo^eb^ sassāmiko ^b^attano phasse anissaro. Vaṭṭitvā^eb^ti bhassitvā aparaṃ gantvā.
[03]^b^215^eb^^b^.^eb^ Maṅganavasena ulatīti ^b^maṅguli,^eb^ virūpabībhacchabhāvena pavattatīti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘virūpaṃ duddasikaṃ bībhaccha’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^216^eb^^b^.^eb^ Uddhaṃ uddhaṃ agginā pakkasarīratāya ^b^uppakkaṃ^eb^. Heṭṭhato paggharaṇavasena kilinnasarīratāya ^b^okilinī^eb^. Ito cito ca aṅgārasamparikiṇṇatāya ^b^okirinī^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sā kirā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Aṅgāracitake^eb^ti aṅgārasañcaye. ^b^Sarīrato paggharanti^eb^ asuciduggandhajegucchāni sedagatāni. ^b^Tassa kira rañño^eb^ti tassa kāliṅgassa rañño. ^b^Nāṭakinī^eb^ti nacce adhikatā itthī. ^b^Seda^eb^nti sedanaṃ, tāpananti attho.
[06]Okilinīsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^217^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Asīsakaṃ kabandhaṃ hutvā nibbatti^eb^ kammāyūhanakāle tathā nimittaggahaṇaparicayato.

[03]^b^218-222^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Lāmakabhikkhū^eb^ti ^a^V2.0165^ea^^a^M2.0186^ea^ hīnācāratāya lāmako, bhikkhuvesatāya, bhikkhāhārena jīvanato ca bhikkhu. ^b^Cittakeḷi^eb^nti cittaruciyaṃ taṃ taṃ kīḷanto. ^b^Ayamevā^eb^ti bhikkhuvatthusmiṃ vuttanayo eva.
[06]Pāpabhikkhusuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sāratthappakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Lakkhaṇasaṃyuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^223^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kūṭaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0166^ea^^a^M2.0187^ea^^b^gacchantī^eb^ti kūṭacchiddassa anupavisanavasena kūṭaṃ gacchanti. Yā ca gopānasiyo gopānasantaragatā, tāpi kūṭaṃ āhacca ṭhānena ^b^kūṭaṅgamā^eb^. Duvidhāpi kūṭe samosaraṇā. ^b^Kūṭassa samugghātena^eb^ vināsena bhijjanena. ^b^Avijjāya samugghātenā^eb^ti avijjāya accantameva appavattiyā. Tena ca mokkhadhammādhigamena tadanurūpadhammādhigamo dassito. ^b^Appamattā^eb^ti pana iminā tassa upāyo dassito.
[06]Kūṭasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^224^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Evaṃ appakā^eb^ yathā nakhasikhāya āropitapaṃsu, sugatisaṃvattaniyassa kammassa appakattā ^b^evaṃ devesupī^eb^ti hīnūdāharaṇavasena vuttaṃ. Appatarā hi sattā ye devesu jāyanti, tañca kho kāmadevesu. Itaresu pana vattabbameva natthi.
[06]Nakhasikhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^225^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vidhaṃsayanti^eb^ viheṭhayanti. ^b^Vaḍḍhitā^eb^ti bhāvanāpāripūrivasena paribrūhitā. ^b^Punappunaṃ katā^eb^ti bhāvanāya bahulīkaraṇena aparāparaṃ pavattitā ^b^yuttayānaṃ viya katā^eb^ti yathā yuttaṃ ājaññarathaṃ chekena sārathinā adhiṭṭhitaṃ yathāruci pavattati, evaṃ yathāruci pavattiyā gamitā. ^b^Patiṭṭhānaṭṭhenā^eb^ti adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena. ^b^Vatthu viya katā^eb^ sabbaso upakkilesavisodhanena suvisodhitamariyādaṃ viya katā. ^b^Adhiṭṭhitā^eb^ti paṭipakkhadūrībhāvato subhāvitabhāvena avikampaneyyatāya ṭhapitā ^a^V2.0167^ea^. ^b^Samantato citā^eb^ti sabbabhāgena bhāvanūpacayaṃ gamitā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘suvaḍḍhitā’’^eb^ti ^a^M2.0188^ea^. ^b^Suṭṭhu samāraddhā^eb^ti mettābhāvanāya matthakappattiyā sammadeva sampāditā.
[06]Kulasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^226^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mahāmukhaukkhalīna^eb^nti mahāmukhānaṃ mahantakoḷumbānaṃ sataṃ. ^b^Paṇītabhojanabharitāna^eb^nti sappimadhusakkarādīhi upanītapaṇītabhojanehi paripuṇṇānaṃ. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti pāṭhassa. ^b^Goduhanamatta^eb^nti godohanavelāmattaṃ. Taṃ pana kittakaṃ adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘gāviyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sabbasattesu hitapharaṇa^eb^nti anodhisomettābhāvanamāha – mettacittaṃ appanāppattaṃ bhāvetuṃ sakkotīti adhippāyo. Tampi tato yathāvuttadānato ^b^mahapphalatara^eb^nti.
[06]Okkhāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^227^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Agge paharitvā^eb^ti tiṇhaphalasattiyā agge hatthena vā muṭṭhinā vā pahāraṃ datvā. ^b^Kappāsavaṭṭiṃ viyā^eb^ti pahatakappāsapiṇḍaṃ viya. ^b^Niyyāsavaṭṭiṃ viyā^eb^ti phalasaṇṭhānaṃ niyyāsapiṇḍaṃ viya. ^b^Ekato katvā^eb^ti kalikādibhāvena vīsatiṃsapiṇḍāni ekajjhaṃ katvā. ^b^Alliyāpento^eb^ piṇḍaṃ karonto. ^b^Paṭileṇetī^eb^ti paṭilīnayati nāmeti. ^b^Alliyāpento^eb^ te dvepi dhārā ekato samphusāpento. ^b^Paṭikoṭṭetī^eb^ti paṭipaharati. Tattha khaṇḍaṃ viya niyyāso. ^b^Kappāsavaṭṭanakaraṇīya^eb^nti vihatassa kappāsassa paṭisaṃharaṇavasena bandhanadaṇḍaṃ. ^b^Pavattento^eb^ti kappāsassa saṃvellanavasena pavattento.
[06]Sattisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^228^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Daḷhadhanuno^eb^ti ^a^M2.0189^ea^ thirataradhanuno. Idāni tassa thiratarabhāvaṃ paricchedato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘daḷhadhanū’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^dvisahassathāma^eb^nti palānaṃ dvisahassathāmaṃ. Vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yassā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^yassā^eb^ti dhanuno. ^b^Āropitassā^eb^ti jiyaṃ āropitassa. ^b^Jiyābaddho^eb^ti jiyāya baddho. Pathavito muccati, etaṃ ‘‘dvisahassathāma’’nti veditabbaṃ ^a^V2.0168^ea^. ^b^Lohasīsādīna^eb^nti kāḷalohatambalohasīsādīnaṃ. ^b^Bhāro^eb^ti purisabhāro, so pana majjhimapurisassa vasena edisaṃ tassa balaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Uggahitasippā^eb^ dhanuvedasikkhāvasena. ^b^Ciṇṇavasībhāvā^eb^ lakkhesu avirajjhanasarakkhepavasena. Kataṃ rājakulādīsu upagantvā asanaṃ sarakkhepo etehīti ^b^katūpasanā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘rājakulādīsu dassitasippā’’^eb^ti.

[03]‘‘Bodhisatto cattāri kaṇḍāni āharī’’ti vatvā tameva atthaṃ vitthārato dassento ^b^‘‘tadā kirā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^javissāmā^eb^ti dhāvissāma. ^b^Aggi uṭṭhahī^eb^ti sīghapatanasantāpena ca sūriyarasmisantāpassa āsannabhāvena ca usumā uṭṭhahi. ^b^Pakkhapañjarenā^eb^ti pakkhajālantarena.

[03]^b^Nivattitvā^eb^ti ‘‘nippayojanamidaṃ javana’’nti nivattitvā. ^b^Pattakaṭāhena otthaṭapatto viyā^eb^ti pihitapatto viya ahosi, vegasā patanena nagarassa upari ākāsassa nirikkhaṇaṃ ahosi. Sañcāritattā ^b^anekahaṃsasahassasadiso paññāyi^eb^ seyyathāpi bodhisattassa dhanuggahakāle sarakūṭādidassane.

[03]^b^Dukkara^eb^nti tassa adassanaṃ sandhāyāha, na attano patanaṃ. Sūriyamaṇḍalañhi atisīghena javena gacchantampi paññāsayojanāyāmavitthataṃ attano vipulatāya pabhassaratāya ca sattānaṃ cakkhussa gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati, javanahaṃso pana tādisena sūriyena saddhiṃ javena gacchanto na paññāyeyya. Tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘na sakkā tayā passitu’’^eb^nti. ^b^Cattāro^eb^ akkhaṇavedhino. Gantvā gahite sotuṃ ghaṇḍaṃ piḷandhāpetvā sayaṃ puratthābhimukho nisinno. Puratthimadisābhimukhaṃ gatakaṇḍaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘paṭhamakaṇḍeneva saddhiṃ uppatitvā’’^eb^ti. Te cattāri kaṇḍāni ekakkhaṇeyeva khipiṃsu.

[03]Āyuṃ ^a^M2.0190^ea^ saṅkharoti etenāti ^b^āyusaṅkhāro^eb^. Yathā hi kammajarūpānaṃ pavatti jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhā, evaṃ attabhāvassa pavatti tappaṭibaddhāti. Bahuvacananiddeso pana pāḷiyaṃ ekasmiṃ khaṇe anekasatasaṅkhassa jīvitindriyassa upalabbhanato. ^b^Taṃ^eb^ jīvitindriyaṃ. ^b^Tato^eb^ yathāvuttadevatānaṃ javato ^b^sīghataraṃ khīyati^eb^ ittarakhaṇattā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
[21]‘‘Jīvitaṃ attabhāvo ca, sukhadukkhā ca kevalā;
[22]Ekacittasamāyuttā, lahuso vattate khaṇo’’ti. (mahāni. 10);
[03]^b^Bhedo^eb^ti ^a^V2.0169^ea^ bhaṅgo. ^b^Na sakkā paññāpetuṃ^eb^ tatopi ativiya ittarakhaṇattā.
[06]Dhanuggahasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^229^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aññe rājāno ca bhāgaṃ gaṇhantā ime viya dasabhāgaṃ gaṇhantīti tesamayaṃ anugati paññāyati. Mahājanassa ānayanato ^b^ānako^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘evaṃladdhanāmo’’^eb^ti. Idāni taṃ ādito paṭṭhāya āgamanānukkamaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘himavante kirā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Kareṇu^eb^nti kareṇukaṃ, hatthininti attho. ^b^Sakkariṃsū^eb^ti anatthapariharaṇavasena pasatthūpahāravasena ca pūjesuṃ. ^b^Otarī^eb^ti kuḷīradahaṃ pāvisi. ^b^Paṭikkamitvā^eb^ ṭhapanavasena apakkamitvā ^b^pati^eb^.

[03]^b^Suvaṇṇarajatādimaya^eb^nti kismiñci chidde suvaṇṇamayaṃ, kismiñci rajatamayaṃ, kismiñci phalikamayaṃ ^b^āṇiṃ ghaṭayiṃsu^eb^ bandhiṃsu. Pubbe pharitvā tiṭṭhantassa dvādasa yojanāni pamāṇo etassāti ^b^dvādasayojanappamāṇo,^eb^ saddo. Athassa anekasatakāle gacchante ^b^antosālāyampi dukkhena suyyittha^eb^ āṇisaṅghāṭamattattā.

[03]^b^Gambhīrā^eb^ti agādhā dukkhogāḷhā. Sallasuttañhi ‘‘animittamanaññāta’’ntiādinā pāḷivasena gambhīraṃ, na atthagambhīraṃ. Tathā hi tattha tā tā gāthā duviññeyyarūpā tiṭṭhanti, duviññeyyaṃ ñāṇena dukkhogāhanti katvā ‘‘gambhīra’’nti ^a^M2.0191^ea^ vuccati. Pubbāparampettha kāsañci gāthānaṃ duviññeyyatāya dukkhogāhameva, tasmā taṃ pāḷivasena ‘‘gambhīra’’nti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pāḷivasena gambhīrā sallasuttasadisā’’^eb^ti. Iminā nayena ‘‘atthavasena gambhīrā’’ti ettha attho veditabbo. Mahāvedallasuttassa atthavasena gambhīratā pākaṭāyeva. Lokaṃ uttaratīti lokuttaro, navavidhāppamāṇadhammo, so atthabhūto etesaṃ atthīti ^b^lokuttarā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘lokuttarātthadīpakā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sattasuññatadhammamattamevā^eb^ti sattena attanā suññataṃ kevalaṃ dhammamattameva. ^b^Uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabba^eb^nti ca liṅgavacanavipallāsena vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘uggahetabbe ca pariyāpuṇitabbe cā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kavitā^eb^ti kavino kammaṃ kavikatā. Yassa pana yaṃ kammaṃ, taṃ tena katanti vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘kavitāti kavīhi katā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Itaraṃ^eb^ ‘‘kāveyyā’’ti padaṃ, kabbanti vuttaṃ hoti. ‘‘Kabba’’nti ca kavinā vuttanti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tasseva vevacana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Cittakkharā^eb^ti vicitrākārākkharā. ^b^Sāsanato bahibhūtā^eb^ti na sāsanāvacarā. ^b^Tesaṃ sāvakehī^eb^ti ‘‘buddhānaṃ sāvakā’’ti ^a^V2.0170^ea^ apaññātānaṃ yesaṃ kesañci sāvakehi. ^b^Anuggayhamānā^eb^ti na uggayhamānā savanadhāraṇaparicayātthūpaparikkhādivasena anuggayhamānā. ^b^Antaradhāyanti^eb^ adassanaṃ gacchanti.
[06]Āṇisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^230^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kaliṅgaraṃ vuccati khuddakadārukhaṇḍaṃ, taṃ upadhānaṃ etesanti ^b^kaliṅgarūpadhānā^eb^. Licchavī pana khadiradaṇḍaṃ upadhānaṃ katvā tadā vihariṃsu. Tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘khadiraghaṭikāsū’’^eb^tiādi. Pakativijjusaññito natthi etesaṃ khaṇo vijjhaneti ^b^akkhaṇavedhino^eb^ tato sīghataraṃ vijjhanato. ‘‘Akkhaṇa’’nti vijju vuccati ittarakhaṇattā. Akkhaṇobhāsena lakkhaṇavedhakā ^b^akkhaṇavedhino^eb^. Anekadhā bhinnassa vālassa vijjhanena ^b^vālavedhino^eb^. Vālekadeso hi idha ‘‘vālo’’ti gahito.

[03]Bahudeva divasabhāgaṃ padhānānuyogato uppannadarathaparissamavinodanatthaṃ ^b^nhāyitvā. Te sandhāyā^eb^ti te tathārūpe padhānakammikabhikkhū sandhāya. ^b^Idaṃ^eb^ idāni vuccamānaṃ atthajātaṃ ^b^vuttaṃ^eb^ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ. ^b^Ayampi dīpo^eb^ti ^a^M2.0192^ea^ tambapaṇṇidīpamāha. Padhānānuyuñjanavelāya nivedanavasena tattha tattha ekajjhaṃ pahataghaṇḍinigghoseneva ^b^ekaghaṇḍinigghoso,^eb^ tattha tattha paṇṇasālādīsu vasantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasena ekapadhānabhūto. Nānāmukhoti anurādhapurassa pacchimadisāyaṃ eko vihāro, ^b^pilicchikoḷi^eb^nagarassa puratthimadisāyaṃ. Ubhayattha pavattaghaṇḍisaddā antarāpavattaghaṇḍisaddehi missetvā osaranti. ^b^Kalyāṇiyaṃ^eb^ pavattaghaṇḍisaddo tathā nāgadīpe.
[06]Kaliṅgarasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^231^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Atikkantavela^eb^nti bhattānumodanaupanisinnakathāvelato atikkantavelaṃ. ^b^Asambhinnenā^eb^ti sarasampattito asambhinnena, sarassa uccāraṇasampattiṃ aparihāpetvāti attho. Aparisuddhāsayatāya ^b^neva guṇavaṇṇāya na ñāṇabalāya hoti. Ta^eb^nti taṃ tathā paccayānaṃ paribhuñjanaṃ, taṃ tathā micchāpaṭipajjanaṃ.
[06]Nāgasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^232^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Gharānaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0171^ea^^b^sandhī^eb^ti gharena gharassa sambandhaṭṭhānaṃ. Saha malena vattatīti ^b^samalaṃ^eb^. Gehato gāmato ca nikkhamanacandanikaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Saṅkāraṭṭhāna^eb^nti saṅkārakūṭaṃ. Keci ‘‘sandhisaṅkārakūṭaṭṭhāna’’nti vadanti. ^b^Vuṭṭhāna^eb^nti āpannāapattito, na kilesato vuṭṭhānaṃ, suddhante adhiṭṭhānaṃ. Taṃ pana yathāāpannāya āpattiyā ‘‘desanā’’tveva vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘desanā paññāyatī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Biḷārasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^233^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ettakampī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0193^ea^ iminā jarasiṅgālena laddhabbaṃ cittassādamattampi na labhissati sakalameva kappaṃ sabbaso avīcijālāhi nirantaraṃ jhāyamānatāya niccadukkhāturabhāvato.
[06]Siṅgālasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^234^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Katajānana^eb^nti katūpakārajānanaṃ. ^b^Kataveditā^eb^ti tasseva paresaṃ pākaṭakaraṇavasena jānanameva. ^b^Ācāramevā^eb^ti katāparādhameva.
[06]Dutiyasiṅgālasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sāratthappakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Opammasaṃyuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^235^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sāvakānaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0172^ea^^a^M2.0194^ea^^b^ālāpo^eb^ti sāvakānaṃ sabrahmacāriṃ uddissa ālāpo. ^b^Buddhehi sadisā mā homā^eb^ti buddhāciṇṇaṃ samudācāraṃ akathentehi sāvakehi, ‘‘āvuso bhikkhave’’ti ālapitā bhikkhū, ‘‘āvuso’’ti paṭivacanaṃ denti, na, ‘‘bhante’’ti. ^b^Dutiyajjhāne vitakkavicārā nirujjhanti^eb^ tesaṃ nirodheneva tassa jhānassa uppādetabbato. ^b^Yesaṃ nirodhā^eb^ti yesaṃ vacīsaṅgārānaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ nirujjhanena suvikkhambhitabhāvena saddāyatanaṃ appavattiṃ gacchati kāraṇassa dūrato passambhitattā. ^b^Ariyo^eb^ti niddoso. Parisuddho ^b^tuṇhībhāvo,^eb^ na titthiyānaṃ mūgabbataggahaṇaṃ viya aparisuddhoti adhippāyo. ^b^Paṭhamajjhānādīnī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena tatiyajjhānādīni saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]Ārammaṇabhūtena vitakkena saha gatā pavattāti ^b^vitakkasahagatā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘vitakkārammaṇā’’^eb^ti. Vitakkārammaṇatā ca saññāmanasikārānaṃ sukhumāarammaṇaggahaṇavasena daṭṭhabbā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na santato upaṭṭhahiṃsū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Na paguṇaṃ^eb^ sammadeva vasībhāvassa anāpāditattā. ^b^Saññāmanasikārāpī^eb^ti tatiyajjhānādhigamāya pavattiyamānā saññāmanasikārāpi hānabhāgiyāva ahesuṃ, na visesabhāgiyā. ^b^Sammā ṭhapehī^eb^ti bahiddhā vikkhepaṃ pahāya sammā ajjhattameva cittaṃ ṭhapehi. ^b^Ekaggaṃ karohī^eb^ti teneva vikkhepapaṭibāhanena avihatamānasatāya cittasamādhānavasena ekaggaṃ karohi. ^b^Āropehī^eb^ti īsakampi bahumpi apatitaṃ katvā kammaṭṭhānārammaṇe āropehi. Dutiyāggasāvakabhūmiyā pāripūriyā āyasmā mahābhiñño, na yathā tathāti āha ^b^‘‘mahābhiññatanti chaḷabhiññata’’^eb^nti. ^b^Iminā upāyenā^eb^ti iminā ‘‘atha kho maṃ, āvuso’’tiādinā vuttena upāyena. ^b^Vaḍḍhetvā^eb^ti uttari uttari visesabhāgiyabhāvāpādanena samādhiṃ paññañca brūhetvā brūhetvā.
[06]Kolitasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^236^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Atiuḷārampi^eb^^a^V2.0173^ea^^a^M2.0195^ea^^b^sattaṃ vā saṅkhāraṃ vā sandhāya vuttaṃ^eb^ sabbatthameva sabbaso chandarāgassa suppahīnattā. ^b^Jānanatthaṃ pucchati^eb^ satthuguṇānaṃ ativiya uḷāratamabhāvato.
[06]Upatissasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^237^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pariveṇaggenā^eb^ti pariveṇabhāgena. Keci ^b^‘‘ekavihāre^eb^ti ekacchanne ekasmiṃ āvāse’’ti vadanti. ^b^Te^eb^ti te dvepi therā. ^b^Pāṭiyekkesu ṭhānesū^eb^ti visuṃ visuṃ ṭhānesu. ^b^Nisīdantī^eb^ti divāvihāraṃ nisīdanti. ^b^Oḷāriko nāma jāto^eb^ parittadhammārammaṇattā tassa. ^b^Te^eb^ti thero bhagavā ca.
[03]^b^Paripuṇṇavīriyo^eb^ti catukiccasādhanavasena sampuṇṇavīriyo. ^b^Paggahitavīriyo^eb^ti īsakampi saṅkocaṃ anāpajjitvā pavattitavīriyo. ^b^Upanikkhepanamattassevā^eb^ti samīpe ṭhapanamattasseva.

[03]Catubhūmakadhammesu labbhamānattā paññāya ^b^‘‘catubhūmakadhamme anupavisitvā ṭhitaṭṭhenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Lakkhitabbaṭṭhena samādhi eva ^b^samādhilakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. Evaṃ ^b^vipassanālakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ veditabbaṃ. ^b^Aññamaññassā^eb^ti aññassa aññassa nānālakkhaṇāti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Aññassā^eb^ti itarassa. ^b^Dhura^eb^nti vahitabbabhāraṃ. ^b^Dvīsupi etesū^eb^ti samādhilakkhaṇavipassanālakkhaṇesu sammāsambuddho nipphattiṃ gato.
[06]Ghaṭasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^238^eb^^b^.^eb^ Abhicetasi nissitā ^b^ābhicetasikā^eb^. Paṭipakkhavidhamanena abhivisiṭṭhaṃ cittaṃ ^b^abhicittaṃ^eb^. Yasmā jhānānaṃ taṃsampayuttaṃ cittaṃ nissāya paccayo hotiyeva, tasmā ^b^‘‘nissitāna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Nikāmalābhī^eb^ti yathicchitalābhī ^a^M2.0196^ea^. ^b^Yathāparicchedenā^eb^ti yathākatena kālaparicchedena. ^b^Vipulalābhī^eb^ti appamāṇalābhī. ‘‘Kasira’’nti hi parittaṃ vuccati, tappaṭipakkhena ^a^V2.0174^ea^^b^akasiraṃ^eb^ appamāṇaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paguṇajjhānoti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sithilamārabbhā^eb^ti sithilaṃ vīriyārambhaṃ katvāti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘sithilaṃ vīriyaṃ pavattetvā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Navasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^239^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aññāni rūpānī^eb^ti paresaṃ rūpāni. ^b^Atikkantarūpo^eb^ti attano rūpasampattiyā rūpasobhāya atikkamitvā ṭhitarūpo, sucirampi velaṃ olokentassa tuṭṭhiāvaho. Dassanassa cakkhussa hitoti ^b^dassanīyo^eb^. Pasādaṃ āvahatīti ^b^pāsādiko. Chavivaṇṇasundaratāyā^eb^ti chavivaṇṇassa ceva sarīrasaṇṭhānassa ca sobhanabhāvena.
[06]Sujātasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^240^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Virūpasarīravaṇṇa^eb^nti asundarachavivaṇṇañceva asundarasaṇṭhānañca. ^b^Pamāṇavasenā^eb^ti sarīrappamāṇavasena. ^b^Icchiticchita^eb^nti attanā icchiticchitaṃ. ^b^Mahāsārajja^eb^nti mahanto maṅkubhāvo.
[03]^b^Guṇe āvajjetvā^eb^ti attanā jānanakaniyāmena satthuno kāyaguṇe ca cārittaguṇe ca āvajjetvā manasi katvā.
[03]^b^Yojanāvaṭṭa^eb^nti yojanaparikkhepaṃ.
[03]‘‘Kāyasmī’’ti gāthāsukhatthaṃ niranunāsikaṃ katvā niddesoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kāyasmi’’^eb^nti. ^b^Akāraṇaṃ kāyappamāṇa^eb^nti sarīrappamāṇaṃ nāma appamāṇaṃ, sīlādiguṇāva pamāṇanti adhippāyo.
[06]Lakuṇḍakabhaddiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^241^eb^^b^.^eb^ Purassa ^a^M2.0197^ea^ esāti ^b^porī,^eb^ cāturiyayuttatā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘puravāsīna’’^eb^ntiādi. Sā pana ^a^V2.0175^ea^ dutavilambitakhalitavasena appasannalūkhatādidosarahitā hotīti āha ^b^‘‘pura…pe… vācāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Asandiddhāyā^eb^ti muttavācāya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘apalibuddhāyā’’^eb^tiādi. Na elaṃ dosaṃ galetīti ^b^anelagalā,^eb^ avirujjhanavācā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘niddosāyā’’^eb^ti. Catusaccassa pakāsakā, na kadāci saccavimuttāti āha ^b^‘‘catusaccapariyāpannāyā’’^eb^ti. Tā hi cattāri saccāni paricchijja āpādenti paṭipādenti pavattenti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘cattāri saccāni amuñcitvā pavattāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dhajo nāma^eb^ sabbadhammehi samussitaṭṭhena.
[06]Visākhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^242^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āraññiko^eb^tiādīsu araññakathāsīsena senāsanapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ dhutaṅgānaṃ, piṇḍapātakathāsīsena piṇḍapātapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ, paṃsukūlikasīsena cīvarapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ, taggahaṇeneva vīriyanissitadhutaṅgassa ca samādāya vattanaṃ dīpitanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Āgatena^eb^ bhagavatā ^b^aparabhāge kathitaṃ^eb^.
[06]Nandasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^243^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhaṇḍaka^eb^nti pattacīvaraṃ. ^b^Nisīdiyeva^eb^ vattassa asikkhitattā. Tujjanatthena vācā eva sattiyoti āha ^b^‘‘vācāsattīhī’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Vācāya sannitodakenā^eb^ti vacanasaṅkhātena samantato niccaṃ katvā upatudanato sannitudakena. Vibhattialopena so niddeso. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vacanapatodenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Uccakule jāti etassāti ^b^jātimā,^eb^ brahmajātiko isi. ^b^Mātaṅgo^eb^ti caṇḍālo. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti kumbhakārasālāyaṃ. ^b^Okāsaṃ yāci^eb^^a^M2.0198^ea^ kumbhakāraṃ. Mahantaṃ disvā āha – ^b^‘‘paṭhamataraṃ paviṭṭho pabbajito’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tatthevā^eb^ti tassāyeva sālāya dvāraṃ nissāya dvārasamīpe. ^b^Me^eb^ti mayā. ^b^Khama mayha^eb^nti mayhaṃ aparādhaṃ khamassu. ^b^Te^eb^ti tayā. Puna ^b^te^eb^ti tava. ^b^Gaṇhi^eb^ uggantuṃ appadānavasena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nāssa uggantuṃ adāsī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pabujjhiṃsū^eb^ti niddāya pabujjhiṃsu pakatiyā pabujjhanavelāya upagatattā.
[03]^b^Chavo^eb^ti ^a^V2.0176^ea^ nihīno. ^b^Anantamāyo^eb^ti vividhamāyo māyāvī.

[03]^b^So^eb^ti mattikāpiṇḍo. ‘‘Sattadhā bhijjī’’ti etthāyamadhippāyo – yaṃ tena tāpasena pāramitāparibhāvanasamiddhāhi nānāvihārasamāpattiparipūritāhi sīladiṭṭhisampadādīhi susaṅkhatasantāne mahākaruṇādhivāse mahāsatte bodhisatte ariyūpavādakammaṃ abhisapasaṅkhātaṃ pharusavacanaṃ pavattitaṃ, taṃ mahāsattassa khettavisesabhāvato tassa ca ajjhāsayapharusatāya diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ hutvā sace so mahāsattaṃ na khamāpeti, taṃ kakkhaḷaṃ hutvā vipaccanasabhāvaṃ jātaṃ, khamāpite pana mahāsatte payogasampattipaṭibāhitattā avipākadhammataṃ āpajjati ahosikammabhāvato. Ayañhi ariyūpavādapāpassa diṭṭhadhammavedanīyassa ca dhammatā. Yaṃ taṃ bodhisattena sūriyuggamananivāraṇaṃ kataṃ, ayaṃ bodhisattena diṭṭho upāyo. Tena hi ubbāḷhā manussā bodhisattassa santike tāpasaṃ ānetvā khamāpesuṃ. Sopi ca mahāsattassa guṇe jānitvā tasmiṃ cittaṃ pasādesi. Yaṃ panassa matthake mattikāpiṇḍassa ṭhapanaṃ tassa sattadhā phālanaṃ kataṃ, taṃ manussānaṃ cittānurakkhaṇatthaṃ. Aññathā hi ime pabbajitā samānā cittassa vasaṃ vattanti, na pana cittamattano vase vattāpentīti mahāsattampi tena sadisaṃ katvā gaṇheyyuṃ, tadassa nesaṃ dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāyāti. ^b^Patirūpa^eb^nti yuttaṃ.
[06]Tissasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^244^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Atīte khandhapañcake^eb^ti atīte attabhāve. ^b^Chandarāgappahānenā^eb^ti chandarāgassa accantameva jahanena. ^b^Pahīnaṃ nāma hoti^eb^ anapekkhapariccāgato. ^b^Paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ nāma hoti^eb^ sabbaso chaḍḍitattā. ^b^Tayo^eb^^a^M2.0199^ea^^b^bhave^eb^ti iminā upādiṇṇakadhammānaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ. ^b^Sabbā khandhāyatanadhātuyo cā^eb^ti iminā upādiṇṇānampi anupādiṇṇānampi dvidhā pavattalokiyadhammānaṃ gahaṇaṃ avisesetvā vuttattā. ^b^Viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā ṭhitaṃ^eb^ pariññābhisamayavasena. ^b^Tesvevā^eb^ti tebhūmakadhammesu eva. ^b^Anupalittaṃ^eb^ amathitaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhisaṃkilesābhāvato. ^b^Tadeva sabba^eb^nti heṭṭhā tīsupi padesu idha sabbaggahaṇena gahitaṃ tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ. ^b^Jahitvā^eb^ti pahānābhisamayavasena. Taṇhā khīyati etthāti ^b^taṇhakkhaya^eb^saṅkhāte nibbāne ^b^vimuttaṃ. Tamaha^eb^nti taṃ uttamapuggalaṃ ekavihāriṃ brūmi taṇhādutiyassa abhāvato. Ettha ca pariññāpahānābhisamayakathanena itarampi abhisamayaṃ atthato kathitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[06]Theranāmakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^245^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mahākappino^eb^ti ^a^V2.0177^ea^ pūjāvacanametaṃ yathā ‘‘mahāmoggallāno’’ti. ^b^Tathārūpa^eb^nti ‘‘buddho dhammo’’tiādikaṃ guṇavisesavantapaṭibaddhaṃ. ^b^Sāsana^eb^nti desantarato āgatavacanaṃ. ^b^Jaṅghavāṇijā^eb^ti jaṅghacārino vāṇijā. ^b^Kiñci sāsana^eb^nti apubbapavattidīpakaṃ kiñci vacananti pucchi. ^b^Pīti uppajji^eb^ yathā taṃ suciraṃ katābhinīhāratāya paripakkañāṇassa. ^b^Aparimāṇaṃ^eb^ guṇassa aparimāṇato sabbaññuguṇaparidīpanato, sesaratanadvaye niyyānikabhāvadīpanato diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatabhāvadīpanatoti vattabbaṃ. Yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyadukkhato saṃsāradukkhato ca apatante dhāretīti ^b^dhammo^eb^. Suparisuddhadiṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatoti ^b^saṅgho^eb^ti. Ratanattho pana tiṇṇampi sadiso evāti.
[03]^b^Navasatasahassāni adāsi^eb^ devī. ^b^Tumhe^eb^ti rājiniṃ gāravena bahuvacanena vadati. ^b^Rāgo^eb^ti anugacchantarāgo.

[03]^b^Janite^eb^ti kammakilesehi nibbattite. Kammakilesehi pajātattā pajāti pajāsaddo janitasaddena samānatthoti āha – ^b^‘‘janite, pajāyāti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aṭṭhahi vijjāhī^eb^ti ^b^ambaṭṭhasutte^eb^ (dī. ni. 1.278) āgatanayena. Tattha hi vipassanāñāṇamanomayiddhīhi saha cha abhiññā ‘‘aṭṭha vijjā’’ti āgatā ^a^M2.0200^ea^. ^b^Tapati^eb^ paṭipakkhavidhamanena vijjotati, taṃ sūriyassa virocananti āha – ^b^‘‘tapatīti virocatī’’^eb^ti. Jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā samāhitena cittena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisinnoti āha – ^b^‘‘duvidhena jhānena jhāyamāno’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbamaṅgalagāthā^eb^ti sabbamaṅgalāvirodhī gāthāti vadanti. Tathā hi vadanti –
[21]‘‘Maṅgalaṃ bhagavā buddho, dhammo saṅgho ca maṅgalaṃ;
[22]Sabbesampi ca sattānaṃ, sa puññavitamaṅgala’’nti.

[03]^b^Pūjaṃ kāretvā^eb^ ekaṃ agārikadhammakathikaṃ upāsakaṃ āha. Ettha ca ‘‘jhāyī tapatī’’ti iminā ārammaṇūpanijjhānānaṃ gahitattā dhammaratanaṃ gahitameva. ‘‘Brāhmaṇo’’ti iminā saṅgharatanaṃ gahitameva. Buddharatanaṃ pana sarūpeneva gahitanti.
[06]Mahākappinasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^246^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sammā ^a^V2.0178^ea^ saṃsandanavasena eti pavattatīti sameti, sammādiṭṭhiādi. Sammā cirarattaṃ cirakālaṃ sameti etesaṃ atthīti ^b^cirarattaṃsametikā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dīgharatta’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Idāni imesa^eb^nti etarahi etesaṃ. ^b^Ayaṃ sāsanadhammo^eb^ ajjhāsayato payogato ca sammā ^b^saṃsandati sameti,^eb^ tasmā majjhe bhinnaṃ viya samameva na visadisaṃ. Kiñca tato eva ^b^buddhena^eb^ bhagavatā paveditadhammavinaye ^b^etesaṃ^eb^ paṭipatti^b^sāsanadhammo sobhati^eb^ virocatīti attho. ^b^Ariyappavedite^eb^ti ariyena sammāsambuddhena sammadeva pakāsite ariyadhamme. Sammadeva samucchedapaṭippassaddhivinayānaṃ vasena ^b^suṭṭhu vinītā^eb^ sabbakilesadarathapariḷāhānaṃ vūpasamena.
[06]Sahāyakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sāratthappakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Bhikkhusaṃyuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
[06]Niṭṭhitā ca sāratthappakāsiniyā
[06]Saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya nidānavaggavaṇṇanā.
